Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-03-13T20:48:07Z'}

title: Convenient but needs more options
review:
Downloaded because I forgot my wallet at home. Just like any other food app, I could order and pay with my card info without the need of my physical card. However, I didn‚Äôt like how there wasn‚Äôt a create your own sub option. I was restricted to select from the existing menu options, and I couldn‚Äôt even remove certain meats from those. Since I was already present in the store I just instructed them on how I wanted it, despite how the app forced me to order it. Would definitely be better if I had the freedom to create my own sub, or AT LEAST remove core meats from an existing sub.

Specifically I just wanted a 6-in ital. herb & cheese w/ pepperoni and shred. mozz. (literally that‚Äôs all), but was forced to order a spicy ital., remove everything, and request no salami personally.

title: Too long to get order through app
review: Customer service was excellent but my major problem is the Subway app. Why is there only one person working at any location at a time? What is the purpose of ordering through the app when I have to wait 45 minutes for my order. That is not just this location. It has happened at other subway locations too. I order through the app for many restaurants but SUBWAY takes the win in the slowest service through the app. Cannot blame employees because there‚Äôs only one at a time. How can they take care of customers waiting + the ones who ordered on the app. I gave Subway three chances at three different locations via app. The app is the most useless creation and a waste of time for the developers who created it. It serves zero purpose. Service is slower thru the app compared to me going regular to order.

title: Don‚Äôt use the App unless you want to wait longer than if you went in as a regular customer
review:
Placed my order. Waited until the due time. Went in. Waited. Asked if they received my order. They did. I waited and waited. Watched customers come in get in line and get service without placing order ahead. They got their food and left more came in and got served.  I was in the store. Tried standing in line. Apparently the giant online order ahead of mine made me invisible even tho regular customers were being served. Horrible experience all around. Actually self boycotting subway completely because of it. At least after digging for an e-mail we received our money back, since you know, I waited 30 minutes and never got my order even started. 
I‚Äôve been using the subway app for a couple months now. It‚Äôs generally ok. But this experience trumps any of that. It was rude and unprofessional to say the least. Zero stars.

title: Not enough options.
review:
When I first got the app I was actually happy that I could order my food and pick it up when I arrived to my location but then later I started to have issues with the app then later realized that I couldn‚Äôt make my sandwich the way I wanted to make it unless I actually went to my location and did it in person, so I started to not like the app within time, now I just use the app when I go in person and just scan the barcode when I order my food at the location, not really as convenient as I thought in the end.

üëéüèº would really love the app more if they gave me a better variety on the app and let me do more choices to my sandwich ü•™ instead of having to go to my location and make it there instead, would make the app a lot more better if they updated it. Then I would give this app 5 stars instead of 2.

title: Needs more work
review: The app gives a lot of headaches. Tried submitting payment method, kept on giving error messages. This is after having closed the app and reopened it a few times, when that didn‚Äôt work I switched off the phone and restarted it a few times, still didn‚Äôt work. I eventually gave up, reopened the app a few days later, and find my payment information had been added. But what good is that? It wasn‚Äôt available when I was hungry. Next, when I tried placing an order, it asks you enter your location so it can find the closest subway to you. It couldn‚Äôt even find that, it kept giving an error message. I repeated the whole cycle of closing and opening the app and rebooting the phone. Still no success. It‚Äôs Subways‚Äôs loss really, they lose a customer, but I can use another app for another restaurant and place the order. Anyway, no need to reply, as I‚Äôll be deleting the app after this review. This is just an FYI, to improve your app.

title: Needs a little love
review: The app is great, love the functionality of the app, but the ordering process needs some work. First, I tried to make the order as a guest, but was forced into signing in. Second, when it came time to pay, it took 3 times of attempting my order before it went through with Apple Pay. Third, the ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù button doesn‚Äôt seem to work. After clicking the button, confirming I‚Äôm here the screen flashes. After 5 times of doing this, the app is stuck in a loading state. I waited 20 minutes for someone to bring my food before finally walking into the store. I give 3 stars as I‚Äôm a developer myself and the amount of work that went into making an app like this doesn‚Äôt go unnoticed. That being said, I wouldn‚Äôt release an app like this without the flaws worked out.

title: I can‚Äôt order from the app anymore
review: I used to LOVE this app because I could order ahead of time and pay from the app. It saved me time on my lunch break because all I had to do was pick up my order. Now the stupid app isn‚Äôt taking my payment information. I have gone through the trouble of choosing my order and getting to the check out only to find that the order won‚Äôt go through because there‚Äôs no card on file. I‚Äôve tried several times to update the info but all I get is an error. I have lost my rewards because of this. And I can‚Äôt take advantage of the app only deals or online order deals either. I tried to contact customer service but everything is done online and there isn‚Äôt an option for app support. I‚Äôm so frustrated about this. I used to love Subway and the app but I have not ordered from them in almost a year.

title: Really?
review:
So-I‚Äôm normally the nicest person ever. I was nice til he said it wasn‚Äôt his problem. 

I ordered via the app-2 pizza subs. Removed all the items pretty much except the pepperoni. Went and picked up. Got home. Order was wrong. I called and the guy said come back up. So I drove back with both sandwiches. He told me to pull to the window, since this particular establishment has a drive thru. I told him it has sauce on it, but I didn‚Äôt want sauce. I ordered it without sauce-specifically removed the sauce-even shows it on my app. He then told me-not his problem-not his fault. The pizza sub comes with marinara sauce. I said yes I get that-but I said on the app I didn‚Äôt want sauce. He then puts the receipt in my face and tells me ‚Äúit says in special instructions-don‚Äôt cut with a knife and don‚Äôt touch sandwich with knife-doesn‚Äôt say you don‚Äôt want sauce. Not my fault‚Äù. Then tells me he won‚Äôt remake the sandwiches. Um-what?!

I then have to open the app and show him I removed the sauce-he told me it comes with sauce. We went back and forth repeatedly. Then finally he says next time put it on the special instructions you don‚Äôt want the sauce. 

But why?!

Why do I have to when your app lets me remove it?!

Then should I just put on special instructions-I want nothing on this except what I‚Äôm saying I want on it and please don‚Äôt touch or cut with a knife? That seems like a waste since I already said I didn‚Äôt want the sauce üôÑ

title: Not worth the trouble
review: Multiple different times I have tried to place a mobile order and it will say something went wrong at checkout. I go to my bank account to find that it charged my account multiple times. (I will however say that they stayed as pending and have gone away. I‚Äôm bothered by the inconvenience of it) The time between the first time this happened, to the last time I tried using the app was a couple of months. I was sure whatever was wrong was fixed at least a few updates ago. But no. Same issue. Staff is always rude when I call about questions (which I understand isn‚Äôt the apps fault, however I wouldn‚Äôt have to call and stress myself with having to do so, if the app just worked in the first place) and I just feel like it‚Äôs not worth keeping the app and trying anymore. I use to use it often because it‚Äôs such an amazing app without these issues.
developerResponse: {'id': 8279259, 'body': 'Hi there, and thanks for reaching out again. The behavior you are describing leads us to believe that you are experiencing a payment issue. You may want to delete your stored payment method and try adding it again, and potentially contact your bank or credit card company to ensure that the information you are using, matches what they have on file.Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-04-18T19:22:33Z'}

title: Worst application from all what I have on my iPhone
review: Extremely unfriendly application, very very small unreadable fonts, not adaptive, extremely confusing way with selections. When order is made it is not automatically refreshed on status - spent 20 minutes just waiting on order when I was sitting inside the Subway store and I was not aware that order is processed and was eating for me as application was still stuck on first step, I got my order only when I asked for it, and application still was not updating the status, I had to exit this application and start it again to see the status update. As the options to blur the sandwich they are not full and again, used unfriendly.. When I got home and opened the sandwiches I found it had tomatoes and my kids are allergic to them - I did not see tomatoes are part of the order by default - had to drive back and make two new orders verbally‚Ä¶.

title: Couldn‚Äôt add card as payment method on app or website
review: Tried to order on website and it kept saying fraudulent card after dozens of attempts and double checks to make sure every number was correct. Assumed it was an attempt to get me on the app. Got the app and instead of it saying ‚Äúfraudulent error‚Äù it just wouldn‚Äôt add the card as a payment method. I tried that dozens of times only to complete the whole form for the card, hit done, and have nothing added to payment methods. It simply wouldn‚Äôt save the info. Updated new phone so that isn‚Äôt the issue.  Ultimately sent someone to the store for me and the order was 3 identical sandwiches. One was on the wrong bread all together and each either had an extra topping that wasn‚Äôt ordered or was missing one that was. Terrible experience overall. Subway purely based on the menu should be amazing but the app, website, and workers are subpar to say the least.

title: Where‚Äôs my ranch?
review:
I have no problems with the app in general, but I mostly order the chicken bacon ranch. If I do so through the app, I always get a sandwich without any ranch and it‚Äôs not even something that comes up on the ‚Äúsauces‚Äù section or anywhere else in the app! If I‚Äôm not ordering for other people at work, I avoid the app, and when I am ordering food for myself and coworkers, I make sure to call the store I placed the order at and explain to the staff that eventually answers the phone (sometimes after several calls) that I want ranch on my sandwich. It‚Äôs hit and miss if I actually get ranch on my chicken bacon RANCH sandwich that I receive, even after I call and ask for it. 
I‚Äôll update my review when the main ingredient that I almost exclusively order is added.
I‚Äôve tried contacting through the subway app itself and haven‚Äôt gotten anything in return, so here I am, writing a ****** review hoping someone sees it.

title: Accurate Feedback!
review: Comparatively to the many, many food apps we‚Äôre all using now (due to Covid), I  was shocked to see Subway has gotten so many ‚Äúgreat‚Äù reviews from ‚Äúnon-users‚Äù for a VERY poorly designed, inconvenient, inconsistent, cumbersome app!! I have my store picked and set, it still makes me confirm it when I place an order! I can‚Äôt add 2 DIFFERENT kinds of meat, or cheese to any custom sandwich! It refreshes itself every time I change ANYTHING!  Really?!! In this day and age of technology this app feels and works VERY antiquated!! And that‚Äôs saying something from a almost 60 year old!! ü§£  Subway, pleeeeeease hire someone from one of your competitors who have marvelously smooth, easy to use and understandable apps to completely redesign yours or maybe ask your REAL users or employees!  The employees don‚Äôt even use the app here in my town, otherwise they wouldn‚Äôt have told me to do something that I can‚Äôt even do on your app today!!! ü§™

title: Worked right the first time now it doesn‚Äôt.
review:
Edit:  They updated the app and broke it for my iPhone 10xr.  It allows you to build a sandwich and then errs out when placing in the bag after trying for a minute.  Very irritating.  Forces me to lose out on deals or choose somewhere else to eat. 

Old:  The app itself worked well.  After order I noticed there might be options for contact free delivery after order was placed, but maybe it was just ‚Äúcoming soon‚Äù.    I will look more closely next time before placing order.  

My ‚Äúin store‚Äù experience was not very good.  I walked in and saw a bag with my three pre-paid sandwiches behind the counter.  All the employees had to do was verify my name and hand me the bag.  Instead a I had to wait in line for three people to slowly go through the normal sandwich creation process.  

SUGGESTION:
Train employees to be aware that the new customer that walked in might be the one who has that completed order waiting.  Take 10 seconds to verify the name and hand them their pre-paid order rather than making them wait 5+ minutes while others complete their orders normally.

UPDATE:  It‚Äôs all good. I read the app instructions more closely.  Just walk to the register directly.  This signals the employees you have a prepaid order. 

 I also noticed a contactless delivery parking.  Just  pull in and call the number in the sign.

title: Better hope your store has everything you ordered
review: I did my first online order today and on the way to the store I get a call that they have no meatballs. I say ok just cancel the order and I‚Äôll go to a different store. They say we can‚Äôt do that, you have to do it in the app. App specifically states to contact the restaurant. I was already there so I went in and stood around for 10 minutes while they tried to figure out how to cancel the order and they never did figure out how. Turns out they did have meatballs they just forgot to thaw them so I had to wait another 15 minutes for the meatballs to thaw since I was already out my $18. Worst Subway experience I‚Äôve ever had and I‚Äôll never order online again. If they could have just canceled the order or even better transfer it to a store that knows what they‚Äôre doing with their inventory then it wouldn‚Äôt have been that big of a deal to just drive a couple miles to a different store.
developerResponse: {'id': 4428612, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-07-27T18:57:09Z'}

title: Awful implementation
review:
I ordered a salad today with avocado slices. Did I get that? Nope. Only realized it once I sat down to eat back at work. No way for me to get back that extra money I spent on this either. Thanks, Subway.

And how do you pick up your food? Well you can do curbside or in store.

If you do curbside during lunch hour, just know that you‚Äôll be waiting a while because Subway doesn‚Äôt have a lot of people on staff to actually carry out this implementation. You‚Äôll more than likely need to step out and go into the store. It‚Äôs not an inconvenience for me, but thankfully I‚Äôm not disabled or really in need of this.

The in store pickup is just as bad though. There is no formal way to do it. Customers standing in line won‚Äôt let you through because they feel like you‚Äôre cutting in line and the people behind the counter are busy taking care of customers in line. No formal line made to indicate where to pick up. No designated area set aside so customers can just come in and grab their food once it‚Äôs ready.

Awful and poor implementation. And this app has been out for a while and other restaurants that just started doing this are doing this a million times better.

Last time I‚Äôm using this app. Got screwed out of my money and what I wanted for lunch and felt awful when going in to pick it up.

title: Love this app!
review: I‚Äôve had this app for a little over a year and it has been great to be able to order ahead and dodge lines when I‚Äôm on a tight lunch schedule. It‚Äôs easy to customize your meals and then simply go inside to the pick up area for your order. Sometimes they have decent deals If you order through the app (sometimes they aren‚Äôt so great). One thing that I disliked was not having coupon codes, but they have that feature now which is great! I did have an issue since the most recent update with the app not locating any locations near me but only my own location. But I deleted the app and redownloaded it and haven‚Äôt had any more problems!

title: Like this app... but...
review: This app has become more user friendly with some of the updates.  I do wish that there was a way to use 2 forms of payment.  I have rec‚Äôd gift cards and added them to app, but if there isn‚Äôt enough money on the card for the whole purchase, it gets declined.  In order to use the balance, I have to then reload the gift card with the additional balance on the order, rather than just pay an additional amount from another form of payment.  Other than this small inconvenience, it is a great app and I like being able to order ahead and then just pick up the order and go with no additional waiting!

title: Not good for custom sandwiches - time waster
review:
This app has a very limited application. If you‚Äôre ordering multiples of standard sandwiches then it‚Äôs ok, but if you want customization, it‚Äôs quicker just to order from the drive thru. 

It won‚Äôt let you change the bread, it doesn‚Äôt include special instructions for each item only for the order as a whole. You can‚Äôt view menu items unless you enter the order process. Exiting a menu item in the order process is difficult and sometimes takes you out of app completely, so if you change your mind you sometimes have to start over. If the store is closed, you can‚Äôt enter the order process to even view the menu (no planning ahead). We spent over half an hour trying to order 5 subs and in the end, just decided to order in the drive thru. App is a waste of time.

title: Needs improvement
review: I ordered a sub buy one get one free. Unfortunately being new to this app I accidentally said done after the first sub. I went back and added the second-order but was charged for both however I only picked up two subs so I paid full price.  Understand each app is different but most apps you add to the cart then continue with the order processing adding additional items. If they do it differently they should put a warning " are you sure you are finished adding items to your cart if so press continue if not press cancel and menu to add additional items. ALL SALES ARE FINAL " this one little thing would get the app a 4-star review from me.

title: Very frustrated with payment
review: So I have Apple Pay PayPal and credit card so this app is supposed to take any one of these.....wrong! I take the lengthy time to order so I can get the 5 dollar foot longs and get to the end and it states this store does not except payment on file so I‚Äôll try another and again and again. Get frustrated and go to the store itself and of course their not allowed to give the discount. How convenient subway! That‚Äôs how you screw people! I liked the app because I didn‚Äôt have to stand in a store in line with 10 other people during our 6-feet apart mask wearing stage. The store stated they to had complained (whether this is true or not) I feel you should be ashamed to be taking more money from people in this time of crises by not fixing your app! If your not going to fix it then allow the discount in store!

title: App ordering
review: I will NEVER AGAIN stand in line at a Subway store.  The App is VERY EASY to use from the first second you click the ‚Äòorder‚Äô button.  Regardless of how many customers are in line at the store ordering Subway has ALWAYS had mine done at the promised time.  You just walk up, tell them your name and then they hand you your bag and you leave since you already paid online.  I will NEVER AGAIN wait in line to order a sandwich from someone who mumbles, and has English for a second or third language (90% of them) and talks very low where I have to say (‚Äúexcuse me‚Äù) every single time they ask me a question about my sandwich!!!! I‚Äôve always loved Subway and because of this app, I can eat it more often now. LOVE, LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP!!!

title: Great app
review:
This is a great app, one of the best food apps for the iPhone. It is easy to use and covers 99% of the options for subs. It not only helps the customer, but also helps the staff by letting them see all the ingredients at once. 
One thing that got me in "trouble" does need fixing. There is a "clear all" option  near the add to bag. I picked a sub and pressed add to bag. I did not notice that my thumb hit "clear all". Instead of clearing the sub or going back to the topping selections - clear all takes off everything except the meat. With no warning I accidentally took home subs with meat only. Please do something to change the button action or at least warn about meat only.

title: Seriously?!?!?!
review: So I‚Äôve had the Subway app for several years now with varying luck, usage and satisfaction.  Being able to pay with the app has always been a struggle for the employees and it has not been user friendly.  Recently it took a turn for the better, my app is carrying a balance, I have a ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù sub that I order, pay and pick up with a couple clicks!  I went to show my wife how the app has gotten better and it asked me to update the app before opening which I did.  Now.... I can‚Äôt even open the app!!!!!  I‚Äôve deleted it and reloaded, nothin and now my ‚Äúnew favorite app‚Äù is use less and I‚Äôm back to where I was two years ago!!!  Hey subway, I think it‚Äôs time to hire someone in IT that isn‚Äôt a relative!!

title: Warning - Zero Customer Service
review: Don‚Äôt order delivery on this. Ever. If there‚Äôs anything wrong with the delivery order, the place that made it won‚Äôt pick up the phone, and there‚Äôs no way to rectify it other than physically go to the store (which didn‚Äôt work anyway). Ordered 3 subs: a chicken teriyaki and two Philly cheesesteaks. Received a chicken teriyaki (minus the chicken) and a separate bread stick. The receipt showed what I ordered. Called multiple times - it went to a voicemail inbox. Tried calling Subway as there‚Äôs nothing in the app. They‚Äôve gone 100% digital (ie they ignore you). Filled out the survey about the form. Zero response. Went to the store with what I received and was told that wasn‚Äôt what they packaged up‚Ä¶ so was accused of lying.. Ended up charging it back though my credit card. So while this app is ok, customer service is nonexistent, and don‚Äôt get delivery as you can‚Äôt do anything about it if they mess up.

title: Seriously flawed
review: Favorites can only be saved after an order has been submitted.  Favorites can‚Äôt be revised and saved, or deleted.  Sometimes certain details in the last order, or Favorite, change ‚Äîfor example, the type of bread defaults back to Italian when it was Italian herbs and cheese.  The order tickets in the restaurant do not print out fully detailed.  I have often had my order made incorrectly because I order a sandwich entitled ‚Äúegg and cheese sub‚Äù and I remove the cheese. The employees think there‚Äôs supposed to be cheese because it doesn‚Äôt read ‚Äúno cheese‚Äù on the ticket.  Or I had ‚ÄúGuacamole on the side‚Äù on my previous order, and I see it in the remarks on my repeat order but it doesn‚Äôt print out on the ticket in the restaurant so they put the guacamole on the sandwich.  There need to be some serious adjustments made to this app.

title: Just got scammed 23$
review: Just got scammed 23$ subway offers delivery I ordered thur them waited for my order and when I got the alert that it arrived there was nothing there at all I couldn‚Äôt contact the driver or track them  I waited 10 more minutes for the food and still nothing I called the store I ordered from I told them the situation and they proceeded to tell me they can‚Äôt do nothing about it and they can‚Äôt control the drivers actions I was baffled at this non sense how you gonna offer delivery if you can‚Äôt even make sure the food gets to where it goes it‚Äôs so ridiculous am disappointed with this  just got robbed of my money for no reason  and they expect me to be okay with this looking for for legal action further if this DOSENT get fixed properly I contacted subway but this incident and haven‚Äôt gotten a response back and they make so hard to contact them it‚Äôs crazy  can‚Äôt believe  this

title: Dude, where‚Äôs my order?
review: This app is great for customizing sandwiches however it doesn‚Äôt always work. Users MUST double check that the order has been sent & fully processed. I‚Äôm leaving this review now because a I have showed up to the store a handful of times only to find that the app had an error and my order was never sent to store. Additionally, today the app would not let submit my payment even though it was showing it had been applied, the submit icon would not highlight and allow me to click it. I restarted my order twice, backed out to the main screen, and re-entered my cart- troubleshooting. Eventually it ‚Äúworked‚Äù. I submitted my payment and everything seems good until I got to subway and learned they hadn‚Äôt  received any online orders.

title: Store staff was rude upon order pick up.
review: When I placed my order through the app I wasn‚Äôt able to pick a time closer to when I would actually be able to pick it up. When I arrived later than the pick up time the girl working came from the back of the store to complain that she had to make my subs during a lunch rush and then I was late picking them up. I only ordered 2 subs with barely anything on them. And correct me if I‚Äôm wrong but it‚Äôs this rude little girl‚Äôs job to make subs. I believe that‚Äôs what she gets paid to do. It‚Äôs not my fault the app didn‚Äôt allow me to pick a later time. Also I didn‚Äôt expect to be that late but got held up at an appointment. Pretty crappy customer service, not impressed.

title: Very Disappointed
review: Placed my order and received the email confirming the order was placed.  Arrived at the scheduled time only to find out the Subway restaurant did not have my order.  I was told the order must have been placed at a different Subway restaurant.  I showed the information my order was placed for the correct Oakley restaurant.  The person then spent the next 10 mins talking to the restaurant manager.  I asked that they just make up the sandwich order, only to be told that they were still looking for the order.  I told them just forget the order altogether.  I get a phone call from the same Subway restaurant, telling me that they just received my order and I could come back and pick up my order. Let‚Äôs just say that didn‚Äôt happen.  I wouldn‚Äôt be using the App again as I spent more time just trying to get my order, then if I went in to order it in person.

Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-09-11T14:29:03Z'}

title: Mess
review:
Since this has been a problem three times, I‚Äôm finally going to write a review.  

Ordering from two different restaurants, the app has forgotten my bread and didn‚Äôt include it in the order.  The first time, they just made it with different bread that I don‚Äôt care for untoasted.  The second time, they just didn‚Äôt make the sandwich, and I was late because I had to wait in line and have them make it even though I ordered it twenty minutes ahead.  The third time, I even included bread notes in the special directions because I figured the app would mess up.  But they did what the first time did as well and I ate a sandwich that I didn‚Äôt care for and didn‚Äôt fit within my dietary guidelines because I already paid for it. 

The app outdoes itself.  I want to be able to order a sandwich and pick up the sandwich I actually order.  I don‚Äôt need cute diagrams of my sandwich, I need it to be accurate.  It was so much better when it was simpler.

title: It‚Äôs okay
review: It can be a convenient for me, especially when I work right across a subway so I can click on my favorite and quickly grab it on my lunch break. But the app is difficult to navigate since you have to go through so much ingredients for one sandwich. Also If you try to go back after adding one thing to the order it automatically submits. This happened to me last week after I realized I almost sent my order to the wrong location, but when I tried to go back to change it, the purchase automatically went through and I had to spend my lunch break talking to customer service to resolve the issue because the store didn‚Äôt cancel my order after they said it was. Customer service was really helpful but it would be great for them to resolve glitches and bugs asap. :)
