You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-06T22:29:35Z'}

title: Worst customer service ever...
review:
Place my first order today... 
and it will be my last. It is unacceptable that you have a name on the product but you are not the responsible, i have to deal with the actual store and the owner of the store to see if i can get a refund. I place my order to the wrong store and according to customer service i could have avoided this problem if I had place it to the store, then i wouldn‚Äôt have a problem at all, like i mentioned before it was a mistake that i didn‚Äôt notice until i got to the store. They said you could have called and cancel that order, right if the employees at the store were to pick up the phone... I do my lunch order over the apps all the time and i guess when it come to subway it is not worth it... one mistake and they just take your money, not even offering credit to spend on your own business.... 
i can say i will no longe be a subway customer... 
what a disappointment
developerResponse: {'id': 7299913, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-02-14T16:15:54Z'}

title: Delivery and product quality
review: I was only going to order delivery from the app because of a promotional email I received from subway. The email stated ‚Äúno delivery fee‚Äù. While I was not charged a delivery fee, I was charged 2 other fees which amounted to 4 dollars. This was half the price of my footlong sub. Although I did feel, a bit hustled for basically gifting subway four dollars AND tipping the delivery girl, I decided to continue with my delivery order. I received the food and it was horrible. It was cold and soggy, missing some of the toppings I asked for and overall a big disappointment. Please stick to your brick and mortar model and stay out of the delivery business! I can luckily hop in my car and pop into a  subway store to get a sandwich (I won‚Äôt be doing that for a while), but please stop taking advantage of the people who can‚Äôt by overcharging them and giving them horrible quality products.

title: Poor results
review:
So using the app was great but the end result did not match what I ordered. I ordered 4 Sandwiches Even though I put different toppings on the sandwiches they came out with three of them all the same and the last one was missing several items off the sandwich. They did call me to let me know that they didn‚Äôt have the bread I wanted they literally only had two types of bread out of all of the lines they offer. I have tried to call the store six times with no answer it just keeps hanging up and telling me to go back because the sandwich maker is busy. This is why I do not suggest this app at least when you order in the store you know you‚Äôre going to get what you asked for. The app is useless when no one follows what you asked for. By the way I did ask the lady when I picked up the sandwiches the types of sandwiches and she said I don‚Äôt know I didn‚Äôt make them.
HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE at the Santee town center location!

title: Terrible App, I will avoid at all costs.
review: Three times I have tried to use this app, once was I successful, after battling the app for over an hour. The app empties my cart without me wanting it too, short circuits when I try to add things to my order or confirm the order, takes forever to load/show changes (which causes the app to delete my cart) overall absolutely awful. All I wanted was to place an order for a salad and a sandwich, it took me over 45 minutes before I finally gave up and just decided WALKING to the shop was easier, which it was, by a long shot. Worst app I‚Äôve ever tried to use. I have Never left a negative review before, and I gave the app almost a year between the second and third time I tried to use it, and the results were almost the same, if not worse. Horrific, will NEVER try to use again, and if I could rate it zero stars, I would.

title: Best idea ever
review:
So today I came home to some very awesome coupons for subway being that I don‚Äôt drive I was telling myself I‚Äôd have to wait until tomorrow to get subway but I definitely upset about having to wait because I am craving it now..
After checking out all the coupons I seen that they not only had curbside pick up but NOW THEY HAVE DELIVERY!! when I tell you I was ecstatic and the fact that you earn points was an awesome plus. As we all love a good deal/saving/getting points at a place that we actually use!!! I am going 5 stars for this app because I‚Äôve been waiting a longggggg time to be able to have SUBWAY DELIVERED TO MY DOORSTEP.. Big thanks to the CREATORS üòç

title: NO Food - NO Refund
review: I will never use this app again. I ordered from my local Subway restaurant for a curbside order for a group. I get there, the restaurant didn‚Äôt have my order.. They refused to give me the food and refused to give me a refund. I had to race around to two different restaurant to quickly get everyone‚Äôs food. Subway later contacted me and claimed I went to the wrong subway. They claimed that the food was ready for me at the restaurant and they also claimed I did NOT speak to a man at their restaurant. ‚Ä¶.The Subway I ordered from is the only one around and I‚Äôm positive that I heard and saw a man‚Ä¶ Unfortunately, there is nowhere in the app to get my money back and Subway customer service was less than informed or willing to accommodate for their inconvenience frustrating error. I ended up having to start a claim with my bank to get my money back. Needless to say, Jimmy John‚Äôs sounds better for now.

title: Dysfunctional
review: I never leave reviews but since the app has no way to contact customer service or some kind of help on the app this will do. After ordering on the app I went in the store and they say they didn‚Äôt get the order and there‚Äôs no way of them giving me a refund. Even though I showed the store my order she just said I don‚Äôt have it on my computer I can‚Äôt make it then proceeding to tell me to get my money back I go on the app and then once I go on the app it tells me I should call the store to cancel the order when the store told me they cannot give me a refund through that way. I understand that this could be a common technical problem that my order didn‚Äôt get to the restaurant but the app has no convenient way to be able to contact someone about this in the store wasn‚Äôt willing to help or work with me. So now I am hungry and $30 Down the drain.

title: Crappy user experience
review:
Every time I have used the app I land up spending more time than a phone call order or in person order. When I want to place 2 - 4 customized subs in an order, the place order button gets disabled with no description when there are more than one sub to the bag. Hate the app. I was able to place the same subs as individual orders. So annoying and time wasting.  Even the f I change the order pick up time the button remains disabled.

 And then there is the inventory issue: it said a store didn‚Äôt have mustard and another one doesn‚Äôt have salt. I have easily subways 100 or more subways in 6 different countries in the past. I have never been to a store that doesn‚Äôt have salt. Makes no sense what so ever.

Favorites, says some ingredients are not available, why not tell which ones? And let me decide to continue without those or change the store.

title: Worse restaurant ever
review: I want a refund for my order. I write an email yesterday and I didn‚Äôt receive any answer. Don‚Äôt keep telling me mi email it‚Äôs going to process to the correct department because it‚Äôs not the gist time that happens and I never have my refund. The employees at the store don‚Äôt be able to help and the manager never is available.I feel mocked and robbed.  A company as big as subway should have better support for customers and a better policy for refunds.  I don't think they keep stealing me every time the restaurant doesn't have the items to prepare the order.  Don't keep telling me that my email is going to be passed on to the correct department because it never seems to arrive.  I am referring specifically to the restaurant located at 1604 and Chase Hill at the Chevron station.  It is not the first time this has happened and I have never received a refund from you.

title: Bad app
review:
Received email deal for $5 foot-longs if ordered 2 online.  
Went to Subway app, where I have acct and was going to choose our favorites, but guess what...no favorites listed.

Started new order, went through menu and ordered from scratch.  Went checkout and received error that items in cart did not match user.  Went to my acct info, looked good.  Couldn‚Äôt figure it out.  Then thought maybe deal expired, but it hadn‚Äôt.  

So then figured maybe have to order thru email.  So back email, app same and again no favorites to choose from.  Fooled around a minute and located my favorites at a store I had used previously, but not one I currently wanted to use.  Bummer.

Again started new order and previewed written summary of each sandwich.  Looked good.  
Went checkout and would not take credit card info.  Put in new credit card. Wanted scan new card, but that was not working.
Had keep going in and out of app and for some unknown reason it finally worked.  30 min later I had a confirmation.  Whew!  

Picked up food, got home and order was wrong.  Receipt showed items that I hadn‚Äôt chosen.  Again the written preview showed exactly what I had ordered before I checked out.  How did it get changed?   How does this happen?  I am now in the twilight zone.  What a mess, soooooooo frustrating!!!

All I wanted was a sandwich!

title: Problems if store is out of stock
review: The app is not well streamlined with the store.  I placed an order for pickup at 1130 and order and paid for extra avocado on an item that already came with them. I showed up to pick at 1130 and the app indicated my order was ready for pickup. The employee notified me they were out of avocado, but had no way to adjust the price or refund the extra that was paid.  They also informed me they were only half way done with my order and it took them 20 minutes to finish the line of customers in line before they went back to finishing my order. By that time my hot subs had cooled. I filed a complaint 9 days ago trying to get a resolution and no one has been in contact. I would not recommend using the app if you want fresh food, an accurate order, fast service, or proper pricing. Go in store and place your order in person.

title: Give it a few seconds
review: It was super easy to navigate and order, once you get the gist of it. At first I didn‚Äôt know what I was doing, but it was like one of those cooking games. I found it amusing to order. I only tried it once so far for the buy one get one free order. I read that the app didn‚Äôt work for some. Everything worked so far for me. One feature I did not like is, you have to add gift cards a head of time and they verify that it loaded to your account through your email and then you can resume checking out in the app. The Target app lets you just add the gift card and pay instantly, whereas this one makes you wait for an email to be sent to you.

title: Slow and Confusing
review: The app gets the job done and can‚Äôt complain about rewards. A couple things need work. If you add a gift card, once the value drops below the price of what you‚Äôre trying to purchase, you can‚Äôt place an order by combing your gift card and other form of payment. When you pay, there‚Äôs quite a delay which might make you think your payment didn‚Äôt go through so you attempt to pay for a second time. There‚Äôs a little too much on the apps page, it‚Äôs a little confusing. Also, depending on where you order from, some places will make your order and let it sit there so by the time you arrive at the designated time, your sandwich is soggy.

title: App selections
review: I love having the app. We try not to eat out too often. When we do, we like subway more than most, and it is super convenient to order ahead of time. Unfortunately we are unable to select the drink we want from the app. At least I have not been able to from my IPhone. Also I frequently have trouble getting our local store on the phone to try and communicate any kinda choice or question I might have. So that could be another way to utilize the app. If there were a customer satisfaction survey with each transaction it would be a paperless and secure way of providing feedback on the quality of service provided at each location. Also, I‚Äôm not exactly sure how to use our circular coupons with the app. That is probably something I have overlooked though.

title: Bug Fixes-A Few Suggestions
review:
The app lags when exiting and entering the app the splash screen logo lags has a slight delay this could be improved with debugging as well as the app feeling slightly sluggish when taping on options sometimes you have to press twice or harder to select something I also wish mainly just an improvement fix for me when you click on show card it automatically turns your brightness all way up which can be nauseating to those of us that prefer our phones darker/dimly lit 

On a side note I wish as a neat feature it would keep your lifetime order history like a full receipt with what was purchased for order going back to 1-3 months or so but a less detailed overview of all orders made with your account such as a line with order total and date transaction was made and which location ‚Äîjust some suggestions
developerResponse: {'id': 11560402, 'body': "We appreciate you sharing your feedback, and are always looking for ways to enhance the mobile app experience for our guests. You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-10-30T17:13:51Z'}

title: Like but could use some improvements
review:
I like using this app and the option of ordering online and picking it up. That part is fast and convenient. 2 things I wish could change:
1. You can only save an order to ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù right after checking out. If you forget, it‚Äôs no longer an option to save the order. I never remember to do this when I‚Äôm in a hurry and have had to re-build my order each time I use the app. 
2. I wish there was a way to combine payment methods. I have a gift card that has $6 and change left on it. My order is usually more than that amount. Because of this, I can‚Äôt use the gift card at all via the app. It won‚Äôt let me use the balance and combine it with another method of payment.

title: Unable to order because of bugs
review: First time using the app and it had tons of bugs. Timed out twice trying to log in. Every time I click the order button to pay I get a ‚Äúcannot read property ‚Äòupdate‚Äô of undefined‚Äù. Looks like a javascript error to me. Only way to place my order was to use Door dash app. I tried calling the store directly from the phone number on google maps, but got a modem line, so that was also needs to be fixed. Very surprised Subway doesn‚Äôt have automated integration testing to catch show stopping bugs like the ability to place an order. For any devs who might read this review, I‚Äôm unsure of the source of my corrupted state. It‚Äôs either that I applied the pop up coupon for the free foot long sub, or, when I first tried to buy my CC was expired, so I updated it, came back and was never able to order. I‚Äôm guessing one of those two flows causes that update property to be undefined.

title: Don‚Äôt use this if you want to custom sandwich
review: This app I think is pretty good compared to some other ones but it‚Äôs got the one worst thing of all, subway is supposed to be Myway and when you try to place an order and customize it with special instructions which the app asks for but then the app will not print it out at the store the special instructions for them to follow so how can I get it my way if it doesn‚Äôt print it for them how can you get it your way if it doesn‚Äôt print it the app makers need to pull their heads out!! Also the custom instructions only 140 characters long like a tweet and it‚Äôs only one what is your order three or four sandwiches everybody wants a little special instructions there should be a special instruction for each sandwich added that one at the final and stay away from this app if you want to make custom sandwiches!!!

title: Love it but needs a tweak
review: The only issue I have is pretty huge and that is the special instructions needs to be in red bold whatever I ask for Guacamole on side and every time I go pickup they‚Äôve put it on the tuna sub which I hate to but have to wait for them to remake I usually split the footlong with my hubby who doesn‚Äôt like guacamole so it really does defeat the purpose of having it ready for pickup when you have to sit wait while it‚Äôs being remade and they get annoyed as they always say it three or four times but it‚Äôs already made I get it but it‚Äôs their mistake not mine I feel guilty then and now I‚Äôve made them mad but for the last few weeks I‚Äôve been there pretty much every day ordering the same order you‚Äôd think by now they‚Äôd get it

title: Could be better
review: I ordered my lunch on the app and after I brought my food back to work, my coworker handed me my bag and I realized that subway had forgotten my bottle of water. So I went into the app to try and make a comment or something so I could get a refund, but there isn‚Äôt any option to do so. With any food ordering app I‚Äôve used, it‚Äôll normally have a ‚Äúreport a problem‚Äù or the app will ask you about your order and allow you to put in feedback. So the app got my order right and I got my sandwich, and I filled out the survey on the email, but it‚Äôs just a standard survey for everyone. There should be something within the app when you look at previous orders that allows you to submit a comment about an order.

title: Still needs work
review: After a loonnng hiatus from this app due to it being complete garbage I finally decide to give it another chance. Decent updates but not the most user-friendly. The biggest issue is that the bread selection doesn‚Äôt show up on your sandwich maker‚Äôs end so I show up to just grab n go and later find out when I go to eat lunch that it‚Äôs the wrong bread. Check the receipt to see if it was my entry error or the sandwich maker‚Äôs. The bread selection doesn‚Äôt even show. Really? Most of your bread is garbage so I go for the flatbread (still not a great product but better than the others). So today I added it to the notes section to be sure. The sandwich maker thanked me as he admitted there‚Äôs been nothing but problems and the bread doesn‚Äôt show on his end. How do you guys miss that part? I mean isn‚Äôt the bread the most important part?
developerResponse: {'id': 2707081, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience - we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com', 'modified': '2018-02-28T21:13:33Z'}

title: Complete Trash of the Highest Order
review: I have ordered from this app several times and half the time my order does not even go through to the location I am heading to. The staff at the subway knows the app is awful and makes the sandwich anyway but any deals the app offers, such as buy 1 get 1 free will not be applied. If I have to explain that my card has been charged and then stand there waiting for my meal to be prepared it defeats the purpose of ordering ahead of time. If the order does by by some miracle get placed at the location I am heading to it will be missing items that I have already paid for. It seems like a scam to offer discounts and then charge somebody full price. How this app has 4.8 rating is insane to me. If I could give it zero stars I would. Save yourself some time and hassle by just going in the store or going to Jimmy Johns instead. Absolute garbage.

title: Terrible app. Used to be better.
review: I can‚Äôt put more than one sandwich on an order with out having to do it NINE TIMES. You can‚Äôt get any of the selections you want right, and all the sandwiches are in the wrong spot. The concept of the app is fine. What it has become is a nightmare. When you try to tap a place you want to eat on the map, it switches back to the location your home town is. Oh nice. I TRIED to have my order made in Detroit, but the FREAKING map made the order go to MISSISSIPPI. I‚Äôm sick of this bull crap. You guys have the time to make little gifs of cars going up and down on hills but you can‚Äôt make an app that FREAKING WORKS.  Kick your 5000 people out of the ‚ÄúCutesy Graphics‚Äù department, and hire some engineers who are going to make the app function properly. YOU KILLED THE APP. I don‚Äôt know how much money you all spent updating this app from its already perfect version, but whatever you spent, it wasn‚Äôt worth it. Please fix it.
developerResponse: {'id': 2265101, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-01-10T19:29:30Z'}

title: Trouble with Sending order without confirmation
review: I like the app, but it seems to be very buggy at times. Twice the app has sent order with a credit card stored in the app without confirming the order. I move away to another screen in the app from order confirmation screen and get notify that an order has been sent without tapping confirm. I tried to cancel the order until a later time by calling the store, but order was already placed. The person I talked explained they had no control over the app. However, I discussed with the owner that it is part of their business model and should be more open to customer issues and resolve them with their corporate office. They did admit the was buggy. Could this issue be addressed in future updates. VERY FRUSTRATED!!!!!!!

title: Subway New App
review: I think the Subway app is really great for ordering. You get to pick your time to get your sandwiches and the menu is easy to use especially the way they show the layering of condiments-very cool. My issue is with finding the Cheese, Veggie, Sauces, Seasoning button. The little downward arrow is up in the right hand corner and you‚Äôre not sure to touch it or not-This should be larger. My other issue is the fact that Apple Cash crash landed on me to where it looked like I was going to cancel because it looks like the only way to pay. I almost cancelled. Finally when I looked again I saw the ADD PAYMENT METHOD. If these issues gets fixed then the app is Perfect! TY

title: App work pretty well!
review: App was mostly user friendly.  When looking at the picture editing of the sub it doesn‚Äôt allow you to change the cheese type.  If you remove it you can add the cheese you want later, but the cost goes up.  However, if you hit the Plus at the bottom right, right away to add additional things, it lets you modify the cheese type that‚Äôs there for free in this screen.  I am not sure why you can‚Äôt change the cheese in the main picture edit screen like you can change the bread, but at least you can change it in the adds screen. Pretty good job Subway.  Please fix it so you can slide through the cheese options in the picture edit and my rating will change to 5 stars.

title: Good until you want to pay with a gift card
review: The app is easy to make your sandwich exactly like you want it. The graphics are great too. The payment part is super frustrating though. If you want to pay with a gift card that you have downloaded it will not let you pay the rest with a debit card. Also, you cannot combine gift cards. I ended up with 3 partially used gift cards and no way to use them. Even when I went into the store to use them I could only use one and had to pay my remaining balance with cash. I still have 2 partially used gift cards with no way to use them on the app. This needs to be fixed on the app and in stores. I did email Subway about this awhile ago with no response.

title: Won‚Äôt work.
review: Just got the app so that I can order something and go pick it up. After going through the headache of setting up an account‚Ä¶ Standard stuff... ordering a sandwich was way too complicated.. Wanted to make it a meal and there was no way to get a fountain drink. Had to go ahead and go with a bottled soda. Then I couldn‚Äôt place the order anyway because it wouldn‚Äôt take any payment method. There‚Äôs no option to pay in store. Mainly I was surprised because it wouldn‚Äôt let me pay with my card. So I got an app to make things simple and rather than going up to subway and taking the 5 to 10 minutes to place an order I had to spend 30 minutes or so setting this up to be rejected and still have to go up there and order like I don‚Äôt have the app. Waste of space on phone and at this point I‚Äôm so frustrated I think I‚Äôm just gonna take the 2 minutes to place an order on Taco Bell app.
developerResponse: {'id': 9550033, 'body': "Hi there, please contact our support team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-07-08T13:36:30Z'}

title: App was bad, now worse
review:
It looks like they tried to design a dating or social media app. The focus should on a simple efficient design to order a sandwich. Earlier versions were clearer, now it‚Äôs a bunch of flowery crap you have to scroll through to order. It‚Äôs also like a game (in a bad way) where you have to be careful what you touch because it will toss in a drink and chips into your order while all you want to do is change one ingredient. The only reason for using an app instead of ordering in person is because it is supposed to be faster and easier. The app in it‚Äôs current state does neither. The Panera app has considerably more options, yet is easier to maneuver through and edit an order. 

Other suggestions- let the app indicate that the store you want to order from is closed or having technical difficulties instead of the app crashing or a vague description pop-up.
developerResponse: {'id': 2515539, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience - we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com', 'modified': '2018-02-06T21:30:07Z'}

title: Impossible to build your own sandwich
review: This app has good intentions. However, the execution missed the mark. One of the beautiful things about subway is being able to walk in and customize a sandwich to your exact liking: protein, cheeses, add-ons, and sauces galore. That, unfortunately, is not the case here on the app. There are very few sandwiches to select from and what are available are set and fixed so if, for example, you choose a ham and cheese melt, it is impossible to add, say, turkey or bacon. There is also not a full list of sauces on the app. So you can add basic condiments like Mayo, mustard, oil and vinegar, but the fun ones such as creamy sriracha or southwest (etc) are not featured and available on the app. All in all, this is a big bust for my family. We will be having to go in and order to our liking until Subway works to make their app actually accessible.

title: Beware of unauthorized charges and poor customer service
review:
Please beware that their customer service is all online. I emailed them about a store charging me for a sandwich that I didn‚Äôt receive. According to the store the order never went through and was supposed to be voided but my bank account was still charged. I emailed Subway‚Äôs customer report who responded with:

 I apologize that you had a negative experience with our app. I appreciate your feedback and can assure you the team that is responsible for the app has received this information and will take it into account, as we are always looking to improve the quality and functionality.

While I‚Äôm glad someone is working on it, I‚Äôd love for someone to look into refunding me my purchase. Until this is resolved I‚Äôm no longer eating at another Subway, but I doubt they really care about the consumer or the issues with their app.

title: Lack of customer support
review:
I‚Äôve only used this app once but it was for a pretty large order. I customized 5 different footlong sandwiches and added them to my cart, but upon checking out I was prompted with an error message along the lines of. ‚ÄúOrder cannot be processed at this time‚Äù. All of my cart items disappeared and so I would have had to re-do them all, had I decided to continue with this app. But my biggest qualm is that the app charged me for the order that didn‚Äôt go through. Also I tried using the ‚ÄúContact Us‚Äù in customer support and submitted an email explaining my issue but was never tended to.

I don‚Äôt mind that I was prompted with the error message upon checking out. I would love to use this app even if I experienced some minor technical issues but the fact that I might get charged for no reason is very concerning, especially without follow-up from customer support.

title: Pregnant and hungry
review: I‚Äôve wanted subway over a week. I just downloaded the app to order it. I didn‚Äôt get half my order cause they didn‚Äôt read the ticket, they admitted it was their fault. I‚Äôm pregnant and haven‚Äôt ate in over 24 hours and paid almost $20 for just a sandwich. They tell me I can come back and get my stuff that I‚Äôm supposed to get it myself unless I go through drivethru. Went through drive thru. They acted like they couldn‚Äôt do anything for me. This is the subway on Martin Luther king in Little Rock. There is no way to file a discrepancy on the app for something wrong. So how I‚Äôm out $7 for things I didn‚Äôt get. It may not seem like much to you but when you‚Äôre pregnant in a homeless shelter it adds up, every penny does and they weren‚Äôt very willing to fix the issue either even after I called twice. I will never use this app again not this location. It also won‚Äôt let me delete my cc.
developerResponse: {'id': 5405529, 'body': 'We are sorry this happened - please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-10-08T13:37:23Z'}

title: Don‚Äôt get ripped off!
review:
This app shows a buy 2 foot longs, get 1 free special (at participating stores), but it doesn‚Äôt bother to tell you if the store you have selected is participating in the promotion. You have to check your total to see if the discount applied. So, I wasted my time customizing 3 sandwiches just to find out that apparently my local store is not participating in this promotion. The app obviously knows that my store is not honoring the special, so why doesn‚Äôt it just say so. I guess they are taking advantage of the people who don‚Äôt check the total before they submit their order and ripping them off.

It also doesn‚Äôt allow multiple (split) payment methods. So if you have a gift card, but it doesn‚Äôt have enough on it to pay for the entire order, you are S.O.L. and have to select a different payment method.

I won‚Äôt be eating Subway tonight!

title: App error charged my card but never sent order
review: I placed an order on Subways app and got to the payment screen. The payment began to process but then the app glitched and an error screen popped up telling me to replace the order. My cart was completely cleared out, so I checked my bank to ensure it wasn‚Äôt charged, but it had been. There was no record of the order in my order history and I wasn‚Äôt sent an email confirmation. I tried to contact the store who also didn‚Äôt receive an order and refused to make my food without an order confirmation even though I could show them the charges. On top of it all, Subway doesn‚Äôt have any live through customer service anymore. It‚Äôs entirely automated so I‚Äôm just screwed out of my money. DO NOT TRUST THE APP because of it messes up the company will not take any responsibility for the malfunction.

title: Tried to Order of the App!!
review: My first time on the app!! While trying to order the app ask if I was a member or wanted to be (my wording!). Even though I‚Äôve been getting e-mails from Subway I don‚Äôt ever remember joining with a password & I write ALL my Passwords down in a ‚Äúspecial‚Äù notebook. But when I push I want to join, a message comes up that there is someone else with that same email (me)!! Looked through my notebook and no Subway password!!! Low and behold I can not get off that page!! So go into I‚Äôm already a member with my email and push ‚Äúforgot my password‚Äù - it throws me to a page that up in the left hand side of the page in the smallest letters I‚Äôve ever seen say ‚Äúwrong page‚Äù (again my wording cuz it was 3 hours ago and I was so mad I was ready to throw my phone across the room!!). And this is why I don‚Äôt use these stupid Apps everyone has.

title: Great for points, garbage for ordering ahead.
review: Whether it‚Äôs the ridiculously wrong wait times (who staffs 1 person to work Friday night around dinner time??? Had to wait an hour outside the shop for an order to get done. Nevermind the people waiting in line to get a sandwich made. Or placing an order only to get a phone call that they are out of everything (but the app didn‚Äôt tell you that, right?). OR, and this is the most annoying, getting ready to order and just getting the annoying little red triangle saying ‚Äúsome ingredients may not be available.‚Äù What ingredients??? A sauce??? The meat??? Bread??? You‚Äôll never know because there‚Äôs NO details included in this warning. I guess you just don‚Äôt get to enjoy your sandwich. You would‚Äôve been waiting an hour for it anyway.

title: They aren't listening
review:
I was asked, are you enjoying our app? I hit "not really." A message popped up. "Oh no! Do you want to tell us about your experience?" I didn't really, but I thought I would help out and hit yes. The next message popped up: "Do you want to call support?" The only answers available were Call and Cancel. So basically, this app has been designed to make sure no one complains.

What did I want to complain about in the first place? It took four tries to place an order after I accidentally tried to use a card without money on it. "This order has been errored and can't continue" the message went, even after I put money on the card; even after I added a new card; even after I deleted the order and reordered from scratch. In the end I had to delete the app and start over with a new password. Extremely annoying. Wasted 30 minutes.

Also annoying: constantly being asked to save favorite sandwiches, going through the trouble of naming them, and then being told the app can't save them because I've reached my limit. The app shouldn't ask me to save them if that's true.

Also annoying, every time I hit Reorder I get an error message.

This app is pretentious and arrogant.

title: The app was great before now it‚Äôs terrible
review: There is absolutely nothing intuitive about this app. It was perfect before easy to use you could get on and get whatever you wanted in 30 seconds and now it literally takes five minutes to search the room menus and delete items and figure out how to add more items. If you were ordering one item and you want to order another item you have to look around to find how to do that. Whoever designed this app should be immediately fired. They should refer to the old intuitive app that they had before this upgrade and make the graphics Lisa stop fixing stuff that‚Äôs not broken.
developerResponse: {'id': 1414390, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience - we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-10-02T19:30:27Z'}

title: The APP need a lot of work
review:
I used the Subway app, and included specific directions/ notes for the Subway employees who claimed they didn‚Äôt received those directions. They showed me a receipt that appeared to be the app order. 
My sandwiches were not toasted, and in my family this is a big deal. My daughters don‚Äôt like the BMT cold.  I ate my sandwich cold, but my girls just couldn‚Äôt. They can‚Äôt pepperoni and salami cold, and I don‚Äôt blame them. I hate them cold too. I used the app feature to indicate that I wanted them toasted; and I also added a note on the directions‚Äô section. 

I was in a rush and I had to spend an extra 15 min in the store to buy a toasted sandwich.
The problem was NOT with the employees, (they were very nice) but the communication between the app and the subway employees (as they mentioned that this is not the first time that this happens, and they even suggested to place the order on the phone next time).

title: Works OK
review: It does the job, but I have a few minor qualms with the application. First, changing the size of the sub completely resets all my other settings. Changing the size of an order shouldn‚Äôt reset all of the toppings. Instead, the app should make a reasonable assumption and keep all the toppings and just change the size. Second, the application performance could be better. I see the loading screen too often in this app. Perhaps there was a trade-off made to ensure the data is loaded independently for each location. Improved performance and more reasonable assumptions when changing order options would make this a five star app for me.

title: Add choices
review:
Suggested changes:
Please add all the choices please. Since you know which store the person is ordering from you should be able to show things like the brown mustard the one I order my sandwich‚Äôs from carries so I can order it on there instead of showing up early to have them substitute. Also half half options like the pizza apps allow so when you are splitting a sub between two kids they can pick their own toppings (example my youngest loves olives on hers and her sister won‚Äôt eat her side if it even had one on it). It would be nice if you could add soup (although I could see why this would be tricky) and the specialty cookies maybe with a back up option if it‚Äôs not currently available. Otherwise it‚Äôs a decent enough app.

title: Don‚Äôt use the delivery option
review: I ordered twice on this app. The first time, the order was wrong when it arrived, but I still enjoyed the meal so I didn‚Äôt make a fuss. The second time, as soon as I placed the order it marked it as delivered and charged me the full amount. I never got my sandwiches and was out $20 plus the tip for the ‚Äúdriver‚Äù. I went through the long process of where to send an email and tracked down which version of the app I had, which iOS, and which store the order had gone to (the number to call never answered) and just got a reply stating that they would inform their team of the issue. I replied requesting a refund or store credit, but never got a reply. I actually like Subway, so I might have kept the app for when I am in person, but the delivery experience and customer service prompted me to warn you all away.

title: Love it but hate how hard it is to submit feedback
review: I'm obsessed with subway, the food is always amazing and I order a couple times a week. However, anytime I order and get a drink I never get it. There isn't any place I can just quickly express if they forgot something or got it wrong and I don't want to have to call the store every time. If I'm paying for something I would much rather receive it or just let the store know something ain't working if I never receive my drink. This isn't the only thing one time i had ordered like 4 subs and only received one had to call doordash because the store wasnt answering (order was place on subway app). I had still never been contacted an update for it.

title: Frustrating app
review: The first five or six times it worked almost perfectly. I had to fumble my way through in the very beginning but learned  to save my favorites so ordering became easier. However now after several tries each time I try to order all I get are ‚Äúerror‚Äù messages. Cannot cash in with the bogo50 offer at all. I have called my location but they don‚Äôt seem to care that the app isn‚Äôt working properly.  They cannot honor deal specials.  And then when I place my order at counter and enter my phone they tell that isn‚Äôt working either. Very frustrating!
developerResponse: {'id': 23797651, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you have encountered these issues, and we would like to investigate further. We encourage you to visit https://www.subway.com/en-US/ContactUs/GuestCare to provide additional details about your experience.', 'modified': '2021-07-07T11:26:14Z'}

title: Update not as intuitive
review: After the recent update, at first I thought I wouldn‚Äôt be able to customize the subs.  Here is how it works:  You add the sandwich to the cart before customizing it.  Next, you have to accept or decline making it a ‚Äúmeal‚Äù.  You won‚Äôt see a choice of ingredients until you go to your cart, then  click on the name of the sub you want to customize, which then shows the usual ingredients.  Next,  click a tiny ‚Äúedit‚Äù beside the ingredients.  Finally, you‚Äôll need to scroll down to find the customization options.  ‚ÄúEdit‚Äù should be a button, not just a word, and the app should let the customer know that customization options are in the cart.  Apps should be intuitive!  What a PITA.

title: Compliment for Manager @ Subway Cafe St Francis Hosp.
review: Danny who is the manager @ this subway inside of St Francis Hosp gave me the best excellent service I can get. I have the subway app and I couldn‚Äôt get it to work  so she assisted me and her staff took care of the customers in a timely efficient way. I have been coming to this location a long time because I have some of  my doctors there in the building. Danny has that smile and patience for all the customers and she makes sure her staff does the same . She makes her customers feel really important because she knows some by name and I appreciate that when I entered Subway. Keep up the excellent work and I will come back. I rate them A+=üíØMsBonnie J.

title: So close
review:
I‚Äôve used this app almost the entirety of the pandemic. But there are several problems- I just got locked out of my second account- which I had to make due to my first account was buggy and locked me out. 
When this app works, it‚Äôs convenient and fast and I really enjoy it. But when the bugs in the system cause issues with logging in, it leaves the user frustrated. 
Most problems are password related- where they send you an email to confirm/change password, (which, we all know you use the same as every other app, so you certainly haven‚Äôt forgotten it.) I never get the email, and can never re-enter the app with said address. (Yes, I checked my junk folder on both emails) 
Would love if you fixed bugs so I can enjoy this app again.

title: If you make a mistake and cancel the order the second you place it, forget getting refunded
review: I mistakenly ordered at a location 2000 miles away (was there for vacation the previous week). Literally the second I saw it, I called the store and cancelled my order so they wouldn‚Äôt make it. Was told I had to call a corporate number for a refund. The corporate number gave me a robot that sent me to their website. And their website doesn‚Äôt list the appropriate topic. Nonetheless, I have tried about 5 different times to contact them by email with no response, and even made a PayPal claim (denied). I did not get that food and I cancelled before they would‚Äôve even started making it. A week and a half later... and no customer service or app support in my inbox or junk folder.

title: Subway is amazing!!
review: Once upon a time I wanted to eat a Subway sandwich, but I really really really did not want to see anyone I knew in my tiny Texas town, or like put on a bra, you feel me, and lo and behold, there was an app! I ordered, picked up in a jif, and now I‚Äôm enjoying my foot long tuna guilt free-ish! I mean some dogs I got a few years ago are side eye-ing me so hard! But whatever! Subway rocks! I love you Subway, and I always will until I don‚Äôt. I‚Äôm fickle you should just know now! ttfn you sandwich shop you! P.S. sorry about the whole Jarrod pedo thing! Just shows how friggin good your sandwiches are to make it through that sh!t. Ok bye bye for rizzle.

title: Helpful but come across some problems
review: A very helpful app when it comes to ordering ahead of time and earning rewards! But as a college student, I have my parents credit card linked to the app, so that I can purchase it occasionally using that as a payment method. In the subways in my home town they always know that I am using a credit card through the app as a payment method, but I‚Äôve gone to various subways elsewhere and the workers tell me there is no way I can use that to pay for the food they have already prepared for me. I am not sure if they just aren‚Äôt doing their job or if it actually does not work on their end, but I suggest the developers should make it easier on THEIR systems to use a credit card attached to the app as a payment method.
developerResponse: {'id': 13067552, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us by tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com- so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2020-01-22T19:03:31Z'}

title: Orders are not right but ok if u make zero changes
review: I love being able to order online but there have been some issues. I ordered a sub once that had guacamole on it. It was a special sub yet when I got it there was non on it. I had customized it and added some extra things but didn‚Äôt remove the guacamole however in the receipt it showed the name of sub and the extra stuff I added. I guess they were supposed to know to put all the regular stuff too but they didn‚Äôt. This last time I ordered an Italian BMT but added extra stuff and it had NO MEAT on it!!  I was like what!?!  The receipt says Italian and then lists the extras I added. Obviously the stores are confused and don‚Äôt realize that the extras is what is printing and they still need to add rest of the stuff too.
developerResponse: {'id': 7826592, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-03-20T20:35:08Z'}

title: Music and sub customization..
review:
When opening this app it kills any playing music. This needs to be fixed. 
Online order customization needs work. You can‚Äôt add an additional meat to your food if it doesn‚Äôt come with it already by default. Not even for the extra charge it would be if you order in the store. 
Ex: Italian BMT adding ‚Äúsingle‚Äù turkey (4 slices) is impossible yet easy to do in the store. 
Paying in store via app is okay at best. When you select rewards to use on the pay screen it doesn‚Äôt automatically use them so why bother selecting them that way?
Ex: hit ‚ÄúShow Card‚Äù and select a $2 reward under ‚Äúrewards‚Äù and hit apply. You scan card to pay. If they don‚Äôt explicitly select it on the register in advance you still pay full price.
developerResponse: {'id': 7567185, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-03-04T17:29:37Z'}

title: Options & Spec Instru Need Wrk
review:
My son basically gets a foot-long grilled cheese ‚Äì and the one Subway makes is outstanding, but as simple as that order should be (foot long Italian white with provolone and American cheeses)...the App does not allow you to add two different kinds of cheese to your order (or it looks like you are asking for all cheeses to be added, and it confuses their staff). 

To make things even more difficult, even though we can add ‚Äúspecial instructions‚Äù that could simplify and clarify this confusion, what we note never seems to transfer from the order in the app to whatever is uploaded in the store. 

So, what should be the simplest order ever can NEVER be simple, or accurate.  And always has to be done after arriving, basically rendering the entire benefit of the App to nil.

title: Great app
review:
Works great. 
Except 2 things. 
So glad you accept Apple pay now!!
1) It rejects PayPal, even though it used to accept it. Best to just not offer PayPal as a form of payment, than to make customer go through the hassle of setting it up only to reject it. 
2) Currently, making an order a favorite is very cumbersome. It‚Äôs per item, rather than entire order. And only after checkout. Let customer set an order as favorite before they place order, as well as afterwards. I see the favorite heart shaped button there during placing order, it should be used to make the current order a favorite or go to the list of favorites.

title: Locked Out with no Support Options
review:
I love Subway stores and I regularly order sandwiches there. I used the app and had started to earn a few $2 coupons. With a group of friends, I suggested using my app to scan for each of our purchases to earn points towards the reward. After scanning for 4 individual sub orders, my account was frozen. The message is ‚ÄúSomething has gone wrong with your account, contact customer support‚Äù. I have looked all over the Subway website and have found no options in their contact us section regarding the app, and the FAQ section was of no help either. 

I am very disappointed by the decision to not include a phone number anywhere on the app or website to talk to a customer service representative. 

Subway is a great place to get sandwiches, but the corporate decisions made concerning the app and customer service are cheap and effortless.

title: The app is great but...
review: The app concept is great and makes ordering for kiddos easier. However, it needs some tweaking. It needs a create your own option for someone who just wants something simple like ham and bacon. Also, items like the raspberry cheesecake cookies are not an option to pick but they are always readily available at each Subway I order from. I have learned to use the special instructions field to request them instead of chocolate chip. However, the special instructions field only allows so many characters so you can‚Äôt write much in it. Other than those two things, the app is great and convenient. I just order, pull up to the drive thru and pick it up.

title: Bad communication between App & Store
review:
I have placed orders several times through the app and each time I‚Äôve been frustrated. The app doesn‚Äôt give you all the ingredients available in store for one thing. Secondly, the order has never been ready when we went in to pick-up despite the time stated it would be ready. The final insult is that they didn‚Äôt prepare it because they could see the order. This last time a different person went in for me and didn‚Äôt know all the details of the order but he had to tell them the order because the store didn‚Äôt have the info. Oh, it got my money no problems though. Because the pickup person didn‚Äôt know all the details he didn‚Äôt mention things I paid extra for. 
The communication between the app and the store needs major improvements. Right now it‚Äôs inefficient, troublesome, and in some cases costs extra.
developerResponse: {'id': 3005732, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-04-02T18:04:23Z'}

title: Easy to order but a few changes
review: When I create the sandwich and add it to the bag, the ‚Äúadd something else‚Äù button is hiding at the bottom of the drop down menu on the side. It should be plain as day in the checkout bag area. Rather than only asking if I want to duplicate the previously created sub, you should have the button right there to ‚Äúadd something else‚Äù. Also, when creating the sub, and on the ‚Äúsauces‚Äù screen, you should add buttons to indicate whether I want that particular sauce on the side. Oil and vinegar make the sub taste great but also quickly turn the bread mushy. I‚Äôd rather have the option to add that on by myself once I start eating it.

title: Fantastic when it wants to work
review:
I‚Äôm a frequent subway buyer, and using the app is convenient for quick pickups on my lunch break. It‚Äôs a very user friendly and visually appealing app that makes it easy to access deals and use rewards. 

However, it‚Äôs about a 50/50 toss up between whether the app will actually submit your order. When it doesn't work, I just get error messages that offer no solution. After messing with it and realizing it‚Äôs a day it‚Äôs just not going to work, I sometimes attempt to use the very frustrating online ordering, which glitches way more than the app, or I just give up. 

It appears not everyone experiences this, so it‚Äôs definitely still worth downloading to see if you‚Äôre one of the lucky ones.

title: App won‚Äôt let me use apple pay! Subway was a pioneer!
review: How in the world has this happened?!  I have used apple pay at Subway basically since apple pay was created!  I have used it for MANY years often 4-5 times a week!  All i wanted to do this time was to get the $1 off deal which apparently was only for app orders, so I went theough it and then had to enter a credit card!!!  I use Apple Pay with all kinds of apps for stores that were MANY years behind Subway in allowing Apple Pay.  On top of that, when i made it a meal I didn‚Äôt have the option to change the drink size. VERY DISAPPOINTING!  I expected more from Subway!  I still gave the app decent stars because it looks like i can do my order but i didnt spend much time as i was standing in the store!
developerResponse: {'id': 8954173, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-05-31T14:57:36Z'}

title: Still needs some fixing after update
review:
When i added my normal footlong sub but decided to edit it in the cart to make it a 6‚Äù I was disappointed when I picked up a sandwich that was so different from my normal order.

I feel that after I‚Äôve added my previously ordered sandwich to my cart i should be able to edit specific things without the fixings changing to some weird gross default I don‚Äôt want.

Sure, I should have noticed that the sandwich fixings changed completely when I made the sandwich a 6‚Äù but I‚Äôve previously had to change the bread because the store I‚Äôm ordering from is out of stock on one type and when I change the bread everything else stays the same.

title: Disappointed with Customer service
review: I accidentally made an online order to a subway that was located about 2 hours away from my town so I never got the food I had ordered. I tried calling that restaurant and they said they couldn‚Äôt do nothing about it because it was made online. So they gave me the customer service phone number and the customer service agent was SO rude, and talked over me not letting me explain what had happened and basically said well it was your error and because the order had already been made they lost produce so to call the restaurant back and see IF they want to give me at least credit. Like are you kidding me?? I made a mistake and now your company can‚Äôt return me my money back. You should come up with a better way to handle these types of errors instead of stealing customers money, and having no way of getting it back.
developerResponse: {'id': 5405514, 'body': 'We are sorry this happened - please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-10-08T13:36:16Z'}

title: Amazingly clunky app.
review:
For the powers that be.... It‚Äôs easier to land a 747 fully loaded in a 3rd world country than it is to place a $47 order on the Subway app. Apps are to be dumbed down to name, rank and serial number. The app exists to create easy, simple and convenient ordering for customers. That‚Äôs it. Minimum viable product type thinking. 

I‚Äôm a user-interface guy. I just ordered five sandwiches. It would have been easier to stand in a line and place my order in person. I found the app to be clunky, unintuitive and wonky to say the least. The app is absent of any type of natural flow. I honesty think it would be better to scuttle the current app and just have two buttons. Button one, where do you want to pick-up your order? Button two, press and we will connect you to that store via phone so you may place your order. As bad as that sounds, it‚Äôs better than what you have now. 

If you want some help, please shoot me an email. Subway needs to raise its game and not spend precious resources on a bad apps that I am sure cost way too much. 

Please improve. I really want you guys to succeed. And please don‚Äôt offer me a coupon or free anything for my feedback. Take that money and put it in your app re-do fund. I think you guys might need it more than me. 

-JC
developerResponse: {'id': 4001650, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-06-27T15:11:14Z'}

title: I love this app
review: I‚Äôm 100 % disabled so when I don‚Äôt want to beg my husband to make me food Are usually only have the choice of ordering pizza or Chinese now that subway is delivering and they have this perfect app where I can order my perfect sandwich made the way I want it it makes my life 100% happier this app is perfect for somebody who is disabled or doesn‚Äôt have a vehicle or doesn‚Äôt want to stand in line at the store and wait they just walk in they‚Äôve already placed their order and it‚Äôs there waiting for them so thanks subway for creating an app for those of us who just can‚Äôt get to you

title: App is hella good
review: The user interface is very well designed and easy for anyone to grasp and understand. The customizable options for the sandwiches are pleasant and well thought out, it all makes for a clean look with a great user experience. This is by far the best sandwich app I have installed on my phone in the last day or two. Plus the 5 dollar deal really makes for a good incentives download and use as a gateway to be exposed to the fantastic app. Overall my day has been made brighter by the app and I don‚Äôt think I will ever look at subway the same. Subway I am now talking to you directly, thank you so much I will cherish this forever.

title: App is fine, as long as...
review: I update my apps irregularly. Maybe monthly or so. Today, I wanted to get a sandwich and was told that I would have to update the app prior to ordering. It‚Äôs like, what the heck was I doing a month ago?  Why do I have to update a stupid sandwich app every three days or I can‚Äôt order?  I search all over the subway website to find someone to contact but apparently this is the only free form source of frustration I can offer. Do they think I want to waste data updating an app I already have?  Just stupid. It‚Äôs crap like this that prevents my parents from using their smartphones. Also, no surprise this company used a diddler as their mascot for so many years considering the lack of critical thinking skills apparent across the board. And still no vegan Mayo!

title: Odd default choices
review:
App randomly picks different breads based on sandwich, instead of all defaulting to one bread type or asking every time.  I ordered 3 different sandwich types and got different bread than expected.

The graphical sandwich builder makes it hard to see that the bread type is not what I wanted.  The graphical builder also doesn't pick default veggie choices automatically that you would get at store (for instance pickles are normally the default all veggies, but not selected in the app).  Being able to disable the graphical builder and just checkbox the items would be better, it would be more clear which veggies are missing from the default.

The receipt the store gets does not clearly indicate how many drinks (and size) and what flavor cookies and chips, so the store ended up shorting me a drink (insisting I was wrong), and had to verify receipt for me to get the chips/cookies.

title: THE MOST USELESS APP
review:
I'm an IT professional with many years of experience in interface design. I would use this app as a case study for my team to review on what NOT TO DO for UX/UI.

Absolutely the worst interface design I have ever seen. In interface design (vis-a-vis business requirements) all functions must be able to handle pertinent features for what the app is used to accomplish as well as intuitive navigation. All core function need to be designed and integrated better (navigation, cohesion, and etc.).

Also, on 11/3, buy one get one free subway sandwich day, a screen popped up on the app indicating that you could only order in store and your only option was to hit OK, which launched you to a browser to find a store. You could not use the app for any other reason, just a pesky pop up screen that kept appearing with your only option to launch a browser to find a store. HELLO! What about using other features of the app like PAYMENT!!!

You could have simply disabled ONLINE ORDER if your not accepting on a given day!
developerResponse: {'id': 1676861, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience - we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com', 'modified': '2017-11-06T15:34:25Z'}

title: Crooked
review: I ordered from this app and paid through PayPal. I got a notice of payment from PayPal that was overcharging me. I went into the app to see what was going on only to see it had voided my order. When I looked further, it showed my order as being placed but it doubled the food. I tried to call the store to sort it out. No one answered. I went there and was told it‚Äôs my problem and not their problem. I offered to show him the PayPal receipt on my phone. He just kept saying it wasn‚Äôt his problem. I called the customer service number and was told that for ‚Äúmy convenience‚Äù I could only contact customer service electronically. I tried electronic methods and got zero response from Subway. I tried another store and was basically told it wasn‚Äôt their problem. Meanwhile I‚Äôm out money for food I never received. I deleted this app and won‚Äôt be going back to Subway.

title: Not functional yet
review:
The app doesn't seem to work for ordering. A few weeks ago there was a PayPal promotion to link and use the app, so I tried. Could not get an order placed, I forget the error. Tonight i just tried another order through the app. I get a rewards error. Tells me to remove the rewards and try again. But there's no way to remove the rewards. Mind you, I didn't add the rewards to the order. They were automatically applied. I click on the $2 reward it shows and it brings me to an empty screen with no rewards. 

The app does work good for paying and applying rewards in the store. However, i find that about half the employees don't know how you actually use the app to pay at the register. They can get reward points but half let me pay with the app the other half tell me they don't know how and to use my card. Significant lack of training.
developerResponse: {'id': 6560161, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-12-26T16:39:21Z'}

title: Horrible User Interface
review: Just a really bad UI design that‚Äôs crazy confusing and takes forever to get from one nested page to another. Please redesign this app and also figure out a better solution for canceling orders. I ordered from the wrong store and tried to call them to cancel for an hour. I called them 12 times and didn‚Äôt even get a chance to leave a message. I won‚Äôt be using this app again until there‚Äôs an update. Also, the rewards bank changes depending on which store I pick as ‚Äúmy subway‚Äù and I haven‚Äôt been to a store yet where they actually know how to redeem them. This whole new system is just trash. Also, subway employees prioritize in store customers so the one time I got a successful order in to the right store when I got there I had to wait 15 minutes for my order. Rethink your system please I love subway, but I can‚Äôt stand this app
developerResponse: {'id': 3569363, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-05-23T13:13:12Z'}

title: About how we can change subway branch
review: Hopefully you get this message my name is Jeffrey I‚Äôm in Pastry Chef down here in Miami used to be I noticed four different subways are closing down because I think you guys need new ideas you should  come out with the box . 5 dollar specials are great but you  would only have people coming in for that only you need to have different things like I said the box having two different sandwiches something different sometimes a business I know people forget and that‚Äôs what I notice what‚Äôs going on but please don‚Äôt close down contact me if you need anything thank you so much.

title: When it works, a good APP
review:
I like Subway restaurants, and I go there frequently enough to benefit from the rewards program (although some Subway franchises opt out of the rewards program).  When I go to pay with the APP for an in-store purchase, sometimes the APP will not open.  So I have to get out my physical Subway card.  Fortunately, my balance is on the physical card so I am still able to pay using my Subway credit.

I just tried to re-load my Subway card with $50.  After jumping through many hoops, the APP said that my re-load attempt had failed‚Ä¶although I got an alert from my credit card company saying my credit card had been charged!   My Subway card did not show the $50 credit so I tried contacting Subway customer service on the APP‚Äîfailed at that, too.  One of the most un-user friendly APPS on my phone!  Developers, please take a look at an APP like Starbucks‚ÄîSO EASY YO USE!

I went to my online credit card to dispute the $50 charge, but, fortunately for me, Subway had already cancelled the charge

Finally, good luck contacting Subway customer service.

title: Add more features please
review: The app is useful and you get perks from it but I wish there was a way to edit the listing right before checkout or at least check to make sure everything is accounted for. Kind of like the McDonald‚Äôs app has the option to. Most of the time it just charges me and I‚Äôm not able to edit anything. The Subway that is closest to me rarely answers the phone so by the time I go to pick up it‚Äôs too late to change anything. I don‚Äôt do this often but when one of the kids changes there mind on what they want at the last second it‚Äôs too late. Other then that it is awesome. Thanks for your time.

title: Could use a few small tweaks
review: Use this app 1-2x a week for ordering and mostly like it. Easy to customize your order and select pickup options. The biggest area for improvement is the feature for recent orders. I cannot access this from the app, I keep getting an error message. I frequently order the same thing from the same restaurant and would love a quicker option to just copy/reorder. I would also like to be able to edit my favorites without deleting them and starting over. Perhaps these features already exist and I can‚Äôt find them. These changes would take this app to 5 stars for me!

title: Bad App, Promotions Frequently Do Not Work
review: I am a frequent customer of Subway. Some of the time the app works great. However, whenever there is a special promotion, like 10% off any item, the app is full of glitches and doesn‚Äôt apply the discount. I just wasted 15 minutes of my day ordering, trying to apply the promotion, and then getting to the screen and having the promotion not work. Then I tried to reorder. No dice. It‚Äôs complete garbage. This also happens when there is something like free chips or a free cookie with the purchase of a foot-long sub. I am sorry, but it‚Äôs 2020 and there is no excuse for a company to have an app that is this poor. Again, I wasted 15 minutes of my day trying to apply a 10% off discount only to have it not work. I tried at least five different times. Forget it. I‚Äôm not using this app anymore. I guess I‚Äôm going to have Dominos today.

title: App constantly has error message
review:
I have tried to use the app multiple times to take advantage of a deal that is going on. I have the same issue as another user who posted. It adds an extra sub regularly and I am not sure why. I have to be diligent and be sure to check the cart and delete the extra items that have been added. Once I go to submit payment I receive a message that stated the following:

Cannot read property ‚Äòupdate‚Äô of undefined

At this point I am unable to go any further and am not able to place my order. I do have a screen shot I can share if that would help the developers! I like subway but the app is not worth the hassle until some bugs get fixed. Hopefully that gets taken care of as there are soon good deals I would like to take advantage of.

title: Horrible App.
review: This app is a good concept, you can order your sub to be ready at a specific time, but the user interface is terribly confusing to navigate. In order to place your order, you have to go to the top left corner and swipe over to find the button to do so. Half of the features are buggy and don‚Äôt work, or you have to try them 3 or 4 times to get them to work. The number one complaint however is that as a user, you‚Äôre able to store your subway gift cards in the app, and at the checkout there is a place where you can scan your phone and theoretically, you can mobile pay with gift cards. Except it NEVER works. I can be standing there scanning it 3 or 4 times, and it just doesn‚Äôt go thru, and then I am faced with the choice of either leaving with no sub or paying out of pocket for it, neither is ideal. Do better, Subway.

title: App is worse then the store no tokens and lies about store location and hours
review: I‚Äôd give five stars but for now it‚Äôs staying at one or if I could zero because it‚Äôs a Terrible app it‚Äôs worse then the store I can‚Äôt find the location I want to order from even with my location on to find the nearest location and it overcharges me when the store doesn‚Äôt unless I do double ingredients which I hardly even do plus the rewards for tokens doesn‚Äôt work no matter how many times I scan my phone in the restaurant it never appears even though I get the confirmation email that it went through also you should have a pay restaurant directly on your app if people don‚Äôt have a credit/debit card and the app never says the right hours for stores. I may just delete your app completely if you can‚Äôt get it together and stop making excuses for it ugh.
