title: Checkout crash caused double charge
review:
Put in an order using $2 in rewards and the checkout crashed. I waited a minute for a confirmation email and when it didn‚Äôt come, tried to place the order again. My $2 reward was gone but I chalked that up as a loss and ordered again. I called the store and told them to cancel the double order when it came in. They said there was only one order. Too bad two orders are shown on my bank account. So now with no evidence I have to dispute a $17 charge with my bank.

Edit: Added a star since I was able to finally get a refund but had to go too great a length to get it done. I‚Äôll continue to hesitate before using this app, if I ever do again.

title: This app is good but could be easier
review: I do like the app but its not really easier when it comes to choices. I ordered off the app for pick up and when I selected for meal there was only a select few chips to chose from, not my favorite Salt and vinegar chips, and it wouldn‚Äôt give me the option for a fountain drink, just a bottled drink. I understand this all maybe based on location or other reasons but I wish it could be just an easier way to order and see all the options available to that store. I‚Äôve ordered from other sandwiches apps and they have an easy format and provided all their products available at their stores. Just wish this one did too.

title: More complicated than necessary
review: I thought I‚Äôd try the app and today tried to order sandwiches with it. The immediate thing I disliked was having sandwiches ‚Äúprebuilt‚Äù (i.e., the turkey ham sandwich I wanted already was set up with certain ingredients). That‚Äôs an immediate pain in the behind because then I had to go in and remove everything that I didn‚Äôt like and then add things through the customize menu. It‚Äôd be a lot easier to simply start with the main ingredients (turkey and ham in my case) and then customize from there. I can‚Äôt imagine EVERYONE wants the ingredients you have the sandwich preset up for. Secondly, I had zero success getting the $5 deal listed if I was to order two of the sandwiches. Thirdly, the only option available to pay was through Apple Pay. At the end of the day, I decided the app is worthless and deleted it. Certainly doesn‚Äôt suit my needs.

title: Great app! Could use some modifications....
review: I enjoy this app the way you can create your own sandwich exactly the way you want it, and set the time ahead (in my case, for lunch break). The only thing I would ask to be -updated-, would be the time set. Meaning, when I set the time, then change something on the order, it resets it back to current time. Also, can it be added in where the order could be modified. For example, there‚Äôs been many times where I‚Äôve made the order, submitted, and paid. Then realized that I didn‚Äôt set the time for next break, and have to call the store. Is there a way to modify the order and/or the time frame after the order is made?

title: Have sub will travel
review:
If you look up a sandwich in the dictionary, you won‚Äôt see a subway sandwich, but you‚Äôd be weird af and who has a dictionary really? That being said, I can attest that the app does indeed work and you can use your rewards to buy subs. That alone should have you interested. 

Not enough? Well what if I told you that there is an Easter egg hidden in the app that will allow you to order a monster 2 pound burrito with all the fixings?

It‚Äôs not true, but still I bet you were interested for a second. You still reading this? What are you waiting for? Download the Subway App today. And as always,  remember to Eat Fresh!

title: Love it
review:
I especially love this because I can order, walk right in, not wait behind indecisive families and get out without even giving them my card.  Just a VIP sandwich handoff!  

Also since my closest subway keeps closing for weeks at a time , in Canyon Lake, Tx of FM 2673, I get the bad news that they are closed and don‚Äôt waste my gas goin there.  I have got the , sorry your location is closed notification 20 times now!  

Today too, so I‚Äôm driving to get some Jersey Mikes I guess?  Straighten that location out please.  I‚Äôm sure they lose every employee every time they do this.

title: Soooo irritated
review: If I could give zero stars I would, why is it‚Äôs that we can‚Äôt cancel or get a refund through the app and then the store is no help AT ALL. I ordered on the app and then went to the store where I was told that the online ordering was down, and they could not refund us, there was no way to cancel on the app you have to go online and submit what is basically a complaint because the number I was given did not work. Then after him telling everyone that they did not have our orders he magically had everyone‚Äôs receipts which had been sitting there the whole time. So they proceeded to attempt to make peoples orders then start informing us a long list of ingredients they DID NOT HAVE so basically what I paid for could not be made so now here I am stuck out of $20 and waiting on a response.

title: Beware of missing items
review: I ordered a delivery from the Subway app. The food was good but I was missing 2 bags of chips. When I called the store they said it wasn‚Äôt their problem because they use DoorDash to complete the delivery. I called DoorDash and they tried to help but couldn‚Äôt do anything because the order was placed with the Subway app, not DoorDash. When I spoke with the associate from Subway they were incredibly rude and said it wasn‚Äôt their problem. I said they should have taken the responsibility to ensure the order was correct and the delivery person left with the correct order. Again, they said it wasn‚Äôt their problem and I shouldn‚Äôt be upset about it and hung up. This is a warning to everyone that uses this app‚Ä¶you have no recourse if your meal is incorrect or missing items. Never again.

title: Having too many issues - forced to call owner at a franchise location
review: I love subway, I order from there all the time. But recently I‚Äôve tried to order through the Subway app and as it goes through I get a ‚Äúdefault‚Äù error and get sent back. Also, sometimes I order and it says my order went through on the app but when I go pick it up the location staff says they haven‚Äôt gotten any orders in. It took more than an hour one time for my order to enter into the system. I went through the whole process of having to call the store owner just to be able to get one of my orders because it simply would not appear. I hope this gets fixed soon.

title: Who designed this
review: I only not give it a one star review because I can objectively give it recognition for at least being visually appealing. And I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs Subways policy to be difficult to order through or if it‚Äôs the programming issue. Either way, the fact that you can‚Äôt keep a order in your cart and switch to a different location, without having to create the entire order over again. For instance, if the store I‚Äôm ordering to closed early or doesn‚Äôt do the BOGO deal, looking for a store that does honor it takes you manually trying every single store and ‚Äúclearing your cart‚Äù each time you change locations. Plus each store charges different prices for the same item. Is subway this lenient with franchises?

title: Be very careful before you order! You can‚Äôt cancel
review: I accidentally submitted an order. At the bottom of the confirmation page it says call the store to cancel your order. I called the store immediately. They told me they couldn‚Äôt cancel the order. I had to use the app. I explained to them that the app says to call them. They said sorry. I asked for a corporate number to call and explain the situation. There is no way to call them. I just submitted feedback for the store because that‚Äôs best I can do for now. This is a serious error in this app! I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôll ever use it to order again now that I lost money. Btw I was trying to see if a further store would honor the recent 2 foot longs for $5 each as the 2 closest to me never do. That‚Äôs how I accidentally order a sandwich. Thank God it wasn‚Äôt 2 sandwiches I ordered and won‚Äôt get. I hope subway returns my money.

title: Love it when it works!
review: I love this app...when it works. It is super easy to order and I love that I can just run in and grab my sandwiches. No lines, no waiting, no paying in the store. I just grab my bag and go. It literally takes 15 seconds...love it!!! HOWEVER, there seem to be a lot of issues with the app randomly not working. It says there is an error and to try back later. Generally when that happens, later means a few weeks. I have been trying to use the app for a couple of weeks now to no avail. I finally saw there was an update and I thought that would fix the problem. Hooray!! Wrong. The update didn‚Äôt fix the problem and I still can‚Äôt add my gift card or order from the app. Boo! Hoping they get it fixed soon!

title: I work at Subway. Customers complain about the app
review: I‚Äôm a sandwich artist at Subway. SO MANY customers ask me to help them because the app always says they don‚Äôt have a valid phone number when signing up (most people order online while inside the store, in order to get online deals.) Another issue many customers have mentioned to me is that there‚Äôs no option to have certain vegetables/sauces on only one side of a footlong. I tell them to add it to the ‚Äúspecial notes‚Äù section of the payment, but customers get agitated. I think the app is great, I just hope those two issues get resolved!

title: Updates Have Helped but needs work
review:
Some room for improvements:
-TouchID....why make us log in and out using a password every time if we want to protect our info?
-If you have a paper or texted coupon, the app is worthless, no way of entering coupon codes.  Would be huge to fix this.  If you wanna use a coupon, you have to wait in line, not good.
-Add an option to just warm meat of some sandwiches if you don't want it toasted but want the meat warmed up only.  I add the note to the order, but it comes out at the bottom of the receipt and they always miss that note or only see it when they are almost done making the sandwich.
-Provide subway card balances at checkout so I can tell if I have enough left to pay for my order.
developerResponse: {'id': 1022626, 'body': 'Hi there. We are really sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our new App experience. We highly value your feedback and are taking each point into consideration for a possible future enhancement.', 'modified': '2018-03-22T17:35:39Z'}

title: Stores with promotion
review: Stores running promotion should be specifically advertised along with promotion. My boyfriend bought a sub and then added the 2nd one; he called the location on Kingscanyon and Clovis to ask if they were running the promotion, the employee said yes. When we arrived at the subway, they charged us for 2 instead of one. We proceeded to tell the employee that we had just called to double check if they were participating in the promotion. The employee asked us to call customer service and take it up with them.  Not very happy with this locations specific customer service at all.

title: Be careful how you use
review:
Too many times have I gotten a call to pick up a sub I did not order or at least did not intend to order.
The place order button is exactly where you touch to scroll up to review the order, there is no check in there are no take backs. This app is horribly flawed especially since, at least in Chicago, 90% of the restaurants do not offer whatever promotion the app offers but you need to review the order to find that out and if you‚Äôre not careful when you try to review it you will place it and not all the restaurants have working phone numbers.
And why must it clear the cart in order to change restaurants? I‚Äôll tell you, because every restaurant charges something different for the same items. So why can‚Äôt the app figure that out and just modify the prices without emptying the cart.

title: Order not received at store till 20 minutes later
review: Maybe I missed it, but after I paid there was a tab that said place order so I clicked it. Nothing was shown about time. Did a little shopping and thought my 2 sandwiches would be ready. Went to subway and they hadn‚Äôt even received the order. No other customers were in the store so I showed my confirmation and asked if she could make the sandwiches and she said no she had to wait for her receipt. By then I noticed my pickup time was 1:20 and it was 1:07. I placed the order around 12:40. I asked for the manager and another woman came out. I explained, showed her my confirmation and she said she would get the manager. By then 2 more customers came in then my order came in. They made and did a good job but not the best experience.

title: Employees can‚Äôt use it
review: The app was easy to use. The employees however don‚Äôt know how to use it on their end. I ordered a salad and they called to tell me that the were out of lettuce. I asked them to cancel my order. They said they couldn‚Äôt cancel it that it had to be cancelled on the app by me. When I did that it popped up to call the store to cancel so I did. They again told me they could not cancel the order or refund me. I asked if I could get a sandwich instead and they said no that it would mess up their inventory. I guess taking my $12 and giving me nothing doesn‚Äôt mess with their inventory?? The manager is the one who told me all of this. Obviously they need training on usage of the app on the front and back end. Also s crash course in customer service! I had to walk out of the store without resolution because they were so hateful!

Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-07-19T20:09:24Z'}

title: App much too redundant and complicated.
review: As I said in the title Line, there is too much redundancy and complexity in this app. Most of the store personnel have no idea how to work it when you ask. The don‚Äôt know how or if it attributes points when you use it. When a store scans your loaded gift card, there is no online receipt to view the recent purchase for correctness. I had to make the merchant reprint a paper receipt to see why so much money has been subtracted from the card. The deals I get via email and texts are not showing up in the app. Definitely the least user friend app on my home page. I would like to go back to the old days of a physical rewards card. I tried to do an online order from the app today, but due to a phantom reward, the order said it would be ready at a certain time and it was never received at the store.
developerResponse: {'id': 7298357, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-02-14T14:20:19Z'}

title: Full menu not available in app
review: I gave a star for the ease in ordering and customizing sandwiches. But twice now, I‚Äôve had to cancel my app order and go to the store to order, because an item I wanted wasn‚Äôt in the app. I think the first time it was a pork sandwich and today, it was soup. I had a taste for soup, and that‚Äôs the reason I decided to get subway for lunch today. I went thru customizing the sandwich I wanted, then I go to add soup but it‚Äôs not there. So after wasting my time, I have to order in the store. And yes, they had soup there. The first time this happened, I remember I was annoyed because they had a deal going on that you could only get by ordering in the app, so I couldn‚Äôt take advantage of it since the app didn‚Äôt have the sandwich I wanted.

title: Poor Quality - Beware
review:
I downloaded the app last night and we submitted 4 subs for an order. Get to the end (after it processes payment) and it said ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre sorry, but this store can not accept your order at this time.‚Äù Clicked ‚Äúokay,‚Äù tried again. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre sorry, but this store can not accept your order at this time.‚Äù So my husband just went to the store to order and bring back food. I get a call an hour later from Subway saying, ‚ÄúYes ma‚Äôam, your order is here waiting for you, we just wanted to be sure you knew to pick it up.‚Äù What!?!?

And apparently Subway restaurants cannot cancel orders placed on the mobile app (even after it tells you that the order was never placed to begin with.) So now I‚Äôve paid for 12 subs and am waiting on a call back from the store owner.... a day later. Yeah right. 

I would not trust this app again.

title: So Inconvenient that I posted this
review: Honestly I love subway because it not a bad meal, but ordering with this app is so painful. 1. The only way to save a favorite is to actually order it. When it say create a favorite I have to order it from a specific store. 2. Very difficult to traverse back and fourth from the veggie/meat menu if I want to add something. 3. Getting bread toasted and change bread is hard to spot and easy to forget it‚Äôs like your trying to hide it from us. Unlike the store they always ask would you like your bread toasted? And then when I arrive I don‚Äôt get what I want and it‚Äôs pretty disappointing. Of course not all your guys fault since i‚Äôm the one who didn‚Äôt press that option but I feel like you guys can make it better. There‚Äôs more but can‚Äôt think of it right now

title: Love the app...when it works
review: This app is very handy and a wonderful thing for my husband who hates having to stand in line and choose ingredients for multiple sandwiches. But, there have been a couple occasions lately (today, even), where I got a blank screen when I opened the app.  Restarting my tablet got the app to work but when I got to placing the order, I got a bunch of error messages. Finally, after deleting the app, downloading and entering the order again, the order went through. This doesn‚Äôt happen every time but enough to prompt this review. Hopefully, the order will be ready when my husband gets there but that‚Äôs another issue...

title: DO NOT USE FOR DELIVERY!!
userName: cash app support wont help me
review:
I placed a delivery order, paid a delivery fee, and tipped a driver on an order that was never delivered. I received no notifications about delivery status, but after searching I found it marked as ‚Äúdelivered‚Äù in the app. 
After hours of trying to get someone on the phone I was informed that the food is in the store available for picked. 

There is no customer support available from subway, the delivery is actually handled by door dash, and as a result this app is just a shell around door dash minus the customer support. The prices are the same or cheeper in other apps. There is literally 0 reason to use this app except for you to get screwed over and hung out to dry by Subway. I‚Äôm filing a backcharge with my bank and uninstalling. Appalling that one of the biggest restaurant chains in America functions this way.

title: App Convenience  after workouts
review: I‚Äôve been working out after hours and I recently found a 24 hrs Subway in Denver. As soon as I finish my workout most nights I place my order over the app. If I want to add extra toppings or change anything about my order there is a specific area for special instructions. The app is very user friendly and after you pay there is a guaranteed pick up time. Also when using the app you earn reward points which is a total game changer for me. Shop and earn money back after 200 points. Check out the app it‚Äôs been very convenient for me.

title: It‚Äôs the only way I order anymore.
review: I rarely have a issue with this app for the most part it is well polished and easy to use. My local subway is really good and get my orders right almost every time. I just wish they would actually show you deals that are going on. For example right now they have a BOGO50 where I can get 50 percent off a second sub. I started looking around forums and stuff for subway turns out I could have gotten a free sub but the app never showed the deal. Yet on the website it was clear as day. Everything else is great just wish that the deals tab actually showed deals.

title: Useless
review:
The Subway app does not function. I can create MOST of an order, but it "has an issue" at some point. I cannot actually place an order. Therefore... useless.  By the way, I'm an IT director who manages thousands of devices, multiple platforms, websites, multiple networks, etc, etc.... I'm not exactly clueless, this new app version is USELESS.

I HATE this new App! It is so much harder to navigate. You can't cancel an order, you can only delete everything off an order one item at a time.  Ordering items by pictures is so slow and for idiots. I used to use the app a lot, now not at all. It was really great for when ordering with a group, just hand the phone to the next person. Now I have to tell them how to navigate.

Old review:
My review for previous version:
Love ordering through the app, I use it nearly every day.  There's 4 features I wish it had:
1- favorite locations, instead of waiting to find them every time.
2- favorite meals, I tend to order one of 4-5 different subs.
3- let me redeem my reward points, I have a ton 
4- let me add a note to my order, like "please toast the veggies," or "add Italian dressing," which is common in Michigan but seemingly no where else.

Love the app! Huge time saver!

Thanks!

We are always looking for ways to improve the experience with possible future enhancements.', 'modified': '2017-08-30T18:54:51Z'}

title: Double charged & no food
review: Tried to order four sandwiches with this app & used Apple Pay for payment.   The app lagged out and looked like it crashed.  I double checked that there was no recent order history & I resubmitted my four sandwiches again.   I tried using my debit card this time thinking there was an issue with Apple Pay.   So it charges my debit now & still shows nothing in recent orders.  I check my accounts to see I‚Äôve now been charged on both accounts to the correct store number.   I called the store to cancel the double order, only to find out they never received either.   So now I‚Äôve paid twice and received nothing.   This is the WORST food app I‚Äôve ever used.   I really like Subway & the employees at this location, it‚Äôs just unfortunate this app is garbage.

title: Not great
review:
In the preview for my sub, it showed that the ingredients in the sub included Spinach, cucumbers, and onions (among the lettuce and tomatoes). I removed the lettuce and tomatoes because they were not of my liking, and when I received my sandwich It was just a piece of bread with 2 pieces of roasted chicken. No dressing, no veggies. Add these ingredients to the customize tab so that the customer KNOWS FOR SURE that they are in their order. Also, if the location doesn‚Äôt have any of the ingredients I want, MAKE SURE IT IS HIGHLIGHTED IN THE APP. All 4 of the subs I ordered because were on the wrong bread because they were out. Sure I can work around that, but I didn‚Äôt know about it until I was sat at home and called the store to complain.

Very disappointed with my outcome and the location wasn‚Äôt able to do anything about it.

title: Agree with everyone‚Äôs poor reviews
review: Well, came to the review section for the app here to find out if I‚Äôm the only one having problems with it but apparently it‚Äôs me and tons of other people. Can‚Äôt sign up, can‚Äôt guest order, can‚Äôt find locations easily, so yeah, until they ‚Äúfix‚Äù (apparently Subway did this some time ago to no avail) this app don‚Äôt use it. Apparently they also need to work on website. Try to do the above mentioned on website with exactly same results. A company should run a promo when all systems are go. This creates frustration and if anyone is anything a bit like me, I wont be coming back. At the same time, I always wish for people success and really hope this company puts it together once and for all but I won‚Äôt be here to witness it with Subway if they ever do.

title: Customizable or is it
review: Are used to love this app where I can make my own sandwich the way I liked it but when they changed it they let made it so I couldn‚Äôt make the sandwich I want it and it makes no sense to order a sandwich to be picked up if I‚Äôm gonna have to call them anyways to let them know that I don‚Äôt want this item on it or that like I would like a spicy Italian but I only want the pepperoni I don‚Äôt want the salami or whatever the other meat is but it won‚Äôt let me do that if they could change it so you can still do your sandwich the way you want that will be very preferable and very welcome let me know if you can change it that way he‚Äôll be very helpful

title: Nice fix programmer with no common sense!
review: So I read ‚Äúwhere‚Äôs the rewards‚Äù review and there is finally a phone & email contact info for the Subway App support! I try to copy this information to my phone book but someone decided to change this standard editing feature to select & copy to be a marketing vote of whether or not the review as helpful or not! Whoever is esponsible for ensign of this app constantly urprises me with their stupidity, I it some upper sines persons son or grandson working their  brought it horses t th local community college? Do they ever use the application? The poor Subway franchise owners and employees must e almost as amazed at the mistakes as I am!  So chi‚Äôs could b fixed for iOS apple phones it would be nice and you might get more helpful notes!

title: App Rarely Works Correctly. Missing Items
review:
My kids often want to get subway and some would actually like to order a Dr Pepper fountain drink with their meal. But you can‚Äôt via the app even though it‚Äôs available in the store obviously. So this means I get though the ordering process only to have to scrap it again or order another drink and add a note that it‚Äôs actually a Dr Pepper. There have been literally dozens of other glitches along the way trying to use this as well like when choosing an item off the favorites menu the app then glitches and you can go no further and have to force close and start over. 
How hard can it be for a company this large to have a functional app to make them more money?

title: Very good but needs a few tweaks
review:
Very smooth and well designed app. Probably one of the best food ordering apps I‚Äôve seen. 

A couple of things should be added or changed for more ease of use though. The ‚Äúadd to your order‚Äù button shouldn‚Äôt hidden in the side menu allll the way down at the bottom. It should be optioned for in the meal review screen preferably under the ‚Äúduplicate your meal‚Äù button. 

Also I ran into the problem of needing to cancel my order because I had forgotten to put in the pick up time I needed. I needed it in 5 hours for a dinner party instead of the 15 minute pick up window it was set to. Totally my fault but it would‚Äôve been handy to have a small 5 minute window for editing or canceling the order before it was sent off. 

It wasn‚Äôt a huuuge deal as I was able to google the phone number of the shop I ordered to and call to let them know about my mistake.  

Overall 4/5. 
The design is very smooth, graphically appealing and mostly easy to use. With a few tweaks it could be even more fantastic.

title: Very Helpful Young Man
review: I had never used the subway app on my phone before. I thought I had ordered 2 foot longs but, I didn‚Äôt. I told the young man and young woman working at the store. The young man was mopping the floor and I asked him if he could help me. I handed him my phone while social distancing and he said I just didn‚Äôt confirm it. I thanked him and he hurried back to help make my sandwiches. I told him I wasn‚Äôt in any hurry but he still made them super fast! Excellent sandwiches and customer service! They both did a great job! Now I will know what to do thanks to this young man taking the time to help me! This was at the Tipton Iowa location.

title: Works better now
review:
Update:  While there may still be a problem adding more than 4 cards at a time to the app (due to the low denominations available) via the web portal, which results in a frozen primary card (so you‚Äôre out of luck until you take the time to call the next day to get the card unfrozen), the app itself has worked fine for a couple of weeks now.  

Some employees need to be better trained to resolve the ‚ÄúUse another form of payment‚Äù error they get when they don‚Äôt follow the correct register process, but again, when they do the right thing, the app works fine now.

Original review (1-star):  Broken - endless ‚ÄúUpdate app‚Äù loop

The app worked more or less until today - when upon launch, a msg appears that an update is required.  Well, that update happened 2 days ago.  Deleted/reinstalled - still no joy.  Will not be happy if can‚Äôt use app to buy lunch tomorrow as the Subway card is tied to it now.  This is why I usually don‚Äôt rely on apps - clearly this version isn‚Äôt ready for prime time.
developerResponse: {'id': 2847629, 'body': 'Good news! We have corrected this issue. If you are still experiencing difficulty, feel free out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.', 'modified': '2018-03-17T04:25:40Z'}

title: Rewards expire too soon
review:
This app has improved. Compared to other similar vendors this app is better but still needs improvement. For example when placing an order through an app offer it needs to reflect those prices from the get-go, or at least have a pop-up saying offer applied at checkout. It always appears like the offer is never being applied. 
In general, I find the deals no longer that great, the cost of the product too high, and the rewards expire too soon. Although I‚Äôve been a long-time customer, I therefore don‚Äôt shop at SUBWAY¬Æ as often.

title: Doesn‚Äôt keep the correct bread choice.
review:
UPDATE***
With the latest update it seems to have fixed the issues and now I have been having no problems! Now it is easy and convenient!

I love being able to pre-order and pick up our dinner. However, using the app has been inconvenient when I have to come in and have them re-make the sandwich. I choose flatbread and customize all of the ingredients easy enough. However, once you add it to the cart it deletes the correct bread choice so they just give me Italian bread each time. Very frustrating and no it‚Äôs not me not knowing what I‚Äôm doing.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-03-01T12:10:20Z'}

title: Stole money from me and no recourse to get reimbursed!!Ripoff!!!! DO NOT USE!!
review:
Do not use in-app ordering if you are concerned with the order being correct. There is no way to get reimbursed for incorrect orders and they have ripped me off and stolen my money!! I ordered through the app and picked up my food. When I got home and opened the sandwiches, only ONE OF THREE sandwiches was correct and one was less than what I ordered so was charged extra for 2 cheaper sandwiches that I did not order. When trying to contact for reimbursement, there is no store number or order number on the receipt so could not even get ANY help at all. The restaurant was not even helpful as there was no one there that knew what to do.
They stole money from me and will not give it back.
Horrible deal and there is no support that is even remotely useful.
HIGHLY DISAPPOINTED AND I WANT MY MONEY BACK!

title: DON‚ÄôT SAVE YOUR CREDIT CARD INTO THE APP
review:
I chose a sandwich, but I didn‚Äôt complete the payment. However, some reason it went through. I called the customer service. The representative was very rude and kept telling me that I need to talk to the subway branch where got my order. So, I tried to talk to someone at the branch about it and the answer was that there was nothing she could do. Of course. The branch just made the food because of the order coming from THE MALFUNCTIONING APP. 

I love subway and I will visit again to buy food. However, I WILL NEVER USE THE APP. I have many apps operated by restaurants such as Panera and Chipotle, but I have never had the problem even if I use them tons of times. The Subway app is only one having this issue. 

I have read other people‚Äôs complaints about the app. They are very similar with the problem I had and the customer center replied that they could help you if you call them. 

The customer service will help you by just telling you that you need to talk to the branch. 

I strongly suggest that you google your favorite location and order through the phone. IF YOU REALLY WANT TO USE THE APP, PLEASE AT LEAST DON‚ÄôT SAVE YOUR CREDIT CARD INFORMATION. My money just disappeared yesterday with the app.

You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-11-13T21:41:29Z'}

title: Great app but missing a few things
review: The app works great but there are 2 things that it could really use. Apple Pay support as a payment method and actual deals in the app. Apple Pay support would allow people using the new Apple Card to get 2% back instead of 1% and the deals that I always see in the app are basically just advertisements of new stuff rather than deals. I‚Äôm signed up for the text message deals but do not know of any way I can use them with the app so support for deals similar to those would be great. I also get local flyers in the mail with deals but do not see a way to apply them to an order on the app either.

You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-10-09T16:07:50Z'}

title: No Apple Pay support
review:
I dislike sharing and possibly having card data stored not locally (I could add a card to the app but who knows if it actually stays on my device since I had to make an account.) between not supporting Apple Pay and not supporting Apple oauth login for privacy this would be a reason for 1 star

The sandwich ui is neat and I‚Äôm glad there is a tutorial, it feels a bit clunky to use and I like the gesture and visualization but having to swipe then tap to remove an item is inconvenient(especially if it could support undo). I like that it‚Äôs more than a simple list of items. This gets one star back

Not being able to make a sandwich a favorite before making an order is also an annoying user experience and lacking in the UI

Thanks!\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-23T16:34:31Z'}

title: A lesson in how to destroy a user experience.
review:
The old version of the app was easy and intuitive. I used it all the time to order for myself and would also order for the family by passing my phone around and letting everyone customize their sandwich.
I have used this new version successfully exactly once out of the several times I tried. 
My final straw for writing this negative review was this past weekend. I downloaded the newest version to my iPad while on a road trip and couldn't get the frickin app to choose the store I wanted, which was 50 miles away. I wanted to queue up the order as there were 7 of us in the car and it was going to take a while to create the order and then have it made.
After closing the app and going back in, it only took three tries to select the store I wanted. Then I tried adding a sandwich. It said there was an error when I tried adding it to my cart and I just gave up. We ended up eating at Wendy's, even though we couldn't order ahead there either. I refused to give subway any of my money after that fiasco.
The old app wasn't perfect, but I don't think I ever had to give up and eat elsewhere.
Subway should look to a different app developer.
developerResponse: {'id': 1144210, 'body': 'Hi there. We are really sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our new App experience. We highly value your feedback and would be interested in some more details regarding your experience. Our team would love to hear from you at appfeedback@subway.com. We are always looking for ways to improve the experience with possible future enhancements.', 'modified': '2017-08-30T19:23:26Z'}

title: Errors and lack of customer service!
review: A while ago my SUBWAY¬Æ account got hacked in New York and ever since I reported it, I have not been able to add a payment method, create a new account successfully or anything. Anytime I try to add a payment method or place an order it says either ‚Äòoops FRAUD‚Äô or there‚Äôs some other default error. I tried reaching out to their customer support across various different methods and they don‚Äôt respond to anything. So I‚Äôm about over this app, in fact, I‚Äôm just gonna delete it again and just cut my losses with SUBWAY¬Æ because I‚Äôm over this. The app is clunky at best and if I am able to get through the order process, it just throws an error out and cancels my order. It‚Äôs extremely frustrating and I am not impressed with how they handle their service.

title: Does not work
review: Had the previous app and it worked fine, used this version a month ago and all was well until I tried to use it this evening and it still had the info from the last order telling me it was time to pick up the order. I deleted the app and downloaded it again and remembered who I was, my payment info and my previous order but would not let me order, signed in and signed out, same deal. Downloaded one final time and now says there are no restaurants in my area and no payment on file, it did remember my. Name though.

Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-08-30T19:30:03Z'}

title: Using subway app is garbage
review: The app seems super buggy and was crashing on me over and over. Would not let me order. I had to restart from the beginning and it finally let it go through. After ordering I couldn‚Äôt help but think that it never asked me for which bread I wanted on my order or if I wanted it toasted so I ended up ordering something I didn‚Äôt specifically want. It took me 2 minutes to get to subway and now I‚Äôve been sitting in my car waiting for an additional 10 waiting for the app to tell me it is finished. I‚Äôm seeing multiple people walk in order and walk out within a couple of minutes and I‚Äôm still having to sit here. Using the app is a huge waste of time. From the time started trying to order to getting my food should not be 30+ minutes. Chick fil A can do it in less than 5.

Thank You!\r\n", 'modified': '2019-10-30T17:09:54Z'}

title: Mobile ordering is a breeze
review: I placed an order using the app recently and I have to say that it worked very well and was pretty easy to figure out. At pickup my sandwich was ready at the correct time and the order was 100% correct so it obviously feeds into their store point of sale properly. Only misfires were that the app does not accept Apple Pay as a Payment method even though the stores do and there is a Notes section in the order where i asked for the foot long to be halved and wrapped individually and they did not. This is likely a store issues but perhaps the point of sale doesn‚Äôt indicate when there is a note on the order.

title: Consistently poor user experience
review:
It‚Äôs nice to get some deals through the app, but the trade offs are bad.

1. You want your sandwich hot? That‚Äôs unlikely. The sandwich gets made whenever it gets made and you don‚Äôt know exactly when it comes out of the oven. There is a 15-minute window for when your sandwich will be ready, but it might be baked before that too. I believe that for app orders, they put the order in one bag (or the stores around me do). Which means if you order one hot and one cold sub, you get two lukewarm subs.

2. If you see a store offering a sub on the menu in the app, that doesn‚Äôt actually mean the store offers that product. I went for a long walk yesterday to the grab a breakfast sub. I chose to walk to that Subway because it was the only one near me with breakfast subs on the menu in the app (and listed on Google maps). Corporate store as well. I arrived around 8:30am and was told they stopped carrying breakfast a few months earlier. It was a hungry walk home.

If you like deals and hot sandwiches, find coupons and order in-person (way faster). Do not trust the app for what‚Äôs on the menu. The Subway app makes me like Subway less.

title: Works great until there‚Äôs a problem
review: Easy to use, functionally fine‚Ä¶ until there‚Äôs a problem. There is no way to resolve a problem on the app. If you receive the wrong item or have other issues, you‚Äôre screwed. We ordered two sandwiches and had them delivered. One was completely wrong. The receipt we received even showed the sandwich was correctly entered into the app, but made wrong. Mistakes happen. They sent it though DoorDash. If we had known that‚Äôs how they were going to deliver, we would have just ordered through DoorDash‚Äôs app. At least there, if there is a problem it can get fixed without having to dispute the charge with my bank. Will not order on the subway app again. If you do, good luck‚Ä¶ hope you don‚Äôt have any issues.

title: Go anywhere else
review: This app is just so confusing. It doesn‚Äôt tell you if you‚Äôve placed your order or not. I had placed an order for delivery and I waited 4 HOURS! I couldn‚Äôt find a customer service number. There‚Äôs no way on tracking your food on the app, finally I just started calling different subway locations to find out that they don‚Äôt do delivery. This was fault on the app for letting the order go through and not giving me any type of information if the order went through or not. But it hasn‚Äôt returned my money, I am just waiting to see if I can the money returned today(the order was placed yesterday) and if not I‚Äôm just going to call my bank to dispute the charge since I didn‚Äôt receive my order. This app is absolute TRASH and a waste of your time.

title: No way this app has more than 2 stars
review: Using an iPhone 11, I cannot see any of the images that are supposed to display. Once I have the order ready after stumbling onto how to select bread with no display, the app tells me discounts will be applied at checkout, then immediately charges me full price. ‚ÄúHave a problem?‚Äù It gives me the store number to call for a refund, but per the store they have literally no control over the app ordering. Need to call? It puts you through an auto system before telling you to go online... online points you back to the app in a vicious circle and submits your statement without actually putting you with somebody to get your refund or the discount... Get with the times Subway. This was pathetic and I know you can do better.

title: not reliable
review: I have had the worst experience with your app. every time that it updates, it logs me out and makes me relog back in. the app is just ‚Äúclunky‚Äù compared to all your competitors. there have been so many times it‚Äôs not worked I have had to skip getting credit for purchases (not just once; but probably enough to actually have 3 free subs amount.) I honestly have given up with using your app; and now that some locations will only take a mobile order...well, I‚Äôve stopped going. (not a good way to have a good covid business plan.) do us all a favor, get an app that actually works. (btw: there is not one thing wrong with my phone.)

title: Not everything you want.
review:
Having issues upgrading my drink when I choose the meal. No option to go from 20oz to 40oz.
When you make a it a meal you get chips and a cookie. You cannot select the flavor of the cookie or the chips you want and add it to bag. You have to choose only one of those. So when you go to pick it up the cookie is never there. Once the subway lady told me can‚Äôt give you the cookie because its not in the receipt. The manager came and gave me the cookie because I got the meal, meaning that I wasted my time for a cookie. Whats the point of ordering ahead?

Lately the app just crashes when Im in the middle of preparing my order. Have to open it again to finish and type the especial instructions again.

title: Terrible. Employees don‚Äôt know how to use it
review:
Sandwich artists don‚Äôt know how it works. If your frontline employees can‚Äôt explain it there is a problem. 
When they don‚Äôt know how to scan it for payment or rewards there is a big problem. 
Everytime I go to a subway it takes forever to check out. They tell me to scan it but it doesn‚Äôt work. They tell me to scan it again, doesn‚Äôt work. They call for help from a manager, while I wait and the people behind me wait. Too long in line. 

Terrible almost never works for ordering. I constantly get errors with an empty box that just says OK.

When it does work I would say 1/2 the time I walk in and the sandwich hasn‚Äôt even been made. So then I stand there and watch them make it. Why did I order ahead? 

Can‚Äôt delete gift cards after they have been used. Actually have to transfer the $0 balance to another gift card and then it will be automatically removed. Why not just give a delete option. Totally counter intuitive. 

How do I do a split tender with gift cards? It just says not enough funds. Do I have to keep reloading and never actually use the full value. 

How do I get my cash when it‚Äôs under $5. Employed don‚Äôt know how to do it.
developerResponse: {'id': 5316117, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-10-01T20:17:16Z'}

title: Very Usable but Very Limited
review: It's a breeze for be to order their subs and wraps the way they come or with limited changes. Very limited changes. A meatball sub with green peppers? Sure. You want that chicken creaser wrap but with turkey? Nice try, chicken is locked to the wrap. There's no place currently to make a from-scratch sub or wrap and I'm not sure why. Because of that, and the limited customization of existing sandwiches, I only recommend the app if you're just popping in for something simple with no hassle, the food is prepped even when I go before my pickup time! Awesome! Those of us who have lovingly handcrafted favorites are better off waiting in line at the store though.

title: Inconvenient
review: The app is not very user friendly. If you have a coupon or ‚Äúdeal‚Äù to apply, we shouldn‚Äôt have to go back to a menu item and add it.  It should prompt the consumer to use the coupon offered at checkout.  Most of us are ordering to-go because we‚Äôre on-the-go, in a car, or on our way out the door. The app was made a little too complex when it comes to discounts, with its unnecessary steps. Also if we use the ‚Äúback‚Äù arrow, it deletes the sandwich we just customized.  Should be more user friendly.

title: App could be great if
review: If you have an item that is available at the store but doesn‚Äôt show up on the mobile app the store will not let you substitute for the item that you wanted. I wanted to try the new Hero Bread. I saw it in the store but when I tried to place an order it doesn‚Äôt show up on the app. I put under special instructions please use hero bread instead of selection. I call store to tell them what I was trying to do and they said there was an up charge for hero bread so they cannot place it on my sandwich . I said I would be happy to pay the difference when I arrive at the store. They would not do it. Said I would have to cancel the order and come in store and stand in line. So much for subway promoting healthy options and providing convenience

title: Literally cannot place an order
review:
I have tried over and over again to order from the nearby restaurant which is open for another three hours.  You get all the way through adding everything to the cart (which takes almost fifteen minutes for the four people I‚Äôm trying to order with) only for it to take you to a page saying ‚Äúyour cart is empty‚Äù when you attempt to place the order. I have wasted almost 45 minutes attempting to make this work and I have memorized the sandwich orders of the three other people I wanted to get sandwiches with in the process. This app is absolutely worthless now.  

In case it helps, every time I start the app it says ‚ÄúDefault, please try again‚Äù. Maybe that‚Äôs related to the app being unusable.

title: Worst App Ever - Don‚Äôt wast your time!!!!
review: Completely unnerved by this app. If it‚Äôs not crashing it will let you get through to the end to put a payment in that it will never accept. Tried placing an order three times in an hour. Had to log out and back in and it never kept the shopping cart under my login!!! What a real piece of crap! This isn‚Äôt the first time this has happened tried putting an order in at work after 6 different payment methods it finally took a debit card! Tried that this time as well as my kids and husband have been out working in the yard and are disappointed that after an hour of trying there is no food for us. Well all I can say is good luck Subway as this family will order online from Publix or somewhere else that wants to sell their food to customers!!!

title: This app is useless
review:
I put my subway gift cards on this app yet when I order my meal in subway I can‚Äôt use the money I put on the cards. Now I‚Äôm down $30 and very disappointed. Also, sometimes when I open the app it immediately closes me out. The reason why I don‚Äôt order online and pay using my gift cards that way is because you can‚Äôt customize your orders on the app. I‚Äôm very upset with this app.

These developer responses are a joke, instead of asking the customer to call them. How about you take the tip you read and fix the problem? It‚Äôs not our fault your app is terrible. So why do we have to go out of our way to call or email you guys. Hire someone who can actually do their job and knows how to make an app good. With the way this is going, I wouldn‚Äôt be surprised to see subway go out if business.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-06-27T15:15:23Z'}

title: Change request
review:
App works nicely.  
A few improvements would be nice to have.
Would be nice to split the toppings on a foot long when your sharing the same sub with someone.
Would be nice to be able to add a comment for the sub so the sandwich artist gets it perfect. Like - add vinegar and oil on top of veggies and not on bread. 
Then lastly it would be nice to have a custom pickup time where the order can be placed in the morning and pick it up a few hours later or a set time after work. And the order gets sent 15 minutes before the pickup time to ensure freshness. I don‚Äôt mind having to pay for the order in advance for that feature.

title: App simply does not work
review:
Changing the location from the nearest Subway to any other one is a nightmare. It won‚Äôt let you simply select one in the map...noooo. You have to exit, search, select and then pray that the app doesn‚Äôt just say, ‚ÄúNo, no, you obviously don‚Äôt know what you‚Äôre doing by selecting THAT subway.  Here, let me select the one closet to you FOR you anyway.‚Äù Then heaven forbid you should actually want to order MORE than one sandwich, because, ha ha...that‚Äôs unthinkable! Trying to add another sandwich actually DELETES the 1st sandwich! And then, hahahahaha this is the BEST part, you aren‚Äôt able to see ALL the veggie or sauce options ever again! Unless...and here‚Äôs the tiny glimmer of hope...you DELETE THE APP AND REINSTALL AND START OVER!

It‚Äôs faster to drive to the store, wait in line, order, eat there and leave than it is to use this app to order a sandwich.

title: Subway app passwords been leaked
review: Hello I am just posting deserve you for everybody‚Äôs information so we can all take appropriate action because Subway and the app developer not doing anything about this issue we are getting so many orders in our stores from the app and then we get customer complains saying that the app has been hacked and the fact passwords been leaked and people just randomly finding the passwords online logging in and if you have card saved in your app they just place an order and come pick it up it is a huge mess we‚Äôve been getting these orders daily 3 to 4 times and nothing we can do about it in stores so I‚Äôm just leaving the review so if you‚Äôre reading it please change your password and delete the card off your app

title: Can‚Äôt add payment method
review:
Was really excited to place an order for pickup as I have little kids. Added while order, which was an ordeal all in itself. Not very user friendly. Then came time to add payment method. I‚Äôve tried Amex, Visa, and Mastercard and the app doesn‚Äôt want to accept any of them. I‚Äôve added all information but the ‚ÄúNext‚Äù button doesn‚Äôt work. Guess I‚Äôll go through a company that wants me to order. Thanks for nothing subway

2nd review:  went to the app to try again about a week later and was able to add payment this go around. Not sure why it didn‚Äôt allow me the first time. Worked well enough this time. Still not the best ordering app I‚Äôve used but it worked.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-10-28T22:36:39Z'}

title: Subway ordering app
review: One of the important reasons for downloading this app was to use my reward points while checking out from the mobile app.  Turns out you have to actually pay at the store in order to redeem the rewards.  I wish the app would say more information on that before I actually paid for the food from the app and notice there was no discount. So disappointed and angry!  If they make it like the other sandwich apps like Jersey Mike‚Äôs where you can redeem points online paying then I would rate it five stars, but until then one star.
developerResponse: {'id': 7300092, 'body': 'Hi, there- you can redeem your certificates when you order ahead. After you select a restaurant location, tap the button that says "Apply" beside the certificate, or tap on the Orange box that displays your tokens and tap "Apply + Order". Once you have built your order and arrive at the "Your Order" screen, you should see the number of certificates you have applied. Your feedback is really important to us and we\'re always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2019-02-14T16:29:23Z'}

title: Needs to be reorganized
review:
I‚Äôm extremely tech savvy when it comes to apps. I use several different apps for mobile ordering and this one is very difficult. 
Organization to get through an order is horrible. I have used it before to place an order for just myself and it took 5+ minutes. Today I attempted to order for my whole family 4 of us. It kept putting sandwiches separate and made it difficult to keep up with if I had added meal items or not. It wouldn‚Äôt allow me to choose the same flavor for both cookies in a meal package, and when I chose a kids pack it wouldn‚Äôt let me add on the side and drink to it. 
Take a look at chick fil a‚Äôs app for ideas. I can place an order with them in a snap. Chipotle is also a good example too.
developerResponse: {'id': 4783420, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-08-23T13:31:38Z'}

title: Missing Options
review: I do like this app for the rewards and convenience, but there are a couple ways it could be way better. For example, there‚Äôs no option to ‚Äútoast‚Äù flatbread unlike every other bread choice- I‚Äôve been having to leave it in the additional notes section, but the employees sometimes miss that unfortunately. It would also be nice if there was just‚Ä¶ a ‚Äúcustom sandwich‚Äù option? Instead of choosing from a pre-made option and having to remove and add a lot of the toppings. Overall, I‚Äôm saying it would be nice if the app operated the same way the store does - you just order what you want!

title: Never works and deals never apply
review: I don‚Äôt know if it is just defective where I live or what. But I‚Äôve attempted to place an order with this app numerous times. Usually the app gives me an error about half way through so that I can never finish. Recently I actually got the entire order in but the ‚Äúfree chips and a drink with any footlong ‚Äú deal wouldn‚Äôt apply. I‚Äôd start my order there and go forward. I finally placed the order snd of course when I went to pick them up the store had nothing about it. Even showing them the offer on my phone they wouldn‚Äôt honor it. Said the app was corporate and they could only do what came through to their system. I‚Äôve tried this on my computer too, always with same result. This app is going in the trash.

title: Repeated failures without clear information as to why
review:
The first time I tried to use the app, I was unable to complete the order. I‚Äôll be ordering at Jimmy John‚Äôs instead.

First, when attempting to select a restaurant where I could order, the app showed me several restaurants listed as ‚Äúopen‚Äù and several listed as ‚Äúclosed.‚Äù When I selected the first ‚Äúopen‚Äù one, I was shown a message stating that it wasn‚Äôt *actually* open and to choose a different restaurant. Then I was redirected to a page where I had to again search for locations (instead of just taking me back to the list that was already displayed).

This happened with the second restaurant I selected as well (‚Äúopen‚Äù but actually closed).

The third restaurant I selected allowed me to start to build an order. However, of the five different subs I tried to build, none of them allowed me to choose foot-long or wrap options; only six-inch was available.

My intention was to order two foot-long subs to take advantage of the ‚Äú$5 foot-long‚Äù deal. In fact, ordering two six-inch subs would have cost more than the promotional price for double the amount of food.

I canceled the order and plan to uninstall the app.

title: Accessibility with VoiceOver needs some improvement with customizing ingredients
review:
VoiceOver works well in this app, except when you try to customize an item.
The biggest problem is the method used to select and customize the ingredients one wants in their sandwich.
Each item in the list is spoken as ‚Äúdouble tap to customize item‚Äù. If I have ten ingredients shown, and each one says that, how am I supposed to know which ingredient I am customizing? It‚Äôs super confusing and needs some attention from the developers.

Please make it so individual ingredients are labeled. FOr example: ‚ÄúTap to customize tomato‚Äôs‚Äù, ‚Äúcustomize ham‚Äù, ‚Äúcustomize mayo‚Äù, Etc.
As it stands, I need someone to help me customize each new order. I‚Äôve added some to my favorites for future ease-of-use, but if I want something different, I‚Äôm stuck.

Also, the bread type selector is terrible to use with VoiceOver! Again, I need help from someone sighted to perform what should be a simple task.

I‚Äôve placed orders with other restaurants, because this app was difficult to use. So, you‚Äôve lost some sales here.
I appreciate your work. Please fix the accessibility issues.

title: Worst app ever! Impossible to use.
review: I just spent no less than 15 minutes trying to order two customized sandwiches using this app. I had zero problems with the first (steak and cheese) but the second (turkey breast) was impossible. I could select the second, but the moment I went to customize the meat option shown under the sandwich titled turkey breast said philly steak. The first time or two I thought maybe user error and I was somehow modifying the first sandwich in my cart. By tries 3 and beyond I realized the problem was the app and not the user. I had to submit two separate orders to get what I wanted. I will be immediately deleting this app the moment I pick my sandwiches up. Now I see why the App Store ratings are so low for this app. Get some new developers or kill the app. You‚Äôre embarrassing yourself keeping this app live.

title: Great until it‚Äôs not
review: I used this app all the time for my orders. Then one order the delivery address changed to the restaurant I ordered from. I understand this is my mistake but I had a door dasher take a picture of my sandwich‚Äôs in front of the store and it said delivered . So I assume the dasher just took my money AND my sandwich‚Äôs . I called the restaurant and they said the dasher already took the sandwich‚Äôs and there was nothing they could do. They wouldn‚Äôt even check outside the store to see if the sandwich‚Äôs were there. They told me to call doordash but I can‚Äôt since I didn‚Äôt order through their app. I told them I used this app , the Subway app. And to my honest shock, they said they then don‚Äôt know how to help me. Subway employees don‚Äôt know anything about this app apparently.

title: Trying to create on the Subway app
review: I updated my Subway app & when I went to create an account, it came up saying that either the e-mail address and/or the password was incorrect. I re-typed both in the event I put them in incorrectly. It still wouldn‚Äôt take. I wound up deleting the app & reinstalling it. Tried creating an account & the same thing happened again!!! I know my e-mail account is correct as I have had it for over 20 years!!!!! Why in the he double hockey sticks will it not take the password? The password I entered repeatedly I might add is one that I‚Äôve used in the past with no problem. Until you fix this problem, I‚Äôll either place my order in person or over the phone. If there was a zero rating on your app, I WOULD MOST DEFINITELY GIVE IT THAT & THEN SOME FOR THIS APP!!!! TALK ABOUT A FREAKING NIGHTMARE!!!!

title: Convenient but lack support
review:
I have been using this app and most of the times i dont have to wait . Some of the set backs are as follows: 1) had incident one day when i placed an order and suddenly i have a notification that i didnt complete my order then i have to put another order and when i came to the store i have 2 orders.  
2) no customer service - the tel number you have is the owners of the store ... no way you can refund anything from them
3. Location services- had an incident again when the location of the store thats magnified was the store that is not close to your real location and will end up selecting that store to order your sub , what a hassle.

title: Force Us To Choose A Time
review:
I‚Äôd give y‚Äôall 5 stars, but the app has one slight problem. The order time doesn‚Äôt need to have a default. Customers should have to confirm the time that they want to pick their order up each time they order. I don‚Äôt know how many times I‚Äôve accidentally ordered something for now, when I really want it several hours from now. Yes, I should have learned, but if the app asked me every time, I wouldn‚Äôt have to go through this. 

Alternately, you could provide us with the ability to change the time immediately after we place the order without having to call the store.

title: Horrible Sandwich!
review: Today on December 22, 2020 at approximately 4:30PM! This place is located in San Leandro, California off East 14th Street   I purchased a turkey sandwich because they make great sandwiches with fresh ingredients! Unfortunately, this sandwich was awful because the bread wasn‚Äôt fresh and the lady barely put any toppings in the sandwich! I asked for a receipt and she also over charged me! Thank goodness I paid with a credit card because the woman neglected to put the receipt in the bag! I went to the homepage for Subway to locate a contact number with no success! Since I don‚Äôt have the receipt I‚Äôm not able to voice my opinion on the matter! So, here I am having to write a negative review! Would someone in the Corporate Office please take a few minutes to address this issue!

title: App keeps crashing can‚Äôt check out
review: When the app functions like it should it‚Äôs seamless. I can put it in order as easily as one canned, I can check out quickly, and I can pick up my order with ease. But when it‚Äôs not working, like it currently is not, it‚Äôs a nightmare. The app continues to crash every time I try to go to the checkout screen. My payment methods keep getting declined on the basis of ‚Äúfraud‚Äú even though there are literally no other places where my cards are getting declined. This makes ordering on the app almost impossible, and extraordinarily frustrating. Someone please look into this quickly.

title: Glitch in app
review: When you order double meat or double cheese the app charges your account for it but doesn‚Äôt direct the store to actually put double meat or double cheese on the sandwich. You pick up your sandwich and it isn‚Äôt as ordered so you still have to wait in line to get it right. The owner of our local shop tells us that unless the preparers see the price and notices that it‚Äôs not the standard price, there‚Äôs no way else for them to know you asked for double meat. This is a glitch in the app that subway is in no hurry to fix. It seems like planned fraud since they know about it but they don‚Äôt fix it. Also the special instructions seems to be worthless as even when you mention that you ordered double meat there it‚Äôs ignored as well.

title: App Changes Orders Without Notice
review: I have ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù saved and place the same order for my family every week. This week, the local shop was apparently out of Italian Herbs and Cheese bread and out of shredded cheddar cheese, which we order on all of the sandwiches. Instead of letting me know they were out, the app automatically changed all bread orders to 9-grain wheat and changed all sandwiches to ‚ÄúNo Cheese.‚Äù  My family was not happy and I could not complain to the local store because when I expanded my individual sandwich orders, they all showed with no cheese and 9-grain wheat so the local shop made them correctly. This is only one of the several issues I have had with the app. I wish it had let me know so that I could have chosen a different Subway location or a different restaurant for dinner tonight.

title: So shoddily put together it requires my first App review
review:
This app handles as sturdily as the first pig that built his house out of straw. At every click or touch it teems with errors and unrequested reboots. In terms of efficiency, this app makes the Iowa caucus look like the London Underground. It requires more wrangling than an unhinged, raging bull. I feel like I can think up 6-7 updates to this app in 10 minutes that would work wonders, but here are three:
1) just have a one page, check mark sheet for sandwich, toppings, chips/drink, etc.
2) if more information is needed, have drop downs menus within the check mark sheet
3) put the dollars earned on automatically instead of not putting them on then asking you if you want them on then not putting them on still

title: Sad-which
review: My second time ordering through the app because of the online order BOGO special. I had my previous order on file so I figured oh I can just add it and I‚Äôll get what I had last time right? Nope :( I usually get the over roasted chicken on 9 grain honey oat and a bunch of veggies and sauces. When I got my sandwich, it was literally 2 chicken pieces on white bread. THAT‚ÄôS IT. I‚Äôm super disappointed in my order because it didn‚Äôt save my favorite toppings on my sandwich. Now I just got this plain sad thing on my lap starring at me. It‚Äôs not the stores fault at all what so ever. I probably soups of double checked before placing my order. But you would think saving your order history for reorder would include all the add ons...

title: Location, location, location!
review:
Great app. Works well. 

The only thing, there is no option to change your location after you‚Äôve made your order. I‚Äôve accidentally ordered from the wrong subway twice. I had to reorder and cancel the previous order. To change location, you have to work your way back to the main menu before you do anything. It‚Äôs a flaw in the design. Most other apps give the option to change or verify location before placing the order. Fix this, and you‚Äôll have a winning app.

Also! Why can‚Äôt I apply my rewards discounts after I‚Äôve made my order!?!? This is app looks nice but it‚Äôs clumsy and steps over its own feet.

title: Love Subway
review: I would give this app 5 stars, but there is no way to cancel the order if a mistake is made‚Ä¶such as location. I travel a lot and if you don‚Äôt manually change the store, it will order at the last store you used. This would be a simple fix with just a prompt when you are ordering asking if this is the location you want. I even verified the address of the subway that I was close to intending to put that in as my pick up location but once I got in there it didn‚Äôt prompt me and I didn‚Äôt think about it and so now an hours drive away someone else is going to get free sandwiches :(

title: Error Alert
review:
Constantly getting an error alert! I have the latest version downloaded and can‚Äôt do anything but select a restaurant. 
Update: After Subway told me to delete the app and reinstall it the app is working. It did take me over 30 minutes to reset my password and get everything back entered because of course I could not remember my password and the email went to junk. I still still find the app hard to use. I dislike all the swiping to change items on sandwiches and that sandwiches have certain items already on them. It was much faster when you could check mark all ingredients on one screen. It is to many steps and often faster to just go to the store and get the sandwich.

title: Easy
review: Easy to follow! I liked the way you selected the sandwiches. App is fun. Except not all my bottled options were available to select. The store I go to has orange juice bottles but not an option on the app. Causes confusion when I arrive. Same thing with the chips, there is a baked lays option but orginial flavor only not barbecue and they always put my bags together for me with the wrong chips because I cant choose what exact ones. I have told all the employees but its always an argument saying ‚Äúthats the chips i chose‚Äù and yes it is but the one i really want isnt an option *shrug*

title: Fraud
review:
Due to this unprecedented times I placed a delivery order through the subway app, hoping everything goes well but I don‚Äôt know I am not supposed to do that.  After I place the order from this place the app draw the money from my debt and canceled my order at the same time.
The status on the app says the order is delivered immediately after they cancelled my order.  I check with the email and everything called this place to see if they received my order they said I should contact the app and they don‚Äôt know anything about my order.
But the only contact information they put on the app is a link to the website that look like takes forever to read my message and I don‚Äôt know if I can get my money back.

title: No support for delivery orders
review:
The Subway app has zero support for delivery orders. 

I placed an online order which never arrived, which is almost expected for DoorDash. I watched the driver go past twice and then drive off, marking the food as delivered. I went through every page of the app looking for a help section so that I could be refunded, but it doesn‚Äôt exist. Even the corporate number gives no support for the app.

Literally the only method of getting help for a delivery order is to submit a feedback form on the subway website, and even then there isn‚Äôt a section for the app or for delivery. You basically have to submit a complaint about the restaurant that made your order, even though in my case the delivery service was clearly at fault.

title: Waste of money ordering with app
review: My issue isn‚Äôt an app problem but a store/employee problem. I ordered with app and didn‚Äôt get my sandwich because they gave it to someone else. They said what did you order? I pull my app and show them and then after minutes of arguing amongst themselves decide that they would make me another. I walk back down to subway to get my second sandwich and yes they misplaced it and wanted to argue with me wanting to see my receipt etc. You can‚Äôt make this up!!! I was so upset I said don‚Äôt worry about it and left hungry. I didn‚Äôt even want to ask for my money back because I can‚Äôt even imagine how that would have went. Do not order with the app unless your store has good employees that know what they are doing.

title: App is broken
review:
I usually order subway 3 plus days a week for my self and my kids and the app had been fantastic, making this a quick and easy choice for lunch. Since the ‚Äúupgrade‚Äù the new app takes longer, is more confusing, and most importantly now ends every order with a pop up saying DEFALT Sorry please try again.
 
I have tried again, I have reinstalled the app twice, I have tried building a new sandwich as well as using favorites and I have switched locations, all with the same result.  

I have a iPhone 12 Pro Max fully updated and the issue has been happening 100% of the time for 2 plus weeks. One star is not low enough as the app does not function and Apple should remove it.

I also saw the response from subway to another similar review and I took the time to call the phone number where they tell you in the intro they have moved to a ‚Äúnew all digital response system!‚Äù Aka they can not help you at all and you can‚Äôt get a person. No way I am writing emails to help them troubleshoot their ‚Äúupgraded app‚Äù. Subway you just lost another very loyal and consistent customer.

title: Update problems
review:
Every time a update happens I have problems my name hasn‚Äôt shown up properly on the receipt and my subway location doesn‚Äôt even show up on the map. I just ordered a sub yesterday without issues but today for some reason I‚Äôve been logged out and can‚Äôt log back in. The problems are consistent enough to make me want to eat elsewhere. Convenience is key with a app like this so problems like this should be fixed ASAP.

Came back to bring my review up to three stars no problems recently but there hasn‚Äôt been a update in a little while so we will just keep it at three for now.

title: 4 Strikes so far for the app
review:
1.  I used the app for the closest subway.  I made the order and it went through, my card was charged.  Drove to the subway...   oops they decided to close 50 minutes early. It took a day for the charge to be reversed.

2.  I used the app to make another sub. I ordered the melt / toasted with a few modifications.  One ingredient was left off and the sub way not toasted.   I thought toasting was the definition of the melt. 

3.  Once more, I gave the app a try. This time I ordered for 3 people all with modifications, this took several minutes.  Again my card was charged right away...  oops, the location you choose is not accepting app orders at this time ‚òπÔ∏è. 

Maybe see if the subway got the order or see if it is open before charging the credit card. 

Yet another poor update to a poor app.  They took several sandwiches off the app. I asked the subway shop and they said that I can not get the app discounts because I can not use the app to order my food. I am being charged 5-10$ more per order because I am ordering it in the shop. What a crappy thing to due to your customers.

title: Horrible
review: One of the worst food ordering apps I have EVER USED. It is FULL of bugs, and I have an iPhone 10x. It is a never ending process of finding dead ends each and every single day. Recent orders? Error Loading. Favorites? Error Loading. Find a Restaurant? Error Loading. Start order for Chicken Bacon Ranch or ANY other sandwich? Nope, this location doesn‚Äôt serve sandwich‚Äôs apparently because NONE ARE AVAILABLE. I‚Äôve re downloaded the app countless times. Reset my phone multiple times and reset network setting multiple times. Same thing. If it isn‚Äôt one of the above, it‚Äôs ALL AT ONCE. And that is why I‚Äôm not going to be giving subway my business anymore if the next time I log in it does this crap again. Your a multi-billion dollar company.... HIRE SOMEBODY WHO KNOWS HOW TO DESIGN AN APP.

title: Good idea on the app but
review:
I like the app generally but the rewards card functionality is why I‚Äôm giving it 3 stars. Half the time when scanning the app I still have to pull out my wallet and pay with my card. I suspect this is a training issue for the subway cashier but I‚Äôm always afraid I‚Äôm being charged twice so I have to make a mental note to watch for that. 

Another issue is the requirement that I sign a receipt. What‚Äôs that all about? If I use Apple Pay I can just scan my watch or phone and leave. But if I use this old fashioned app I have to sign still??

title: A few frustrating problems
review:
I use the subway app three days a week.... almost every week. Lately it has been freezing up, and I have to delete it and reinstall it to get it to work correctly. Earlier in the week it didn‚Äôt even send my order through to the store though the app said the order was placed.

As a side note, the app and online site often tell me the store I chose is not open, but that is not true. The store is located in Alabama, but our town (Phenix City) runs on EASTERN time NOT Central time. It will often not let you place an order saying the store is not yet open.... but that is incorrect. 

I love subway, but these problems are very frustrating.
developerResponse: {'id': 10980015, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we wanted you to know that this issue should now be resolved (with App Version 15.2.0). If you have further difficulty, please reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-09-30T15:35:27Z'}

title: Contacting Support and an app error
review:
First off, contacting app support is impossible. Not only is it not where it says it is, but the one email address that I found and emailed apparently doesn‚Äôt even exist. (Which I found listed elsewhere through that link.)
The whole reason I needed to talk to app support is due to an error in the app. When I click on the roast beef sandwich the second page says what comes on it, but the customize page changes the sandwich to a club sandwich instead and it will not let me take the other two meats off to try and correct the apps error. 
I do really like the idea but of the app and how easy it is to customize a sandwich, but with a family of 5, and 2 out of those 5 sandwich meals being roast beef, I cannot use the app until this error in the app is corrected.
