title: Charged for nothing!
review: I placed my order like I always do on the subway app, it told me my order was ready. I went into the store and there were multiple people there to pick up and we were being told that they did not get are order and we would have to do it again in person and pay again. We were told that the online order would not be charged for the online order‚Ä¶ I even called the owner to make sure. But I was charged! I emailed them and they again told me I would not be charged so I sent them a copy of my credit card statement. That was about 12 days ago and have received no response. So I think it‚Äôs fair to say don‚Äôt trust there online app ordering! Unless you like paying for your food twice!

title: Easy to use
review: Very easy to use this app. I like the ability to customize your sandwich, even put items on 1/2 of your sandwich and also leave comments about your order. The only downfall I have found is that the app doesn‚Äôt accept the coupons that I have found in the mail or newspaper. The app may have the specials that are on the television but the ones that require a coupon, you‚Äôre not able to put the coupon in or a coupon number in so you‚Äôre forced to go in the store to order if you want to use the coupon.

title: This subway apps is cheap n horrible. Never works properly
review:
Cannot trust this subway mobile apps it‚Äôs defective. they charge u through ur credit card for online order n then order doesn‚Äôt goes but ur payment goes through and then when I go to pick up my order the store says there is no order n then I ask them I did mobile order n it went through n it charged me through my credit card they says call customer service n when I call customer service on their business hours it never gets connect..

My god this is rip off.. very disappointing n worst apps I ever got. I‚Äôm still waiting for my charges to get reversed what it got charged. Not one time I got charged it got 2 times.. there is no customer services available on the phone line. zero star. üëéüèºüëéüèºüëéüèº

title: So convenient
review: We love this app for ordering! It‚Äôs so much easier to just click on your saved favorites, add to cart, and pay than to go into the store and spell out all the toppings etc for multiple items. I like that you can name/label your favorites so that if more than one person likes the same type of sandwich but with different toppings you can easily find them. Let‚Äôs not forget the REAL rewards you earn. They aren‚Äôt coupons for things you don‚Äôt order. You actually get discounts off your total. Very pleased with this app.

title: Still bug ridden
review:
I redownloaded the app today, hoping the various bugs I experienced previously would have been ironed out.  To my disappointment, I can‚Äôt even log in.  When I open the app and click ‚Äúsign in with existing account‚Äù the ‚Äúlog in‚Äù button is unclickable, whether I‚Äôve typed in my password or not.  As a potential work around, I tried hitting return while in the password section, but that didn‚Äôt trigger a log in attempt either.  I‚Äôm using the current version of both the app and ios, on an iPhone 7 if that matters.

One more thing: Browsing other bug-based negative reviews, I‚Äôve seen the ‚Äúsorry for difficulties‚Äù auto-response with the 1-800 number.  I‚Äôm not interested; please just fix your app & maybe spend some more money on quality assurance/your app dev team.

title: It only ever worked once
review: I used it to order successfully once. But ever since then, my funding source never seems to work. I‚Äôve tried PayPal, debit card, and credit card. I get errors every time. I‚Äôve came back to this app a few times over the years to see if it works yet. It never does. Tried to Google the problem and it‚Äôs not just me. I think I saw Subway post on Twitter once basically saying their system isn‚Äôt broken and that people needed to uninstall the app and try it again. Still never works. To be fair, I get the same thing trying to order from their website. Today I tried it again and couldn‚Äôt even get to the payment. I built my sandwich and it said ‚ÄúOops: rejected‚Äù or something like that. I give up.

title: Would like to more easily Double the order.
review: Hi just went to the trouble of customizing & writing the special instructions. And then because I wanted a 2nd footling just like it, I HAD TO GO THRU THE SAME PROCESS ALLLL OVER AGAIN. You folks should have a button that will EASILY multiply the customers order.  Some folks might not want multiples of the same footling sandwich. But I‚Äôm planning on loosing weight with your delicious veggie delights. And I always order 2 at a time. Please make it more apparent on how to go about doing this so that you folks actually succeed in Saving your customers their valuable time. Thankyou

title: Poor App Design and Unsympathetic Employees!!!
review: When I was trying to order a buy one get one free sandwich online, I was trying to scroll up and accidentally select the ‚Äúplace order‚Äù button. While that is on me, there should be some sort of order confirmation to make sure I want to place my order before I actually place it. Especially when this is happening on device as small as a cell phone. Not only that, but when I went to the restaurant to try to explain the issue to the employees, they had no sympathy and disputed the fact that buy one get one free is even available online. And the app did show that you could do a buy one get one free. Regardless, subway has lost my business due to the poor design of its app and the lack of help from their employees.

title: Need to watch them make it
review: Ordered for the first time using app.  Tried on line for 20 minutes and always receive error at the end.  Downloaded this app and I was able to order, however every screen click asked me if I wanted to share my location, and every time I hit yes.. but I add something and asks for location yet again.  Then, I pick up the order. I‚Äôm not picky, but I ordered 2x lettuce and 2x onions.  When I get my sub, there was less lettuce than if I ordered single inside restaurant.  Same for ALL ingredients.. except the meat.  Meat was the regular 6 slices of meat.. but ALL veggies were so sparse, it was basically bread and meat.  They are very stingy when you are not watching. Deleting app.. won‚Äôt go again. Feel if I need to watch them I will go to the other sub shop around the corner.

title: This app is very convenient
review: I use this app all the time, as a subway employee I understand how the times work and how to get around through the app. Some people don‚Äôt understand the ‚Äúhave it your way‚Äù aspect of the app. I have never had concerns with payments, points, or order pick ups and am confused when others have problems such as pick up time. You select everything, and then get mad at the employees for not being able to do anything. A little rant I‚Äôm sure, but I‚Äôd like to tell these people sometimes how this all worksüòÇ

title: Has potential but buggy
review: My first order on the app went fine but my second order I put in it was somehow scheduled for 5:30 pm (I put in my order at 12:15 pm so it should have been scheduled for the soonest time). I tried changing the time, which you can not do after you order, so I tried cancelling the order. The app tells me to call the restaurant to cancel but when I call they tell me to cancel on the app...wow. I explain my situation and even the employee admitted the set up of the app is ‚Äústupid‚Äù which I hate to agree cause I love subway. Unfortunately, I ended up deleting the app and plan to just go in-store so I don‚Äôt starve. üòï

title: Really great!
review: Wanna skip those odd long lines or the entire process? Want to make your sandwich all at once instead of waiting for the toaster and and other in front? Make you‚Äôre sandwich on the app super quick and just set a time for pick up and boom. Subways just got a whole lot quicker! Also worth mentioning if other reviews haven‚Äôt yet. My first time using the app if you order a foot long you get one completely free. Now I‚Äôm a small stomach guy but you‚Äôd have to be out of it to not accept a free meal for later. This apps staying on my phone for sure üëçüèª

title: App worked surprising well!
review: I haven‚Äôt eaten at Subway in while, but had a craving for it. I figured I could order online being it‚Äôs 2020 now, so I downloaded the app. It has built in How To animations. It just worked‚Äî hats off to the developers. Nothing was confusing and I placed my order in record time plus don‚Äôt have to wait in long lines at this busy location. Only pain point was not Apple Pay integration so I had to manually type payment info in. As long as future app updates do not break my login I‚Äôll continue to be a happy camper.

title: Miscommunication between the store and app several times
review: I like the ability to order ahead and skip the line. But a lot often the store is out of the ingredients that you pick and the store is clueless what to do in those circumstances. I know live inventory management is hard to maintain and I seriously think subway should come up with a plan of action for the same. For example, is it possible to reverse the online transaction and ring you up at the store for the revised order total(particularly when the missing ingredients are charged separately like Guacamole)

title: I‚Äôd give it 5 stars if they were in sync with the stores.
review:
Great app, and being able to avoid a line and walk straight up to the register saves time. 

The only issue is that the app has all the possible ingredients available to choose from regardless of what the local store has. 

I ordered a sandwich and added ingredients not available at the local store. When I arrived the sandwich wasn‚Äôt ready because they didn‚Äôt have the items. It‚Äôs not a big issue, but if you have a small window of time to pick up and you get there and have to wait in line to make a sandwich, it defeats the purpose.

title: Can‚Äôt cancel order, worst customer service!!!
review: I have been using the app for a little while. I used it to pick up an order while I was on vacation once. Then next time I went to order, I searched for the nearby location I wanted and usually go to, but it switched back to the California location I used on our trip. When I realized that it was sent to the wrong location (I‚Äôm in a different state), there was no way to cancel the order. I called the location and they said they couldn‚Äôt do anything. I then emailed customer service. They said they can‚Äôt do anything. Also, finding a way to contact customer service was horrendous! So far my complaint is sitting in limbo and no one has tried to help refund my money. This is the worst customer service I have EVER experienced.

title: Long, cumbersome process ends in error
review: Selected food choices on the app. Debit card listed as form of payment. Selected Place the Order. Processed for a couple of seconds and a message popped up that said ‚ÄúOK‚Äù. It never left the order page so no idea if the order sent. Called the subway store to see if they got it. They said no and try again while on the phone. Since my app never left the order screen I submitted again. Two seconds of ‚Äúthinking‚Äù and the ‚ÄúOK‚Äù message pops up. Subway says they received nothing. So after ten minutes of navigating through the app to place the order, I ended up having to give it verbally over the phone and now have to check my bank to make sure I wasn‚Äôt charged for it. Or charged for it twice. Keep working on it subway. You‚Äôre not done.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-04-10T14:59:56Z'}

title: Watch out for double charges!
review:
A few days ago after clicking the button to submit my order I got some error message that said something about my order ‚Äúcouldn‚Äôt be placed at this time‚Äù. I verified that the order did not submit by looking at the previous orders listed in the app. So I went through and recreated and a new order. Although the 2nd time around the app no longer showed my $2 in discounts available for use so I had to pay more, but whatever. 

Fast forward a few days and now I see where my bank account was charged for BOTH orders! Even though the app only shows the 2nd order I submitted! Not ok! Now I have to figure out how to get my money back for the double charge. I‚Äôll definitely think twice about using this app again now.

title: APP is too basic and not useful for CS
review: There's been a lot of advertisement for the BOGO deal, but many restaurants are not participating. I placed a purchase in the app and though it says that to cancel it you should call the restaurant, which I did and went in person, I was still charged and didn't get refund. The restaurant owner said he couldn't do anything because the purchase was made through the App. Last week, I called different numbers to contact CSR and was on hold for over an hour and a half. On one call, that department couldn't handle my issue and they transfer me back to the main menu -- which has no options to actually talk to someone with issues with the App. I would not recommend using this App to anyone due to their lack of CSR contact numbers or choices.

title: Need to work on location stores
review: I used the Subway app for the first time today. For some reason the app didn‚Äôt gave me the nearest Subway location and unfortunately I didn‚Äôt realize until I made my order and went to the Subway that I thought I made the purchase. The guy was helping me out and that‚Äôs when we finally figure out that my purchase was made at Brookshire location. The employee explained that I could call to the store to cancel the order. When I called to the other store the guy was very rude. He said ‚Äú You can‚Äôt cancel the order you need to come right now and pick it up‚Äù and then hung up on me. Now I‚Äôm out of pocket because I couldn‚Äôt get my order since I was on working hours and the store location where I placed my order by accident was far away.

title: Subway on Delaware Avenue McComb
review: I love Subway on Delaware Avenue in McComb, MS It‚Äôs the cleanest, friendliest store in the area I always make my purchases at this store and each time I am very satisfied with the customer service as well as the food Next review I will give shout outs to each and every employee I encounter there My sister also feels the same way because just like me this Subway store is the only one she purchases her food So if you can please let these Subway employees know they are doing a great job and keep up the good work

title: Harder to build a sandwich but still great
review: Some things are more cumbersome than earlier editions but I love that rewards build up that you can add right in the app.    Adding favorites definitely cuts down on time.  The only critique I have to offer is that I wish they had it where you could just build your sandwich and not have things automatically added that you have to remove or modify.  And then to have things sorted by sauce, extras, etc. ... sometimes I forget to add things because everything‚Äôs kept separate from each other.  The convenience is great though and I love the app so, all is good!

title: Terrible app
review: App is slow as can be. It has to reload after any entry. And reloads slow. If having to look at a text to see what others want, it starts over the order reloading. If you don‚Äôt want something like cheese on a melt but want it grilled, you have to put it in the notes and it won‚Äôt let you take it off and just pray they read the notes. The new order touchscreen at the drive through is even worse not showing all the new items and is confusing and the people show no interest in helping if press the button for help. And to top it off, if you try to order several hours early for an office staff of 15, the app won‚Äôt let you order more than 5 sandwiches at a time. Ridiculous.

title: Fast food.
review: If you have never worked In the fast food industry SHUT your mouth you filthy lazy slobs.  The worker‚Äôs in this industry work their fingers to the bone for rude people.  Subway workers take more cussing off then most.  They don‚Äôt have a drive thru so they get to see the rude jerks face to face then smile when they complain that there isn‚Äôt 15 types of bread or that ‚Äúsorry we ran out of spinach because of an Ecoli outbreak ‚Äú.  And for the record I don‚Äôt work for Subway.  I‚Äôm a farmer.  So let us listen to the words of our parents. IF You CANNOT say anything NICE then say NOTHING at all!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Worst app and service for ordering food
review: Dont waste time or money ordering on this app. I ordered for pick up at one location, i get there and they say my order was actually sent to a different location. (Yes, i double checked before ordering where I was placing the order at.) I get to the other subway and of course, THEY DONT HAVE MY ORDER IN THE SYSTEM. They say theres nothing I can do and cant give me a refund since no order was on their system. I have been trying to contact customer service, but conveniently for subway they have no way of immediate contact with any humans for customer service. Im sure ill be waiting months for any sort of refund, IF i ever even get one or a response from anybody. Id give this negative stars if I could.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work at all with VPN
review:
We use VPN help protect our family‚Äôs phones & computers from bad actors. But both your mobile app and online website deny access to customers who use VPN.

Presumably this is because your sites mistakenly assume connections from multiple and different customers over time using common VPN IP addresses must be attempting to compromise your sites. Poor assumption, bad software.

Get with the program like other companies and payment processors have. There are smarter ways to determine who‚Äôs a legitimate customer and who‚Äôs not and VPN is becoming more popular and a necessity to help protect families when using the Internet.

title: Could be better
review: Overall I will say the app is quite useful especially having the favorite foods of everyone in the family on the farm. I appreciate that I can actually save more favorites because the old favorite limit was foolish. My food is correct all the time. My biggest complaint is the arbitrary 6 sandwich/protein bowl per order, when ordering for everyone I would have 7 items and then have to put in a second order for just one item right afterwards, this is highly inconvenient and even my local store believes it is asinine that my order has to be split. Please get this fixed

title: I almost always enjoy it‚Ä¶
review: I enjoy eating Subway‚Ä¶ when they get the order right. I order through the app on occasion due to convenience, but I have a major issue. Flatbread is for some reason unable to be marked as toasted. I thought it was because they toast it no matter what, but apparently my Subway didn‚Äôt receive that memo. I had a cold flatbread sandwich that did not taste good whatsoever and actually tasted uncooked. Maybe fix the app so I know what I‚Äôm getting every time I place an order please. I‚Äôll have to start ordering. In person if I must, but I‚Äôd prefer to use the app to make it easier and more efficient. Thanks

title: Incorrect order
review: Ive ordered on this app because it felt very convenient as theres a place nearby which is always packed with lines. However i ordered mozza meat sandwich. It didn‚Äôt have mozzarella and I thought maybe they dont have it today. The next day i ordered it again and checked that they did have it in store when i came to pick up and this time there was some mozzarella in the container but no mozzarella on my sub again. I also paid for the deluxe which is a bit extra and it turns out to be paying extra for the same thing and not a single piece more maybe even less instead of more. The main problem is that I can‚Äôt even report or get help with my order as theres no in app support.

title: Simply not User Friendly
review: I‚Äôve tried on several occasions to use the app especially to take advantage of buy one get one free. The app will not allow you to pay in cash and the store won‚Äôt honor the discount when making the purchase in store with cash. So Subway is penalizing people who prefer to pay in cash on two fronts - (1) not even being able to place an order on the app and (2) charging full price just because the customer wants to use cash instead of a card. VERY POORLY DEVELOPED APP

title: Permit Payment by Multiple Gift Cards
review:
Payment with the current version of the app can only be made with one thing (either a credit card or one gift card). Please change it to permit payment by a gift card plus a credit card OR permit payment by multiple gift cards. You promote your gift cards so much; now make using those gift cards something easy which the average person can do through the app. 

If I want to make a purchase of $35 and I have 4 gift cards which are each $10, I‚Äôm stuck. Wendy‚Äôs app has it perfect where each gift card is converted into a digital account balance within the app which future purchases can be easily drawn from; check out their app and see if you can make Subways app like that in terms of using gift cards.

title: Doesn‚Äôt matter how user friendly the app is if the workers can‚Äôt get it right....
review: The app is extremely user friendly and makes it very easy to order. However this doesn‚Äôt matter when you go 0/4. I‚Äôve ordered 4 times through the app and NOT ONCE was the order made correctly. I‚Äôve had sandwiches toasted when I didn‚Äôt want them too (and yes I checked to make sure it wasn‚Äôt my fault and I ordered it correctly), I‚Äôve gotten a chopped salad where they didn‚Äôt chop it and wouldn‚Äôt when I asked, and I‚Äôve gotten a wrap where they gave me the wrong tortilla, cooked when I didn‚Äôt want it cooked, and was so dainty and thin it practically had nothing in it. From now on I‚Äôm just ordering inside so that I can see them make my food and make sure they actually make it the way I want.

title: Really super great
review: I really didnt eat subway much before I got this app. Once I got this app though, I eat there all the time. Its pretty reasonable pricing, online ordering makes it super easy to customize, you get rewards such as free chips or cookie, when you earn enough bonus point from ordering you can get $2 off, and its a quick and easy meal for when I need it! I love this app, it glitches every once in a while but once i close out of it and reopen it, it works perfectly. If you like subway, this app is so worth it! And super easy to use.

title: Saves me time every week
review: Once you set the app up and use it a few times it stores the sandwiches and meals that you like for quick re-order. I will start thinking about lunch and decide to head to Subway‚Ä¶ I will pull off on the side of the road place my order and it is ready for me to pick up by the time I get there a few minutes later‚Ä¶ Letting me skip the line entirely. The order process takes maybe 30 seconds from the time I open my app and it takes me about a minute to run in and grab my sandwich.

title: I love it!
review:
I love the subway app! It makes it easy to place an order so it‚Äôs ready when I arrive. I like that it saves your orders so you can reorder the same thing at a later date, making it even faster! The only things I wish were different are 1) you aren‚Äôt able to enter your coupons on the app (unless I haven‚Äôt figured it out) and 2) when ordering in the store, many employees in the stores in our area are unfamiliar with scanning the rewards on the app/paying from the card saved on the app in store. 

But I‚Äôm sure that will change with time. So overall it‚Äôs a great thing!

title: Not reliable at all!
review: I ordered a sandwich through the app for a noon pickup.  Showed up to the store at the correct time to hear the employees say that they never received an order from the app.  I showed them my app with confirmation of store # and order and told me to wait in line and they would make my sandwich for me.  I only had enough time on my lunch break to pick up food, not wait in line for them to make my sandwich.  I asked for a refund and the store told me they were unable to give a refund since they couldn‚Äôt find my order.  It took a 15 minute conversation with Subway customer service to get a refund on the money I paid.  I would STAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS APP unless you are willing to risk losing your money on an imaginary order and are willing to deal with corporate Subway.

title: Having a subway gift card is torture.
review: I got a subway gift card for holiday, and figured like anywhere else it‚Äôll be a pleasant thing to use to cover a meal or partial meal. But no. I have to sign up through pop up windows to refill a gift card since it doesn‚Äôt have the exact amount I need. It‚Äôs such a pain that I no longer use this app until I forget and come back to the same thing. It can‚Äôt just use the remaining balance and call it a day. Like everywhere else in the world does. And trying to reach customer service on your app for when there‚Äôs a mistake is worse than trying to tell a deaf dog to sit down. Very disappointed.

title: AWFUL app & doesn‚Äôt work
review: I usually don‚Äôt write reviews but BOTH times I‚Äôve ordered using the app, it has been a complete disaster. The most recent, at the end while paying for my meal, the app told me I couldn‚Äôt place my order because it had been too long. So I restarted and tried placing it again. When I came to the store it showed that both orders went through however I was only notified that the second one went through. Therefore, I had to pay double because of the app ineffective capabilities. Not to mention lots of the coupons I was sent don‚Äôt work on the app (tried coupons at serval locations through the app). Not worth the hassle and lost money. Go somewhere else or use a better app.

title: Worst app ever!
review:
The interface is poorly designed and difficult use. Very difficult to order more that one sandwich unless ordering same sandwich.   Doesn‚Äôt allow you to back track your order very easily.  If you can‚Äôt order breakfast subs then it should stop you before you have gone through the process of ordering one.  That just doesn‚Äôt make sense.  Menu selection buttons are offered that don‚Äôt work.
If you ever need to show your students a poorly designed app and need an example then this the app to use!

title: What happened?
review: I have used this app for more than a year and absolutely loved it. In fact, the manager at my subway is the one who turned me onto it because I come in at least three times a week. Recently, say the last two months, it has been completely off. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling, still off. I even switched to a brand new Iphone and recently installed it. I ended up being able to order something I didn‚Äôt want and call them to change it right away. The app tells me my store is out of everything I want and when I call they actually have it in stock. I have either been unable to use it or call in and change the order after placing it. What happened?

title: Customizing is nice but...
review: Being able to visually customize your sandwiches is really nice. Where the app falls short is if you want to change your store/pickup location, you lose everything in your cart and have to start over. Ran into this bc our normal store said it wasn‚Äôt open. So had to select a different store. The newly selected store didn‚Äôt have the $5 footlong deal making it about ~$15 more expensive. So I wanted to change to a different store that did have the deal. This is when I discovered I had to blow everything out of my cart and start all over. This was a PITA.

title: Zero customer support
review: We were ordering through the app. When making the order, I thought I was ordering through my regular location and didn‚Äôt realized the app have saved the last location I ordered from which was very far away from our regular place. We contacted the store and they told us to call the corporate number to get a refund since it was obvious we were not intended to order from a store that far. We called over and over, and it is impossible to get in contact with anyone. The automated recording kept sending me to the website where I couldn‚Äôt find a place to contact anyone or express what had happen. It was extremely frustrating!!! They make it imposible to request a refund and I might have to eat it up... NOT VERY HAPPY!!!

title: Failure of an app
review:
I am not sure if it is the store or the app but there is definitely a software failure because every time I order from the app, they always get the order wrong. From a software developers standpoint, I would never release an app that couldn‚Äôt even do what it is suppose to do to my customers. Especially when there is money involved. I can‚Äôt believe a big corporation can‚Äôt even make an app that can correctly send an order to a store. I would recommend hiring more software engineers to fix this failure of an app. 
I recommend anyone to just wear a mask and wash your hands and order directly at the store. You don‚Äôt even save money or time since you still have to go inside and pick it up. I wonder why people go to Jimmy Johns instead of Subway.

title: By far the worst and most pointless app I have ever had.
review: I have downloaded this app four times now, each time it hasn‚Äôt worked. I actually called the subway here and other apparently customers have also complained about the app. I was surprised when it has such good ratings but that‚Äôs just you guys tripping the system. Each time I have downloaded it, it doesn‚Äôt work, claimed I already had an account and said either my email and/or password was incorrect. I went to change the password but it never sent me my emails to reset it. I also tried making a new account with different emails but it kept saying error. It‚Äôs a terrible app and doesn‚Äôt work, it is a waste of time. You guys seriously need to fix the app or just get rid of it, thanks.

title: Developers need to think
review:
The App uses the ‚ÄúOpt Out‚Äù model when you ‚Äúbuild‚Äù a sub sandwich.  They show 5 or 6 ingredients, and unless you specifically ‚Äúopt out‚Äù of an ingredient (i.e., tomatoes) the App puts that ingredient on your sub.  Why not simply let the user choose (i.e., ‚ÄúOpt In‚Äù) for those ingredients, just as the user does for sauces and seasonings?  The first time I used the App, I got several ingredients on our subs we did NOT want.

Also, it appears that the only way to add a Favorite is to purchase the sub, and then add it to your favorites.  Why not offer the option to create Favorited before purchasing?  That would be easier for the user.

Apparently the developers never actually use the App, or these things would be glaringly obvious.

title: Needs some modifications.
review:
I enjoyed using the app and then picking up my order. There are two issues that were pretty major for me.  Subway is all about making each sandwich the way the customer wants but in that respect the app falls short.  I wanted a one meat and one cheese sandwich and there wasn‚Äôt a way I could find to do so.  I even tried to order a sandwich with multiple meats and just delete the unwanted meat. Nope the app would let me delete toppings but not meat. 
  I also want my sauce on the side. I couldn‚Äôt find a way to leave a comment or special requests for a sandwich.  
It might be a while before I use this app.  Hope there are improvements soon.

title: Wallet & Touch ID integration needed
review:
Review #4, June 12,2018

The developer has responded to my previous post and fixed the login issues & for that I‚Äôll give it 3‚≠êÔ∏è. I‚Äôm still waiting for wallet & Touch ID integrations. Hopefully they‚Äôll work on it. 

Review #3, May 26, 2018

The app forced me to logout to agree to the new terms and conditions, now I can‚Äôt log in because it‚Äôs automatically taking me to ‚Äúforget my password‚Äù page, which I did & still can‚Äôt login 

Review #2, 2017

Wallet and Touch ID integration still not available. I visited one of your stores and I couldn‚Äôt use my card to pay for my order because the lady couldn‚Äôt figure out how to scan my subway card. 

Review #1, 2016

Downloaded the app and I wanted to buy subway card for myself and it was a terrible experience. If I created account with my personal information then I shouldn't have to enter everything all over again to buy my self a subway reward card. 
It needs a new design for the latest software ASAP. Even maybe take some notes from WAWA App.

title: A loading anim‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.ation for every screen?!?!
review:
Completely unusable if your network happens to be a bit slow or your WiFi is slow. It‚Äôs like every screen was rendered on some machine in the cloud rather than just being using some cached data on the phone.

Not sure exaggerating or making this up - it‚Äôs quicker, easier, and faster to just get in the car and drive to the nearest subway and place my order in person rather than use this app.

A bit of constructive criticism: the only time it should ‚Äúneed‚Äù to talk to the internet is when loading the restaurants near me, and actually placing the order. That‚Äôs it. Everything else should be able to work offline in airplane mode

title: Mobile app is always down
review: I have lost count of how many times the app won‚Äôt work. From just a plain white screen with nothing on it after tapping on the app, to getting to the sign into your account or continue as a guest and it says access is denied. I have deleted the app and reapplied it, to shutting my phone completely down and turning it back on with no luck. I contacted the corporation and they said they would work on it and it fixes it for a few days and then goes right back to not working. I have gone to the website to place an order, or have just went in to Subway so it‚Äôs not the end of the world, just wish the app would continue to stay logged in and work.

title: Great app great deals
review: I really like the bogo foot longs, my husband & I have used it many times & it is really great. Also there are other good deals like free 6 inch sub that is really nice. Just make sure to double check your order before you place it to make sure your sub is how you like it because I have accidentally forgotten to change/remove an item from my sub before so now I just always double check before I place my order. It is also very convenient to just be able to walk into the store & skip the line

title: Clever interface but slower than in-person ordering
review: The app and tutorial or easy to use, and understand with great visual aids to see exactly what you are ordering. A few options that would be available in-person are not available on the app (or is it just due to Covid limitations?). Even with the great interface, it still took a long time to enter and customize my order; it is much slower than in-person ordering. But I expect it to pay off on future orders when it remembers my preferences from this order.

title: Just don‚Äôt
review: The app sometimes glitches, takes your money, and doesn't ever send the order to the store. Plus, the ghetto people subway hires so they can keep paying minimum makes it so much worse. Those people forget ingredients 3/4 of the time and 100% of the time just throw everything together extremely sloppy and don‚Äôt care if anyone is ever going to eat it. I really would give it a 0 star if I could. I just wanted some convenience and subway could not deliver. Just go to the store and watch those ghetto people put ur sandwich together so they get it right and not do it sloppy.  I actually went back up to the subway once and demanded another sub before they forgot BACON CHEESE AND TOASTED. like I can‚Äôt even. Pull it together subway.

title: Difficult to order/no cancelation
review: The App is difficult to navigate and order what you want exactly. When you hit ‚Äúcustomize‚Äù if gives you all the condiments and veggies but never does it mention toasting. You will get a cold sub because you couldn‚Äôt find the toast button. After your order is in and you realized you messed up somewhere you have to call the store to change/ cancel your order. If the manager isn‚Äôt in there is nothing they can do. Ex. If you want to cancel and the manager isn‚Äôt there you won‚Äôt get a refund. Also if you chose the wrong restaurant you have no way of changing it to the right restaurant or canceling your order.

title: So many errors and deals that don't work
review: Absolutely infuriating to use. First time I downloaded the app it wouldn't work at all, so I deleted it and came back to it after some time. Upon actually being able to use it, I went through the menu and made sandwiches, THREE times there was an "error" that completely wiped out the custom sandwiches, and had to redo the order. Called my location to ensure they participated in the "2 for 5$ deal", and they assured me they did. Placed the order and was charged full price. There is NO WAY to ensure that the deal is applied because they force you to complete and pay before the deal is utilized. Completely ridiculous setup that is counter-intuitive to a good experience. Not likely to go back to subway anytime soon.

title: Worst fast food app
review: Downloaded the app to get the buy one get one free deal. Horrible idea. Firstly the price displayed for the sandwich I selected was not the price I was charged. The ‚Äúcustomization‚Äù process is so clunky & difficult to work & left many options off. I had enabled location & was actually in the parking lot of the location I wanted to order from & it sent my order to a location several miles away. Need to cancel your order? Can‚Äôt do it in the app. Try calling the store before the number disappears from the app because there‚Äôs no store locator & if you go to your order details you can‚Äôt find any contact info for your store. Need additional help? No one will answer the 800 number, good luck getting your money back or a sandwich with this app.

title: Would give it 0 stars.
review: There‚Äôs a promotion going on for BOGO footlongs. It doesn‚Äôt tell you if a store is participating or not until you get to checkout. If you try and switch stores it doesn‚Äôt carry over your cart.  Once you have PayPal hooked up, there is no confirm order screen. I accidentally placed an order trying to see if the discount would be applied on a later screen.  There is no way to cancel an order besides calling the store. But when I called the store, they said they couldn‚Äôt do it and I had to call customer support. I‚Äôve spent 1.5 hours on the phone, sent multiple emails, and messaged them on Facebook and still haven‚Äôt been in contact with anyone. At this point I see them as thieves and will never give them my business again.

title: Great app except kids meals
review: I have 3 little kids so the ability to order through the app and not stand in line is wonderful. However, the app does not allow me to choose their drinks or sides. This causes an issue at the restaurants. Some let me change with no issue but have commented how it effects their inventory. Others will not leaving me with drinks my kids don‚Äôt want and sides my kids don‚Äôt want. This causes me to go to a convenience store to purchase the additional items because I am so mad at that point I refuse to purchase on principal. Please fix for both myself and the stores benefit.
developerResponse: {'id': 9549980, 'body': 'Hey, there! If you could give us a call at (833)-778-2929, or send us a message at appfeedback@subway.com, with the missing items, and restaurant address or store number- we can contact that local restaurant team and make sure they update their menu. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-07-08T13:33:31Z'}

title: So disappointed !
review:
First, the app is slow.

Second, I asked for toasted flat bread steak and cheese with Chipotle sauce. The Subway I picked gave me steak and cheese on white bread NOT toasted. The clerk showed me the receipt with my order, which leaves OUT the bread I ordered or the fact that i wanted it toasted.

Why is this not right, Subway? It‚Äôs easy to customize your sandwich on the app, so why don‚Äôt you have the app tell the employees what to make? That‚Äôs the whole point of coming to Subway is to get your order done exactly how we want it!

Get the app to communicate the EXACT and COMPLETE order to your employees. This is not rocket science and not your employees fault if they don‚Äôt know what I asked for in the first place.

Furthermore, if a customer calls in an order, don‚Äôt have employees tell customers, ‚ÄúOh, just use the app.‚Äù Because the person on the phone wouldn‚Äôt have messed up my order, unlike the app.

Thank you for reading. Your employee who gave me my app order did offer to remake my sandwich, but there was a long line and it would‚Äôve made me late to wait (ergo the app order in the first place.)
developerResponse: {'id': 2576267, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-02-13T21:20:34Z'}

title: Worst App
review: I‚Äôm a big mobile user and this subway app has been by far one of the worst apps I‚Äôve ever used. It‚Äôs supposed to ge easy and straight forward to use but it‚Äôs not. It crashes a lot, it‚Äôs slow, and full of issues. I make sure I update my phone and the app and I have not seen much improvement. One multiple occasions it has given me ‚Äú an error‚Äù has occurred and I order again. When I get to the store for pickup they have two of the same orders because it had recorded both orders. Can‚Äôt add items to cart because it just keeps sending me to the home page. Big fan of the food and have been a loyal customer for years but this app is truly awful and if I could I would give it a 0/5 stars.

title: Healthy Lifestyle - WW 5 points
review:
Who says ‚Äúyou can‚Äôt have your bread and eat it to!‚Äù?  Subway rocks. I think Subway will be my new best friend when I want a filling and nutritious sandwich (with low points!üëè).  
     Supper: 6‚Äù Oven Roasted Chicken on whole wheat (5) & Lays Baked Chips Original (4) were a total of 9 points. 
     I got the sauce on the side and after arriving at home, I drizzled some creamy sriracha sauce (not even an 1/8 of a serving) on my subway. 
     So filling - so delicious. Of course I love getting it filled with all the vegetables! 
     I even have 3 points left over for a snack later (we ate early).

title: Better than older versions
review:
It‚Äôs improved from the initial  version of the app , but yet to improve a lot . Developer should check Walmart app for reference how a mobile app should be.. 
choosing location feature is still very bad, there should be options to change the location in case order not prepared situation. Give clear details of purchase history , OVER ALL EDUCATE AND TRAINED YOUR SUBWAY STAFF TO HANDLE MOBILE ORDER , 9 out of 10 don‚Äôt know how to use mobile app for payment and take orders from mobile .. that‚Äôs the biggest challenge ..

title: Use of remaining gift card balance on App.
review: First of all I would like to say that I really appreciate the SUBWAY¬Æ application. However one thing needs to be addressed. When there‚Äôs a low amount on a gift card balance, the app will not allow you to use that amount toward your purchase but prompts us to reload the account. If you could make it possible to use all of the balance on a gift card that‚Äôs loaded onto the app and THEN use another form of payment after that, it will be greatly appreciated and helpful thank you.

title: Money gone and no food.
review:
I ordered two sandwiches, card charged. Showed up at Correct address showed them the receipt and they refused. 
It had been working fine but suddenly after the update it charges but does not update the stores. To make matters worse neither the store nor in the app there is a way to report.

Update:
Customer support said the purchase never happened. So I took a screen shot of the receipt from the app. 
The fact that I had to do it shows you how messed up they are.

Update 2
OMG third world country. These people forwarded my complaint email to some guy who replied me FROM A GMAIL ACCOUNT. So basically enjoy the app, but Know that is it breaks, they just hand you back to the character who owns the franchise store (aka dude with a Gmail account) - who happens to be the  guy who refused to honor the online payment to begin with (basically stole from me). Now, I work for a startup in the financial district of SF. Thank God I can do without the few bucks he stole. But I stand on principle. I hope there is a class action - I hereby declare I will donate any income from which - but I want that guy to loose his franchise on drum street in SF.
developerResponse: {'id': 4892007, 'body': 'Hi, Ari- we see that the franchise owner of the location has been trying to get in contact with you to make this right. Please feel free to reach out at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. to let us know how you would like to proceed. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-08-31T18:07:26Z'}

title: Terrible ‚Äúmobile‚Äù heuristics
review:
I was at a drive-through picking up a coffee, and placing my order. I selected my desired location from the map, so I know I got the right one. By the time I place the ‚Äúorder‚Äù button, I had not noticed that it had reverted to the closest physical store to my then-current location. By the time I get to work, next-door to the location I selected, they don‚Äôt have my order there, obviously. I checked the app, and find a location 6 miles back on my route.

I call customer service, and the best she can say is, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry you ordered from the wrong location, sir.‚Äù You should have said, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry that our app didn‚Äôt take your explicit selections and hold them as a priority; we‚Äôll be happy to reimburse you for your trouble.‚Äù She did not say that.

title: Poor Customer Service
review:
I ordered thru the app on May 7th just before 7pm, the store‚Äôs website says they close at 8pm so there should be no problem.

Pickup was for 7:15pm. Arrived at the store, gas station btw, and there‚Äôs no one at the Subway counter. Asked the gas station attendant, who informed me that the Subway had closed at 7pm. NO notice of this on their website or at the store. Gas station attendant was kind enough to text the manager who told him I had to get a refund thru the app. Well there‚Äôs no way to do that.

Visited the store during open hours, the manager tells me that the store hours had changed and the website had now been updated. Also that I had to get a refund thru the corporate site. I contacted customer service thru their site, received an email reply that they got the complaint. Almost 2 months later, no refund, no contact, nothing‚Ä¶.

I like the Subway sandwiches, I‚Äôll never order at that store again. I‚Äôll maybe try a different store or try Firehouse, Jersey Mike‚Äôs or something. Guess Subway needs to ‚ÄúRefresh‚Äù their customer service some.

title: Won‚Äôt let me update my phone number
review: I recently got a new phone number and it‚Äôs activated and the app won‚Äôt let me update my number saying that it is an invalid number which it isn‚Äôt. I fear I‚Äôm missing out on deals and updates because I can no longer get any texts deals or updates :/ I wish this would be fixed. I also wish I could know when my sandwich is actually done being made because I have it toasted so I can eat it warm but then when I get to the store it‚Äôs cold because they made it a while ago but the app said it wasn‚Äôt made yet so I didn‚Äôt get it sooner
developerResponse: {'id': 11560456, 'body': "Hi, there. We are sorry to hear that this has been your experience. You can contact our support team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu or at (833)-778-2929. If you can, have your app version, device type, and steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!\r\n", 'modified': '2019-10-30T17:16:38Z'}

title: App freezes while ordering (no app support)
review: The location function does not work and you can‚Äôt place an order without selecting the location, ergo, you can‚Äôt place an order for anything with this version of the app. There is no phone-a-human to tell about this problem and no contact info in the App Store or the developers website for technical issues. I tried the Contact Us section as directed on the website but none of the forms can be submitted unless you have a receipt number from a purchase or a valid gift card to fill in the ‚Äúrequired‚Äù fields. If I owned a subway, I would be outraged at the lack of support for the website and app that is preventing clients from ordering from my store.

title: Good Solid App, but Missing 1 Thing!!
review: I think the app and mobile payment platform are great, however I do have one issue, and it‚Äôs one, from a place like Subway that I wouldn‚Äôt expect. There is no way to create a sandwich from scratch. You should be able to chose your bread, meats, extras, vegetables, sauces, and condiments. The best example I can give is the Chicken Pizziaola, that‚Äôs my go to, so I have to order my families food in the app, and then mine in the store. Maybe I‚Äôm wrong but it just seems like a fully customizable option would make more sense. For that I gave 3 stars, if not for that, 5 stars all day long.

title: Too many issues
review: I just downloaded the app because my online purchase was lost when I changed locations.  I‚Äôm not able to get the online BOGO deal to show up in the cart - apparently it shows up only if it is a participating location, but no indication before hand of who is participating.  I guess you are expected to call around and ask.  The app also doesn‚Äôt allow to change locations unless you want to clear your cart and if you‚Äôre like me trying to find a location to support the BOGO deal, that‚Äôs not going to work.  Such a pain! There simply appears to be too many issues between franchise locations to make online ordering work.  I suppose once you have your location set and don‚Äôt plan to change, it may work ok.

title: Great app
review: I enjoy the simplicity of the app and how it makes it so easy to order our subs and the service at the location we go to is so great there is a subway right down from our home but we go the extra miles for the service we receive at the Hwy 31 S Athens Al. I know there owner is the same but it‚Äôs the workers that make the location run and succeed. I know I have been in customer service my entire life so has my husband we just want respectable treatment nothing less.

title: HORRIBLE APP HORRIBLE SWEs
review: This app is legitimately bad. I installed it in hopes of being able to get a sandwich while outside the store. I see someone begin to walk inside, I think ‚Äúoh no biggie, I‚Äôm ordering online so mine might get made at the same time if not sooner.‚Äù Suddenly, while tapping on my OG order, the app refuses to work and says I have too many items despite my cart being empty and me just wanting to keep buying my bmt special despite there being no chipotle present in the store. I try again but to no avail, am met with the ‚Äú WHOA! Too many items‚Äù error box. I HAVENT EVEN ORDERED ANYRHING. I keep trying, over and over and OVER again. Ok fine. Let me get a sweet onion chicken teriyaki so I can get 15% off any footlong‚Ä¶NO NO NO NO IT FOESNT WORK IT DOESNT WORK YOU BROKE THE RULES.

title: Poor delivery feature
review: Doesn‚Äôt allow you to select a store for delivery. There are two Subways near me one 0.8 miles away and the other 0.9 miles away. It chooses the closest store which was close to closing time and it wouldn‚Äôt let me check out with the delivery option. I had to wait until the closer store was closed to order so it would then pick up the second store and allow me to use the delivery option. It would be great if there was an option to choose a specific store for delivery for customers with multiple stores within your delivery range.

title: Very good app, a little room for improvement
review: I love being able to order ahead and avoid the sometimes very long lines. The app is fairly easy to navigate and the stores usually get the order correct. (Always check it though. They sometimes forget the salad dressing or the mayo or even the meat in one case.) The app could be better if it didn‚Äôt require so many key strokes and was more intuitive. But overall, I am very happy to have this way of ordering.

title: Subway location issues
review: This is the first time that I have been able to use the app to place my order. Every other time I have tried to use it (over the last 6 months) it refuses to give me locations and then when it would eventually get to one it wouldn‚Äôt allow me to use the discounts/offers that appeared in the app. I would get to a store and place an order and explain the problem and ask to use the coupon/offer in my app and be denied because you HAVE TO PLACE THE ORDER THROUGH THE APP ON YOUR PHONE! Seriously did they not understand or hear what I said? On top of that no one offered to assist me with the issue.

title: Good app, frustrating selecting restraunts
review:
I use this app quite a bit when ordering out. Subway is a big go-to for my friends and I. But at work, we get a 15 minute break at 10, and our lunch at 12. The nearest Subway opens at 11 due to Covid, but I don‚Äôt often have the freedom to make an order at 11. And you cannot see your favorites unless you select that specific restaurant, which is also frustrating.
TL:DR Please make it so we can select a restaurant even if it‚Äôs closed at the moment. This way we can view our favorites, make an order pickup for the time they‚Äôre open, ect.

title: Frustrating
review: When this app works, it‚Äôs great. But I‚Äôve had problems at least 3 different times where I put in all the details of my order and then it can‚Äôt take my payment (some error comes up) or I can‚Äôt select pay at restaurant. What a pain!!!  Today I could have gotten bogo footlong with the app but it was but 2 get one free footlong in the store. And since my app wasn‚Äôt working, that was my only option. What the heck?!  And please make it optional to see or not see whether I want to make it a meal. If I don‚Äôt, I shouldn‚Äôt have to see that question for every item in my cart the entire time. It just make my view way too busy.

title: Great app - I hope the dev reads this though
review:
Hi Dev, I love your app as it makes it super easy to pick up my sandwiches and call the shop if I need to modify my order. The sandwich customizing is super engaging and fun. I also appreciate the special deals and discounts that are offered periodically. 

One thing: please add cilantro to the menu as a veggie. I don‚Äôt like having to call my local subway each time and telling them I couldn‚Äôt pick cilantro as a topping and that I‚Äôd like it added. 

So if you get around to it, please add cilantro to the list of toppings! Thank you.

title: Sunk!
review:
The app is so messed up I can't even use it. I'll give them a chance to fix it but for right now it's unusable. The picture verification at the beginning is confusing and doesn't work right. A total failure. I also can't order all the toppings I like because the app has no way to allow for anything at my local store (sweet peppers) that is out of the ordinary. 

Tried app again and it's still terrible! I got in after several tries I was able to put my order together (thanks btw for adding sweet peppers) but it would not let me make the order. It kept saying there is an error but would not tell me the problem. Finally I had to go to the store and make the order. I still don't know why it wouldn't work it just wouldn't.
developerResponse: {'id': 1246273, 'body': 'Could you provide more information please, so that we can look at the issue? You can reach us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-10-04T16:18:08Z'}

title: Frequent errors
review: Leave time to compile your orders more than once because you'll get at least 1 error every time you use it and have to do everything over again. I usually wait too late and try to place an order around an hour before they close, then struggle 15-20 min to get the order in through the errors, then can no longer order because it stops accepting 30 min before closing. So 9 times out of 10 I just waste 40 min trying to order and then end up not being able to buy it. Not something to use when in a rush.

title: Freezes Constantly
review: I would like this app if it didn‚Äôt freeze every couple of taps/clicks. I have a family of 7 and would like to be able to use the app to place everyone‚Äôs order, but the last two times I‚Äôve used it in the last 30 days, it has taken me at least 30 minutes to place the order because it freezes and I have to close the app and reopen it. It is ridiculous. I literally just had to order an extra sandwich because the app would NOT let me delete it from my cart which I already had seven sandwiches in/ready to order.  I wasn‚Äôt willing to start over from scratch tonight.

title: Only one little problem...
review: We LOVE Subway! Everyone in our family of 4 can customize their sandwich they way they want. Since the pandemic hit we have been using the app more. Especially when the $5 foot long deal came about unfortunately there is no way to just customize your whole sandwich. It is annoying! My youngest loves to get pepperoni, American cheese and mayo on Italian. I can‚Äôt not get this on the app. So in turn it takes more of my time and costs me more money when I have to order 3 sandwiches on the app and go in the store to order the 4th. Please fix this!

title: It used to work great, but now I can‚Äôt even sign on.
review: I used to order from my app and eat here a few times per week.  I haven‚Äôt been back in about a month though because every time I sign on, I get a message stating that something has gone wrong and that I need to call customer support.  Customer Support is automated and can‚Äôt help me.  I tried deleting the app and reloading it.  I tried changing my password.  One time, I got in through the webpage and when I went to pay, I got a message that there was an error with my payment method.  There was not an error though.  It was the payment method that I‚Äôve always used and it wouldn‚Äôt allow me to re-enter the information.  I‚Äôm using an iPhone 8 Plus.  Please fix the problem.  Thank you.

title: Endless Loop
review:
Edit: Issue has been resolved and app works fine now. I was able to log into the app and create my order without further issues. The developers were able to find the problem and fix it fairly quickly. Rating has been changed.

I‚Äôve been stuck in an endless loop of recreating a new password after the previous was accepted. App won‚Äôt allow me to get past this every time I try to log in despite notifications the password was accepted. This may be a temporary glitch, but this hinders the use and not worth the trouble.
developerResponse: {'id': 3654570, 'body': 'We appreciate your patience while we investigated the concerns you shared with us. We identified the concerns that you brought to our attention, and our support team has indicated that the concern you identified should be resolved. Please uninstall and reinstall the Subway¬Æ App from your device, and the concern that you mentioned should be corrected. If you could follow up to let us know that this has been resolved, we would truly appreciate it. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-06-16T14:00:30Z'}

title: Weekly app user
review: I like The convenience of using the app to order my food on the go. It gives you a response on the time that the order is available for pick up. It‚Äôs very for filling to pass a line of people waiting to order to pick up your order that‚Äôs ready to go. Quick in and out and no hassle. Occasionally the app doesn‚Äôt work well which of been resolved by deleting the app and reloading it. I believe it may have been caused by app upgrades. Overall ordering ahead of time is smart and the app gets it done. Our use the recent orders and tap to quickly re-order. Very nice feature to use for re-ordering.

title: Good but missing food off menu and paying issue
review:
So overall a good app. I couldn‚Äôt find a way to order plain chicken strips. I don‚Äôt want big pieces of oven roasted chicken or terriakki or rotisserie. 

Paying was odd. I used reward in store scanned it and it automatically paid with the credit card on app with no confirmation. It doesn‚Äôt say I‚Äôm paying for it just applying coupon. You should clearly make it obvious when scanning a coupon someone is paying as well with app. All other fast food apps make that clear and require fingerprint or at least confirmation of payment.

title: Rewards do not work
review: Ever since this update 7.7.0, I am unable to get tokens or use my two dollar coupon from the app. I eat at the same location almost daily(due to only food location to work), and I was accruing points and coupons for the last 4 weeks. This past update has stopped that, I can‚Äôt select the coupon because is states ‚Äúloyalty program not accepted at this store‚Äù. The receipt shows my account info also. I have sent feedback to support with a pre-written response about how sorry they are to hear this  and to contact them. Did I not just do that. I have requested for missing tokens, but no response and no tokens have been added to my account.
developerResponse: {'id': 3478241, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-05-15T20:38:51Z'}

title: Update: made it worse!
review:
New version of this app is terrible. It‚Äôs nonintuitive, difficult to maneuver and almost impossible to tell if you‚Äôre ordering what you think you are. The original version was straight forward and easy to use. This one is just stupid. At least the restaurants now respect the order, IF you can figure out how to get it to them with this cumbersome user interface. 

Old review: The app works great, but I routinely run into restaurants that ignore app orders until I arrive at the store. They just say, "Oh, we're busy." I know you're busy, that's why I used the app to preorder!  So instead of a quick process, I actually get shoved farther to the back of the line. Subway needs to get their locals on board with prioritizing the app orders or this is worthless.
developerResponse: {'id': 1473379, 'body': 'We apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right. Please mention the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us.', 'modified': '2017-10-11T14:06:26Z'}

title: Gift cards disappear and form to submit to fix doesn‚Äôt work
review: There is an option to consolidate gift cards which is awesome. But sometimes the gift cards disappear. There is a form to contact customer service but once you fill it out there is an error to ‚Äúselect a subject‚Äù but you already did. Changing the subject doesn‚Äôt remove the error. So you have to use a computer, which the first time I did get credit back, but the cards disappeared again and now I have to get my laptop at home. It‚Äôs lots of work, just disable the feature if you can‚Äôt get it to work consistently or at the very least test the customer service form to make sure it actually works.

title: App payment doesn‚Äôt go through
review:
This has happened several times usually when I‚Äôm in a hurry which adds to the frustration. You get your whole order added and try to submit payment and it says ‚Äúsorry an error has occurred‚Äù. After messing with it for 30 minutes trying a gift card, Apple Card and other credit cards, finally found the app just isn‚Äôt great, and it works better if you just go to the website. Sad that something is supposed to make things more convenient does the exact opposite.

Taco Bell and Wendy‚Äôs on the other hand, I was able to use their apps while I was sitting in the drivethru!!! Super fast and convenient in comparison to this app

title: App not working for me
review: The last several months, about six months now I haven‚Äôt been able to place my order. I can get into the app and I can search and get what I want but when it comes time to submit it always comes back with an error. I‚Äôll try it two or three times and it‚Äôs always says error. I‚Äôve looked to see if my app needs updated. I don‚Äôt know what to do next. I really enjoy having all of the rewards, etc. please help.

title: GARBAGE app
review: I placed my order at 11am and the app told me it would be ready 3 hours later, i went to the store to cancel or pick up the order, they haven‚Äôt the order on the system, so there‚Äôs no cancel option in the app, there‚Äôs no support section to cancel the order, the woman at the restaurant can‚Äôt cancel the order because the order even appear on the system, so i losed my money and my food, the worst food app, i wont use it again EVER, GARBAGE SERVICE GARBAGE APP, 0 stars if that was an option

title: Horrible App
review:
Absolutely the worst app I‚Äôve ever used. I‚Äôve been ordering Subway with it for about a year and a half now and every single time, I have to confirm each page about 3 times. If I choose my location and then click on my saved sandwich, it makes me choose my location again. And then I have to choose the sandwich again. And sometimes I even have to choose the location AGAIN after that. Horrible app with tons of bugs that need to be fixed. I‚Äôve used a few other fast food apps and they are AMAZING compared to this one.

Update: I am now unable to select a different Subway location when ordering using the app. Still the absolute worst app I have ever used.

title: App is great but...
review: The app is very convenient and helpful to order especially when you want to see your options before ordering instead of holding up a line. I like that I can pick up in my area they usually finish before the est time. My only issue is that their is no option to add a br√≥coli or chicken soup to your order. Sort of makes it a bit inconvenient when you just want to go pick up but then have to wait in line to get a soup. Wish they could add the soup option and pretzel option too.

title: Two different payment methods
review: Everything about the app is easy to use. Love how convenient it is. The only gripe I have is that I can‚Äôt use all the money on a gift card and pay the remaining balance with my credit card. Love that I can add a gift card to the app, transfer and reload balances as I please, but in the event that I want to use up a gift card and it doesn‚Äôt cover the whole cost of the meal, let me use my credit card to pay off the rest instead of having to reload the card.

title: Great functions, poor performance
review:
I have been using the app practically every day for 6 months. Occasionally it works well, but it often ends up taking me as long to use the app as it would to go through the sandwich line. Sometimes it won‚Äôt find my order history for reordering. Every once in awhile it won‚Äôt accept payment for the store. 

I suggest adding a warning feature if you are about to place an order at a location that is not your nearest location. I had used a separate location one weekend, then made my usual order on Monday and had to cancel it because it went to the Saturday store.
developerResponse: {'id': 10265082, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-08-20T19:43:23Z'}

title: $11B in sales and a 10¬¢ app
userName: I'm Bill and I approve this‚Ä¶
review:
The app is so dysfunctional that I don't have too many complaints so I'll list them all:
The map has a little blue dot on my location but when I hit the button to zoom in on my location, it zooms in on a locations 20 miles south of me.   The app doesn't acknowledge the Subway location on my commute (Waymart, PA) so I can't order a sandwich to pick up on the way. Note: Not the apps fault, but that location won't take phone orders... they tell me to use the app. I guess I can't order ahead. Last, the figures to configure the sandwiches don't respond reliably to touch so I have to hit the bread multiple time to select it so I can toast my bread. It can't find me, it can't find my restaurant and it won't let me toast my bread. Your app is useless Subway.
developerResponse: {'id': 1714707, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2017-11-09T21:32:59Z'}

title: Lack of security on the app cards will get stolen
review: This app if you are not careful will get your cards stolen. I had a credit card that I have not used often and I used it to get a couple subs paid it off haven‚Äôt touched it afterwards for a few months. Then I get a notification that over 200 dollars worth of stuff is purchased on the card from subway. The credit card company was able to drop the charges because of fraud but there are probably more people who aren‚Äôt so lucky especially if they are using a debt card on this app. If subway cannot keep their applications and websites secure so you can make your transactions then clearly your should spend your money elsewhere

title: Almost Perfect!
review: Subway app is great and easy to use. The ONLY reason I didn‚Äôt give it a full 5 stars is mainly for the bread options. I know more locations offer other options -jalape√±o cheddar, toasted Parmesan for example-and I would love for those to be available on the app as well. Other than that, they offer to upsize, make meal, add sides and even offerPromo  codes right there in the app and it really helps in case you forget something. Plus there are tutorials and step by step assistance upon first download. Very well thought through.!!

title: Buggy and Difficult
review: I NEVER write reviews but I‚Äôm so fed up that I hope to save some poor soul who thinks this will be a good thing for them. This app has let me down so many times. Many other fast food apps far surpass this app. Today I went to make my order and had half of it added and it gave an error; very frustrating. The discounts that only can be applied in the app are a good trick cause when it bugs out and you can‚Äôt use it you just give up and order at the regular price. Not anymore. Subway needs to step up their game. The only thing the app is really useful for is the rewards but then you have to be successful ordering through the app to use them so maybe not.

title: Conveniently Inconvenient
review: The app overall is great. My problem is getting a hold the driver or AT LEAST Subway directly when the order is wrong or missing items. I can‚Äôt stop everything and go to a nearby subway to fix the problem because for 1. I‚Äôm at work. Granted everyone is going through extremely tough staffing issues, but it would be nice to choose which location you want your food from for 1. Faster service or personal preference. Then IF the item you want is out of stock the app will redirect the order to a different location.

title: Terrible User Experience
review: This is the most terrible app I've ever seen for ordering food. When you order delivery, the drivers are the ones to finish the orders, meaning you don't get to tell Subway whether you have received your food. Once the drivers hit "delivered" button, you cannot find any info of the drivers like phone numbers again. And there is no any entry in the app that you can report you have not received your food. What happened to me is the driver never contacted me, and I have no way to contact the driver or Subway to find my food. Tried the to call the store I ordered from but phone was never picked up. The designers who designed this app need to be sent back to school.

title: Good app but still needs work
review:
The app is great but needs work, the following is what holds it back:
‚Ä¢ at times it does not apply coupon to check out total, it then becomes a hassle and at the end I just order from another food app that is much easier.
‚Ä¢ not enough deals and the ones listed are only for mobile use, again at times I just order from another food app that does allow me to apply deals in person at restaurant.
Would be great to see these improvements.

title: What a joke
userName: take note from Chic Fil A
review:
First of all I accidentally placed an order while sitting in a Subway.  There was no way to cancel the order.  I immediately told the sandwich artists and they said to contact customer service to get a refund. Long story short a month later the store sent me a gift card. 
Second attempt for online ordering-The app said my order would be ready at 12:25.  I finally got my food at 1:05.  After watching people go in and out of the store while I waited for my ‚Äúexpress‚Äù order I realized could have gone in and stood in line and been out before my order was ready.  It is obvious the app and the store do not talk. I knew not to cancel my order or I‚Äôd be out $35.  App needs a lot of update.

title: App‚Äôs menu is incorrect
review:
1. There are several items, such as pastrami, that are still offered on the app, but which subway apparently no longer sells. There have been at least two occasions where I have placed an order, but then the store had to call me to tell me the item was no longer available. When I asked which store did sell that item, I was told that subway, as a whole, no longer sells it. If that is the case, it should be removed from the app, shouldn‚Äôt it?

2. Some stores are frequently removed, and then added back, to the app, with no explanation. It‚Äôs hard to know which stores work with the app.

title: Does not stack up
review:
This app has lots of lingering issues and inconsistencies. First, when you press the order button, it asks you to confirm the location. Then, as soon as you add one item to the cart it asks you to confirm the location. Hey app, see step 1!

Second, it has a terrible connection with the various franchises. It will not allow you to add items (like spicy brown mustard) that are available at the restaurant. It gives you a selection of only four kinds of chips, when 8 are available at the restaurant. Same with drinks. It requires a lot of swapping once I pick up my order. I even have to have them unwrap my sandwich and add things the app wouldn‚Äôt let me order. Terrible system!

title: Mrs Jacobs
review: I have used this app before with success, but there have been several issues before and just last week I made an order on the app, I was charged and everything only to show up and the store had not received notice of it. But they couldn‚Äôt make my order for me and give it to me unless they charged me again. So I paid $25 online for nothing. I sent an email through the app with the info for the order to report the problem a d ask for a refund and have not as of yet heard back. On top of that, the employees at the store didn‚Äôt know how to help me fix the issue or even point me in the right direction, and one employee particularly was very rude. Overall a pretty lame experience and I will never use this app again.

title: Keeps losing account information
review: I tried to order from the app today but it must have logged me out since I last used it.  This has happened in the past and at the time it was suggested that I uninstall it and reinstall it as the data probably had become corrupted.  It worked that time.  No go this time.  Even entering the correct credentials which are valid does not work.  They work fine on the website.  So the issue is not the credentials.  It is annoying to discover I can‚Äôt order ahead of time now.  I don‚Äôt memorize most app credentials because there are too many so it is important an app keep my credentials so I can use it when I am away from home.
