Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-05-20T19:44:51Z'}

title: Finally gave up
review:
I had a small window to grab lunch and I was right up the street from a Subway, so I figured I would download the app, put in a order, and I‚Äôd be great. Wrong!! I downloaded the app and had to jump thru a bunch of hoops to set up an account, even though I already had one. Finally go that all sorted and got to the order. The way the app was laid out was confusing, sometimes you swipe, sometimes you toggle, some veggies automatically pop up, others you have to add from a separate menu. By this point I‚Äôm 30 mins into what I thought would be quick. I went to submit my order and the app said there was a problem with my acct and I needed to fix something. 
So, I finally just gave up and decided to go somewhere else.
developerResponse: {'id': 7567193, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-03-04T17:29:55Z'}

title: Horrible app
review: I tried to place an order with the app. I had a gift card. It wouldn‚Äôt let me use the gift card and then pay the remainder with another method. So we went to the store to order and when using the app to pay, the employee was having issues finding the gift card. They had to log me in on their screen and it took a while for them to get the gift card to go through. All the while there‚Äôs people behind me waiting. I‚Äôm deleting the app because it‚Äôs to inconvenient. I use mobile apps daily for restaurants and stores and this one is definitely one of the worst ones I‚Äôve ever used.

title: Not Ready when it says
review: I like the convenience of preordering. But only 20% of the time is the order ready when the app says it is. I do not know if the store says its ready(and it isnt) or if there is a time algorithm used to approximate. I assume the workers do it so it doesnt look like it took them 40 minutes to make 5 sandwiches. But the finish product is always consistent. I just know now to give it an extra 15-20 minutes after it says its ready.

title: Glitches in app
review: I use this app often. Sometimes it works fine and sometimes I have to end up calling the store to order. It will often freeze up while I‚Äôm trying to select items. When you go to select what kind of chips you want there are only a couple of options listed, but then when you get down to the store they have all of the options they normally have. Same with the cookies. It only lists three choices but at the store there are many more. I did the most recent update as of March 18, 2021 and it did not fix these glitches. And yes I restarted my phone after I installed the app.

It‚Äôs a good app but sometimes it bugs out for me and also I am unable to input a gift card. I just got the gift card and I know there‚Äôs money on it but it keeps showing it as invalid and sometimes I cannot even submit it, the button would just disappear and I have no choice but to go back. 
I had trouble sometimes with chocolate chip cookies not showing up when clicking the selection menu but I think that is fixed now. Other than the gift card thing, the app is easy to use and a great addition for anyone who hates to wait in line.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-06-06T15:38:37Z'}

title: App is good, but could use an update
review:
I like how easy it is to customize the sandwich. However, any time I mark the bread as toasted, it is never made that way in the restaurant. It has been like this no matter the location, so I assume it is an issue with the app. 

Another idea, although it is probably not an original one, would be to put a pickup spot so that people know that they can go around the line. I‚Äôm not sure if it is this way in other locations, but isnt where I am. 

Overall, I really enjoy the convenience of the app, but the toasting issue is frustrating.

title: Decant Food Ordering App
review:
Subway has done a decent job in building their app, it‚Äôs easy to customize your sandwiches, it works well with the rewards program. I like that you‚Äôre able to use PayPal as a payment method so you don‚Äôt have to save a credit card with them. Things I would like to see them add is the ability to pay with Apple Pay, and allow the app to stay signed into a person‚Äòs account if they choose.
An idea for the app would be for them to add a popular in your area section to show what sandwiches are trending by others in the area.

title: why subway
review:
I used to love this app. At my part time job, I only get a 15 min break for every 4 hours I work, so I used to place an order through the app and then as I go on break, I would go to my nearby Subway and pick up my order, return to my workplace and eat in peace. I did this several times a month for a year straight.

However - it seems that many Subway locations in my area no longer offer mobile ordering?? The four closest Subway locations (three of which are still too far to walk to during a 15 minute break) no longer offer mobile ordering. Why though?? Why would you remove the option after offering it for such a long time?
developerResponse: {'id': 5316121, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-10-01T20:17:34Z'}

title: Convenient App
review:
I love the point system. Plus, it doesn‚Äôt matter where you are! They deliver within a reasonable distance of their location as well as having quick delivery. I don‚Äôt think it can get better than this. I wish we could play little games to get cool rewards like Starbucks. Although, the apps pretty good how it is. It‚Äôs very manageable. Anyone and everyone can use it. It‚Äôs simply and quite efficient. 

- I‚Äôm definitely a proud customer üòä

title: Does not work
review: I‚Äôve only successfully used this app once or twice. You are not allowed to combine your gift cards. You must choose one payment method for your order. Tried on two different devices to order today. Attempted three different orders. All three times the app emptied my shopping cart. One of the times, I also received an error message that there was a limit on what I could order, very bizarre considering that the app it emptied my shopping cart. So much for all their deals and rewards points much less my gift cards. I experienced these issues regardless of if the order was pick up or delivery.

title: Need to update
review: This app works ok. But the reason why it got 1 star is because of the way it generates orders. Order entry is great and simple enough but you can‚Äôt check in with the app until 5 minutes before your expected order pickup time. So today I place my order, no traffic, I get there 10 minutes before I expected. Tried to check in and can‚Äôt. I‚Äôm looking through the window at people doing nothing. If I would have been able to check in they would have been able to start my order early, I would have gotten out early. Instead I sat there and waited but could have walked in and got my order faster. Please fix this for a higher rating.

title: Disappointed
review:
My order was a pickup outside order. My payment information is on my account. I‚Äôve ordered from this location before.  Received a call regarding my order wanting to verify my credit card information.
I told them was not giving the last 4 digits to them due to telephone scams being a problem across the country. Told them my husband was on his way to pickup the order. They said they would have to cancel the order. I said when he arrives
He would just place another order.  Upon his arrival the order was ready and he gave them the payment info the last 4 digits of the card.

Upon opening the sandwich it was not in the bread but look like a salad all lose once opened up.

Will differently not use this location again. There was very little meat and cheese. We had to 
Build the sandwich at home and add other things.
Have never had to do this before.

Unhappy customer

title: It would be perfect if I didn‚Äôt have to reinstall every few days
review:
This app is great. However, every few days, you may find your self uninstalling the app & reinstalling it due to its inability to process a payment. You can cancel the order, change it up, change the time, & change the payment method - yet, it‚Äôll say ‚ÄúUh oh!‚Äù followed by a bunch of programming nonsense essentially stating it can‚Äôt process the order.

I have an iPhone 11 and am up date.

title: App/website doesn‚Äôt work
review: I wanted to place an order to pick up on my way home. The website wasn‚Äôt working so I thought I would try downloading the app and placing my order that way. It still didn‚Äôt work. I get an error when I try to sign in. I even tried to create a new account, no dice. I had my son try the website on his phone/laptop, didn‚Äôt work. O thought I would try the next day to see if it was a fluke, still didn‚Äôt work. I didn‚Äôt want to go into the store to place my order because I don‚Äôt want to stand around other people if I don‚Äôt have to, hence ordering online. I ended up going somewhere else. I don‚Äôt plan on buying from subway unless I can order online.

title: Previous order status sorta hangs around
review: This app works really well for me and it makes ordering more fun than expected. However, the previous order status hangs around for at least a week or two afterward, which can be a little confusing when you order more often than that. They might even jumble an old order status ahead of the one you just placed. Everything else I‚Äôve seen in this app for about a year now has been, frankly, fantastic.

title: Beware No Way To Cancel An Order
review: On March 20, 2020 I was working on an online order.  I somehow submitted the order.  In trying to cancel it through the app I somehow submitted a second identical order.  Upon closer review the app said I had to call the Subway store where the order was being picked up.  When the store did not pickup the phone I drove to the store.  Both the employee and her manager (who she called) told me I had to cancel on the app.   Needless to say corporate gave me a song and dance about they contacted the owner of the Subway and they would reach out to me.  Since it hasn‚Äôt happen I reached out to my credit card company to dispute this charge.  I learned my lesson that both Subway corporate and this particular owner could careless about their customers.

title: Missing items, resets too quickly
review:
The concept and layout is great, but it‚Äôs lacking unless you keep ordering pretty simple and go quickly. 

My main frustrations:

1) I can‚Äôt place an order that includes gluten-free bread (which costs extra) - weird since Subway does one of the best jobs and avoiding cross-contaminated that I‚Äôve seen and has some of the best GF bread. 

2) I can‚Äôt select two different cheeses; only double of the same kind. 

3) If I leave the app sitting too long, even after finishing a sandwich but before submitting an order (like if I‚Äôm asking others what they want on their sandwiches), my order resets and I lose what I‚Äôve completed. It doesn‚Äôt stay in a cart or anything like most shopping/ordering sites. 

It‚Äôs beautiful and not too hard to figure out, but these aspects (especially #1) make it nearly pointless for me. I‚Äôve given up on several orders and just gone in. Tonight, I submitted my husband‚Äôs order to get a head start but have go in to order my gluten free sandwich (which takes a lot longer).

You can reach us tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. We look forward to hearing from you, and thank you for sharing your feedback.\n\n', 'modified': '2019-11-27T14:27:28Z'}

title: APP ORDERING MADE SIMPLE
review:
1st time using the app to make a pickup order. Me being able to put my specifications, with the way I‚Äôd like ingredients added, & bread of choice being Toasted was outstanding! I do not have to worry about cashier misunderstanding my order, as well. The coupon code/Deal was easily added and paid for. How can it be messed up‚Ä¶Unless it is purposely done so by a worker at Subway‚Ä¶
Ewwwü§®the anticipation on if the app ordering instructions are followed by the makers of the sandwiches‚Ä¶

title: Needs improvement
review: On the plus side ordering using this app is as smooth and simple as it should be. I only have two issues. The first is it does not allow you to add or redeem points on your Subway card, which is a problem. The whole point of having it is to accumulate points and use them on purchases. The other issue is minor but still annoying. I selected flatbread for my sandwich when I ordered it today but for unknown reasons it didn‚Äôt show up under order details so I ended up with the whole grain instead. It still tasted good but I like the flatbread better. Until these issues are fixed I will not use the app to order ahead of time.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-02-06T21:27:58Z'}

title: Bugs make it hard to order a sandwich
review:
Me: I‚Äôd like a sandwich please! 
App: FRAUD! Order canceled. No sandwich for you! 

 Me: I‚Äôd like a... 
App: BUY 2 FOOTLONGS AND GET ONE FREE! Order now! 

 Me: I‚Äôd like a sandwich please! 
App: Your cart has been corrupted. 
 Me: Can I empty it and start again? 
App: No sandwich for you! 

 Me: I‚Äôd like a sandwich please! 
App: Would you like the same one you got last time? 
Me: That would be great! 
[Crash to Home Screen] 

Me: I‚Äôd like a sandwich please! 
App: Yes, but I won‚Äôt let you use your previous orders or I‚Äôll crash to Home Screen. 
Me: Ok, can I start a new order then? 
App: Sure! It‚Äôll be at the store soon under the name ‚ÄúUnknown‚Äù. 

Me: I‚Äôd like a sandwich please! 
App: Sorry, your store is closed. Would you like to select another on the map? 
Me: Umm, okay... wait, your map says my store is open. 
App: Sorry, your store is closed. Would you like to select another on the map? 
Me: Ok fine, I‚Äôll order from another store. 
App: Actually you can‚Äôt select any other store either. No sandwich for you!

We encourage you to visit https://www.subway.com/en-US/ContactUs/GuestCare to provide additional details about your experience.', 'modified': '2021-12-14T18:51:24Z'}

title: Rewards and payment system not intuitive
review: I frequently use several other fast food chain apps, and it never have any issues. Every time I go to Subway it seems like there‚Äôs a problem with the order, and the employees are unable to do anything if you purchased it through the app. Total joke! Of you don‚Äôt plan to use it for rewards then it‚Äôs fine. I tried to scan to use the rewards, and ended up just charging my PayPal without using the rewards. It wasn‚Äôt obvious that it was going to charge my PayPal, and I wanted to charge my business card and I was unable to get it resolved at the store, and not worth wasting my time trying to get someone to help.

title: Idiots
review:
Still isn‚Äôt fixed so they won‚Äôt get money from me. Fix your app or close it but this is so frustrating

Stupidest app in the world. Required to sign up to use so I do but there is a problem trying to sign up so it tells me to call a number so I do but in infinite wisdom I‚Äôm subways higher ups they‚Äôve decided to no longer offer phone support so the phone tells me to go to a website. How about no. If the email address is correct and as is my phone number and I followed your excessive directions for a password then you still don‚Äôt work I‚Äôm not about to email you and wait when I wanted to order my food you know when I‚Äôm hungry. Sorry but I‚Äôm not waiting anymore

title: Gita
review: Did a wonderful job. She was very patient and helped me with the app when I couldnt get it to work and she made my food before I finished do I could make it to the hospital before visiting was over to see my son! He loves Subway! All he asked for the trooper was a candy bar. But after surgery so serious, his aorta tore, I saw the store tried to order on the app from the car and it was geeting so frustrating. But I have to run bless her! Thanks give her a raise!!! Not now but right now!

title: Needs a Better Menu
review:
It‚Äôs a good app with nice promotions but it has a couple of flaws. Example is I want a turkey and ham sub which isn‚Äôt offered and I can‚Äôt add ham to my turkey sub. My 9 year old wants a ham sub, not an option so now I‚Äôm standing in line to order this sub though my other subs are waiting on the online order pickup stand.
Also, the location finder needs to be better. We were traveling out of state, in a city we have never been in before, I ordered from a Subway that showed up in the area, turns out it was 4 hours south of me. So I paid double for my meal.

title: Red triangle warning
review:
I was about to order my usual suspect order at my favorite subway when I saw the red triangle saying that my particular restaurant does not have all the ingredients for my order, without specifying which ingredients are missing. It did give me the choice to switch to another subway though, but not to cancel (which I did anyway).

Apparently my particular restaurant has run out of certain ingredients. But if I was able to read which ingredients are missing I could decided whether or not to go ahead and order anyway. But not knowing which ones they did not have, I just simply canceled.

title: Better than previous versions
review: I think I last used this app about a year ago and had difficulty with the ‚Äúmake it a meal‚Äù option. I added that option to all my subs, but when we got to the store, the ‚ÄòArtist‚Äô told us they weren‚Äôt on the ticket. He did the right thing. Kudos. This new version (to me) is a vast improvement over the previous one and am quite happy. My only suggestion would be to allow the ability to name your sandwich, so it makes it easier to identify each sandwich in the order. Make it so. I have spoken.

title: Terrible
review: App need so much work that it‚Äôs comical, it takes too much to customize an order! When you click the icon to not be reminded to add extra stuff to your order, you are still prompted everytime you order anyway. The $5 footlong deal is a joke as well, none of the restaurants offer the deal and if you really want to offer customers a deal during a pandemic, make the deal nationwide instead of giving franchisees the power to decide whether or not they will cut prices in half. I‚Äôm sure they knew majority would be against it! I will not pay $10 for a sub from subway because it‚Äôs not close to being worth it! $5 is a deal $7/$8 is reasonable, $10 is another joke that makes no one laugh but subway!

title: App Not Working-Please Fix
review: For the past few MONTHS I‚Äôve been trying to order through the app, I get all the way through to payment and click the button to process the order, then it spins forever and says ‚ÄúDefault‚Äù. My phone is up to date and so is the app, plus all my payment info is up to date. When I go into the Subway restaurant they tell me they don‚Äôt have the capability to give me the same discount I was going to get through the app if it worked. Not going to subway anymore. Way too much of a hassle and you won‚Äôt get the same discount in store even though the app isn‚Äôt working. I keep thinking there is an update coming to fix it but nope. BYE.
developerResponse: {'id': 25813470, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you have encountered these issues, and we would like to investigate further. We encourage you to visit https://www.subway.com/en-US/ContactUs/GuestCare to provide additional details about your experience.', 'modified': '2021-11-19T20:57:51Z'}

title: More cheese
review: I think this app is a great idea because you can save time by ordering before your there and for me there‚Äôs a subway down the street in walking distance so i can just pick it up but my only issue is that you can‚Äôt add multiple types of cheese. Me and my family are cheese lovers so we always get multiple types of cheese on our sub way sandwiches. I can not seem to order a sandwich with more than one type of cheese on it. I don‚Äôt care if i have to pay extra just give me cheese.

title: Mediocre at best, deceptive at worst
review:
Nothing special about this app
In fact it chugs (moves slowly) and handles going back to previous pages about as well as Internet Explorer on Windows Vista. Those are minor complaints tho.

From my experience it seems either all the Subways near me are incapable of doing ‚Äúdeluxe‚Äù or ‚Äúdouble‚Äù meat, or that the app isn‚Äôt displaying those customizations right. It‚Äôs been an issue every single time we have attempted it. 

Now today I when you click to ‚Äúorder now‚Äù under the pop-up offer of BOGO 50% off (and I imagine any other deals that come up) the app does not notify you if the location in question is even participating in the offer! Apparently each location gets to pick and choose whether they offer deals, which is super neat for me and other customers ordering on the app that doesn‚Äôt tell you until you try to check out.

I‚Äôm so done with this entire franchise but it seems like the app is the number one culprit.

title: Cuts the mustard
review:
I have been using this app for quite some time and I don‚Äôt understand why you can‚Äôt add certain ingredients to your sandwiches. For instance, I can‚Äôt add brown mustard or even regular mustard to oven roasted chicken breasts. I can‚Äôt add black pepper to my Cold Cut Combo. I get that certain Subway locations may have different ingredients, but this is pretty standard.  There is an option to add ‚ÄúSpecial Instructions‚Äù in the check out, but in my experience it goes unnoticed half the time.

Please give us the ability to customize sandwiches from scratch instead of being forced to use templates.

title: Are you kidding me?
review: So first off, I‚Äôm a vegetarian and I went through every sandwich trying to find one that would let me order without meat but that simply wasn‚Äôt an option. I really like subway but if they won‚Äôt cater to more diets than I‚Äôm going to have to go somewhere else. Secondly, THIS APP DOESN‚ÄôT WORK! I spent over a half hour trying to figure this thing out and setting up sandwich orders just for it to tell me ‚Äúorder failed‚Äù at the end of every order. Seriously? For a company that praises their app so much maybe they should actually design an app that isn‚Äôt a waste of time. After reading the other reviews it‚Äôs a wonder I even downloaded this app in the first place, my main wish is that I could give this app 0 stars.

title: Stole my money
review: Used the app to buy a sandwich. When I got to the front of the line the guy asked me to show verification that I had bought my sandwich on the app. But the app froze when I tried my recent purchases but I got MyWay points for it. I went to the ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù option but that sent me to the online website and I they had me file a complaint that SUBWAY never responded to even after two separate detailed complaints days apart. I‚Äôm mad because it‚Äôs like a job application just to explain what happened because you have to type everything out. So you stole my money basically. App is a waste if you CANT GET THE SANDWICH THAT YOU HAVE ALREADY PAID FOR! THEN CANT EVEN GET A REFUND! And NOBODY RESPONDS to the online feedback that you direct your app users to use.
developerResponse: {'id': 10265360, 'body': 'Hi there,  we are sorry this happened! You can always reach us at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Thank You!\r\n', 'modified': '2019-08-20T20:20:32Z'}

title: Pricing and order details way off- poor development
review:
The app has incorrect pricing in multiple places for the same order.

If you place an order for one sandwich and more than on drink (ex 2X drinks) it will show wrong pricing in the:

1. Order details on home screen. Shows price of all drinks ordered, but not the QTY.

2. The order history is way off, shows only the drink selected and the base price. So if you ordered 2, only shows 1 drink and price for 1

3. Your email confirmation is the only correct view. Shows what you ordered entirely.

Issues when picking up because of pricing:
Because of these pricing and QTY issues pick ups are always wrong and without the email, the app is useless. 

Also, the UX is completely backwards. Why would you have order details for your pick up, but your order history is different. Put them into the same place. And tie all the data fields of your order and pick up times together.

What do I know, just led TurboTax app,  was a shark tank company and sold  and now JUUL executive.

Fix your app. Not hard, just use your brain, just a little bit.

title: Great people
review: Everything is always made perfect. My one complaint is the Mobil pick up orders should be allowed to pick up inside even when the lobby is closed. I had to wait the same amount of time k would have if I had just ordered Ik the drive thru because I had to sit in line and wait for other people to order anyways. But besides that everything was amazing and the employees were professional kind and accommodating.

title: Smooth sailing
review: I am a huge proponent of app ordering.  I use many different dining apps and Subway ranks at the top for ease, accuracy, and speed.  I also work at a restaurant with app ordering and appreciate the customer doing much of the work and also easing pressure on inside sales and seating. There should be some extra perk for app orders. Your customer basically becomes your employee, doing the work for you. Now I‚Äôm not saying pay $9 an hour but a lil sumthin sumthin to reward your customers effort.  Oh,  and as I am in a tourist area my subways don‚Äôt have $5 footlongs so no value deals here

title: Hours for stores incorrect but easy ordering
review: My subway doesn‚Äôt have a certain time to serve breakfast, ie Bacon egg and cheese. But every time I have tried to order it on the app in the evening it tells me I can only order breakfast from 5am to 11 am. My subway also does not open til 9am, so the only time I got to order BEC through the app. I get a phone call from the store apologizing that they don‚Äôt open till 9 and my order couldn‚Äôt be ready at 7:30am. The app is easy to use and customize your sandwiches. Just wish I could actually make a purchase with it, instead of having to order through the store.

title: Worst. App. Ever.
review: If I could give it no stars I would. It's truly the worst food app out there. I understand that subway has lots of choices. But it is the basic functionalities that are the issue. Making a change to size of bread is near impossible. Changing anything is difficult. The system for selecting your sides is the worst. The queue to toasting is hidden on the first page and it's tricky to go back. The function to add another sandwich to your order is hidden on he checkout page. The option to pay cash I store does not work. I could go on and on. I hope Subway listens to its customers and goes back to the drawing board. It took me 20 MINUTES to order 4 sandwiches, and one bread type was still wrong. Truly awful app.
developerResponse: {'id': 1246184, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience -we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-09-12T19:52:10Z'}

title: Relatively user friendly
review:
If four and a half stars were possible that‚Äôs what I‚Äôd give, however I‚Äôm rounding up because the app itself has an easy interface and paying (I‚Äôm an apple pay user) was simple. Everything was clear and they kept my favorite items listed even though I haven‚Äôt used the app in almost a year. It made it easy to order the favorites on the go. 

One of the other advantages is that they don‚Äôt send me a million emails every week, which in this day and age is an under appreciated accolade. 

The only reason I would ding the rating is because they don‚Äôt have an option for dry spices, which we all know can make or break your sandwich. Maybe they don‚Äôt offer dry spices still in other places though. Who knows. 

Overall I‚Äôm pretty pleased.

title: Customization lacking
review:
You should be able to add any topping to any sandwich, just as when ordering in the store.  But for example, breakfast sandwiches only have egg+/-pork options as protein‚Ä¶.  I was unable to add chicken or beef to the egg.  I don‚Äôt eat pork for religious reasons as do hundreds of thousands of others‚Ä¶.  If I want a breakfast sandwich with meat, pork SHOULD NOT be the ONLY option.

Also only Coke, Diet Coke, and Sprite as options‚Ä¶.not as big a deal bc I can type it in the instructions.  

However I can‚Äôt use the same workaround for extra toppings, because that affects the cost of the sandwich.

title: New Change
review: I would like the app to have the option for a custom made sub. That‚Äôs the only thing stopping me from ordering online, same thing on Door Dash. Or the option to take everything off and everything on or everything that sub offers on or off. The sub that‚Äôs closest to the one I want I can take off the pepperoni. So I can‚Äôt order, and resort to somewhere else. Subway is my all time favorite fast food/ restaurant, but I wish it would allow me that option.

title: Awful app
review: This app has always been the worst ordering experience. Not only do they make it frustrating to order what you want on your sub then they frequently can‚Äôt find the stores in my area even if it could find them before. I live in a big city so there are subways all over. Also then when you do order on the app that still doesn‚Äôt mean your order will come out correct. It‚Äôs frustrating that the only way to get the promotional deals is to order on their crappy app. This was the last time I‚Äôll order from them. It‚Äôs not worth the hassle or frustration especially since in all honesty subways quality has gone to the lowest of lows

title: Love the app
review: It‚Äôs so nice because I can order something before work and pick it up right away. It‚Äôs also nice because it‚Äôs less stressful for the workers. I, personally, just don‚Äôt like when people watch me make their food, so I hope that this helps in that a aspect as well. There‚Äôs also less contact and less time you have to be in there, so it‚Äôs great when dealing with this pandemic. Overall, it‚Äôs awesome! Get it if you eat at Subway often.

title: Easy to use - but pay attention to pick up time!
review:
This is one of the easiest meal order apps and I like the visual representation of the sandwiches as you build them. 
However, I think the first thing they should ask you is what time you want to pick up your order. I‚Äôve gone to place an order in advance multiple times and skipped over the time section because there is no prompt. It‚Äôs not intuitive. App developers, please consider making this a prompt as you place your order instead of a default section.

title: Subway app
review: Using the app is so convenient and easy especially with everything going on nowadays. What makes it even easier is adding my favorite to the app, so when I want to order, I just go to my favorites and add it to my cart. Also, I don‚Äôt have to wait 30 minutes in the store to get my order, so that is very important to me. In addition, I customize my sandwich and remove anything and select more or less of anything, so I am so happy that I download it the subway app.

title: Horrible app!!!!
review:
Would give it no stars if possible. Problems with the app:  1.  can easily add duplicate items to cart because of confusing placed back arrow.  2.  Cart cluttered with ‚Äúwouldn‚Äôt you like to add items‚Äù making it difficult to check your order. 3.  Not able to order all the options available in the store (e.g. special breads). 4.  Payment system difficult to use if trying to pay for part of the order with a gift card. 5.  App is temperamental and it took several times trying for it to apply my already added gift card amount. (Kept showing $0 in the ‚Äúapply gift card area‚Äù when the app already showed that the gift card still had $7.85 left on it. ). 
Redesign your app, PLEASE!!!!

title: The app is great but I have one problem
review: I have been using the app for a good month or two and sometimes when coming home from school, I don‚Äôt feel like waiting in-store to get my order ready. I kind of wish this app something similar to what Dunkin‚Äô Donuts has in their app, adding money to your app and being able to access that money if you want to use mobile ordering. For one, I don‚Äôt not have a credit card I can enter and that‚Äôs the only choice the app gives you if you want to make an order through the app!

title: Works great when it isn‚Äôt bugging out
review: I recently started using the app for mobile order and loved it for the first month (using it 2x per week in two different towns). Then yesterday I selected to order my meal from the Cheyenne location and come to find out the app glitched and sent it to Laramie which is 45 min away. I was told that the app is sometimes that way and I wasn‚Äôt offered a refund which is frustrating but I was able to get a fresh sandwich when I got back to Laramie last night. Please fix the app, I hate ordering Jimmy Johns and don‚Äôt want to switch to them simply because of an app issue.
developerResponse: {'id': 11151828, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-10-09T15:40:38Z'}

title: Added features please!
review: I love a lot of things about this app except I‚Äôm a picky eater and they don‚Äôt have a build your own sandwich or salad feature! They have sandwich options and salad options but you can‚Äôt add meat or delete meat that you don‚Äôt want they only let you delete or add veggies and condiments and not everyone eats the specified subway sandwiches, I prefer my own thing! And I also don‚Äôt like where you are limited to certain breads for the sandwich you choose, not everyone eats the same! It would be a nice option to build your own sandwich and be able to choose from everything you offer.

title: Not bad, needs optimization
review: It‚Äôs not a bad app it gets the job done. Needs a little bit of optimizing though, it lags and load times are slow compared to other food apps. One thing that needs a change though is the option to be able to toast flat bread, it gives me the option to toast all the other breads except for flat bread for some reason, I don‚Äôt want to have to go to the special request box to manually ask for my flat bread to be toasted when I could‚Äôve clicked the option if the feature was there.

title: Terrible
review: The customer service at my local subway store is great. The app is terrible. No kids menu on the app. White bread isn‚Äôt listed. For curbside pickup after paying when the sandwich(s) are ready to be picked it completes the order and you can‚Äôt click on the link to call the store and let them know you are there like it says to do during the order completion. The apps for other companies for example McDonald‚Äôs work flawlessly. If you have a van full of kids and it‚Äôs below zero outside you don‚Äôt want to drag the whole family with babies inside to pickup your order when you can‚Äôt notify the store you are there because the app doesn‚Äôt work.

title: Charged when there was an error
review: I ordered on the app and it came up as error the cart was expired and I had to create new cart. I tried ordering from a different location and the same thing came up. I was charged for both, I reached out to customer service and received a email from Patrick Ryan asking for date/time/ amount and last 4 digits of CC to process a refund. After the reply never heard from again after several emails, no refund absolutely no response. I received a fraud alert 2 weeks later from my credit card company for 3 separate charges that I didn‚Äôt make. Coincidence? I will never go to Subway again, terrible customer service!
developerResponse: {'id': 24015145, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you have encountered these issues, and we would like to investigate further. We encourage you to visit https://www.subway.com/en-US/ContactUs/GuestCare to provide additional details about your experience.', 'modified': '2021-07-19T21:03:34Z'}

title: More options
review: While using the app it didn‚Äôt allow us to add toppings to our sandwiches.  Even though certain sandwiches come with certain things I would prefer to add a few extra items like cheese to any sandwich or be able to change lettuce to spinach.  If you can do this in the store you should be able to do it with the app.  Making the app as close to a store visit as possible would be ideal.   Love subway and hoping for an upgrade to the app soon.  üòÄ

title: Review
review: The last four times we picked up our orders it was missing the dressing the banana peppers that we wanted two times the normal amount we had none other bacon we requested on special instructions always to be cooked first so that it‚Äôs crispy and then put on the sandwich was just fat not cooked good and I just had to give it to the cats I & my husband was missing all of his Chipotle dressing his different kind of sandwich BMT we both were missing our dressing the same night also the restaurant showed us that they didn‚Äôt even have the special instructions printed there where they could see them!

title: Shouldn‚Äôt be my fault
review: Should go to 0 stars, but cookies were ok. So app issue with unable to create my way. Meats locked and when you want to add different meat there not available. Go and write in special instructions the manager at store basically blames me for spending an hour on app and not getting it to work properly. Me listing what I want in the special instructions cost was about a dollar difference in what sandwich I was required to compensate for what I wanted. Like I know what the cost is before ordering. Manager I asked to show me how to do app and was unable to do also instead of an apology she walks away. Also got a sub on order that was deleted when I was trying to get app to work. Deleted app. Deleted the return to store.

title: The App is nice
review: The app is clean and works well, but I‚Äôve only used it once. I love that I can order ahead and pick up. Sometimes the lines can be extremely long and my lunch break is only 30 minutes. However, I placed my order around noon today and the app said my order would be ready for pick up at 12:20. I think my order was made as soon as it came in. I showed up at 12:17 and while the app said my meal was still being made, it was actually already made, sitting all wrapped up and kept in a microwave. Also, there needs to be a better process with picking up online orders in store.

title: Convenient until there is an issue
review: Today we placed an order that was delivered some other random place. That is when we discovered that there is no way to resolve an issue within the Subway App and that payment is made directly to the store so the store is ultimately responsible even though delivery is provided by a third party. Luckily Door Dash has great customer service and helped us through the process of having the issue resolved even though they were only the third party who delivered. If it was not for us getting lucky with Door Dash's help we would be hungry and out $20 on top of it with no way to communicate to anyone that an error was made.

title: My order was not all there when ordered through subway app
review: I‚Äôm very dissatisfied with this app and subway delivery. I placed order through subway app and ordered cookies and chips with sand. I didn‚Äôt receive cookies or chips. I called Subway and the guy said he could put the items aside and I could have someone go pick them up. They don‚Äôt deliver their self but use DoorDash. Which didn‚Äôt help cause I didn‚Äôt order thru the DoorDash app. They said they do deliver chips and cookies with sand which I don‚Äôt understand why they didn‚Äôt deliver them with order. They place blame on door dash and suggested I contact them to get refund! Sooo Annoyed with Subway! Never again will I order for delivery!!

title: Good idea, poorly executed
review: I use the app‚Äîprimarily because of the ease of ordering. However, the app leaves a LOT to be desired. Changing or editing a saved sub is impossible‚Äîwhich is a hassle when you created an order but can‚Äôt get it because the store doesn‚Äôt carry an item you have requested. Instead of allowing you to adjust your saved item, you have to delete it and start over. Also, there‚Äôs no large soda, the apps doesn‚Äôt list items that are in store (Diet Coke in a bottle? Cool Ranch Doritos?), and the store has yet to ever read and do what my comments request. All of this makes it questionable as to whether I should bother with Subway. Do you do user testing?

title: Only full price items
review: Now this may be the fault of the local Subway owner but it still only an issue when I use the app.  Every time Subway offers online order only deal..... my local Subway will show up in the app as closed.  Now the first time I experienced this I assumed it was a glitch or error but after 3 times of having to go to the actual restaurant ,having them tell me I have to pay full price and that they don‚Äôt know why they are appearing as not open..... I‚Äôm guessing it‚Äôs either national scam or a local one.  I‚Äôm betting on the local one.  Shame on somebody.  It‚Äôs also not very intuitive.  Building sandwiches is not as easy or slick as it should be.

title: Not happy
review:
App was working fin√© until my card expire, I thought this is an easy change just enter the new expiration date on my new debit card and ready to keep ordering, that‚Äôs not the case since my card expired 4 months ago I can‚Äôt order anything more all I see is a stupid message telling me (my card is expired) 

I call already no one help me yet, because you can‚Äôt speak with a machine right. 
Week after I enter my new card I did  recibe a email telling me that my card update was successful!! Yeah finally! Nop nop my app still doing the same. 
I‚Äôll ben ordering from the web because my app is not working hopefully some can solve this problem not just for me probably more costumers has the same issue.   NOT HAPPY !

title: They have fixed all bugs I had before. Great experience now
review: I love subway and hate lines. This app is a great idea but for the last year it was absolutely broken. It wouldn‚Äôt work, it‚Äôd crash, it was terrible. I used it in 2019 and it‚Äôs all smooth sailing. The app is clean and works well, nice animations and great interface. For me, the opportunity of using this app is a better experience than waiting in a line. If you‚Äôre into convenience then try this app out, subway did well with it. I

title: It‚Äôs been improving, but I‚Äôve noticed a issue
review:
Ap works fairly well, although I‚Äôve noticed not everything has been available.

Example. Every store I have ever been to has had provolone cheese. Unless it‚Äôs been recently added. It isn‚Äôt an option on the ap. And the stores I have ordered from definitely have it.

Another example is to have a bread choice as 2nd or 3rd option. I ordered and when getting order picked up they were out, so an employee chose what bread, which happened to be my least likely to get. There should be a backup option so if this happens the employees have a direction to go.

If I wasn‚Äôt in a rush I would have denied the order.

Just a few thoughts, keep up the great work!

Oh and teach the cashiers to get you your points, I‚Äôve no less then a dozen missed purchases because they didn‚Äôt know how to do it. And didn‚Äôt care after the fact.

title: Awesome service
review: Blaine H Street is awesome ! We order every Saturday morning from them. They always have it made for us. We always request bacon to be on the side instead of on the sandwich and they always have it done perfectly and how we ask. Which is awesome that they took the time to read what the customer wants. Means a lot. (How many times have you ordered something to get it home and it is not even close to what you ordered )

title: Worst Toupee of trump READ
review: Answer developers. READ people Do not buy it‚Äôs a waste of time and storage. Nothing goes through. I love subways food but only when I get it at the stores. Nothing goes through like I said and I can‚Äôt even order a simple sandwich. I don‚Äôt wanna hear oh call this or go in that or sorry for the inconvenience because they will send us on some dumb website and won‚Äôt even do anything. I wish I can rate it zero stars. Actually all devices should have that option. Because this isn‚Äôt even bad.  Hey it‚Äôs not bad at all. It‚Äôs horrific it‚Äôs terrible it‚Äôs a waste of time it‚Äôs ugly it‚Äôs  a waste of storage and worst than Donald trump and his toupee. Sry trump haters. It‚Äôs just like really horrific thank u reviewers. U reviewed well u reviewed well.

title: App Useless on military bases
review:
I can‚Äôt order to pickup on my base.  I get subway coupons in the mail and none of the off base restaurants will take them, even in light of the recent price hike.

Consider this people, the last days of the $5 footling were in 2018 on subs like the cold cut, Black Forest ham, blt‚Ä¶etc. since the. Your average price of these sandwiches are now $8 and above. All the premium subs are $10+!!!

So in the last 4 years, subway has hiked their prices about 50-60% since 2018 and doesn‚Äôt like to honor their own coupons that help out.  Time to start voting with my dollar and stop going to the ones that won‚Äôt honor a promotion, so why should I give them my business?

title: no refunds
review: I‚Äôve used this app once before a few months ago and found no real problems with it. July 30th i place a delivery order (like i had done once before) and i was charged. There was no notifications to alert me that my order had been cancelled. I have not received the refund and it‚Äôs currently the 5th of August. I emailed Subway the night of the order and left a customer complaint. I have received no reply and still no refund. I retried using the app again and the same thing has happened with no refund. I called the company and was not helped. Bad app with no customer service.

title: Could be more aware
review: I go to one or two Subways that are closest to my location and order through your App.  Neither of them appears to read the ‚ÄúSpecial Instructions‚Äù!  I prefer my sauce on the side so the bread is not soggy when I‚Äôm ready to eat it.  I always ask for sauce to be put on the side. Nine times out of ten, they put the sauce on the sandwich, and then don‚Äôt admit it. Not to be wasteful, I accept the sandwich, as is.  The tenth time, they forget to include the sauce in my pick-up bag.  It is VERY frustrating.  But, yes, I keep going back and submitting the same App order.   I keep hoping!!!!!

title: Customization better on previous app version. Worked well today, in the past had problems working.
review: I tried using the app two or three times a couple of weeks ago and had problems with it and got error message. Today I used it with no problems. New app version does not show (or at least I have not discovered) a way to customize ingredients by removing then adding different ingredients. Previous version allowed customization as much as I wanted. That‚Äôs why I only give current app version 3 stars.

title: App works great.
review: Easy to use. I love getting head of the line privileges. I walk in, they stop what they're doing and hand me my order and I walk out. If you use drive thru you might have to wait in line. Doesn't save you much time that way. The only thing I wish they'd improve is the location part of the app. It only saves your last location. I'd like to see a drop down list of the last three places you ordered from. I rarely use the same place twice

title: Don‚Äôt use EVER
review: I ordered my food from the subway app at 08:26pm, the tracking kept showing they weren‚Äôt even making the food. Then I received notice that it would be delivered at 09:25. Note that the subway location closes at 09:00pm, and it‚Äôs literally 5 minutes from my house. I was brought a Jack n the box order, which I didn‚Äôt order, and I was still charged for the subway meal. I have called the location for the past two days with no anger trying to talk directly to them about it. When I walked in after work today they told me it‚Äôs a third party app and they probably won‚Äôt be able to give me a refund. I won‚Äôt ever use this app again. Buyer beware.

title: Its not the app its the people
review: I placed an order on the app (second time ever) and I decide to go to the local beer store which is two stores down from subway and when I‚Äôm done I go into the shop to pick up my sandwich, the guy behind the counter says he never saw it, and not only did he tell me he never saw it, he said the app is the problem and it‚Äôs broken and people complain all the time but I had to buy a sandwich and have it made in store then when I get home I check the app and it says my sandwich was made and I was charged for a second sandwich ultimately. Again it‚Äôs not the app it's the people

title: Excellent, but Slow Loading
review: The subway app let you know about 15% off deals that are really worth getting, it‚Äôs easy to navigate, it won‚Äôt show up with rewards for cashback on future sndwiches, it has all the options, and there is comment sealed in case you want to ask for something special. However, even on a fast connection, it takes a few seconds to switch between screens every time that Hass to happen. Annoying. Still, alcohol, a great app

title: Frustrated - couple years of patience worn out
review: I‚Äôm surprised the app is literally the 3rd to worst app I‚Äôve ever needed and tried to use.  Bread choice disappears. Hard to remove items or not intuitive unless you‚Äôre an IT person. Local franchise never gets or loses orders due to no Internet connection and you show up with no order ready. Login reset is problematic.  I‚Äôve tried to bear with but it‚Äôs my mom who enjoys the sandwiches.  I rarely trash an app review but good thing they make AWESOME sandwiches or I‚Äôd go to their competitor.  IJS

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-12-29T14:41:53Z'}

title: This is NOT convenient!
review:
I downloaded and used the app for the first time today. I was a little irritated that the coupon sent to me via text this morning could not be applied through the app. Next, there were things such as adding egg white to my salad that I could not add through the app so I put it in the comments. 

I go pick up my order and it was not made correctly. The cashier stated that we did not put egg white on your salad because we have to charge you for it since it‚Äôs not an option on the app. So, I still had to stand there and pay for something that should have been available to add through the app!
developerResponse: {'id': 8557494, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us by tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com- so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-05-07T14:44:54Z'}

title: This is the secret.
review:
I love Sammiches like Bruh Man from the 5th Flo. 

But to be honest it‚Äôs hard to find the best sandwich made fresh.  

The secret to a great Subway sandwich  is 
1. Knowing what you want 
2. The time to make it right. 

A Subway line, all those choices and feeling rushed can be anxiety inducing for you and your server. Rushed to make decisions and rushed to make it right. Not a great combo. 

But with the App, you get a perfect sandwich because you can take your time to choose the sandwich and toppings and your server can make it the quality you dream of.  

A different restaurant had a sandwich I used to love and they dropped it from the menu.  I spent time on my Subway app and recreated the sandwich. Like whoa!  While not identical, the Subway Sandwich was definitely better. 

This App is Key to my Happiness  
Use It!!!

title: Do not use this app if you plan to edit your sandwiches.
review:
Used the app for the first time in a while and I‚Äôm really ticked off. We ordered some food and edited one of the sandwiches to take off most of the toppings it came with and add a few that we liked. Placed the order and brought the food back home only to find all of the original toppings and none of the toppings we asked for. I looked on the app and it had switched the topping back to the original after I had ordered the food.

Do not use this app if you are going to customize your sandwich. This place is too expensive even with a discount just to get the exact opposite of what you asked for.

title: Great app for food ordering, super simple.
review: Great app!  I always enjoyed subway subs since I was a kid, this app basically defeats the worst part of getting a sub at subway, the line.  I always get extremely inpatient when I am waiting in a subway line watching someone add fifteen toppings to that sub that IMO look horrible together, but no fret just order ahead in usually within five minutes the subs ready on a take away order counter away from the line.

title: Disgusting
Glitchy app causes Aggravation
review: When I redownloaded the app and signed in at first it wouldn‚Äôt let me create an order just select a location. After restarting the app it finally let me create an order for my family. Then when I went to check out it was set to curbside pickup, which isn‚Äôt what I had selected, and it wasn‚Äôt currently available. When I went to change it to in store pickup (why isn‚Äôt drive-thu an option for store that have it) my order was erased, very aggravating! So I went to the store and ordered in drive-thru but they were out of provolone cheese and shaved steak, why can‚Äôt the app show when a location is out of these things?

title: Really buggy
review:
The app use to work fine, but here in the last few months it has had a lot of bugs. I can‚Äôt access my recent orders consistently, I repeatedly have to close and reopen the app after getting an error message ever time I try. It repeatedly asks me to confirm the order location after I had already done it. Coupon codes which are displayed in the app do not work like the 15OFF which is currently offered and I have confirmed that a few people have been able to get it from that Subway. 

There are just a lot of bugs and no apparent attempt to fix them.

title: Subway Five Stars
review: I love this app.  I‚Äôve lost weight using Noom and Subway. 50 pounds down. I eat at Subway daily. Three clicks and my order is waiting for me hot and delicious. I order in the car and then walk in and sit. Order doesn‚Äôt have to be this fast but it usually is. On top of this, I get rewards. Sometimes free cookie.  Sometimes free drinks.  And always working toward my $2 off coupon. The app works great at finding the nearest Subway when I travel. Helps to keep me eating healthy while on the road.

title: App update has corrupted my account
review:
I used to use the app all the time. I could scan my app for points and/or use rewards. Now I open the app and it states ‚Äúsomething went wrong with your account‚Äù and the app will not allow me to use it and tells me to contact support (which goes no where).
I sent an email to ‚Äúsupport‚Äù which was just for ‚Äúexperience at a store‚Äù as there is No app support on the website. I get an auto reply and then an auto follow up email the next day and nothing is being done. 
So now I have lost all my rewards, points and can‚Äôt ever use the app again.
I have updated to latest app version and even deleted and reinstalled. Nothing.
No support, no help and lost my rewards

title: Who is participating?
review: The app states that the ‚ÄúTwo foot Long subs for 5.00‚Äù is only online and only at participating restaurants. Then, the app says the price will be reflected at the end of my order, when I place the order. Nope. After I go through several minutes of ordering, I see that the price does not reflect the ‚Äú Two for 5.00‚Äù price. So, a waste of time on my  part. How am I supposed to know where this price is good? Am I supposed to call each restaurant and check? By the time I call two or three restaurants, and then place a detailed order.. my lunch is over. Subway.. fix this time consuming problem.. Or Ill just order somewhere less confusing.

title: Good when it works
review:
I prefer to use the website to buy subs ahead, just because I find the app is limited in functionality. But the thing that irks me the most is when you go to the store and buy your item and when you‚Äôre ready to check out you‚Äôve been signed out of your account...WHY?! Then trying to log in takes time and by the time you show your app, the scanner has reset so you have to ask the employee to set up for the app again.

At the very least, keep a card outside of the account so it can be scanned without needing to log in.

title: No way that 4.8 average is real.
review: This has been the worst app I‚Äôve ever used. You‚Äôre losing so much money everyday by keeping the horrible development team that is responsible for the pile of consistent garbage. The layout, design, and functionality have changed so consistently and each one is somehow equally unbelievably bad. At one point I logged back in after being logged out and all of my points were gone? Within a week after a huge purchase so I know they didn‚Äôt just expire. Please just get any developer that actually understands mobile application design and development. All I want is to be able to mobile order quickly, efficiently, and reliably each time. Ex: McDonald‚Äôs or Chic-fil-a mobile apps.
developerResponse: {'id': 12775385, 'body': "We appreciate you sharing your feedback, and are always looking for ways to enhance the mobile app experience for our guests. You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-07T16:17:46Z'}

title: Order Location.
review:
Make sure to check your order location before completing it, couple times my order went to wrong location far away. Tried calling the store to cancel but A) they hardly ever answer,  B) if they answer and cancel now you‚Äôre stock with trying to get your money back since it charges your card right away and the store is not able to cancel charge .  
They really need to add a Cancel order option in the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 7678991, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-03-11T20:43:47Z'}

title: When it Works. If not? You get burned.
review:
Considering the fact that apps are not perfect it‚Äôs astounding that there is little to no help when it stops working properly. 

I tried ordering a sandwich for myself and my Girlfriend and when I changed the location of the order it placed the order anyways (saying error occurred) to the wrong location! I called to cancel the order and it did not let me. I then tried to swallow the fact I lost $15 because no one seemed to understand the problem stating that you CANT CANCEL ANY ORDERS. 

So you risk my money on glitches? Yeah I‚Äôm good on this app. I‚Äôve used it for almost a year and now all of sudden you absolutely screw me over.

Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-10-08T17:41:28Z'}

title: OMG. Awesome
review: This app is just great. It makes life easy. I really like things that make life easier. I am so unbelievably happy that I was able to get this app from the App Store. The App Store has so many great answers to most of life‚Äôs problems. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without all the wonderful apps from the App Store - including this completely wonderful subway app. Thank you subway for making this app to make my life so much easier! You rule!

title: Unalterable orders through the app
review: Downloaded the app this morning. Entered my credit card info and placed an order for around noon. Realized that order wouldn‚Äôt work out with my kiddos lunch time at school. Needed to cancel order. No way to do that through the app. Called the store like the app instructed. The order wasn't showing up in their computer so they couldn‚Äôt alter or change my order. They told me to call toll free number. I did that, but they can‚Äôt access electronic info either to alter the order.  Sad my order is limbo with no way to alter or cancel it until 15 minutes before its scheduled to be picked up later today. This needs to be tweaked   I don‚Äôt want to pay for an order that I can‚Äôt pick up and eat.
developerResponse: {'id': 4783612, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-08-23T13:52:36Z'}

title: Very bad experience
review:
This‚Äôs regarding my first and last order with Subway, order number is 715C0C90-3B in 170 West 23rd street, New York, I ordered personal pizza in mobile app, it showed my order was ready for pickup and drama started when I went to store, they started saying they don‚Äôt have personal pizza and they can‚Äôt do anything about my order, when we asked about why did you accept order in that case? Why didn‚Äôt you call me if you don‚Äôt have it? They told we can‚Äôt do anything about online orders and they had to call some other office to refund me and I got it. My question is Why app showed it‚Äôs ready for pick up if store doesn‚Äôt have it?
Why to waste my time and your time in that case?
developerResponse: {'id': 4256378, 'body': 'Hi there. We are definitely sorry that this happened. We show that the order number you provided was voided by staff on 7/10. The reversal may take several business days to process. If you have any additional questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-07-16T14:26:44Z'}

title: Unable to create account or login
review:
I'm using an iPhone X and clearly the app hasn't been updated for it, but that shouldn't cause the issues I'm seeing. I tried to create an account in the app, but clicking the button after entering my name and phone number results in a blank page every time.

I then created an account from a computer and when I try to login with the app, I enter my email address and password, but the login button does nothing. Literally nothing. I tapped on it a dozen times, tried 3D-touching it, and all that ever happened was the "log in" text on the button became selected. On a webpage in mobile Safari, this usually indicates the button is disabled.

Meanwhile I've uninstalled it.

title: Not Too Shaby
review: I really like the app. It makes it really easy to just grab your food and go without having to wait in line. The only thing is (and this isn‚Äôt Subways fault) but the subway near my job‚Ä¶the service isn‚Äôt that great. I‚Äôll order ahead of time(maybe  or 2 hours ahead of time) and would still have to wait in line for my order to be made. The thing is is that this Subway doesn‚Äôt have many customers. Like it‚Äôs never busy there lol but still a great app

title: Always Works!!
review:
Subway app is not like other food apps it ALWAYS WORKS!! The cool thing is if you have someone states away you can order pay and allow them to pick up. The food is always extremely fresh and absolutely perfect for how you requested. 
We had a homeless man 1500 miles away hungry and app worked perfect BUT the people of Subway makes it the most special. 
We used in many states without one issue. 
PS: sometimes you might need to ask about chips / cookie etc.

title: Love the app- employees need trained
review: I love the app; however, any time I‚Äôm not in a big city, employees don‚Äôt know how to operate this system, or they don‚Äôt try- or have to ask their manager who sometimes don‚Äôt know either. Nothing against the app! I wouldn‚Äôt have a ‚Äútime limit‚Äù when you activate a deal. It never comes up on the servers at a few subways I stop at; or I end up getting charged more (let us say there is a bacon deal). Also- I can‚Äôt see what im typing right now so apologize for the errors! It is typing white against. White background, lol

title: Love using the app. Only one criticism!
review:
I absolutely love using the app! Easy! Convenient! Staff say they absolutely love when people use it, its much easier to do multiple subs when its an online order.

My only negative comment is i have 900 gift cards with cents on it because it wont take more than one gift card at a time. I want to use up an old card and then pay the remaining balance with a new one but it will only use the card if you have the FULL amount.
developerResponse: {'id': 8954008, 'body': 'Hey, there- give us a call at (833)-778-2929 and we can help you transfer those on to one single card. Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-05-31T14:42:59Z'}

title: Almost perfect!
review: I rate it 5 stars. However, there is one thing that makes me unhappy every time, and I would love to point it out for you to fix it to make the app perfect. The ‚Äúspecial order instruction‚Äù DOESN‚ÄôT work. I swear I always type my request before hitting the order button, but at the store the employee shows me the printed receipt and argues with me that there is no instructions at all. It happens at all stores every single time I use the app. Please fix it.

title: The app functions well but is VERY unreliable
review:
When the app works it is great. However more often than not (about 80%)of the time; it does not work. 
There are times when you will spend a lot of time choosing and customizing a sub only to have the app display a "Cart expired" message. Once you see this message you know the app will not work. 
Another common problem is the app will display an "update required" message. But when you click on it the App Store shows no update. Again you are guaranteed the app will not work. 
For a national chain with such prominent advertising it is really sad to have such a substandard user experience.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-10-27T17:31:49Z'}

title: It used to be great
review: I tried to use the Subway app today and it was a major disappointment. Up until today, one could order Six inch sandwiches and cheesy jalape√±o bread. Those are no longer available in the app. I finally tried to reorder a favorite salad since I could not order a six inch sub at all. I kept getting an error message and couldn‚Äôt make the order. It was working fine before today. I decided to drive to the store. There was a sign up that said that Subway was making changes. I want no part of these changes based on my experience today. There are too many other sandwich restaurants to deal with this frustration.

title: Not Worth the Rewards
review: I liked using this app because of the rewards. But you cannot customize the sandwiches well enough. They need an option to start totally blank. I have tried ordering different ways and putting stuff in the notes and I get the wrong sandwich probably a 1/3 of the time. There‚Äôs also no way to report that your sandwich was wrong on the app. So you don‚Äôt get your food and you don‚Äôt get your money back. There is a survey option on their website but it requires a number from the receipt which obviously isn‚Äôt accessible from the app. So irritating.

title: Bug in new update
review:
After trying for 30 minutes to contact subway and browse through their website looking for a way to submit this bug report, I decided to just put this here and hopefully it gets to them.
With the new update there is a bug that makes Subway restaurants that close at midnight (12 am) appear as though they are closed in the app and I can‚Äôt order from them. This is likely due to the program treating AM times as being on the same day instead of the next day and so 12am is seen as the closing time at the little start of each day.

This app has been great otherwise, please fix this bug.

title: Great App
review: As restaurant apps go, This Subway app is very easy to use...‚Äùafter‚Äù you take a couple minutes to learn its system. It takes a few trial and error button clicks, but after your first ‚Äúcustomized‚Äù order, it‚Äôs a breeze. Straight forward, limited options (unlike menus with pages of options, combinations, etc.)...best of all..their App actually worked from very first order! üëç I‚Äôm still trying to my first  order completed with other restaurants. üòñ

title: Mustard
review:
I left your table after years of loving Subway until I realized it had to be ‚Äúyour way‚Äù!
I frequently asked for ‚Äúspicy brown‚Äù mustard. After years of requests I gave up and found other outlets.
PUBLIX GROCERS, makes the best open choices, fresh and toasted, without begging for condiments or garnish. I almost feel guilty taking my business away but PUBLIX seems to do whatever it takes, at all their stores free of added charges and in abundance no petty counting or limits. HELLO SUBWAY! CAN YOU HEAR ME OR ARE YOU JUST SUB WAY DOWN‚ÅâÔ∏è
Chet Elfenbein

title: New Update Won‚Äôt Allow Ordering
review: I updated today and now cannot place an order using the app. I get an error of ‚Äòcannot place order.  Order not placed‚Äô   I was trying to order 4 different sandwiches. I noticed after the second attempt of trying to place my order that it duplicated one sandwich and took another away. I finally gave up on my order and had Jimmy Johns instead. Their app works.

title: Useless
review: I can't recall ever seeing any app with 100% negative votes except for a couple of obvious shills. And the identical canned apologies from some outsourced desk in India are actually insulting, how many times can you say you value our business without specifically answering our questions? My complaint is you can't even use the app without divulging personal information first. You can't read their legal terms of use or privacy statements FIRST before agreeing to them. If you can walk into their store and buy a sandwich cash without giving up your privacy rights the law should require them to give you that same option if you want to pre-order electronically. I vote along with everyone else, the app is useless.
developerResponse: {'id': 1352020, 'body': 'Hey there- we just want to let you know that we apologize for your frustration. These capabilities require creating an account and sharing your information with us. You may wish to take a look at www.order.subway.com, where you can build an order and check out as a guest. Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-09-25T14:23:54Z'}

title: Please add pay at store option to app
review: We used to use the app all the time. However someone got our debit card info ( we believe from it being saved on the app and used it at a Subway in another state. We changed info but since they no longer offer PayPal and do not have a pay at store option on the app, we feel we can no longer use the app as we do not want to put our info into it again. Wish they would at least add a pay at stre option like Dominos and other restaurants do.

title: One of the stupidest apps ever
review: I deleted it after trying to use it once. They have two advertised specials which I clicked on to see the ingredients. I could not back out of either one and had to close the app. How asinine. Then I tried to order one of the regular sandwiches but it wanted me to create an ID which means they are going to sell my info and I will be bombarded with spam for Russian women who want to meet and penis enlargement pills. On top of that the online menu did not even list my favorite sandwich at the shop I was going to. I skipped the app and went to the location and they did have my favorite sandwich which I then ordered and deleted the app. Worst app ever!!

title: Doesn‚Äôt Work?
review: It‚Äôs a pretty app, but whenever I try to order, it says a problem occurred and to try again. This has happened way more times than it hasn‚Äôt. The particular subway I‚Äôm ordering from says that they do take online orders, so the problems with the app itself. The times that an order does ‚Äúgo through‚Äù, there‚Äôs a chance that once I arrive for pickup, they won‚Äôt have gotten any orders at all! This happens across multiple locations.
developerResponse: {'id': 1414352, 'body': 'We apologize for the inconvenience. Please contact us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com so that we can make this right. Please mention the restaurant location, date/time you tried to place the order, and your user name when contacting us.', 'modified': '2017-10-02T19:25:30Z'}

title: Sloooooow and error messages
review: I received an offer through PayPal for Subway, but I had to download and order through the Subway app. I spent half of my lunch break trying to order 1 wrap. Every time I tried adding it to my bag it would give me an error message. It finally added the wrap after 10+ tries but then there were 2 wraps on the order. I tried removing 1 wrap and was again met with error messages every time. Finally got 1 wrap removed. Also, accidentally made it into a meal with no issue, but when I tried to remove chips/drink it kept giving me the same error message. I gave up and just paid for the meal instead of just the wrap. Will not use this frustrating app again.

title: Do not get this app
review:
Barcode never worked 
Could go thru line faster than placing order
Final straw. Placed order via app. Heard my order go thru as makes annoying noise at cash register. The beeps did not stop. An employee approached me asking if placed online order as I had done so in past. Advised yes.  Tried to show order on phone. SubwY staff asked me to delete order as they could not print it out. I advised paid do not think could be deleted. Eventually had to go back to work. Talk to staff who said will try to print and we meet next day. Went back manager unable to print the order. Nothing staff could do. Manager not around. Still waiting for sandwich. Nice people finish last. Do not recommend app
