Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-08-31T17:59:44Z'}

title: Help
review: I‚Äôm just trying to let you know that after the recent update I just put in today the app will not stay open it opens and immediately closes. I wonder if you can check into that and seeing if it‚Äôs happening with other people. You might have to make an adjustment to the app. I‚Äôve never had trouble using the app before so I think it has to do with the newest to update

title: How does this happen
review: This app needs a lot more optimization. You might as well place your orders through their website because this app is horrendously bad. It took me 10 minutes to add one sandwich to the cart, and other sandwiches take forever to load before giving you an error and making you have to go add it again, I ended up just placing the order at the drive thru because I couldn‚Äôt place an order within the 12 minute drive to the store. This app is by large margin the worst app I‚Äôve ever used for any fast food establishment or restaurant ever. I don‚Äôt ever write reviews, but this app was so particularly bad that I just had to.

title: Disappointed
review:
Used the app to pick up some subs at the subay on Lake Otis in Anchorage l,Ak.   I ordered some z45-50 mins before I arrived.  Show up and nothing is ready,  they told me maybe I ordered from another store before checking.  Then found my order,  made it ,  then sat them up front because by this time they were busy with other customers.   So i had to ask them for the subs.  

This was a inconvenience,  i use the app as it is usually a time saver, the sandwch is usually ready by the time I get there.  I would have been better off just showing up and ordering.  Multiple people cane and went in the time I was waiting for my sandwich

title: Sebastian
review: I when to this subway and to my surprise Sebastian was so helpful and so patient with me because I‚Äôm new with the app and there wasn‚Äôt too many people so he was able to give me that special attention very kind man works hard for his job and very professional so thank you for having good people that are concerned with customer service Sebastian was very nice thank you very much I will be going there from now on Ms. safeKey ü§ó

title: Just stick to the annoying website
review: Terrible app. I could not figure out how to adjust the scheduled time the order would be ready. It incessantly asks if you want to make a meal in spite of continuously saying no. It also went ahead and ordered my food despite trying to return home from the confirm order screen. I never hit a button that gave me the impression that I had confirmed my order.

title: Subway and covid
review:
My local subway has recently renovated and it looks nice and clean. During these tough times using this app makes life a bit easier. I just order what I want then drive to the store and pick it up they are ready usually within 15 mins.

When first using the app I ordered a couple times wrong make sure you tap the bread and under the bread there‚Äôs a little flame icon click it and it‚Äôs toasted and don‚Äôt forget to order cheese ect.

title: App developers need to take a lesson from Chipotle
review: The subway app is very clunky when it comes to online orders. Sandwiches have preset ingredients that you have to deselect if you don‚Äôt want and then add on what you do. Both times I‚Äôve ordered I‚Äôve made mistakes with my order because I didn‚Äôt realize what the default setting was. They need to rework this and make it more like the chipotle app which walks you through all the meat and veggie options and has you pick what you want or don‚Äôt want without anything being preselected for you.

title: Check your order before sending it!!!
review: Did a decent sized order at work one day for lunch for my employees. I had everyone use the app on my phone and add what they wanted. Made the mistake of telling the last person to submit the order before checking it over. When I got my order I noticed there was way too many subs. Looked at my order on the app and my sandwich was added 3 more times to the order!!! This could not be an accidental mistake because you have to physically press the button to add one more of the same sandwich and it takes a few seconds to load. Started a new order on the app and I watched the same thing happen as I started to add more sandwiches! Scam?!

title: It‚Äôs okay but...
review: You guys know you sell soups too right? It might be a small thing to complain about but I actually like the broccoli and cheddar as well as the chicken noodle soups you sell on the side or as an option to add to the subway sub combo. Not all subways might have the option all the time but I think it would still be nice if you added the soups as an option to order everything on the app instead of buying part of your order on the app and then ordering the soup when you get there. Please consider adding your current available soups to the app also!

Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-09-30T14:25:35Z'}

title: Great if it works.. but it doesn‚Äôt...
review:
This would be a great app, if it worked.. I‚Äôve placed a few orders in the past which always took longer then a simple app should take but it went through so I‚Äôll deal with it. Plenty of great food places have bad apps.  
  Today, however, it did not work at all. I picked my order then went to the cart to checkout, tapped to place my order. It repeatedly just kicked me back to my cart and said ‚Äúunknown error occurred‚Äù I tried restarting the app, and the order but no luck.
  It now tells me there are items in my cart, but none there when I tap on it, and I‚Äôm not able to add anything to the cart.
  This app simply does not work properly, if at all.

title: Terrible!
review: This app is horrible. I ordered with the b1g1 special. The location I ordered from was out of 4 items I put on my sandwich (lettuce, tomatoes, banana peppers, olives). The girl at the location printed the receipt, which basically confirms that she can make it with everything I requested. No cancel button on the app. The app says to call to cancel. No manager to issue a refund. I came back when the manager was there and she told me, ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know if you got your sandwich.‚Äù The worker scribbled all over my receipt telling her they were out of everything and I didn‚Äôt get my sandwich. Wrote into corporate regional manager and nothing has been resolved. Never going to another subway again. No refund, no sandwich.

title: FIXED!!! Why can‚Äôt we order CHIPS!?!
review:
UPDATE: Thank you for fixing the app! Only thing I would like to see added is MARINARA added to the sauce selections. That would allow another item for creating a pizza steak sub. Thank you! 

Please fix the app to be able to order chips!!! I enjoy being able to place the order using the app, and having the sandwich ready, transaction complete, and all I have to do is grab my chips & drink cup, fill it up, and out the door! PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE fix this!
developerResponse: {'id': 6890643, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we wanted you to know that this issue should now be resolved. If you have further difficulty, please reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2019-05-08T12:20:55Z'}

title: Need more options
review: Please add create  your own options or open up the meat selections for add ons.  My kids like turkey and pepperoni, but there is no way I can find to add pepperoni to a turkey sandwich in the app.  My other kid likes salami and cheese, but there is no way to select that as an option.  Without a little more customization available, the app doesn‚Äôt work for our family.  And this isn‚Äôt an app issue, but since we couldn‚Äôt use the app for our needs I called two local subways to phone in an order ahead and neither location is answering.  We use the locations often and I know they are open, but that is disappointing.
developerResponse: {'id': 10265448, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-08-20T20:26:08Z'}

title: Not happy
review: I ordered a pizza through the app and got some reason the store not only didn‚Äôt make it, but they didn‚Äôt want to give it to the person who went to get it for me. They stated that the order hadn‚Äôt come through even though there was prof that not only did it come through but that it was paid for. THEN a cashier came into the salon I was in while I was getting my hair done (hence why I sent someone to get me the food) and asked to SEE MY PHONE to confirm that I placed the order. Then when I got the food , the pizza wasn‚Äôt fully cooked and it wasn‚Äôt cut fully. But they tried to compensate by giving me an extra cookie and making my drink bigger. I will never order through this app again.
developerResponse: {'id': 8821296, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us by tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com- so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-05-23T14:52:17Z'}

title: Bad bad update!
review:
I used to love this app! I decided to write because I just don‚Äôt understand in the life of me why it has become so much difficult to order now. Before a simple pin would do, reorder was a very nice feature, try ordering in a hurry and you end up frustrated.
I really don‚Äôt know who designed this version but they really messed things up for Subway and the users.
Disappointing, I had to go in a store when I could just order ahead before.
developerResponse: {'id': 1473985, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience -we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-10-11T15:41:17Z'}

title: Ugh
review:
We spent half an hour trying to get the app to load and put our order in to save time while on a long road trip. By the time the app stopped freezing and we finally got the 4 sandwiches right, we were 2 minutes from the pickup location, and the order wouldn‚Äôt even have been ready for 20+ more minutes. We ditched the app and went into the store. Not pleased with how confusing the app was or how it continuously froze and made a simple task take half an hour. 

Also, what‚Äôs the deal with only being able to submit 3 sandwiches over phone order? Way to make a simple task 10x more difficult.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-01-02T16:31:11Z'}

title: Have to agree with reviews
review: I would love this app if it worked correctly.  I can‚Äôt order sandwiches because of issues, never know if I‚Äôm getting my points correctly.  I usually go in the store to order and it always says it can‚Äôt retrieve my points -try back again.  Also I would love to see my receipts on the app.  If you don‚Äôt do a mobile order it doesn‚Äôt show up as a previous order even if you scan your card at the store.  We eat at subway at least twice a week and if would be great if I could do an order and have a family member be able to pick it up.   Please do some upgrades that work!

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-08-16T18:36:42Z'}

title: Store says NO ONLINE ORDERS
review: Ok so I just downloaded this appü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ I made my order had a designated time for pickup and when my daughter got there they said they have NO online orders and I may have sent to wrong storeü§îü§îü§îü§î I know how to read and I know how to input an address UGH so have to waste time and gas to go back up there when I CLEARLY HAVE MY ONLINE RECEIPT where I paid for it!!! WILL BE MY LAST TIME DINING WITH SUBWAYü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ü§¨ hard enough getting an order right by calling it in or saving time from being in the line with employees that hate their jobs. So why not have an app where they can see what you want precisely and make it with minimal interaction with the public... ugh I was so wrong they are awful even reading from an order
developerResponse: {'id': 2706980, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-02-28T20:57:16Z'}

title: Much Better
review: I love this app! It‚Äôs better than the website. I just there was a way to make a ‚Äúcustom‚Äù sandwich where you start from scratch. Yes you can choose a sandwich that has the ingredients chosen for you and you can add or subtract them. I just don‚Äôt trust for that to be noticed once the store receives the online order that it will be correct. We shall see because I just had to do it because I have to oddly picky girls lol.

title: Doesn‚Äôt compute discounts
review:
I took the time to place an order based on the special buy two subs get one free. After going through all the trouble to place the order it will not show the discount no matter what I do. I even called the local subway to ask them why it‚Äôs not working they tried to do the same thing on their phone and had the same problem. Get your act together subway. Very frustrating!!!!!
They were kind enough to take my order over the phone but not as convenient as using this app which is supposed to be convenient

title: Buyer Beware
review: If you have any issues with your order, your money is just gone. The store will say you have to go through the app. The app has absolutely no option to contact customer service. Your order will not be fixed. You will not receive any missing items. You will not be refunded. And there is no way to contact anyone for help through the app. This has now happened to me twice. I won‚Äôt be using the app again and if you value your money, I recommend you don‚Äôt either, until there‚Äôs a clear way to get customer service if you don‚Äôt receive what you paid for. Subway - FIX THIS.

title: Needs Work
review: I have a couple issues with this app. First of all my biggest issue is that if there‚Äôs a problem with your order you can‚Äôt report it in the app, you have to go to the website and go through the ‚ÄúContact Us‚Äù route while switching back and forth between emails to get the information you need from your ‚Äúreceipt‚Äù. Second, the app doesn‚Äôt show everything that is available in the restaurant. If Subway isn‚Äôt going to keep the app up to date what‚Äôs the point?

title: Easy as Easy can Be
review: This was the easiest app on the market.  It‚Äôs better than every food chain app chic fil a papa johns all of them.  I am surprised how easy it was. I‚Äôm not even a big subway sandwich eater probably do subway once every couple months.  But I saw the deal so I used the app.  And it worked.  The app is soooooo easy that it will make me order more sandwiches from Subway not because of a deal but because of the ease and convenience of there app.  Great freaking job!!!!!

title: Literally no Security
review:
Someone hacked my password for this app, and ordered $40 worth of subs from across the country using my CC. No 2-factor authentication, nothing to protect my CC info, and no notice of this happening other than a ‚Äúthanks for your order‚Äù email. I contacted Subway about this and they have not responded after a week. I‚Äôm actually shocked that not only do they not have measures to prevent this from happening, but they also did absolutely nothing to address it after the fact.

This app is not secure. If you‚Äôre going to use it, don‚Äôt save your CC info, because Subway will let someone 2000 miles away steal it and enjoy dinner on you.

title: App is very glitchy
review: This app is full of bugs. Orders don't always make it through to the store. Screens pop back up after you X them out. You can't tell if a store is honoring a promotion until you check out. You can't change stores without wiping out your whole order. Sometimes things you add to the cart don't show up in it. Stores don't show when they're out of something. And the latest, we get an error message saying the order has not gone through, but it has. We have ditched Subway altogether on several occasions because the app is so poor.

title: No cohesion with stores
review:
First of all with the new update you there‚Äôs no way to go back after clicking into the basketball featured subs. If you just want to look at ingredients, the only option is to either buy or kill the app to get back to the Subway Home Screen. No swiping or back button. 

My biggest issue with the app is sometimes the stores aren‚Äôt honoring the online deals but it doesn‚Äôt tell you that until you get to the checkout screen. If you‚Äôre trying to use a deal it‚Äôd be great if the app told you store A wasn‚Äôt but store B a little further away was.

title: Not great
review:
I like Subway, but using the app twice lead to two wrong orders. First one missing veggies, second one added a sauce that wasn‚Äôt asked for. Huge issue for people with allergies!

Not being there to watch the sandwiches get made allows for employees to do what they want and not show care since most people won‚Äôt check their orders until they‚Äôre home and nothing can be done about it. The papers clearly show what a customer selected, so just follow what was ordered, don‚Äôt make it up as you go along.

I‚Äôll just go in and order from now on to make sure things are done right because there is no accountability with the app. Gwinn, MI location

title: Awesome when it works
review: The app is wonderful for saving time in line. I have trouble at times, especially when trying to order the cheese pizza (have a kid who lives their pizzas). I just want it the way it comes and it tells me I am violating the customization rules??? There are also times when the app will not pull up past orders, which, when I get the other error, makes it impossible to use. I use it a lot, especially in these times, and overall it is very useful when it works as designed.

title: Love love love
review: Absolutely love this app. It‚Äôs super easy to use. Sometimes we don‚Äôt want to use grub hub or u we because of the extra cost, but we also do not want to wait in line just p ick up what we want. One issue I did have was accidentally submitting the same order twice. We ended up paying twice for the same order, the employee at the store didn‚Äôt know how to give us back our payment. Other than that, nothing but a great experience!

title: My Love For Subway is Beyond Comprehension
review: if i were on death row my one and only final meal would be to eat as many subway sandwiches of any assortment until the time has come. subway is and always will be my one true sandwich love, not jimmy johns or jersey mikes but subway, the home of the 5 dollar foot long and the home of my one true love, bacon egg and cheese on flatbread with light mayo. nothing will ever be able to explain into words how much i love this restaurant it is my home away from home. my euphoria.

title: Don‚Äôt pre-load
review:
The sub app for a family is great because going thru the line with everyone is annoying and painful for the parents who is trying to manage the chaos.

However, I was super annoyed that every sandwich on the app is prefilled with veggies and topping that you have to delete one-by-one. It would be easier if your just selected the meat choice and then filled it from scratch like you do as you walk down the line at the store. Also, you should be able yo switch easily from 6-inch to footlong without having to completely make a new sandwich.

title: First Time User
review: The only way the Subway near me takes orders in advance is by the app only. You can‚Äôt call in they said (Military Trail in Delray Beach). So I‚Äôve avoided ordering all together until now. The app was easy to use (swipe left or right to keep items), hit the ‚Äú+‚Äù button to add things, add credit card and voila. All done. One thing that should be added is option to choose a pickup time and/or a comment about how long I should wait before picking it up.

title: CONFUSING
review: This is the 3rd time I‚Äôve ordered off this app. It premakes sandwiches for you  & you have to go click  & double check EVERYTHING before you submit.. each time I‚Äôve used it my sub is wrong. This is by far the most confusing food app I‚Äôve EVER used  & I am not pleased by it in the slightest.. there should be a create your own option that starts with bread  & goes from there.. this premade selection is awful! I‚Äôve wasted a lot of money the past few times I‚Äôve used the app. Due to the confusion  & wrong bread type, toppings, NO CHEESE!  & the list goes on. It‚Äôs very hard to understand even when rereading your order before you submit.
developerResponse: {'id': 7298373, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-02-14T14:21:14Z'}

title: Flawed
review: Lacking, frustrating, and not flexible, this app needs work. You can‚Äôt start an order from the beginning, you have to pick one and customize, and there are many things about you can‚Äôt change like type of meat on the order. When you finally select one and select ‚Äòchips‚Äô it brings up apple slices and cookies. Sorry, not what I clicked on. Also, WHY do you have to order a frikken meal in order to save it to your favorites? I wish Chipotle was closer so I could go there instead of to my nearby subway just because of how big subway is as a franchise and how much they do not care about how their apps run.
developerResponse: {'id': 6890655, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we wanted you to know that this issue should now be resolved. If you have further difficulty, please reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2019-01-17T21:41:02Z'}

title: So far so good.
review: App was easy to navigate. I added a gift card and found the Subway near me that I wanted, picked my meal and customized it. Received an email confirmation right away and my order was ready even though I showed up a little early. The only suggestion to improve my rating would be more access to nutritional info. Calories are shown while I‚Äôm customizing but I would really like to see sodium content too. Fat content wouldn‚Äôt hurt either.  Overall everything went smooth for my first order.

title: Not the full drink selection
review: It‚Äôs a little easier to order now, used to be a bit difficult compared to other ordering apps. It‚Äôs a little easier now but does not give full list of drink options kind of annoying when you don‚Äôt like Diet Coke cola or any coke cola for that matter and sprite makes you sick literally have to drink lemonade or nothing I love subways tea but can‚Äôt order it on the app we also love Dr Pepper but for some reason it‚Äôs not a option not even diet Dr Pepper.

title: This app is SO frustrating!
review: I have tried at least 4 different times over the past 6 months to order my family subway. I love how easy it to customize a sandwich although I wish a ‚Äúon half‚Äù option was added! Then everything seems to be going smoothly and the kids are super excited about getting subway but then my payment will never go through!!! It‚Äôs SUPER FRUSTRATING! I‚Äôve tried using multiple credit cards and even try going through PayPal but have never been able to successfully place an order through the app!

title: You can‚Äôt place an order
review:
The app used to work quite well. I use it quite often for lunches when I forget to bring something to work. More recently though you can‚Äôt place an order through the app itself. I‚Äôve tried multiple ways of payment and every time I get ‚ÄúDefault. Sorry Please try again‚Äù - even better it momentarily charges my payment method and refunds it so then I need to wait for my money back. 
I havent tried paying in store with it yet to see if that works. I‚Äôve just gone to other places where I CAN order online/in app, as I don‚Äôt want to waste my extra time on my break.

title: Very easy to use
review:
Love the ease with which ordering can be done. I would have given this five stars but there is no way to customize the meats on a sandwich; for example, adding turkey to a Black Forest ham sandwich or vice versa, just as we can do in the store. It wouldn't be difficult to add that mod in, as price increases for extra meat are already built in to the app. If you can do that I'll switch my rating to five stars.üíï
Otherwise, love the app, along with the ease of locating nearby stores as well as the use of discounts and coupons.

title: Fix the ordering process
review: There needs to be a order confirmation page and also a cancellation option. If you accidentally touch the place order button (which is really easy because it takes up the bottom 15% of the screen) then the order is just placed and any order errors are not caught by the user. Also having no way to cancel other than calling the restaurant doesn‚Äôt work because sometime the restaurant for some reason does not pickup their phone. The hassle created from this makes me order at other restaurants with better apps even if subway was my first choice.

title: Works 100% of the time on WiFi
review: The app works perfectly when on WiFi, but the app does consistently fail to work when using menu favorites on a data connection. Either the favorites menu loads and says no favorites are set up, or you can attempt to add the favorite to your cart only to get an error. I understand that a bad data connection can be difficult to work through, but when I have 4 bars of LTE I would think the app should work fine, especially if I can stream videos and music with this same connection.

title: Crashes on Launch
review:
Crashes on launch every time.  Use to us this app all the time to order and pay for samies.  It was extremely convenient.  Not usable now however.  I have the latest app update and I‚Äôm using iOS 11.3, the latest update, on an iPhone 7.

Update on Cinco de Mayo:
Deleted and reinstalled.  Seems to be working now.  Will update again once I‚Äôve ordered a few times.  Of note, developer followed up on my review and provided phone and email to contact for help.  That alone speaks very highly of app.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-05-05T21:48:55Z'}

title: Add pickup time please
review: I tried to place an order early and didn‚Äôt wanna pick it up until afternoon, there is no place to change time while placing your order that I could see. Is there a way to add where a customer must choose pick up or delivery time, and not just default to next available time. It would also be helpful if you could make the time changeable at the check out to, in case we miss it during the order. I didn‚Äôt joy the ease of building the sandwich though, being able to add and remove items with simple

title: Big disappointment
review:
Went into one of your locations tonight, greeted like always. Ordered 1 foot long steak and cheese, 1 foot long subway club, and 2 foot long roast beef. I was told they were out of steak. I then said then make it 2 foot long subway club. Your employee than told me the club has been changed, no longer has roast beef in the sand which it now has bacon instead. I told him I would pay extra for the roast beef, I can‚Äôt eat bacon. He then told me he can‚Äôt make the roast beef sandwich, ‚Äúwe discontinued roast beef‚Äù. Asked if he was joking, he assured me he was not. Too bad the restaurant is so close to my home. Had to drive 5 miles to get to Jersey Mikes. So much for a long relationship with your locations.
Sorry: Jim Blakley

title: Garbage App, I‚Äôm Hungry Now!
review: Same as some other users. I ordered 2 subs at 2:55pm from the Mill St. location in Belle Fourche, SD, the order goes through and it says ready to pick up at 6:45pm! I patiently waited an hour before calling the store to see if I could come earlier, but they don‚Äôt see the order in their system still. I can‚Äôt cancel the order from the app, as it states I need to call the store. They can‚Äôt cancel something they can‚Äôt see, and I‚Äôve already been charged for it. Now I have to continue to wait and hope they get it!? The staff won‚Äôt (can‚Äôt) do anything to fix the issue because there isn‚Äôt a manager on duty. I‚Äôm starving and I can‚Äôt afford to just scrap this and eat elsewhere.

title: Disappointed with promos
review:
Their BOGO promo was a bust for me.  The app said the discounted price would appear, and it didn‚Äôt.  The local store said they are participating in the promo and had no way of overriding any prices charged via app and told me to call the corporate store.  

Called corporate, they said nothing they can do and that the store had to participate in the offer.  Unreal.  Maybe someday the left hand will speak to the right hand.  

Since they aren‚Äôt able to do anything to right their wrong (apparently adding whatever points needed for a sub was too much to ask), I realized that I could do something, so deleted the app and will dine elsewhere.  Customer service failure = lost customer.  Great job Subway!

title: Terrible and unreliable
review: This app is absolutely terrible to use. Every time I try to use it, it acts wonky. Today, it told me that at checkout there was an error and to empty my cart. It told me that my order didn‚Äôt go through. So, I stopped at a different location and got a sandwich (the 2nd was closer to where I was where as the one I ordered from was closer to work). They had some issues with the computer in the store so I looked at my bank account to see there was a charge for the order I placed through the app. Then, my email had a confirmation pop up - 15 minutes later after I was told that it didn‚Äôt go through. FIX the app! Now I have 2 sandwiches because of this.
developerResponse: {'id': 12777134, 'body': "Hi, there. We are sorry to hear that this has been your experience. You can contact our support team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu or at (833)-778-2929. If you can, have your app version, device type, and steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-07T18:09:24Z'}

title: No Order Support
review: The app is well made and convenient to use; however, there is no continuity in customer support received from the individual store.  If there is a problem with the order (i.e. the store has run out of the ordered product or the order is not made correctly) there is no recourse for the store to issue a refund.  On multiple occasions, I have shown up at the store for my order only to be told it wasn‚Äôt made because they ran out of the item I requested.  Since the store cannot cancel the order and issue a refund, I must be satisfied with a alternative selection.  Additionally, if there is a problem with the order, there is no support provided through the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 3478209, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-05-15T20:34:16Z'}

title: Horrible Update! Unusable
review:
I've been using the old Subway app for 2 years, and this update completely broke the online ordering system. It deleted all of my stored menu items. You can't even add double meat. Horrible UI. Uninstalling and never getting Subway again. Nice work, dummies.

UPDATE: Just tried to use the app again and still doesn‚Äôt work. Apple please pull this from the App Store. It is unusable. And BTW, Subway, I haven‚Äôt been back to any of your locations since this horrible update. I used to go 2-3X per week. This update has literally cost you thousands of dollars from me. Likely 10‚Äôs of millions across the country. Nice work Engineering and Product Dev Team. Way to know your customer.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-10-27T13:37:34Z'}

title: App Error on Reorder Function
review:
I just picked up my food, got all the way home and opened my sandwich to find it was completely different from the app order I chose.

I ordered by using the reorder option in my purchase history. I checked the sandwhich I was ordering to make sure it was the same one I wanted. However, when I checked the app to see if it was a restaurant error or app I saw that the app had the same incorrect ingredients as my sandwhich. Most of the ingredients are things I do not eat. Despite removing them, the sandwich retained the flavors.

I do not have the time nor the gas money/funds to waste in ordering the sandwich I want and returning to the store. 

In addition, I cannot find how to remove items from my favorites list, and the only way I have seen to add an item to my favorites is immediately after ordering the item.

The only good thing I have to say about the app is that the store gets the order and completes it in a reasonable amount of time.

title: This app steals from you
review: This is the worst app. Twice now I have tried to add a gift card to my account on the app and when I try to transfer one gift card balance to another, it removes both gift cards from the app. I have tried contacting customer service multiple times (no phone number to call so you have to email) and I have received nothing back other than the automated reply. So now I‚Äôm out a good amount of money and no food to show for it. If you use this app, just be forewarned that if you try adding a gift card to it you are taking a chance of losing that money and Subway not giving a crap.

title: Great app, one major flaw
review: Convenient app. I like that I can complete my purchase completely through. Design of the shopping cart is atrocious. Complete order button floats on the bottom so it‚Äôs easy to accidentally click. There is no verification message which would be fine if there was a way to cancel through the app. This is an easy fix please fix it. Otherwise 5 stars.

title: Not Worth the Download! App Hacked!
review: Only used the app once and someone from Florida was able to go in and use the app to order over $30 worth of food. I‚Äôm not even in Florida! Customer Service is nonexistent and it‚Äôs impossible to contact the company to dispute the order. There‚Äôs no way to cancel an order once it‚Äôs placed and the phone numbers to the stores are useless. I tried the phone number for this specific place and it wasn‚Äôt even a working number! I had to call my bank to dispute the charge and have to call around to figure out how to prevent this from continuing to happen. Not worth the download!

title: Another 0 stars if possible
review: 2 days to get an order thru & wound up trying catering as it was a big order.  Technically talked you off subway & have to register again. Hour before order was to be delivered the next day the cancelled the order. Customer service also technically also not subway was useless.  Wound up calling the nearby subway directly (so no rewards either) & they went way beyond at this small location &  had order ready in just over an hour.  I also don‚Äôt like you can‚Äôt leave a review in the app.  Waste of time & came close to ruining a special day with a bunch of people & no food

title: Better, but still needs custom orders
review:
It‚Äôs nice to be able to customize a sandwich that exists already, but there‚Äôs no option to make a sandwich from scratch like you‚Äôre in the store. It doesn‚Äôt feel the same as ordering at Subway.

Also the loading icon is very jarring when it pops up after every menu, as well as the animation restarts randomly during it. If it didn‚Äôt turn the screen completely white after every option that would be nice. Love your sandwiches, thank you

title: Awful update that is stealing money!!!
review: I ordered on the app and it kept saying error over and over but then it charged my card THREE times!! Not only that but then the store advised they can‚Äôt do anything about it and that this is very common so I‚Äôm currently out $30 in subs I did not receive as I only got and wanted one order. You can call their customer service, they‚Äôve conveniently converted to online only so I‚Äôm more than likely going to have to take this up with my credit card as I doubt I‚Äôll be seeing a prompt response. What a nightmare of an app and I won‚Äôt be using it again after this poor experience. Beware!!!

title: What did you do to the app?
review: I used to use this app frequently and it worked great.  I could easily order what I wanted, specify curbside pickup, everything so easy.  This latest update is Pooh-Pooh!  The ordering was chaotic and I ended up with a mostly correct order, but not completely!  It advertised curbside pickup, but there was no place to specify that and no way to get it after I got to the restaurant.  I had to go inside to get my order.  (It was ready and was what I actually ordered, although not exactly what I wanted.  The people at the restaurant were very nice.  This app is not their fault.)  Not happy!

title: Small Town offers GOOD SERVICE!
review:
I‚Äôve lived here for over a year, moving from the city.
Customer service is fantastic at Subway, ElDorado Springs, MO. When it comes to employment, employees don‚Äôt see customers as business in the city, and the loss of a customer often doesn‚Äôt matter to younger employees.  One reason is job hopping where a restaurant is always hiring. 
I grew up in a small town, and still believe the values of rural communities makes a difference in the work ethics of younger employees.

title: Couldn‚Äôt add a credit card and no Apple Pay
review: Setting up an account in the app and couldn‚Äôt add a payment method. There are inputs to add a credit card etc... but when I filled in the initial screen with name and cc# the ‚ÄúNext‚Äù button remained grayed out. Could not advance. Required a visit to the Subway website to add a payment method to the account. Also, why TF is there no option to pay with Apple Pay?! I can in store but not in app. Makes zero sense. Subway needs to hire more competent developers. No wonder you guys are losing business! More hoops you make users jump through just means we‚Äôll turn to those businesses that are competent and offer the more flexible payment options.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-09-25T18:32:45Z'}

title: App doesn‚Äôt work.
review: I just updated the app again and I get to accept the new terms and conditions and it redirects to change the password. But before this update I would try to open the app and it would quit and disappear every time I opened it. The app is not convenient and don‚Äôt get me started on trying to call the store to get an order in. There could be no one in the store and they don‚Äôt answer. So get the app to work properly please.
developerResponse: {'id': 3654750, 'body': 'We appreciate your patience while we investigated the concerns you shared with us. We identified the concerns that you brought to our attention, and our support team has indicated that the concern you identified should be resolved. Please uninstall and reinstall the Subway¬Æ App from your device, and the concern that you mentioned should be corrected. If you could follow up to let us know that this has been resolved, we would truly appreciate it. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-05-30T14:03:39Z'}

title: It‚Äôs like any other APP
review: It‚Äôs like any other APP...  Boring hard to figure it out but it works after u do figure it out & the pass codes are goofy but they eventually save u a couple of dollars! I did like the graphics for the sandwiches in taking & putting on ingredients so that‚Äôs a big win!! I guess it pays to stay healthy!  I didn‚Äôt hate the apps like I hate most so what the heck it‚Äôs ok so it‚Äôs either fail or home run! So it wins!

title: Notifications settings?
review:
There doesn‚Äôt appear to be any notifications settings in the app. I had to turn off all app notifications to get away from the marketing popping up on my phone.
Is this just an oversight or is it an intentional way to make it harder to avoid unsolicited marketing? 
In any case, I‚Äôd like to have notifications for my orders but I can‚Äôt without also having incessant marketing push notifications so I just have to constantly check the app when I make an order.

title: It shouldn‚Äôt be this hard to use‚Ä¶
review: I constantly have problems with this app.  For one thing it seems really slow compared to others I have used.  Second it‚Äôs really confusing trying to set up favorite items.  Just now I was trying to save some favorites after ordering and it told me I had reached the max number of favorites and to delete some.  I went back in through my account to favorites but there is no option to delete‚Ä¶the only option is add to bag‚Ä¶you‚Äôd think a franchise this big could make thing a little smoother‚Ä¶

title: Annoying
review: Ok I‚Äôm just getting into the Mobile app for fast food craze and this is one of the most annoying apps I‚Äôve come across for this purpose. It makes you become a member to order things and then when you put your credentials in if you‚Äôre already a member it tells you that there‚Äôs an error. So you can‚Äôt order as a guest you can‚Äôt order with an account and it‚Äôs 8:00 so they‚Äôre open. It also gives you a number to call but really? I‚Äôm sure they‚Äôre not open and who wants to go through all that for a quick sub.  It‚Äôs just an annoying situation. I‚Äôm just going somewhere else at this point.

title: Constantly missing parts of my order
review:
The app itself is easy enough to use. Though it does not teach the user how to add/remove parts of the sandwich, I figured it out by swiping randomly.
My biggest issue is that all three times I have used this app so far, they only give me my sandwich, and never the chips or cookies. So I‚Äôm guessing the app doesn‚Äôt tell the stores if you order anything besides the sub. I checked the first two times and they just gave me the stuff. But forgot this last time on my rush to get to work on time. Super disappointing to find that I was missing half my order, and that wasn‚Äôt a cheap mistake.

title: Subway app is almost great
review: I like the convenience of saving favorites and tracking points for rewards a lot. I also like the incentives offered without the hassle you would normally have to go through at the actual store. Subway has done a great job with covid-19 restrictions and contactless interactions as well. The only caveat here is that the delays in toggling between the favorites and the order menu is a bit annoying and I think with a few software tweaks this could be a thing of the past.

title: Use this app and hope for the best
review:
So ordering via the Subway app basically takes the quality control step out of the process. We‚Äôve used the app 3 times and all 3 times resulted in a sub par or just gross version of what we were expecting. 
This is different for fast food apps like McDonalds because their menu and processes are set in stone and not open to interpretation. 
When you are in an actual Subway restaurant you can say ‚Äúhold the clearly expired lettuce‚Äù or ‚Äúplease don‚Äôt dump a gallon of mayo on my sub‚Äù. Only realizing these mistakes after you drive home makes the situation worse. 
I recommend you only use this app if you have confidence in your local Subway. 
I clearly don‚Äôt.

title: No good
review: The first time I use this app it worked well ever since then it either has taken my money out and not giving the order to the store or has took my money out and I cannot get a hold of no one to get a refund I have tried uninstalling it and reinstalling it still the same thing I ordered at 12:30 today on July 15 said it was unable to locate the store I called the store to make sure they did not get no order there is no order to be found and it was money took it out of my bank account would eitherOr get the food it‚Äôs very close to work or I can walk to it to get it and if it works like the first time willing to try it multiple times

title: Liars and crappy design
review: All day today there were TV commercials saying if you ordered via the App you buy 1 foot long and get one free. Even the App has a banner saying this. Just add 2 foot longs to the your cart to get the discount it said. Well first of all whoever made the App has never ordered more than one sub. After you add the first one to your bag you can‚Äôt get back to the menu without touch the ‚Äúback‚Äù arrow several times. Crappy design. Then when I finally did get the second sub in the bag, no discount. Maybe I need to complete the order I thought, so I did. Nope. I was charged for both and the local store won‚Äôt do anything about it. I used to eat Subway once a week. No more.

title: Not all it‚Äôs cracked up to be
review: I got it to try out and got a coupon for a buy one get one sandwich free.  Ordered my 2 sandwiches, went to pay and it said I had to pay for both sandwiches.   Alright, I thought, save the coupon for later.  Entered in my CC info and checked out. Magically I went from 2 sandwiches to 3 sandwiches and repeat order on the the sandwiches and charged me.  No I went from wanting 2 sandwiches and paying for 1 to wanting 2 sandwiches, getting and paying for 3.  When the confirmation page prior to me checking out only had 2 sandwiches and the price for 2 on there.  Unimpressed.  Works like I thought it would.  Now I guess we will see how well the meal was prepared.

title: No Order - No Reply - No Refund
review: I‚Äôve used this app a few times now and all was great until the my last order. I went to the store to pick it up and all they could say was they didn‚Äôt get it. I showed them my confirmation with the right store, date & time of pick up. I was on a tight schedule and couldn‚Äôt wait for them to make the sandwiches or I‚Äôd risk being late for work. I‚Äôve been writing customer service for 2 days now trying to get my refund. No reply and no refund. I‚Äôm pretty disappointed in the non existent customer service if you have a problem. Looks like I‚Äôm going to have to file a claim with my credit card company to get my money back.
developerResponse: {'id': 4255810, 'body': 'We are sorry this happened - please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-07-16T13:54:23Z'}

title: Impressive app.
review:
The customization system is pretty great, allowing you to decide every little detail about your sandwich or just skip the hassle and get something premade if you‚Äôre in a rush. It runs smoothly, which is a surprise for a restaurant app as they tend to crash and be pretty buggy. Never had an issue, and can confidently say the app goes above and beyond just being ‚Äúserviceable‚Äù. 

Five stars.

title: Customization is Spotty
review: You cannot get exactly what you want, like in the brick and mortar. If I want a salami and bacon sandwich, I can‚Äôt get it. I can order a BLT with extra meat, but it won‚Äôt allow me to choose anything other than bacon. When I type in a request to sub salami for bacon as the extra meat, the store calls to say it will disrupt their inventory. This is just one example. The other flaw is the ability to continue ordering additional sandwiches. Sometimes you just have to place one single order at a time instead of placing an order for 6 sandwiches at once.

title: Delivery does NOT work
review: I‚Äôve tried ordering and having a sub delivered to my job multiple times now and each time I get an error message just clicking on my bag. What is the point of offering delivery if your app is so broken it doesn‚Äôt even allow you to select that as an option? I‚Äôm only giving 2 stars cause the one time I was able to order, I had to do curbside and everything went smooth. Otherwise, just doordash it or go into the store personally cause this app is a joke if you can‚Äôt physically get to the store to pick up/order

title: Can‚Äôt select delivery restaurant‚Ä¶
review: The app doesn‚Äôt allow you to pick a specific restaurant when using delivery. As a result, it automatically picks a restaurant for you. But you don‚Äôt know which restaurant has been picked until after you‚Äôve placed your order. And for some it picks the worst possible location to deliver from. For me, that‚Äôs a super busy location inside a crowded mall instead of a location a quarter mile away that is rarely busy and is located inside a strip mall. Because of this my order takes an hour longer to get delivered than it should‚Ä¶.

title: Not a fan‚Ä¶
review:
More often than not, I have issues with the app. It‚Äôll ask me my location then somehow change it before ordering so my order goes to the wrong place.
No place in the app to check in? Fortunately, I checked my email and saw a link there. But then I wasn‚Äôt allowed to check in because it wasn‚Äôt 5 min within my time frame. So then I sit there waiting for that window to check in. And I get an alert saying my order is ready when it‚Äôs not. Much quicker to go inside, watch your sandwich be made and not have to wait around.

title: Love it but could be better
review: I love this app and use it a few times a week.  I think it would be improved if I could save my favorite few locations.  I cycle between a few depending on where I work on any given day.  I don‚Äôt like using the map to search by city and then scrolling thru dozens of locations. I would prefer to save favorite locations or at least to search by street address instead of city. Thanks!

title: Good but can be better
review: The app seems to glitch quite a bit my favorites don‚Äôt have here and it tells me certain sandwiches are not available but if I reset the app everything becomes available. Other than that I love being able to place my order through the app and go to my local store and pick up. And now that they‚Äôve added salt and pepper to the options that makes everything much better!

title: Worse Over The Years
review: This app has become worse over the years I‚Äôve used it. Previously, the interface was very simple and convenient to use. Now it‚Äôs become ‚Äúfancy looking,‚Äù but much slower and less responsive. Also, there are several items at my local subway store that I can order that are just not available on this app. For example, veggie patties are unavailable on the app, and so is Sriracha sauce. Because of this I‚Äôve started using the phone to call in my orders, instead of using this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 682641, 'body': 'Hi- we are sorry to hear that your experience has been less than excellent. Would you mind reaching out to us at appfeedback@subway.com so we can take a closer look at this for you? Thank You!', 'modified': '2021-03-24T22:31:00Z'}

title: Good start.
review: For the most generic orders this app will work fine. I have not been able to select salt, under the seasoning section, also I can‚Äôt select Coke products under the fountain pop, or the bottled pop sections, and not all varieties of chips are available to be selected. I have tried specifically asking for the substitutions in the instructions part of the order. This can only work if the one preparing the order actually reads the instructions. So far this has not worked. Please update the app.

title: Ordering with this app is very confusing, when it works!
review: This app used to be easy. However today, I tried to order the 6 inch $5.99 special and could never get in the app. I tried changing the password and it would not let me in! It continued to send me back to the sign in page! Then I tried to starts new account and same thing happened. Can somebody help!

title: Can‚Äôt redeem rewards, employees clueless
review: I‚Äôve accumulated like $10+ in rewards that I can‚Äôt use because either the scanner ‚Äòisn‚Äôt working‚Äô at every subway, the employees don‚Äôt know how to use it, or it just plain doesn‚Äôt apply at checkout. I‚Äôve tried submitting orders via the app and there‚Äôs always some form of error that prevents it from reaching completion (usually some notice saying a payment is already being processed, even though it hasn‚Äôt... then the order just never goes through). I‚Äôve had rewards disappear after trying to use them but without receiving the actual discount. Very annoyed.
developerResponse: {'id': 5228516, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-09-25T16:44:54Z'}

title: Forced account & login?  Still?
review:
Even after my review for a previous version, a developer response and 3+ months, the architecture of this app is still mind boggling.  Why alienate customers who don‚Äôt want to open an account with you?  If I like the app and later choose to open an account and place an order via the app, that‚Äôs fine.  But for the casual user simply wanting to find a nearby location or see what they currently have on their menu...this app is worthless in its current form/version.

IF there is a way to bypass the login and I overlooked it, make it clearer and more accessible.

As it currently stands, I downloaded this app and will be deleting it within a 10min period.
developerResponse: {'id': 1750732, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we will definitely look into this issue. Feel free out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2017-12-23T04:26:03Z'}

title: Do not get it.
review: Honestly, when I got this app I should‚Äôve read the reviews‚Ä¶ to start off when ordering I had everything in my cart but when I hit purchase to checkout, the app glitched and said that there was an error but my card was charged. Soon I got a notification that DoorDash was getting my order but the order details were off, instead of saying 7 items, it said the order was only 1 item! I am disappointed by this, not only that but eventually, my order was cancelled or modified by subway so I never got my order. I am not satisfied at all and overall, there‚Äôs so many bugs‚Ä¶

title: Garbage app scammed me
review: The other day I made a order using this app for 2 pizza subs, after my order was placed the store called me and said they no longer offer the pizza sub so they cancelled my order, subways then charged me TWICE then refunded me once so I‚Äôm out of my money and never got anything. I tried contacting subways and only get computer automated responses‚Ä¶..after looking around the internet I see many people have similar issues when subways app charged them multiple times and some saying the store never even got their order after the customers card is charged. Honestly never using this app again

title: Poor app design causes user frustration.
review:
Here are two reasons I dislike this app. 

1) I used a gift card and now have 2 dollars remaining. The only option is to pay the entire amount by Apple Pay or add money to the gift card. There is no option to pay first by gift card and then by Apple Pay. The result is an unused gift card balance which profits Subway while ripping off the consumer.

2) I accidentally selected carside pickup. I tried to change it but there is no option to toggle in-store pickup after the feature is selected. When I arrived, the one carside space was filled up so I parked and walked inside. I waited in line then asked for my order. The person said it was for carside pickup and told me to go back to my car and call the store. I showed the receipt and eventually they gave me the order. 

There are many other reasons to dislike this app. I only had space for two‚Ä¶.

title: You used to have an easy app
review: I have started to order and ended up frustrated multiple times since you ‚Äúimproved‚Äù your app. We‚Äôve ended up 3 different times in the last two months going elsewhere after getting frustrated. It‚Äôs fine to use until you try to add a coupon on special. Then it won‚Äôt subtract the money or only partly does.

title: LET ME ADD RANCH
review:
I like this app because it‚Äôs convenient. 

However it once was an amazing app before it got updated a little while ago. Now you don‚Äôt even get an option to put RANCH on a Chicken Bacon ***RANCH*** sub, you don‚Äôt get to choose between fruit punch or cool blue you‚Äôre just stuck with cool blue if you want Gatorade, and the app doesn‚Äôt really like to load in. Took me 20 mins to place an order which should have only taken 1‚Ä¶ 

*Yes both Ranch and Fruit Punch Gatorade is available at the store I go to. It‚Äôs just the app that doesn‚Äôt offer it*

title: Sooooo easy & Great rewards!
review: I have saved everyone in my family's favorite sandwich and so on nights when dinner is rushed I can have it in 15 minutes with just a few taps!Plus, the app notifies me when I've got rewards waiting and when they are about to expire. I don't think I've ever paid full price for my order because their reward system is so great. Highly recommend!

title: No subway found in area
review:
I have used this app before to order in my town. I wanted to do an order and signed in, they could not find the subway I use all the time. Which is weird because I‚Äôve ordered from here a lot. 
Drove down to order from them before I went in I checked again, I‚Äôm literally standing right in front of it and it says i have no subway in my search area. And yes, my location services are on for this app, I checked. 
So this app is useless for me. Pretty annoying since I have big orders and usually like to order at least 2 hours ahead. Now I have a huge line build behind me. Awesome.

title: Broken App
review: iPhone 11 and iPad 3rd gen both confirm you can‚Äôt see the ingredients, so as long as you enjoy tapping a blank screen 9k times because the ingredients *are* there, you just can‚Äôt see them (yay!), so the trial/error portion of working around a multi-billion dollar corps fantastically and pre-amateurishly broken app that apparently didn‚Äôt go through even 4 whole minutes of QA (neither did Apple, for that matter, like 2 peas in an iPod) may very well be the highlight of your day...if your day consisted of licking hobo‚Äôs armpits while listening to corpse-Limbaugh fart from the beyond the grave for 23 hours. Good lord, Subway, immensely stupid and entirely unforced error.

title: Frustrated Subway app user
review: For about two weeks or so the subway app for 810 Dakota Ave South Huron SDlocatiob the apps says they are closed and you can‚Äôt order. They are open they tell me they don‚Äôt know what is wrong with app. I usually order a lot but haven‚Äôt been able to. The drive thru line is always so slow and long that it drives me insane. Please someone get it fixed. You are losing business.

title: Works great.....but
review: I had a problem when ordering on app and through website. On my iphone iOS 13.5.1 when selecting chicken bacon ranch melt, it doesn‚Äôt give an option to make it a footlong. So I called the store and talked to the manager. She was very helpful and said to order a sub at the same price and put what I wanted in special instruction section. That worked except when they don‚Äôt pay attention it and make it wrong anyways.

title: Super Inconvenient Ordering System
review: This app definitely works for ordering Subway online, but they don‚Äôt make it easy. Instead of having a simple checklist so you can select your numerous toppings, they decided to try to make things pretty instead of user-friendly. Now that I‚Äôve used the app a couple times I understand how to remove, change and add toppings, but it was almost impossible at first. It should be simple to put in an online order, so many other restaurant apps do it just fine. This one is just not usable enough.

title: My favorite restaurant
review: This is my favorite restaurant because it offers such a healthy choice of menu. I am a vegetarian and I dislike eating greasy, deep fried foods all the time and this place is one of the best alternatives. I plan on eating here a lot of more often and using my subway in-app rewards card because the customer service and food is always perfect. I would recommend to friends and family to visit subway as a healthier alternative to fast food.

title: Nothing works in the app!
review: Coupons don‚Äôt apply, phone numbers for stores are outdated/wrong, can‚Äôt adjust meat selections in orders. This is absolutely horrible!!! In this day with Covid and people trying to be in public less, Subway stores are terribly small and we order ahead everywhere to make this easier. Nothing was easy with this App! We do this a lot and this is by far the worst app I‚Äôve ever seen. Don‚Äôt use it unless you‚Äôre not going to use the coupons, and plan to order items exactly as presented. You can‚Äôt even chose the upgrade drink size option from the menu, a pretty basic standard Subway request. Seriously, the worst food app I‚Äôve used.

title: Worst Food App on AppStore
review:
Love Subway food and price. Hate Subway employees. Whether they‚Äôre preparing the food or making an app they make sure they‚Äôre the worst in the business. Employees are either teenagers with bad attitudes or older folk who failed in life and got stuck at a shop for teenagers to work.

If you want to do anything on the app, be prepared to wait. There‚Äôs a loading screen for every press you make. With lots of hidden hyperlinks to open browsers. All the while demanding mass amounts of data.

To SUBWAY: Make an app for ordering sandwiches. Not a test program to try out menus for your new mobile game. App sure does look nice but what‚Äôs the point if it doesn‚Äôt work. Keep it simple stupid...

title: App stopped working after 10.0.0 update
review: The Subway app worked great until this past week with the latest 10.0.0 update.(I think that is the version.)Now it tries to load, but I just keep getting a spinning Subway logo, but it won‚Äôt load. Yes, I tried turning my phone off an on. üòâ I also I deleted the Subway app and re-downloaded it. I went to our local Subway and they said some other customers had the same trouble, but not everyone.  I hope they fix this soon because we have purchased approximately 7 subs this week that we haven‚Äôt gotten counted towards our reward points. üò¢
developerResponse: {'id': 8761637, 'body': 'Thanks for reaching out to us! We heard your feedback loud and clear, and we now have a fix for the pesky issue you described. Please update to the latest version, and feel free to call us at (833)-778-2929 if you are still experiencing any issues. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-05-20T15:21:44Z'}

title: Good app, poor service
review: I‚Äôd rate the app higher, as it works great, however the staff can‚Äôt seem to make the food the way you order it. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs a flaw in the app, or with the staff, but each time I place an order my food is not prepared as it was ordered. Today I ordered a toasted roast beef sub, deluxe, toasted, with a note to toast it longer than usual. The sub I received was not toasted at all, nor was there extra roast beef. It seems as though it would be simple to make an order as the app shows it to be, but apparently it‚Äôs far more difficult than it should be.

title: Dump the app and order in person
review:
Using the app to order is hit and miss.   About half of the orders I have placed have been fine.   Other times I have ordered and when I pick up my sandwich, there is only meat and cheese on bread.   That‚Äôs it.   When I have questioned this, the employee at Subway tells me that sometimes if you order via the app, the veggies/toppings don‚Äôt make it through to the order sheet they use to create your sandwich.   Not good.
Now more times than not when attempting to use the app, I just get a message saying ‚Äúan error occurred, please try again‚Äù.   
App used to work fine.   Apparently there was a bad update at some point that really made it go downhill.
developerResponse: {'id': 4331042, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-07-20T16:46:46Z'}

title: This store is awesome!  I love subway üòä‚ù§Ô∏è
review: The southern highlands subway in Henderson Nevada has amazing employees they were so kind and caring that they helped me figure out how to use my e-gift card and found me a discount I could use so that I didn‚Äôt have to pay more then what was on my card! Plus all their food looked and tasted fresh and their store was very clean and organized!! I definitely recommend eating hereüíú‚ù§Ô∏è

title: App could do a LOT better
review: There‚Äôs no way to change the size of the drink in a combo, there‚Äôs no way to select Dr Pepper (for example) as the drink even though it‚Äôs available at the store, selecting ‚Äúsides‚Äù cycles through 3 screens for every item instead of being able to just click several things to add all at once, the app is too ‚Äúdumb‚Äù to recognize that separately adding chips and a drink to a sandwich order should turn it into a ‚Äúcombo‚Äù (although maybe that‚Äôs by design in order to charge people more, if you‚Äôre a conspiracy theorist), and no way to add a tip.

title: Keep rewarding you
review: They reward you and you can keep using it for more subway. I love ordering ahead, you skip the line and go straight to the register and let them know you have a mobile order. You also set the time you want to pick your order, so if you‚Äôre at work but can‚Äôt pick it up right away you can order to pick up later. It‚Äôs a convenient app and I love the deals. Saves money and time.

title: Done with this app
review: I‚Äôve had to dispute two charges now because this app failed. My card was charged for ordering when I received error messages that the restaurant could not accept my order. I had to go in person, so I paid three times. Called my credit card company to dispute the extra charges. I now need to dispute a new charge because the Subway I ordered from was out of meatballs, and the app has no way of detecting supply of ingredients at a restaurant. The Subway location has no way of clearing out the order or amending the charge, so I have to call my credit card company again. That‚Äôs unacceptable.

title: BROKEN app, always having issues
review:
This app will glitch out on you, and this chain does not take any responsibility when it costs YOU, the customer. Finally uninstalled after having numerous issues in app (constant error codes/orders not going through but still being charged/etc.) that the company refused to fix and blamed ME for. There‚Äôs rarely a deal going on that makes these overpriced sandwiches worth it. Might as well just go in store because this app is NOT worth the hassle and inevitable lost money. 
Not to mention finding any sort of way to contact customer service is nearly impossible.

title: Notice
review: This is a third party app as I have been informed. I ordered with the app and the restaurant called to let me know they could not fulfill the order because they were out of items needed. Since this is a third party system they could not cancel my order or refund the charge. So I was charged for food I did not receive. The app only directs you to call the restaurant the restaurant directs me to use the app. I called the corporate number and was greeted with an automated voice letting me know it was a fully digital system so there is no person to talk to it directs you to the website. I filed a complaint but have not got a response.

title: Missing a ‚ÄúBuild Your Own‚Äù Option
review: The app is fine in theory, but I think it‚Äôs a bit ridiculous that there isn‚Äôt a ‚Äúbuild your own‚Äù option, where from start to finish you pick what you want on your sandwich just as you do in-store. According to the app, the sandwich that I usually get is only offered as a wrap, and I can‚Äôt change the wrap into a type of bread, which defeats the purpose of mobile ordering and contactless pick up for me. I‚Äôm forced to go into the location to get what I want.

title: Good app but needs offer locations
review: I love being able to customize my order online and find nearby locations. What I DON‚ÄôT like is that one has to pick out customizations then wait until the very end to find out if a certain restaurant is participating in an offer. Come on, this is 2020! Isn‚Äôt there a way to list participating restaurants? Sometimes I‚Äôve had to build up order 3-4 times before finding a Subway that accepts offers. That‚Äôs my only problem with app.

title: Easy to use, decent rewards.
review: The app is easy to navigate, intuitive to order, and keeps all payment info on file for future orders. Building sandwiches exactly the way you want is just as easy as pointing in the store. The rewards you earn are not amazing, but better than nothing. As of the time of this review, you gotta rack up 200 points just to earn a $2.00-off coupon. Subway should step up the rewards incentives to drive customers back in more frequently.

title: Issue canceling order
review: I had an issue canceling an order to alternate location in oakland that I bought a sandwich the day before. I tried to order a sandwich locally from San Francisco but I accidentally placed the order for the location across the bay in oakland. In the app it says to cancel the order please call the store, when I tried calling the oakland store to cancel my order, the phone number didn‚Äôt work and I was charged for the sandwich I never received. Be careful to setup the order correctly, you might be paying for a sandwich you never receive and subway has yet to refund me, unless fixed, it is likely you will not receive your money back either.
developerResponse: {'id': 10977539, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-09-30T13:59:48Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt customize!!!
review: I was so excited about this app, and I do love the rewards. I get two dollars off for every 200 points I collect. The reason that I cannot give it five stars is that it won‚Äôt let me order the sub that I always get. I cannot find any way to make it on the app, therefore I can‚Äôt place an order on the app and I can‚Äôt save my sandwich as a favorite. If there is a way to completely build a sandwich from scratch, then I could do what I need to do. If that is a possibility, let me know how! If you fix that option I‚Äôll give you five stars!
developerResponse: {'id': 10555391, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-09-06T14:05:48Z'}

title: My orders as of recently.
review:
Recently my orders haven‚Äôt been going through on my iPhone 7. Because of expired rewards and I understand the expired rewards but it won‚Äôt let me finish my orders because of the expired rewards and I did exactly as it told me to get rid of the expired rewards. But nothing happens. Also I would like to mention I normally do really enjoy this amazing app. But this has become annoying. 

Could someone kindly help me with this?
developerResponse: {'id': 8176022, 'body': "Hi there, please contact our support team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-04-11T17:34:20Z'}

title: Good App
review: The app works good & is easy to navigate. The only issue I see is that all the menu items available @ the store I order from are not listed on the app (soup, hashbrowns). It‚Äôs not enough of an inconvenience for me to deduct a star though! I‚Äôve used it for over a year now, never had any problems.  I use the app @ work & it saves me so much time not having to wait in line! I love it!! I also like that I can pay through my PayPal account.

title: Good app but needs to warn about duplicate orders
review: Good app. It has a very good graphical user interface. The only two problems I‚Äôve had with it is that it seems to allow you to orders special order items that might not be there at your local subway. The other is that if you accidentally duplicate your order it doesn‚Äôt warn you about submitting the same order twice. Also you should have a way to pull favorites out of recent orders and to modify the names of the favorite item.

title: App not working after update
review: The subway app updated and when I opened the app it told me I had to log out to accept the new privacy policy and terms, I did and now I can‚Äôt get logged back in. I log in and it takes me to the screen where I have hit continue to accept the new terms and when I do it takes me to a subway headquarters screen saying forgot password create a new one so I did twice in fact and it still won‚Äôt log me in, it keeps taking me to that same screen saying I have to create a new password. App worked fine before the update now I can‚Äôt even get logged in at all! So I am giving only one star because the app is useless to me now!
developerResponse: {'id': 3642147, 'body': 'Developer Response (Pending) - May 29, 2018 It may take up to 24 hours for this response to appear on the App Store.\nWe appreciate your patience while we investigated the concerns you shared with us. We identified the concerns that you brought to our attention, and our support team has indicated that the concern you identified should be resolved. Please uninstall and reinstall the Subway¬Æ App from your device, and the concern that you mentioned should be corrected. If you could follow up to let us know that this has been resolved, we would truly appreciate it. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-05-29T17:55:14Z'}

title: Update the app!
review:
UPDATE: Reinstalled the app, and it now works! Changing my rating to 4 stars.

I will admit, I gave it a 2 star rating because of the major annoyance, but maybe that was a bit too harsh. I did eventually get it working. And it still works now. That be said, here are some pros!

The app gets it right with ordering sandwiches that I have loved in the past! As well as making it super convenient to keep the status of my sandwich consistently updated. There could be more options with toppings, but other than that, the app works great!

Minus the crashing problem that I have had-- which I let the developers know. They gave me some tips on what I can do to remody the problem. Communication is there. And I do appreciate it.

Overall, the app isn't terrible. A few nit-picks here and there, but overall quite solid!
