Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-05-03T01:36:40Z'}

title: Works great! (Ignore the bad reviews)
review: I was skeptical to use this app with all of the bad reviews listed.  I was very glad that I gave it a try.  Fast first set up and accurate ordering.  I arrived five minutes before the stated time and my food was ready and waiting for me. No line. No wait. Fresh food to order. The employees at the Subway were shocked when I told them about the bad reviews. They said people use it all the time and they never get complaints.

title: Nice option but seems to have glitches often
review: I like using the app and thankful for the option too. There just seems to be issues and glitches with site often for some reason.  I generally have all bars on my device.  Still seems to be slow?  So not sure why.  But other than that it‚Äôs super convenient!  Thank you!

title: Terrible interface, slow, unreliable
review:
The app has a terrible interface, it is slow, and it is unreliable. Ordering causes frequent loading screens and at payment time, the app regularly throws errors. Sometimes the order goes through and you end up with duplicate orders, sometimes not. Often you have no idea if your order was successful until you check your email. They also allow you to input PayPal payment types, but then have a banner saying PayPal is no longer supported. 

If I could give them zero stars, I would, and I use this app at least once a month.

title: Unfulfilled Potential
review: This app has potential but in the current form it‚Äôs nothing but lackluster. One would think a company as large as Subway, in an era when an organizations online presence is fundamental for success, that the organization would make the functionality and usability of their app a top priority. Well, you‚Äôd be wrong. It is untelling how much in sales Subway is losing due to costumer frustrations with this app. Subway, make this app result in a great costumer experience and the evidence of that impact will be manifested in your bottom line.

title: Worthless
review: I never write reviews, but feel the need to give this frustrating app a scathing review. This piece of crap app never works and the developers should be ashamed of themselves. I can‚Äôt even imagine how much business Subway must be losing. I‚Äôd rather eat anywhere else than deal with the aggravation of trying to order food through this worthless app that never works. It kicks out my orders multiple times and tells me my cart is empty, despite my placing multiple items in the cart. And then finally tells me my cart has too many items. Updates and restarts won‚Äôt fix this doomed app. Enjoy!

title: Make it an app your workers know how to use
review: Y‚Äôall need to train your workers on your stupid app better. I ordered a meal and picked a bottled drink and when I went to go pick up my food they refused to give me the bottle drink and we‚Äôre going to charge me more for something I paid for. I paid for a bottle drink and walked out without a bottle drink because they refused to give it to me and they were gonna make me pay for it. I even showed her how I ordered a bottle drink and to get to drinks. I clicked on a picture of a cup and she‚Äôs like no see you ordered a cup I‚Äôm like no I clicked on a picture of a cup to get to the drinks menu. Please do something about this

title: Our experience
review: We utilize the Holt Road location in Columbus, Ohio. We will get absolutely perfect orders and the get the most jacked up mess and have to drive all the way back there to get fixed and they are so ‚Äúwhatever sorry‚Äù about it. Never a next orders on us, let‚Äôs give u extra chips for the inconvenience.... literally NOTHING. If the order today isn‚Äôt right we are never getting from this location ever again!

title: When it works it's great
review: 50:50 chance I get my kings or it works for payment  and scan. Seems associates are not trained they struggle when you want to do both pay with the app, again 50/50 chance I can and gain my points. Sees like prompting the clerks to ask hey would like to use the app to pay or something will give them a standard and force the needed training if. I have experienced this in different subways in different states they don't know nothing about the app and I lose points

title: No deals and can‚Äôt order without signing up
review: I downloaded the app hoping that I would be able to get some offers or coupons, but I didn‚Äôt see anything like that. Even then, when I tried to place an order, it wouldn‚Äôt accept one without first having to go through the hassle of signing up for yet another ‚Äúrewards program.‚Äù I understand these companies look at these apps more as a marketing tool designed to rope in consumers versus a convenient ordering experience, but I just want to order a sandwich without having to join the Subway fan club.  Is that too much to ask?

title: So disappointed
review: I ordered a sandwich with all produce and one with none. It didn‚Äôt give me an option for white bread, so in the notes I put please make the one with no produce on white bread. Chips there were hardly any options. It wouldn‚Äôt let me delete my old PayPal password so it would process. I added a debit card. My husband picks up the order and his no produce sandwich had the stock produce, I thought it was an error on the restaurant nope the app shows produce even tho I selected none. It came on wheat bread. My husband said next time he‚Äôll just order in the store since he already had to pay separately for the baked bbq chips.

title: Missing features for this app
review: Most of my order was completely wrong.  The receipt has the correct drink and chips but I received completely wrong items and there is no way to report errors in the app.  Also, I wasn‚Äôt able to use up my gift card because my purchase was more than the balance of my gift card.  There should be a way to use the gift card and then pay the balance off with the other card on file.

title: Could use improvement
review: Overall it‚Äôs an easy app to use, but the customizations could be greatly improved. You can only select from a handful of options as far as meats. It would be great if the app could be updated to include a ‚Äúcreate your own sub‚Äù option as most of the things my family order are not able to be ordered through the app. I thought this would be a nice easy way to save time and place an order and have it ready or almost ready by the time I got to the store, but sadly not because I usually end up having to go in to order anyway.

title: Never works
review: This is by far the worst of all the restaurant apps I have. Half the time when I open the app it gives me an error message. When the app does open I can only get my rewards barcode to scan about 25% of the time- which I guess doesn‚Äôt even matter because I can never see my rewards. The app always says, ‚Äòunable to retrieve your tokens, try again later.‚Äô The only thing I‚Äôve had any success with on this app is ordering ahead of time, and that sometimes fails as well. I always make sure I have the latest version of the app and these errors continue to happen.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-07-26T15:39:12Z'}

title: Problems at every step.
review:
I started up the app and tried to make an account. I got an error saying an account was already using my email address. So I tried a password reset and got an error saying NO account was found using my email. So no way for me to make an account.

So I tried guest checkout. The menu didn't show veggie options that I know my restaurant has, so I just entered them manually in the notes section. 

Then when I got to the payment, it somehow doesn‚Äôt use any of the phones built-in autocomplete. So I had to enter everything manually. Since I can‚Äôt make an account, this means I will probably have to repeat all of these steps anytime I place an order, at which point, it would be quicker to just stand in line at the store. Pretty much completely defeating the entire purpose of the app.

Disappointed. I usually like order-ahead apps, but have never had one fail at every single step like this.

title: Do not use the app
review: If you use the app, and there is a problem the store cannot/will not fix it. I placed an order via the app, it took my payment, yet when I went in they could not find the order the app would not show the order but I can show on my bank account where they took the money.  I was told, ‚Äúwell it is an app problem and we won‚Äôt make any money‚Äù but the money was taken out of my account already! Can not reach anyone regarding this at Subway, they don‚Äôt have an active help phone line as they have all gone digital.. do not recommend using the app to order.

title: We are spoiled by our local Subway
review: We have been so blessed to have Shawn as our local manager. She runs a tight ship and everyone not only respects her but also love her. You can tell that she is a good manager as the same people greet us when we arrive! Ben Hottel is a asset to all as the night manager. It‚Äôs nice, especially in these times, to go back to a favorite spot and see the same friendly faces!

title: Finally an app that‚Äôs easy to use
review: This app is wat super easy to use. It‚Äôs pretty much self explanatory when it comes to using the app and placing your order. The deals in the app are mice you get. I‚Äôll most likely take advantage to those deals as much as I can. Using the app made my order cost $18 but the same order ordering in the store was $26.‚Äù‚Äù And it was the exact same porter customized the same exact way. So the deals really help.

title: Fix the change sandwich size feature
review: The app is fine up until you try to change the size of your sandwich sandwich. When I was ordering I put in all the toppings I wanted when I was ordering a 6 inch, when I decided to make it a foot-long instead, all of my all of my reset. I‚Äôve accidentally ordered a sandwich with the wrong toppings a couple of time and the restaurant couldn‚Äôt do anything about it. Simply changing the size of the sub shouldn‚Äôt make you have to start the order all over again. If this feature was fixed, the app would be completely fine.

title: Update was a downgrade
review: This used to be a great app. Functional, clear, and arguably ‚Äúfun‚Äù user experience where you could see the layers of your sandwich to customize it and specify less or more of an item. The best user experience I‚Äôve seen. Then they had an update and it‚Äôs terrible. I almost always forget to ask for my sandwich to be toasted because it isn‚Äôt a clearly visible option, and most recently it didn‚Äôt even prompt me to customize, it just immediately added to cart and i had to go back and edit it (but still forgot to ask for it toasted!!!!) Bring back the fun sandwich builder version :(

title: Gift cards
review: I only gave the app 3 stars because I am upset I have 5 different gift cards on the app one is $8.03 another one is $4.85 the other 3 is under a dollar what I would like to know is why you just don‚Äôt add all the gift cards together just tried to purchase a sub and it said all I had was $8.03 and was told to purchase another gift card why should I I have enough on there now it is upsetting it is my money and I can‚Äôt use it

title: ***BUYER BEWARE***
review: If you place an order and the restaurant does not have it available. You CANNOT cancel your order. You need to reach out via and online form and only get a reply that your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the team to improve our customer service. No refund just an apology that they will try harder. As of today, two weeks still no reply and no refund. Way to kick someone while they are already down. The charge your card before they even attempt to make the food. Waited 20 mins to be told ‚Äúoh we don‚Äôt have what your ordered‚Äù and ‚ÄúMost subways have no management‚Äù

title: Hacked
review: Someone hacked my subway app account. GOT MY CARD INFORMATION, PHONE NUMBER and was ordering subway in a different state than where I live. I live in Maine someone was ordering subway in Brooklyn New York. MULTIPLE times and spam calling my number. I am very upset. I have spent PLENTY of money at subway in MAINE I love subway I am so upset that this has happened. I don't think I can ever trust you guys to spend money in this establishment ever again. I had no other hacks on any platform other than subway. SO no my information as not leaked. IT was literally just my subway account. I am no happy. I had three purchases. I have pictures and proof if needed

title: Default - Please try again‚Ä¶and again‚Ä¶and again
review: Keep getting constant error message ‚ÄúDefault-Please try again ‚Äú, when logging in, when clicking on offers, when trying to pay. I tried to add the ApplePay discount, no - default, try again. Only way to order a sandwich was using another payment method, full price. What‚Äôs the point in having a discount offer if you can‚Äôt use it. I contacted customer service before for previous order issues, they were indifferent.  Ordering at Subway has been too much hassle, it‚Äôs not worth my time and effort, I choose to go elsewhere.

title: App falls short
review:
Doesn‚Äôt work consistently. Some offers aren‚Äôt applied even though the criteria is met. If the store doesn‚Äôt honor the offer the app should be smart enough to not show it once you select the location. Also, light Mayo and spicy mustard are available in store or if you call to place an order but not when ordering via the app. Really?? This all applies using the latest version.

It would be good if Subway looked at abandoned orders. I receive an email letting me know I left something in my cart so they can track those but no one seems to want to know why customers are abandoning orders.

title: Wrong order
review: I placed an order from my phone. Went in and employee asked if I had placed an online order. I said yes. He told me my order was in the bag on the counter. I took the bag and went home. When I opened the bag there was 1 footlong and 1 six inch sub. I ordered & paid for 2 footlong. The footlong had extra of veggies I didn‚Äôt order & the six inch had veggies & cheese that wasn‚Äôt even ordered. When I tried to call to complain I couldn‚Äôt get through. The recording came on saying the worker was busy with other customers and the call would disconnect. No way to rectify this problem without going back to the store!

title: Good, but could be better
review: I like that you can save favorites, but I wish I could save the entire order with add-ons included because you have to choose each individual sandwich you have saved before and then add the meals again.  We have a family of four and like to order the same thing every time, at least once a week and it would be nice to just hit ‚Äúsame order as precious‚Äù and be done.

title: Worst ever
review: I used this app for the second time today. First time it sent it to the wrong location. Today not only did the location not get my order, it charged me twice on my debit card. When I called the store they were nice but told me I would have to call customer service. When I called them the CSR was unapologetic and just said you will have to dispute the charges with your bank, I can‚Äôt help you!  REALLY... YOU CANT CALL YOUR BANK THAT TOOK MY MONEY!!!!

title: We eat at Subway more often now.
review: The app makes it so easy to order and pay it‚Äôs become our take out preference because how easy it is. It only glitched on us a little one busy Friday night at he night of dinner time. The customizations weren‚Äôt being shown in real time and I gave up and sent into the store. Our local sandwich artists are so awesome I was actually happy I got to go in and say hi so I didn‚Äôt mind that that app was acting up!

title: App needs updating.
review: I use this app weekly and lately have been having issues. It says my order didn‚Äôt go through and it clears my bag, but I check order history and it‚Äôs there. I called subway and they said they never got my order. Then it said we got it! So I assumed it went through finally. It never did. Must be a glitch. Also this point is so delayed and glitchy and runs so slowly. Please fix! It should take me a half hour to order a grinder and a salad.
developerResponse: {'id': 12777058, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us by tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com- so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2020-01-07T18:05:22Z'}

title: Where is the truth?!
review: I made an order and realized there was a mistake (on my part) about 4 seconds after confirming the order. There‚Äôs a small section at the bottom of the screen in light grey text that says to click the button directly above to cancel the order. NOT TRUE!! The button was there but the number is the one of the store (or catering..) and they just kept saying ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs an online order, we sent cancel it here‚Äù. WHERE IS THE TRUTH?!?! I can‚Äôt cancel through the app and calling doesn‚Äôt work either...when it literally says to call the number to cancel. This is app decided to screw me over on my first order...thank you, one star, please fix that

title: Broken app, how is it rated so hi?!?
review:
This app is very broken! It‚Äôs buggy in many aspects of the app. It makes it so frustrating that I say forget it I‚Äôm just going to the counter. One of the biggest issues for me is that you save a sandwich on your favorites but it only saves what meat and bread it is.... and does not save anything else! What‚Äôs the point of having a favorites sandwich if your not actually going to have all the ingredients in there... on top of it it crashes constantly and the location services is awful on this thing. Never even gets close to my location. 

Improve the app I have seen crappy mobile games with better functionality.

title: Can‚Äôt do anything without an account
review:
I got this app because I travel a lot and often stop at Subway. I wanted a better way to find the nearest restaurant, and maybe a way to see what specials were available that day, and assumed the Subway app would be able to do this. Instead it insisted I log in, and refused to do anything else until I did so. I don‚Äôt have a Subway account, and I‚Äôm not interested in one.  An app like this should only ask for a login if the user is doing something that requires it; otherwise, it should just try to be helpful. I already wanted to go eat there, I only needed directions.

Your competitors understand this. Minimum stars.
developerResponse: {'id': 3714285, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-06-04T15:26:54Z'}

title: Keeps taking me to the forgot password page.
review: I literally just downloaded this app in hopes it would make my life easier. Instead, after signing up, I tried to log in multiple times and it kept taking me to the forgot password page. At first I thought that maybe I was typing my password in wrong so I reset it... twice. I finally had some hope when it took me to the picture section to make sure I wasn‚Äôt a robot, sadly, it took me to the forgotten password page again. I will try one more time later on but if it doesn‚Äôt work, I will just have to waste time and hope the line isn‚Äôt long. This is for an iPhone 6splus with AT&T.

title: Mostly ok...
review: I use this app literally 2-3 times a week.  I have, however, discovered a bug that needs attention: if you change the bread to ‚Äúflatbread‚Äù, it completely disappears.  So I would place the order, then wait for the store to call me to ask what bread I wanted.  Now I leave it in ‚Äúspecial instructions ‚Äú, sometimes they catch it, sometimes they don‚Äôt.  Overall the app does what it‚Äôs supposed to, and I use it a lot. The customizing part is a bit tedious, but once you get what you like, you can just repeat the order next time.
developerResponse: {'id': 2574543, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience. We have identified this issue and are working on a fix to be released soon. Feel free out to reach out to us with any additional details at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2018-02-13T16:19:34Z'}

title: Incredibly slow, some bugs
review:
I assume this is a backend problem but any button press in the app triggers a multi-second loading animation. There are times where I‚Äôve wanted subway and dreaded the 5+ multi second button presses that would be necessary to place the same order I did last time.

There‚Äôs also a weird bug where the delivery address will sometimes get changed to the restaurant address. If I didn‚Äôt know to look for it, I would have confused delivery drivers several times instead of just once.

title: No sandwich
review: The app works great! However, when I got to Subway, there was one worker doing nothing, and two workers making sandwiches. They helped all of the other people in line while my order that was placed 20 minutes prior was not even started. The purpose of ordering ahead is so the food is ready at the time posted. Not later after I wait in line.

title: Ugh - won‚Äôt find location
review: I liked this app - the convenience of ordering ahead when I‚Äôm on the go is great (if the location is on top of their orders), but there have been many instances that I have tried to order (right now for example) and a location will NOT pull up. I tried accessing location multiple different ways, but when I put in an addressed or click the arrow for where I‚Äôm at nothing happens. No restaurants pull up. The map is just there.

title: App not working
review: Sorry I‚Äôll change this review when you guys fix the problem but I tried ordering subway 2 times in the last week and have been unsuccessful. I have used this many times in the past with no problem but as of late, I‚Äôve been unsuccessful. I‚Äôll change this review when you fix the problem.

title: Stealing Money
review: They do not respond to issues with the food ordered. We ordered two very different footlongs, one with sweet onion sauce, and they put it on the wrong sandwich. Toppings were mixed, bread was wrong and we purposely ordered three for a buy two get one free deal. They put the sweet onion sauce on a spicy Italian. The sandwich wasn‚Äôt even edible after removing the meat. I honestly tried to make it work. My son contacted everyone he could and after no response from anyone dealing with the app, he contacted the CEO of subway and received two coupons for a six inch sandwich. Never ever again. I‚Äôll pay too much for a pb&j before I give any money to subway ever.

title: Subway App
review: Love the app. Literally takes me 2 minutes to order our subs & were on our way to get them. The app is correct but for some reason the place we pick them up from mess up in something and do nothing to fix it. But will continue to use app because it‚Äôs user friendly & my 10 year old daughter can get on amd pkace our ordered. Awesome

title: A little clunky & no way to add a tip
review: It‚Äôs the little things. If you want me to type a phone number, switch to the number pad. If you want an email address, don‚Äôt make me hunt for the @ sign. I tried to set up an account three times but it wouldn‚Äôt go through. Fourth time was the charm. Also, your employees are doing the same work to make the sandwiches and pack orders but there‚Äôs no way to add a tip on the app. Make it an option please.

title: App works good, rewards points are earned at a reasonable rate‚Ä¶ But
review: This app is now pretty much worthless to me now with Walmart Subway locations closing. I unfortunately work for Walmart and the location at my store recently closed for good. Now I don‚Äôt have a way to eat Subway or spend the 2$ reward I just earned the day before the one at my store closed. I don‚Äôt drive myself so visiting locations other than the one in the store I work at is not a viable option for me so the 2$ will just sit and expire now.

title: App Much improved over time: If you were disappointed before, it‚Äôs time to try it again
review: This app has been one of the more clunky apps I have ever used over past years. But it has continuously chipped away at the major slowdowns and quirks. It is much faster now and more features work like one would expect. It‚Äôs finally ready for prime time.

title: Only way to cancel or change a accidental order is to call store and no one answers at the store
review: I was distracted by kids and accidentally placed my order before putting the correct pickup time in and there is no place on the app to correct the order. It has a place to call the store, however I tried calling the store literally 15 to 20 times in the span of an hour and no one answered. When I went to the store to explain what happened the customer service was the worst I have ever experienced. Basically the lady yelled at me and said it was my problem for making the mistake. Wow! Ok. Goodbye subway. üôãüèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: New Update
review: I‚Äôve always used the app day in and day out, since I don‚Äôt have time to make food and work can get in the way. It was a little upsetting when the app had issues for a while... But I have a great feeling about this new update! Super efficient, it stays updated with current menu updates, I even get member subway points every time I order. Always makes me feel great knowing I can get more for my buck.

title: I don‚Äôt get it
review:
I love Subway and always appreciate their deals.  But the app is lacking because the menu is incomplete.  I wanted to order 3 sandwiches, tuna, pastrami, and meatball.  The meatball sandwich is on their home page but not on the menu.  The pastrami is not there at all.  Went to the store where I got exactly the order I wanted and they gave me the same deal.  

In these days of social distancing I‚Äôd rather not stand in the line especially, when I literally got pushed by another customer.  It would be great to walk in and pickup my order complete.  No contact.

title: Barely operational
review: The deals are nice if you can Guess which stores have them and reorder your entire order 3 times just to see if it'll give it to you, but the app is very frustrating to use.  First, signing up and logging into your account through the app is broken since you put in all your information and then the "accept" button is grayed out and won't work, the app changes your phone's brightness rapidly for whatever reason, and it doesn't listen to you if you ask it not to show you a certain pop up again.  It'll keep showing it

title: Mostly convenient!
review:
I like this app. It was great when we were allowed to go to the counter and I could just scan the app for payment. Since COVID I‚Äôve been ordering online. The ONLY thing it‚Äôs missing is for you to customize a list of sandwiches before you place an order. Or editing your favorites if you made a mistake. Otherwise, great app. 

Also, the text was invisible while I was typing this review in the app, so we‚Äôll see what comes out on the other side.

title: Horrendous
review: This app is AWFUL. It‚Äôs littered with bugs, it adds things on your checkout list that were never on there, and forced us to buy an extra sandwich. Even when we removed it, it added it after it displayed the correct price for 4 foot longs. Even the Subway employees in Parsons, Tennessee think it‚Äôs awful. You‚Äôre a 2.6 billion dollar business. You‚Äôd think they could hire a coder to make the app work. AND ON TOP OF THAT in order to get the 5 dollar footlong deal, you have to put up with this hell to get a discount. Why is it restricted to the app? You‚Äôre paying the same amount for sandwiches. Oh wait, it‚Äôs because it forces you to buy another sandwich. FIX YOUR GARBAGE APP YOU CORPORATE HACKS!

title: Hot garbage
review: The app told me there was a buy two get one free special so that‚Äôs what I ordered. The free sub ended up getting dropped from the order. The interface is super confusing and when you think you‚Äôve done it right, you‚Äôll find out when you pick up your order, it was wrong. Not only is the app super confusing to the customer, the parts of the order that did make it through were also wrong. Our chips and drinks were omitted, even though carefully reviewing the confusing receipt verified what should have been there. I will never use this app again, and neither should anyone else. I‚Äôm not sure how this scam is allowed by Apple.

title: Easy to pick out items for order
review: It was very nice to use this application to order a sub for my Dad to pick up for me while I am off my feet.  However,  I had a difficult time getting the hyper link to actually place the order to come up. It was grated out and I had to add another sub then delete it in order for it to let me click on the ‚Äúplace order‚Äù button.  I was able to use my gift card and submit for a later in the day pick up.  Thanks.

title: Subway App
review:
Well, fortunately there aren‚Äôt nearly as many bugs in the franchises as there are in this app. So many errors for a national chain.

I think what Subway and the developers need to keep in mind is that people think of ‚ÄúSubway‚Äù as 1 store - everywhere - not as individual locations. 

The FIRST thing when clicking on ‚ÄúStart An Order‚Äù should be confirm your location. There should be the first option for ‚Äúclosest‚Äù and then ‚Äúfavorites.‚Äù 

I was using the app in California and when I came back to Florida, it stuck with the California location even thought it said it was 900 miles away... then told me my order would be ready in 20 minutes.

I was unable to cancel the order in the app and the local franchise wouldn‚Äôt answer their phone. So I was stuck paying for it and the app help support wasn‚Äôt too concerned with my issue.

It was my fault, I get it, but it should not let me order from across the country.
developerResponse: {'id': 5477146, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-10-12T14:28:02Z'}

title: The only way that I will order Subway
review: This app is brilliant!  I no longer have to stand beside sick people in the line during flu season nor do I have to wait behind slow/obnoxious people in general.  It‚Äôd be cool if I could wave my smartphone or Apple Watch in front of a window to dispense my freshly-prepared food.  Points pay-out needs to be improved!  The points need to meet or exceed the old paper Subway cards to keep me coming back for more!  $2 rewards just doesn‚Äôt cut it.  Swap that for a free foot-long sub!

title: Like the app but lost money because of the design
review: I like the app and it's quite fancy and intuitive however I had problem with default location. It always picks the location from previous order instead of the one nearer to user's current location. At least there should have been a prompt to confirm the location. Many a times, I placed the order for wrong location (assuming that it picks based on current location which many other food ordering apps do) and there no way I can cancel it.

title: The app hardly ever works anymore
review:
For about two weeks or more now the app hasn‚Äôt been working. You can‚Äôt order online. You can‚Äôt earn rewards or use any that you have accumulated or even see what you have. You can‚Äôt do anything except look at the menu. Literally, that‚Äôs all. Error messages for days and days. 

That being said, when it worked I did use it and liked it and that is the only reason it‚Äôs a two star review and not one star. Close to deleting for the fact that I haven‚Äôt been able to use in weeks. Please fix soon and I will still happily use
developerResponse: {'id': 4001666, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-06-27T15:12:29Z'}

title: I love this app!!!
review: This app is extremely good especially if your hungry all you need to do is order whatever you want through the phone and since you can add special things you want on ur sandwich such as it being cut in more than 2 slices it‚Äôs almost as if your ordering there in person I 100% recommend this app for my fellow sandwich lovers and have a great day

title: There‚Äôs a bug
review: Say you have a foot long sandwich with all of its customizations saved as a favorite. The next time you order you‚Äôre not as hungry so you add the favorite, go in your cart to edit the item, and change the size from footlong to 6‚Äù, and checkout. Guess what happens?  Upon changing the size it has removed all customizations!  Of course, this isn‚Äôt realized until you get home with your messed up order.

title: Served with a side of frustration
review: The old app would allow us to create a custom sandwich but this one doesn‚Äôt.  It feels like whoever created this app has never gone to a Subway before.  Not being able to create custom orders defeats whole purpose.  I now have to spend 20 minutes standing in line.  Even the 13 year old can‚Äôt figure this thing out. I am giving this app 2 stars in the hope they will bring custom orders back otherwise I will have to take stars away from other apps since I can‚Äôt give a negative star review.

title: Useless
review: This app is absolutely useless. Put in my order and when I go to pick it up they haven‚Äôt even started it. There was literally 2 customers in the place when I walked in. Why use an app to put in an order if the business isn‚Äôt even going to start on it until you get there. The whole idea is to have it ready for you.

title: MAN this is App is glitchy‚Ä¶
review:
I initially liked the refresh but it is VERY glitchy. When you click to view the menu, the app freezes.  It‚Äôs done this every time at the exact same place, even after you ‚Äúhard close‚Äù it. 

There are also some design issues. When you want to re-order something previous, the app forces you to go to the same location that you previously ordered from.   It won‚Äôt let you re-order the same meal from a different location; you have to select the new location and start all over again. Very irritating. 

Please fix this!

title: Decent app but slow
review: It‚Äôs great that the app combines all of the different data that it does including your gift cards and credit cards for payment and rewards. But the app can be very slow and you‚Äôre sitting at the cash register waiting for it. Also, it‚Äôs too easy to place an order with no immediate cancel function. That has been a big problem in the past. There should be at least one screen that confirms if you really want to place the order or a way to cancel within a minute.

title: App is functional but some features buggy
review: Recent Orders shows nothing no matter how many orders I place on the same device. Favorites sort of works. Changing restaurant locations is a pain without allowing location data to be used. Payment options in checkout are difficult to navigate to apply a reward promo or change funding source. Overall, app gets the job done, but could use some work on the few defects mentioned.

title: A terrible, nearly pointless app
review: In a world where nearly every restaurant has an app to order food, you would think one of the largest fast food chains has a decent app. NOPE. This is the worst food ordering app on the market. The first issue is that I can‚Äôt make anything a meal - can only add a drink or certain sides (NOT EVEN CHIPS????). The second issue is how slow and bug-ridden it is. In just my last order I had 3 errors all before the 4th error telling me my order couldn‚Äôt be completed (I know fool me once shame on you, fool me FOUR TIMES, shame on me). Might need to fire the team that creates this app and take some notes from whoever made Chick fil a, or even jimmy johns.

title: Big Bad Joe
review: Manju and her husband have the cleanest Subway store in the tri-state. With all this Corona Virus in full swing this would be the only fast food restaurant I would feel more than confident that my food was not only handled with sanitary gloves and Subway standards, this store has been going the extra mile before this terrible Pandemic started. And they are so gracious, friendly, and courteous. Thumbs Up for this Subway Store. Sandwiches and service done right with a smile.

title: So easy!
review:
As a mail carrier, everything I do in my work day is timed down to the minute. So being able to walk in and not have to stand in line means everything to me. No one wants to spend their lunch break in a line.

 In the app,they should eliminate the part where one has to pick specific chips flavor. The options never match what the store has. It should just say pick when you get there.

title: Looks like it's back on track!
review:
For the record, I think this app is one of the most needed ordering apps out there. At least for me. 

The app started out nice and simple. And it worked. Then you went to this picture menu silliness and the app got extremely buggy and basically useless. 

However, it seems that here lately it's back to working the way it's supposed to. Here's hoping it stays that way!!

title: Very satisfied
review: This review is based on the app. While I have always enjoyed my sandwiches from subway, I haven‚Äôt had this one yet. Ordering through the app was super easy and they allow you to customize your order any way you want. They even ask of you would like your footlong cut in three pieces, I think that is thinking of the details. Great job Subway

title: I wish the app was good
review: Not sure why this is still an issue‚Ä¶ others have their apps working pretty well, but I have to say that for years now the Subway app has been so glitchy and problematic. I keep hoping with each update that it‚Äôll get better, but it‚Äôs one of the worst apps out there second only to Burger King.  It fails so often that at least half the time I try to use the app I end up just ordering food elsewhere‚Ä¶ it clears my cart after building my sub, glitches out so I have to repeatedly try to submit and close the app and reopen and rebuild again. It is so terrible.

title: App is easy to navigate, just wish I could get a full list of ingredients.
review: The app is really easy to navigate. Easy to place an order. But, I‚Äôm vegan and I would like to be able to have a page that has a full list of ingredients in the specific store that I select. I would like to know what is in each product and also to know what is available to put on my sandwich‚Ä¶. Specific to that store.

title: Trash
review: Had an account and it kicked me out during the update and now I need an account to even order when I was able to order as a guest in the past ? not only that but can‚Äôt remember my account info and it won‚Äôt send the email to my email for me to recover it. Y‚Äôall really updated an app that wasn‚Äôt even broken and broke it :) thanks

title: Can‚Äôt log in.
review: I really do like the app, but ever since an update happened, it had kicked me out. Whenever I try to sign back in, the login button becomes unresponsive. I‚Äôm upset because if I ever want to order online and earn points, I have to do it on my laptop since I can‚Äôt log in on my phone. Tried reinstalling the app, but that didn‚Äôt work. Please assist.

title: Horrible app
review: Don‚Äôt get this app!!! You‚Äôre going there anyways so might as well watch them make it because they are not going to care. The options aren‚Äôt all available, they don‚Äôt read the special instructions, they might as well just freestyle and give it to you bc they don‚Äôt even read all the directions! It was convenient because I can order and have it done by the time I‚Äôm off work but what‚Äôs the point being disappointed when the sandwich you specifically asked for is wrong. Just ordering in person is the best option for accuracy in my opinion.

title: Getting better
review: The app is significantly more intuitive than the previous iteration which was so frustrating I quit using it. It was actually quite easy to place an order with the current app. I recommend trying the Subway app again if it‚Äôs been a while since you tried it. I believe you will be pleasantly surprised. I was.

title: Inconsistent
review: I use the app at least 2-3 times/wk. It is handy when it works but half the time I get ‚ÄúThis restaurant is no longer accepting breakfast‚Äù, ‚ÄúThis restaurant is not accepting orders at this time‚Äù or my favorite ‚ÄúThis restaurant is currently closed‚Äù when it is clearly not as I drive by the drive through with 3 cars being served!  In the days of Covid and Online rewards programs there should be no reason for the terrible inconsistency of this app!  This is the most buggy app I have ever used and I have been using it for over 1 year. Please figure things out!

title: P Belair üò°
review: Saw the commercial on tv buy one get on free. Went into subway in Columbus N.C. asked about buy one get one. We were told to download the app and we could get the deal. We stood there for about 30 minutes trying to figure it out. We finally got it to work. Then we were charged for both sandwiches. I asked why, the Mgr if you want to call her that, told us she could not fix it. We paid for it and left. They stood there and did not offer to help us. Pretty stupid people. I guess Subway doesn‚Äôt need our business.  Not a problem, you only get to treat bad 1 time and that‚Äôs it. I‚Äôm glad subway is doing just fine without my business. Good luck.

title: Great app but Problem with ‚Äúroasted‚Äù chicken
review: I love this app and it‚Äôs very useful to have a ready to go sandwich when I‚Äôm on the run. The only issue I have seen is that a couple of times my roasted chicken breast sandwich has been confused with rotisserie chicken and the end result has been a very disappointed picky eater. When I asked about it, the person told me it was confusing as to which one it referred to. Maybe there is an issue with the wording?

title: You can‚Äôt delete or update your credit card information
review:
I got a new card to replace an old one.  It has the same number but different expiration and security card. This app is now completely useless to me now since Subway doesn‚Äôt allow you to delete or edit an existing card in your account.  I thought it was a limitation of the app but you can‚Äôt do anything about it on their website either.  No way to report the issue so I‚Äôll have to give this feedback here and hope they get their crap together.

I should be able to remove all of my card info from my account, but no, Subway has it forever.

title: Subs Heroes Hoagies Sammies
review:
No matter what y‚Äôall call it, they‚Äôre delicious & this app helps you get them faster üòÄ 

Easy to use, easy to customize, easy to set a pick up time, really easy to checkout and use your coupons or discount codes 

We‚Äôve been using this app for several months and never had a problem, so was happy to knock out a review. Great all, thanks Subway

title: What‚Äôs the point?
review: I do not understand what the point behind using the Subway app is, other than to closer track the information of the people using it. You can place orders via the app but you‚Äôd best hope that everything is right because the app offers no way to contest or submit an incorrect order. The bag and order on the receipt were correct, the sandwiches inside were anything but correct; obviously a store error, not a delivery error. Simply embarrassing that a company which can afford millions of dollars on advertising can not afford the same commitment to a functional app.

title: Super buggy
review:
Update.. wow I made my review below many years ago and hadn‚Äôt been back to subway since then.. I finally went back today because of a good deal and found that the app is as buggy as ever. After all these years.. still bugs galore. So many errors.

I can't tell you the number of bugs I've encountered with this app. I used to go to subway all the time but this app has stolen my money several times or just straight up refused to work properly. Half the time it tells me "no stores nearby" even though there's 5 of them within a few miles. Just a total mess.

title: Amazing!!
review: I order my subway off the app, and it‚Äôs always ready and fresh! The app is super easy to use, and I love that I can rack my points up and earn free food! The people here in Hawkinsville, Ga are super nice when you walk in. They always make sure my order is correct, and that I have everything I need before leaving. They are so sweet, and always greet you when walking in. üòä

title: Can‚Äôt Create An Account
review: The app just gives an error message ‚ÄúOops‚Äù after entering email address and password with the required elements of an uppercase letter, a lowercase, a digit and a special character. I‚Äôve made various attempts.  The app seems to offer a lot of convenience and I can use it as a guest. Too bad I can‚Äôt create an account. 3 stars since it seems to work as a guest and is convenient. But when all you get is ‚Äúoops‚Äù with no indication as to what the issue is then it‚Äôs not a truly useful app.

title: Not the worst, but for sure a contender
review:
Of all the fast food apps I have, this is easily the worst one.  The issues I‚Äôm having include:

The app lags so badly, regardless if it‚Äôs on wifi or the 4G cellular network.

The UI is anything but user-friendly.  One suggestion: get rid of the option to add chips/cookie and a drink under EVERY SINGLE LINE ITEM.  That is cluttered and makes the order appear confusing.  There‚Äôs already a pop-up to make it a meal.  If I didn‚Äôt select it when I was adding things to the cart, why would I want them now?

Also on the subject of the UI: it takes FOREVER to place an order because of how the pages are set up.  When you order a sandwich, the app redirects you to the Home Screen to order the next one.   Why?  Just take us back to the menu screen.  Also, can the ‚ÄúAdd to Favorites‚Äù function please be added to more screens?

title: Very Quick and Convenient
review: Can save any of your favorites. Makes for quicker ordering. Saving payment information speeds up process. Literally just ordered and paid for 2 footlongs in a matter of 2 minutes. Walk in the store, it‚Äôs ready to go. Tell them I had an online order and give my name. In and out the door in 15-20 seconds. Quickest and easiest online ordering and puck-up I‚Äôve done from ANYWHERE.

title: The App steals your money and store can‚Äôt help
review: This app is horrible. I placed an order at the local subway and the cashier and manager said it did not come through. I even gave them my phone and pulled up my recent orders to show them. Went to my bank app and showed them the money was taken out. THEN, I asked if they could pull it up by the order number‚Ä¶ they couldn‚Äôt! Tried to find a way to get help through the app and the ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù leads you to fill out a long form, there is no way to get help instantly when this crap malfunctions. From now on I‚Äôll just order in the store!

title: Has some flaws.
review: Will let me create a breakfast sandwich to order, then later tell me I can't order it at that time--despite knowing that location serves it all day.  My closest location does not let you order oven roasted chicken, despite it being offered (and a core Subway sandwich).  If I have to change locations, I'm forced to empty my entire cart and start over.  And one local store shows up only part of the time.  In short, it gets the job done, but not real well.

title: Review
review: This app works pretty smoothly.  I have always liked how Subway lets you fully customize ingredients and the app works better than I expected at doing that also.  The only odd thing is, if I order at the store and scan the app to get my tokens, it ends up charging my credit card even if I want to pay cash.  You can probably change it at the time but I always forget.

title: DO NOT TRUST FOR EGG WHITES
review:
Some Subways don‚Äôt currently have egg whites. If you order them, some of those Subways will substitute eggs without comment, and the app will not warn you. I have a family member on a low iodine diet for cancer treatment and we learned this by coincidence - after they had already eaten one sandwich on an earlier day that supposedly had egg whites. 

We now have no way of knowing what their earlier sandwich had in it, and have to check if their treatment has to be delayed by as much as a week because Subway couldn‚Äôt be bothered to say in the app that egg whites aren‚Äôt available. 

For a company that claims to support health, disappointing isn‚Äôt a sufficient word. Order with care.

title: Useless app
review: Subway is having a buy one get one if purchased online only.  So downloaded the app and did the order for two sandwiches.  Went to checkout. Enter a credit card. Got error messages can‚Äôt find property link. Tried a second time. Same error.  Entered a different credit card. Got the same error.  Entered a third credit. Surprise same error.  So didn‚Äôt order online.  Went into the store to see if they honored the buy one get one free. Got a big fat no.  Read other reviews that had the same issue.  Therefore Subway is using the app to bait you Hopi g you go into the store and pay full price. This is a poorly designed app.

title: Love the app
review: Ordering on the app is so much easier. I am able to see exactly what ingredients come on each sub, the price, what costs extra and what does not. I don‚Äôt have to stand in line at the store. So convenient! The only thing I dislike is I haven‚Äôt found a way to apply my coupons in the app so I can apply to charge before paying. This improvement would make the app so much better!

title: Works great. I have 1 issue
review: I like the app. It is easy to use. I would, however, like to leave feedback on one item. When I select favorites, I cannot simply touch the picture of the item to add it. I have to hit the ADD TO BAG option below the picture. I forget almost every time because logic says I should just tap the picture to select. I would offer feedback that you should be able to simply tap the picture of the item to add it. Thank you.

title: Version 7.6.1
review: This version closes when you try to open it. The version before this? Yeah, ‚Äúwe‚Äôre sorry but online ordering is not available at this time.‚Äù  Deleting the app and just placing my order on your website. I had hoped this update would help but it didn‚Äôt. Y‚Äôall are a big enough company, you should hire a better app developer. That‚Äôs sad. Your competition has high quality apps.
developerResponse: {'id': 3385538, 'body': 'We want to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced with this technical concern you brought to our attention. We have had success with many users fully uninstalling/deleting, and reinstalling the Subway¬Æ App from and to their device. If you continue to experience error, please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or send an email to appfeedback@subway.com. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-05-07T17:24:15Z'}

title: I got the lady at subway to get it to work luckily‚Ä¶
review: I tried to place an order today and it kept putting me in New York City for pickup even though I had selected my correct location in Arizona. You guys need to fix this asap because someone could easily overlook the location selection when it changes back to NY and not even pay attention. Luckily she fixed it for me and got it to work after pressing many different buttons over again.

title: Error messages everywhere! App doesn't work
review: Wow. Did anyone even test this? I am shocked to the core that this was released in the condition it is. I waited a couple days and a couple updates to see if you guys could smooth it out and nothing. Error message after error message, completely unusable. Yesterday it said no Subways existed in my state. Today it found the Subway but said "location is not part of this service." What does that even mean?!? Holy crap. Even the error messages are low effort. I ensured location was turned on and yet I receive the message. DO NOT offer a service like online ordering if you can't ACTUALLY DO IT.
developerResponse: {'id': 1351741, 'body': 'So sorry for your experience! Could you provide more information please, so that we can look at the issue? You can reach us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. Please mention your concerns in the restaurant location(s) so that we may have this corrected.', 'modified': '2017-09-25T13:55:54Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt really customize‚Ä¶
review: When my fianc√© and I go to Subway we build our own, we don‚Äôt use the numbered ones. But for his sub we can‚Äôt make it on the app because it doesn‚Äôt allow certain ways he likes it. He gets footlong on Italian with ham and double bacon toasted with American cheese, He is able to choose on the app a ham and bacon but can‚Äôt add extra bacon. I wish there was a fully customizable section that it would go through every step, aka (bread, size, toasted, meat, cheese, veggies, sauces) and you could pick and choose each item‚Ä¶.

title: Easy to use, very convenient
review: When you have a short lunch break or if you simply don‚Äôt feel like waiting in line, this is the app for you! It‚Äôs easy to customize your order and it even tells you the calorie count as well as your total before you place the order. They have pickup or delivery option. Give it a try!

title: Terrible Communication Between App & Restaurant
review: My order was supposed to be ready by 7:05. I got there at 7:15 and found out my order hadn‚Äôt even been started. They told me they were out of Artesian Italian bread and when I asked if that‚Äôs why they hadn‚Äôt started, one person said yes while the other person said they were busy. I replied, ‚ÄúThe app said it would be ready by 7:05‚Äù and I was told ‚Äúit doesn‚Äôt go by time.‚Äù I‚Äôm still waiting and they still haven‚Äôt started it. I guess I started by reviewing the app and ended with reviewing the store. ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: The app that makes you DROOL!
review: So much fun!!! I always order crazy sandwiches and having the app that lets me figure out what I want and convey to the chef exactly what I want it‚Äôs so much easier than trying to do it in person! Thank you subway for making a great app! The only problem is I drooled all over my iPad And the review center is not allowing me to see what I‚Äôm writing so I don‚Äôt know how DROOL was spelled‚Ä¶ But that‚Äôs another review, sadly.

title: Awful app
review: The worst app, it is constantly showing error notifications while trying to order. It takes me 15-20 minutes just to get to the end and finally able to pay for two sandwiches from my favorites list so I can‚Äôt imagine what it‚Äôs like to have to create one, let alone multiple sandwiches. The loading screens is basically all you see. Also, it has deleted my payment method more times than I can count and will not accept my Apple Pay. It is an awful app and I use many others that are not any where near this slow and unreliable

title: No coupons
review: When I first started ordering from the app it let me use promotional coupons. After a month it stopped and says the restaurant doesn‚Äôt accept them. Except that if you go to the restaurant they accept them. Also the app in general is buggy and hard to use. There are half the sauces that they have in store on the app. Honestly the app got worse with use instead of improvement with time. Overall the app is ok but needs a lot of work.

title: Terrible
review: All I wanted to do is order 5 sandwiches. They were not even that complicated. First it would not recognize any store available in my area. There is one 1/4 mile away. Then, I build a sandwich, it spends 2 minutes loading, then tells me there is a problem/ error/ or start over. This is the third time that I‚Äôve had these problems. I‚Äôve only used this app 3 times. I spent more than 30 minutes fooling with this app until I gave up. I went to the store, ordered the sandwiches, and was out of there in 15 minutes. In the end the sandwiches were delicious as usual.

title: The Recent Orders Button is always malfunctioning
review: It is so incredibly annoying. What is the point of having an app that you only need to reprocess a past order but the recent orders icon gives you errors and is inaccessible? Sometimes it‚Äôs due to not having the latest update. Sometimes you have to restart the app. Sometimes it‚Äôs just buggy because Subway‚Äôs software is garbage. McDonalds and other restaurants doesn‚Äôt have this problem, just subway. Why do I have to refill a sandwich from scratch when I always order the same thing? Incredibly annoying.

title: Doesn't work. Zero successful orders. Very buggy.
review:
I would add items to my cart, but when I went back to the cart, it would say there was a problem and that my cart was empty. When it would take me back to the main page, the number indicated that there were things in the cart.

Can't specify pickup for next day.
Can't build an order while the chosen restaurant is closed either. Same with online. That is maddening.

If I'm logged into the app and put things in the cart, then go in through the web page, my order isn't there. That's laughably bad design. Especially considering I tried completing my order online since the app wasn't working.

When I went to submit feedback, the app directs you to "contact us". That page has a drop down listing things like restaurant feedback, franchise info, press inquiry, but not app feedback or even "general/other". What was the plan for handling bug reports? Sifting through negative reviews in the app store?

title: Great app, but‚Ä¶
review: This is a really good app for ordering Subway, and great for rewards, but I often forget to get the cashier to scan my order if I just want Subway as I pass it on the road. I wish that there way a way to get points for your order after you ordered it like scanning the receipt or something. But other than that, it is a great app.

title: Convenient, but could be better
review: While i love ordering online and picking up; some things could be worked on. Many times if there‚Äôs special instructions added on the order most times it‚Äôs looked over by the sandwich maker. You aren‚Äôt able to customize a kids meal either. It would also be awesome to be able to use coupons when order online as well!

title: Worst food ordering app
review: I never write reviews for anything. But nothing has ever irritated me as bad as this app. It doesn‚Äôt even work. I spent 20 minutes trying to order from this thing. You pick a soda it tells you that you didn‚Äôt. You pick a bag of chips, it tells you to repick a soda. You try to go back to pick a soda and it tells you you can go back without losing your whole order. And then the whole thing crashes. Eventually had to go on my desktop and even that bugged out and I had to restart my order twice. Subway is definitely not worth all this hassle when everyone else has a functional app.

title: Worked great, no more
review:
This app was great. Worked flawlessly for a long time but a little while ago it was overcharging me because it wasn‚Äôt recognizing meals. I brought it up with subway‚Äôs customer service and they said they‚Äôd look into it. Since then it‚Äôs been one issue after another and when I tried to bring it up with CS they ignored me. This app is no longer worth using if the developers can‚Äôt keep it working and CS refuses to comment on its issues.
Also no, I don‚Äôt want a canned response about how I should call CS when I‚Äôve already spoken with CS. Amazes me how this app has over four star average when almost every review I‚Äôve seen is one star.

title: Would‚Äôve been a 5-star
review: My rating would have been a 5-star, but my boyfriend ONLY like turkey and ham subs. Which means we have to pay for a Subway Club (ham, roast beef, and turkey) and put in the special instructions ‚ÄúNO ROAST BEEF‚Äù... which most of the time the workers at Subway do not read the instructions and put it on there anyways. I wish there was an opinion to completely customize a sub, not just order off the menu. Other than that, it‚Äôs easy to use, fast, and reliable.

title: Tokens don‚Äôt work
review:
Update: The rewards program is a great idea! It‚Äôs a shame that it doesn‚Äôt work. I just got the update a couple weeks ago and managed to get around 140 tokens! ... that were completely wiped from my account. A $2 reward for every $50 spent is already not much, it‚Äôs a shame that they don‚Äôt even honor it. 

Another update:
Are your employees informed of the mobile app? It seems like half the time I enter after the app tells me that the food is ready it turns out the Subway in question had no idea I even ordered. 

Do yo

Original review is unfortunately still immensely relevant:

"BadRequest: unavailable‚Äù

Given that this error message is what your users are seeing about 80-90% of the time they're trying to order a sandwich (having to customize the sandwich all over again each time), can you at least have the courtesy to update the message's text with something that makes sense? App is completely nonfunctional most of the time.

title: Broken App
review: I used this app for months with no problem and now I can‚Äôt ever use it. It won‚Äôt pull up anything and any time I try to start a new order or reorder, it gives an error message and won‚Äôt allow me to do anything. I even tried logging out, which of course I forgot my password so when I went to reset it, I couldn‚Äôt even do that because as soon as I switched screens to grab my email verification number and tried to switch back to the subway app, it brought me to the log in page and I couldn‚Äôt go back to enter the verification number. This WAS a very lovely and convenient app, please fix this issue!

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-02-06T15:49:58Z'}

title: Little that you can do in this app
review:
I am shock that in this age this app really provide you with no benefit than adding your subway egiftcard (because that is the ONLY way aside from ordering online). You can‚Äôt add the card to Apple wallet. You can‚Äôt merge card balance, which really is their way of trying to make you lose money by having balances in their gift cards. Then  their app design just plainly confusing for someone who have lots of app. 

The reward seems to be going away or not available to the app. So I really don‚Äôt know what you can do other than using your egiftcard.
developerResponse: {'id': 2163507, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we will definitely look into this issue. Feel free to reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2017-12-29T14:44:24Z'}

title: Better than waiting in a drive thru
review:
First: Swanton OH Subway is amazing! Always amazing service and the employees are always displaying professional friendliness.
Second: Order from the app when I leave for home. Stop in, pick up, head home is simple with no waiting. 
Third: I use the find a subway near me feature a lot more than I expected.

title: Poor Conflict Resolution
review: DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS APP!! If anything goes wrong with your order such as not receiving your food or getting the wrong order, there is no way to request a refund through the app. Also, staff is not well versed in handling issues that arise through the app. I‚Äôve lost money multiple times using this app either due to inaccurate information such as‚Ä¶incorrect closing times listed and being charged for food I didn‚Äôt receive. If for some reason you must have Subway, go to the actual restaurant or place your order through a third party like Door Dash.

title: That‚Äôs a no from me
review: It‚Äôs not just that I got an online confirmation that my order was READY and the store not only didn‚Äôt have it ready but had no clue there was an order despite having only one other customer. It‚Äôs not just that I had to stand around and wait and then be told they didn‚Äôt even have what I ordered. It‚Äôs that they had NO IDEA how to void the order so I stood around several more minutes while they tried to figure it out (which they did, eventually.) Wait, you think. Cancel it in the app. The app says to call the store. App deleted with grim satisfaction. Fail.

title: Garbage
review: I ordered three basic sandwiches and went and picked up the order. When I got to the house, two of them were WAY wrong. Only the meat and one or two of the veggies were correct. I double checked my order before calling the store to complain, and they had built them to the specifications of what the app decided that I had REALLY wanted. I‚Äôve used the app a couple of times before, so it wasn‚Äôt user error. I wasted my money on sandwiches no one wanted. I‚Äôll just call the store from now on. (If they pick up) at least my order will be the mediocre sandwich I paid for.

title: Helpful Staff at store
review:
I stopped at the Bethel Store in Port Orchard on my way home from working as an RN.  I asked about the buy 2 - get one free offer.  The sandwich artist, Mateo, was very nice and explained that it was an online offer.  He was very patient in teaching me how to set up the app.  
Keep him around!  He has a great customer interaction personality!  I watched him with multiple customer interactions, as I was very slow with my setting up the app.
Thank you Mateo!!

title: Great but could be better
review: Mobile ordering has become my favorite thing to do. However what makes the experience less than favorable is when certain things are unavailable but you aren‚Äôt notified until you arrive to pick up your food. Kinda inconveniences both the worker and the customer which can be fixed on the app programming and letting stores notify that they don‚Äôt have certain items due to the pandemic.

title: Good,  not Perfect
review: Well, it worked the first time. There was only one glitch. It wouldn‚Äôt let me proceed with curbside pick up. I had to figure out how to change it to an in-store pick up. The app should take you to where you need to change to an in-store pick up. Other than that, the app worked pretty smoothly which is surprising given that most giant corporations can‚Äôt walk and chew gum at the same time.

title: HORRIBLE AND INFURIATING
review:
I tried to order off of this app several times in the past few years. It has NEVER gotten better and has ALWAYS been incredibly sketchy, glitchy, confusing and infuriating. 

Trying to apply deals to your cart is like pulling teeth!!! And if you don‚Äôt apply the coupon every single time to each item, it charges you full price. Then you try to go back to apply the coupon but you can‚Äôt do it without taking you out of the order!! 
I wanted an advertised deal on my lunch but I could only get it through the app. 

Not only have you lost my money today, but you may have lost me as a customer altogether. I want a healthy and affordable lunch and if the only way I can get that is trying to go through the seven circles of hell on your app so that I lose 20 minutes of my lunch break, only to NOT be able to order or get my deal, then I‚Äôm not messing with you guys again.

title: Food pictures are the way to order food!!
review: This app is super user friendly. Who doesn‚Äôt love pointing at a picture to order food?! The ONLY hiccup I encountered was making sure you select your location before you put sandwiches in your cart. If you forget to change it before hand and have to change it later, it will empty your cart and make you start all over.

title: Worst restaurant app ever
review: I used the Subway app for the first time today - I ordered 2 sandwiches- 1 Italian BMT - that sandwich was fine - 2nd sandwich was a Black Forest Ham - went to eat that sandwich a couple of hours later and there was no ham on my sandwich.  I went back into the app to review my order to make sure that I wasn‚Äôt the one that made the mistake and when I reviewed my ‚Äúpast orders‚Äù it somehow placed another order!! So now I am being charged for an order that I didn‚Äôt place!! I ordered the sandwiches to eat on a road trip so I am out of town and can‚Äôt even go pick up the order that the app decided to place for me.

title: Future app options
review: To provide users to be able too, use as a family account, or be able to log on with two different devices. Some use it to order company food and others can make it useful to put in their own food order, with out others see it having to take their order. In addition, to be able to pay in store, not always by card. Some people like to just had over cash to other who are picking up there food, beside their card.

title: Not accurate when ordering
review:
We placed an order via the app and then immediately received a call from the store.  Even though I could order things on the app the person from the store told us that they didn‚Äôt have the certain items and that I had to pick something else.  Plus they could not remove the items and refund the money.   So I was stuck with picking substitutes or cancel the entire order of 5 sandwiches and start over.  

Seriously!   Plus are coupons could not be applied by the store.  

I‚Äôll just uninstall the app if subway can be flexible enough for things outside my control.
