Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2020-01-07T16:32:56Z'}

title: Easy to use and makes things quicker dinners
review: As a very busy mom of 2 young and active kids. We wind up running from one activity to another with little time to spare for a good dinner. Love the app that lets the kids easily picture their food. Being able to order and pay in one step with just a quick pick up run in is so very nice. Thanks Subway. I love not feeding them junk food all the time.

title: Updated app HUGE step backwards
review: I found the old app user friendly and never had a problem. The "improved" app is a nightmare! I have yet to use it without encountering a problem. It is far from user friendly and I just now tried to place an order and received a message that an error was encountered and the order could not be placed. I'm not sure Subway is worth the aggravation!
developerResponse: {'id': 1352171, 'body': 'So sorry for your experience! Could you provide more information please, so that we can look at the issue? You can reach us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-09-25T14:37:18Z'}

title: Disappointed
review: I was very disappointed when not all menu items were available. For instance the honey oat bread is not available nor is the vinegar and oil. In order to customize your sandwich you had to click on a sandwich first and take off everything you don‚Äôt want to put everything you do instead of just picking your bread and meat and other condiments first and making a costume sandwich. This app is a great idea because sometimes subways lines are so long but it looks like I‚Äôll still have to wait in line or go somewhere else that takes less time...
developerResponse: {'id': 2706847, 'body': "We apologize that you couldn't get your order exactly how you wanted it. We'd like to talk with you more so please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us.", 'modified': '2018-02-28T20:32:35Z'}

title: Convenient
review: Love that it‚Äôs open 24/7. Am a nite owl so it‚Äôs perfect for me at the moment (however things could change in the near future). Also as I was there just FYI the sandwich maker was constantly busy making sandwiches so where every other subway closes at 9pm you have the mkt captured till sunrise. Keep up the good work and yes the sandwich makers make awesome sandwiches. üëç

title: Terrible! Problems signing up, no search option
review: This is seriously a terrible app. I can‚Äôt create an account because it says my email is being used. If I try a password reset it says no account exists. I‚Äôve never created a subway account and I‚Äôve never had such a weird, unsolvable problem with an app. Second, how do you order a kids meal on this dang app?! There is NO option for kids meals, and no search button. I know the store I am ordering from has the kids meals so how in the world are you supposed to do it? Just wasted like 45 minutes on this TERRIBLE app.

title: Remove credit cards from App
review: 3 fraudulent charges within 24 hours. I do not trust Subway App now. Subway needs to work on possible glitches or immediate notifications for an order being placed and the fact there is no way to contact Subway online. Subway did reverse the fraud charges after I contacted my banks fraud department upped stars from 1 to 3 for that. PSA: I highly suggest removing credit cards from any and all apps so this doesn‚Äôt happen to you. I hate scammers.

title: How can you create your own, when the app will not let you access all the options???
review: I have tried many times to use the app/online ordering system, which is the only way to access some discounts. Usually I can‚Äôt customize my order the way I want it because the options are not available for that sandwich. All the bread, veggies, etc, should be available for whatever you want to order. For example, my husband loves the tuna sandwich on the jalape√±o cheddar bread but that bread is not available for the tuna sandwich. Where is the build your own options???

title: Bad app
review: Your application does not work at all and now I cannot order sandwiches on my iPad or iPhones so please fix the application so the millions of people can order your sandwiches online once again. The application was working until you made everyone upgrade the new version which does not work at all so please fix the application.

title: Could be a lot better
review: First off, this app is incredibly buggy and things don‚Äôt always work. It‚Äôs always crashing when I click to select things. Makes ordering annoyingly difficult at times. Also, there is no way to build a sub from scratch. Kinda the whole point of subway, you build it how you want. You can only select a subway pre-maid sandwich, then have to go through and edit to get what exactly you want. Think this app would be great if a few things were fixed.

title: Ridiculous
review: I love subway and having an app for me to order ahead because I live in a very rural area makes things so much easier, but I feel like a freaking 1st grader created this app. It‚Äôs not very user friendly and I‚Äôm a younger woman, it doesn‚Äôt have the kids menu option and don‚Äôt even think about deciding you want a larger or smaller sandwich because if you do, it completely resets the sandwich you‚Äôve already built. I‚Äôve paid for sandwiches that weren‚Äôt even close to being right due to this app. I feel like it‚Äôs time to just delete it and not go anymore. üôÑü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: App doesn‚Äôt place order at all for over a year
review:
For the past year, I‚Äôve been trying to place order on the subway app, but it never places the order for me. Also, a lot of the items in the app are missing which are available in store. 
I‚Äôve tried making new account, different phone, multiple credit cards for payment, and even tried changing the store. But nothing works. 

Also, guess what, in store, I can‚Äôt pay for the order with my credit card already placed the app, it shows error to them. But, I am able to pay with the same credit card with physical card.

This app used to work great and saved me so much time. But now, ordering from Subway is a pain and I hate the experience. I have to go in person everytime to place the order.

I have reached out to Subway multiple times about this issue but I have heard no word from Subway to help me with this.

title: Tip: Call ahead for curbside pick up
review: I‚Äôm not sure who dropped the ball (the app or chain restaurant), but I ended up having to walk into the store even after placing a curbside pick up order and checking in. The employees made it seem as if they were not aware that I had checked in. No other customers were in the store, which prompted to go inside to see if they had my order ready. They didn‚Äôt have the designated curbside pick up parking spots either. So make sure to call ahead to see if the store offers that service.

title: Convenient saved favorites
review: I really love this ap the favorites that are saved really help me keep everything straight for my kids orders that are the same every time.  I do wish there were more coupons available on the ap I use the paper ones inn the nail I b am typing but seeing no font in my screen this could‚Äôve a crazy review.

title: Far better now
review: The first time I tried using the app I got everything together but bc the app was having ‚Äòissues‚Äô it wouldn‚Äôt allow me to finish .. I was even in the store but they would not give me the $5 deal upon showing them all that I‚Äôd done not to mention how long it took me like appr 30-45 mins.. I give it 5 stars now bc it is now easy helpful and extremely convenient.

title: App bugs out constantly.
review: The subway app, like a lot of food chain apps, is slow, buggy, and confusing. I‚Äôd be fine with the weird layout of my recent order button worked, my favorite orders button worked, and if it actually sent orders through. Today, instead of telling me the order got cancelled and then CANCELLING the order, it sent the first one through without me knowing and then I ordered a second one thinking the first one didn‚Äôt go through. Sitting here with an extra sandwich if anyone wants it.

title: APP BITES
review:
It was rare sunny & warm winter beach day, January 17th 2021. Pack your bags and pick up a Subway on our way. Decided to use the app to save time, it is winter after all, the sun sets earlier... So ordered three Subway sandwiches, pay via PayPal, and some 20 mins later finally at Subway to pick up the order... WHAT ORDER? asked the employee... what do you mean WHAT ORDER? I replied...

Since we was picking up the order to head out to beach ASAP, I snapped pics  of the order so my boyfriend could quickly go in and pick up the order... The restaurant said it never received our order, and even though I have PHOTOGRAPHIC EVIDENCE and PAYPAL EVIDENCE, still ZIPPO... Had to re-order and PAY again.. I ‚Äúcontacted‚Äù Subway through PayPal... ZIPPO still!

Give me my money back!

F THIS APP! Never using it again, THANK U NEXT!

p.s. When I click on ‚ÄúRecent Orders‚Äù on the APP, an ‚ÄúError Message‚Äù pops up... HMMM, ok, I have an iPhone 12 Pro-Max, my iOS and app were up to date, your APP BITES...

title: Love this app!!!
review: Lovin‚Äô how can save ur orders for quick and easy future orders.  You can even save your payment information for future orders, which in doing so, makes everything quicker and more convenient.  Your rewards pop up, so you don‚Äôt even have to click on anything to check if u have any.  Thanks for offering these services & making quarantine less frustrating!!!

title: Terrible app
review: This application refuses to except an entirely valid email to register. Instead it gives me an 800 number to call and speak to the web team. When you call that 800 number it instead tells you to go to the website and lodge your complaint there. They will not let you speak to a live person. So I went to the website and tried to register once again there. But it to refuse to accept an entirely valid email. When I tried to file a complaint through their online form, it offered me 4 subject areas to choose from, none of which were related to their subway application.

title: Limited Contact Purchase
review: Overall, am enjoying the app. My only complaint is that once I get to the store location to pick up my order I‚Äôm asked to sign a receipt. I‚Äôve purposely made payments through Apple Pay so I can have a contactless buying experience; which is then defeated by having to handle a clipboard and pen which has been handled by I don‚Äôt know how many other people before it‚Äôs handed to me - and clearly isn‚Äôt being regularly sanitized. Is this something you can correct immediately?

title: Waste of time.
review: Most times I want to order through the app it doesn‚Äôt work. Constant errors, asks me what location every time I click something, pizzas not even on the app menu, and several times the store didn‚Äôt even carry what I ordered and I don‚Äôt find out until I get there, kinda pointless to use the app with all the problems. You‚Äôd think this would be a simple way to order some food but it‚Äôs far from that. I just get irritated and order somewhere else. Been this way for months through several updates. I‚Äôm just going to delete after this review and forget it‚Äôs even an option.

title: Easy to use!
review: I love using this app! It took a little bit to figure out how to maneuver the app itself, but once I figured it out, I use it all the time. I order ahead and it‚Äôs ready when I get there. My one complaint is that there isn‚Äôt a way to only add ingredients to half a sandwich; or at least I haven‚Äôt figured that out yet. Thank you for an easy to use app that makes my life easier!

title: Sometimes convenient
review: There absolutely needs to be a prompt to ask which store you want your order sent to. Twice without thinking I sent my order to the wrong store since I‚Äôm always traveling.  Most other ordering apps have this so it‚Äôs puzzling that Subway does not have this. Other than that, app has gotten better and ordering is pretty straight forward.

title: Canceled Orders
review: I only use the app to get points, other than that üôÖüèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I will never mobile order ever again because you can‚Äôt cancel your order!! (There‚Äôs a button to cancel but that only directs you to call the store.) Some stores take forever to answer their phones and when you do get a hold of them they inform you that you have to come in to get a refund which is unfortunate if you‚Äôre traveling! So yea, the app took my $16 and I never recurved a refund or a gift card after months of emails and promises.

title: Poor app!
review:
I try to Add a card for payment, and I get an error message stating invalid card, which it is not. I sent a message to customer service and have not heard back. I would like to use the app, but unable to do so. Willing to give better rating if I can at least use the app.

After a period of time, I was able to get the app to work properly. Now that it is working, it works great!

title: So many glitches and spelling mistakes
review: I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs my area or what but it doesn‚Äôt work in Eugene Oregon. Constantly fails, gives me a ‚Äúdefault error‚Äù just opening the app. Doesn‚Äôt let you order even though we have plenty of subways. And it‚Äôs riddled with spelling mistakes‚Ä¶. Not to mention it has sandwiches listed none of my subways have heard of‚Ä¶

title: No tolerance for special dispensation creating an order
review:
The ordering process probably works fine. I admit I have not yet tried it. The reason I have not tried it it is because nearly all the time I come to Subway, I order a foot-long, but dress each half differently for my wife and myself. Workers are happy to do that in the store, but there is absolutely no mechanism for doing so in this app. I imagine I‚Äôll increase my rating at least one star, if not two, when the day comes I actually make an order, perhaps only for myself.

Take a cue from the Papa John‚Äôs app where you can specify a topping to go on the entire pizza, left half, or right half.

title: A favorite fast food app that‚Äôs easy!
review:
A definite go to favorite of food app‚Äôs that makes it simple to get exactly what you want or the sandwich just how it‚Äôs pictured and not waste time answering questions like what do you want on it. 
Umm I want that like like that in the picture. Lol

Current version doesn‚Äôt let you peruse the menu after hrs though so that‚Äôs a negative but otherwise it works well and has rewards.

title: App is convenient but don‚Äôt save your card
review: The app is super convenient when you want to order quickly and pop in and right back out for your food however do NOT save your card in the app. I live in the Midwest and had my app hacked - I paid $76 for 3 sandwiches, cookies and drinks to be delivered to some place just outside of New York City (yes, the idiots provided their address). Subway corporate makes it impossible to contact anyone to discuss refunds so I won‚Äôt ever use the app again.

title: Love it
review: So easy to just go in and have food ready and paid for. Only thing I would change is that when you pay with a gift card and funds don‚Äôt cover whole thing, you can‚Äôt use the remainder and then apply the balance to another card. It makes you use another card to cover whole amount. Just a website glitch.

title: I like the option for online ordering
review:
I like the option, but took a little bit of fumbling to figure out my toppings
Wanted to get their $5.99 deal but it didn‚Äôt show up until the very end when you go to pay. Took 10 minutes to figure that out. 
I‚Äôll know for next time to continue on until it gets to the payment and the discount will be applied

title: Good but missing ingredients
review: The app works well and is fairly intuitive once you get used to it which does the take long. The main issue is that there are ingredients I‚Äôve found at Subways around the country that aren‚Äôt available on the app. Oregano, Parmesan, etc. it‚Äôs also impossible to create a custom sandwich without working off one of the menu ones. I‚Äôd like twice the number of characters to type special instructions. Thanks for reading!

title: Fun, Fast 2Order - Unless
review: Unless you want a pizza or are unfamiliar with how to navigate the app. No worries. Won‚Äôt take long to figure out and offers lots of rewards for using. They ALWAYS get my order right when using the app vs calling it in. Tip* don‚Äôt start order without going to the home button and using coupon first. It will then lead you to the order.

title: Soup, I need soup!
review: Can someone please add the soup options that Subway offers please! I hate not being able to add my soup on the orders I make through the app. I literally have to pick up my mobile order and still go back to the line just to order a soup that I could‚Äôve been able to order before even stepping a foot into their locations.

title: This app is the worst
review: This app is literally the worst.  I downloaded a month ago and have yet to have a successful order, or to successfully pay in store using the app.  It doesn‚Äôt even know which stores actually take online orders. So when you show up to the store after ordering through the app - they are nice and polite, but they can‚Äôt provide a refund and the 800 number to call customer service tells you they have moved online, and then you find out that the store you ordered online through the app isn‚Äôt in their list of stores so you literally cannot cancel your order or get a refund.

title: Needs better customization options
review:
The app is fine if you want to order from the menu every time, but if you want to, say order a sandwich with turkey, salami and mayonnaise for example it is impossible. The app does not seem to support customization of any kind that doesn‚Äôt start from a base menu item sandwich,  nor can I find anywhere to include a note to the restaurant. 

The main page UI is cluttered and could use streamlining, especially when you have food in your cart.

title: I should be a spokesperson‚Ä¶I tell everyone!
review: I constantly joke that I should be a spokesperson for the subway app because I‚Äôm always telling everyone how much I love it! Especially for the pickup. I can order my family‚Äôs favorites in seconds and have it ready to pickup whenever I‚Äôm ready. It‚Äôs such a quick and convenient tool for a busy families.

title: Terrible timing
review: When you order with this app, you can only put it 20+ minutes out from when your order is placed, no sooner.  If I‚Äôm on my lunch break, and I get here in 5 minutes, I don‚Äôt have time to wait for food.  I got here and asked if they could start making it and they said they don‚Äôt have to have it ready until the time from the app and wouldn‚Äôt even start it while I watched them make other sandwiches for people walking in.  Complete crap. Update, they didn‚Äôt even start my sandwich until it was supposed to be ready.  6 min after estimated time.. almost 1/2 an hour to get a subway.

title: Very glitchy and often doesn‚Äôt work
review:
When it is working, it‚Äôs a helpful app. When it‚Äôs not, which is often, it is unusable. I have the latest update on my phone and the app and it‚Äôs still not working. I just keep getting pop ups that say that the product info is missing or it won‚Äôt load the page I‚Äôm trying to get to at all. Trying to start an order produces an ‚Äúerror try again later‚Äù message. It has been like this for over three weeks. 

Subway....please hire some real software coders, your high school students are failing.

title: Please hire competent developers
review:
Your app does NOT need to take over the audio from other applications. When you open it, it stops the music, or podcasts or anything that is playing. You only need to do that if you are going to play media. Not from the app opening.  A competent developer would know that. It is REALLY annoying. 

Additionally, not all the ingredients are available in the app. So ADD A COMMENT FIELD FOR @&&‚Äù@ SAKE, so you can tell the employees (that almost always don‚Äôt have English as their first language) what you want. That is the main reason to use the app!

I won‚Äôt use this app or go to your restaurant. Please learn from PANERA. Their app is excellent.

review:
The app lets you complete your order without finishing questions the store might have, so when you get to the store they didn‚Äôt prepare it. 
Subway, the people that do not come to your store anymore are the ones that don‚Äôt want to wait 10 minutes in line in their 30 minute lunch break, your app functionality is critical to getting customers back.
This is the only reason myself and others returned to Starbucks because the app works really well. Hope this helps.

I hope you are able to get this app all worked out because subway is one of my favorite places to eat.

title: Disappointed
review: Just downloaded this app to order dinner and discovered it doesn't allow you to enter coupons or select paying cash as an option.  I needed to order ahead as it was a large order, and had a coupon I wanted to use.  My plan was to send someone with cash to pick it up and use the coupon, but since that wasn't an option, I was stuck paying full price.  We eat at Subway a lot, but I won't be using the app again.  This seems like a basic function that should be pretty standard by now.  Very frustrating.

title: Defaults to last location you ordered
review: For some weird reason the apps default behavior is to order from the last location you placed an order. If you don‚Äôt move around that‚Äôs fine, but if you commute you have to make sure you manually type in the new location each time. Other food apps automatically just pick the closest location to you, this should be the default behavior but it‚Äôs not here.

title: OK App, but could use some tweaks
review:
I like ordering in an app then picking up the results. And this does that. I have two problems with it:

1. When opening the app it ‚Äúthinks‚Äù for a long time. It also does this just about anytime you change a screen. It eats up battery power like there‚Äôs nothing else a phone needs to do. 

2. When customizing a sandwich, there‚Äôs an option to have ‚Äúless‚Äù of something. I chose ‚Äúless jalape√±os‚Äù. I don‚Äôt think they pay attention to that at all. I also specifically asked for no jalape√±os in the notes box. Of course, there‚Äôs jalape√±os all throughout my sandwich. I would suggest having an option where you can say no to any ingredient instead of just less. 

Otherwise, it‚Äôs an ok app.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work for my needs
review: Tried to order a turkey sub with only lettuce and Turkey , nothing else.  The app adds tomatoes and oil and peppers and does not allow you to FULLY remove them , only to add less than the regular amount.  It‚Äôs what I always order so the app will not work for my needs which is too bad, it would be really convenient if it did. Now I have to manually call and then go to the register to pay .  It would save Subway and myself time if they updated the app to allow you to fully remove items which are automatically added.

title: Easy to use, but....
review: The app is easy to use and makes the waiting game basically obsolete. The only issue I had was not being able to use a gift card balance and a debit or credit card in the same Transaction. I was prompted to add funds to my gift card instead of being able to split this up.  Maybe I missed something and I‚Äôm mistaken.  If so please teach me how to do this.

title: Functionality poor
review: Frequent rewards offered but don‚Äôt work at all locations. You won‚Äôt know until you try to place the order sometimes. Then when you try to switch locations it cancels out of your order because the other location will be missing one or two ingredients from each of your sandwiches. There needs to be a better way to transfer The sandwich to different location minus the missing ingredients. Not ease of use or functionality.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work, no refund
review: I got the app after the website didn‚Äôt work for me. I had placed in order on the website and my local subway said they never received the order so I contacted subway and they told me they could do nothing about giving me a refund. I let it go and got the app to see if i had better luck then. Worse than the website. I can‚Äôt even sign up or log into the account I had previously made. No email works and it won‚Äôt even tell me why it isn‚Äôt working. I love the restaurant but they have horrible customer service online.

title: Says an error occurred when orders actually went through
review: I‚Äôve been experiencing an issue where the app tells me an error occurred and my order wasn‚Äôt completed when it actually went through. Because of this issue multiple duplicate orders were sent to a subway luckily staff there where smart enough to realize something weird happened and were able to refund me. I have so many issues with this app when it comes to getting orders to go through it regularly takes me multiple attempts to get an order through

title: Need more options through the app
review: The ‚Äúleave a comment‚Äù section is useless because the associates at the store never read them. I always have to leave a comment that I want my sandwich heated not toasted, and it‚Äôs never done. Also, you only get very few options for chips even though there are more options in the store. I will put that I want a certain type of chips and my comment is always ignored. It‚Äôs just annoying.

title: Good when it works
review:
You‚Äôd think having all the ingredients and options available to order ahead would allow for a better ordering experience..wrong answer here! 

I use a lot of food apps with customizable options, this one is by far the worst from navigation, to saving settings (reset my toppings when I change the size?!), errors trying to order, and coupons that my store is able to scan not working in the app.

Good when it works, good luck otherwise

title: Terrible
review: I think it is actually the worst maneuvered app you could ever imagine. First of all, it‚Äôs pretty simple to put your order in and customize sandwich etc problem gets to the end where I have tried to place my order at least ten times and the same error message comes up over and over but the error message isn‚Äôt even proper English. It starts off by saying ‚Äúuh oh‚Äù and continued with a bunch of computerized sayings that doesn‚Äôt even explain what the ‚Äòerror‚Äô even is. I‚Äôve tried to complete my order countless times until I gave up. It seriously made me lose my appetite and I don‚Äôt say that often.

title: Convenient and fun
review: Are use this app to order Subway when I have don‚Äôt feel like cooking and who doesn‚Äôt love subway now and again? Ha ha. Anyway it is a very easy app to use once you get the hang of it the sandwich theme of how it is built is pretty fun to play with once you add your ingredients and put it all together they do make pretty bomb sandwiches. Just wish the prices were so high I mean what happened to five dollar subs? LOL

title: Clunkiest app I‚Äôve ever used
review: This has to be the worst app I‚Äôve ever used. I‚Äôve used Apple products and the App Store for 10 years and I‚Äôve never wrote a review. But this app is so bad I had too. Navigation is horrible. Layout is horrible. UI is clunky. Billion dollar company and you have an app a child could develop. I can‚Äôt stand ordering from subway anymore. They have minimal employees in stores so you spend 20+ minutes trying to have the severely understaffed high school kids making sandwiches. They do this to push there online and mobile ordering because it‚Äôs more convenient. Don‚Äôt do that if you can‚Äôt do it right. Rant over.

title: Great food but app is not working correctly.
review: Love the Subway food for its flavor & healthy choices but we‚Äôve been having trouble with the app for about the last 3 weeks. We can no longer change the type of bread to what we want & the restaurant tells us that they don‚Äôt receive any info on what bread to use when they receive our order. We‚Äôre using iPhone 6S phones w/IOS 11.2.1.

title: Fix Add Payment Functionality
review:
Downloaded to order. When I went to add a credit card the ‚Äúnext‚Äù button is grayed out even after entering credit card, name, expiration and cvs.  It doesn‚Äôt give me any indication of why it won‚Äôt save my payment information or what the issue is. Please take my money and order. :) I was very happy with the app until I couldn‚Äôt complete my order.

Thanks!

title: Works great, tell your employees about it
review: The app is convenient, but not everything is available on it - like the breakfast croissant sandwich. When I order on the app they never read the comments, so maybe they need to be in a more obvious location for them to see? When I try to use the app in store they‚Äôre always really confused as to what it is and what to do. So overall the app functions great but I wish there was more employee awareness of it.

title: Newer version Subway app disappointing
review: The newer Subway app makes paying from your registered gift card via the app almost impossible. The store employees don't know how to receive payment from the app or to assist, but rether think your going to steal your order. The app's built in map to find the closest Subway always slows the app down. A big dissapontment form the first version of the app.

Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-08-24T17:39:25Z'}

title: HungerStrike
review:
The old original subway app was fine. However if using their "new and improved" app... you will absolutely starve to death before you are able to order anything. I think I dropped 5lbs just trying to order before I just gave up & went to Jimmy John's - this is worthless and wasted space on your phone. 
Crashes constantly or is ridiculously slow loading (however that could also have to do with having the crappiest phone carrier known to mankind ---> AT&T)
Gave it one star because it is actually a useful tool for thick honeys on a diet, you will not over eat because you won't get any chow at all.

title: Employee
review: I‚Äôve Been working at Subways for almost 6 months and it‚Äôs a really Grate job experience. Things aren‚Äôt  always not easy but there also not hard!! And it‚Äôs takes a teams effort for everything, I like when everybody‚Äôs stays communicative and the mangers makes sure everyone stays on track&&on the same Page.

title: Annoying
review: Got a disgusting sandwich. Customized my sandwich, changed the size and everything changed back to the ‚Äústandard.‚Äù Why can you change everything but the size? Also why does the standard pick some sides but not others? While also not picking a cheese. Makes no sense. Also app said it would be ready in 20 minutes (1:10 am) showed up at 1:17 and it was not ready till 1:24 because they didn‚Äôt make it until after I got there and it was dead. Also options are not the same in store for chips. Super annoying

title: Buggy App
review: Rewards are great but how to use the app is not intuitive (same goes for ordering in the store). Several times I go to order a footlong sandwich and customize what I want the sub to have (no Mayo). But if I click edit sub to change it back to a 6‚Äù sub instead it will completely restart my order if I had customized one of their pre made sandwich options, it will add back what I removed. I found this out after ordering and getting my sandwich so the sub does not come out how I originally wanted.

title: Smooth, fast, and easy
review: The app is very user friendly it allows you to add and remove items on your sandwich even gives options for ‚Äúmore-less‚Äù  great feature! The checkout process is quick allows you to use apple pay and keeps card on file for future purchases!

title: It‚Äôs come far, but‚Ä¶
review: This app used to be all but unusable. Nothing would load, would constantly crash, etc etc. it all seems to work now, which is great. I order regularly. But something needs to be done about gift cards. You need to allow people to split the difference if the card doesn‚Äôt cover the whole purchase, instead of making them then pay for the whole thing on a card. Literally just holding money hostage, and the only way to use it is to get another card and combine them, or reload it. Mad stupid.

title: Disappointed
review: The app is not bad but don‚Äôt ever try to review your order or check if you added all the things you wanted. The moment you hit edit for any of the items it completely resets your settings and you go to the store end up with a sandwich you did not want. Please developers why reset the entire settings when looking at your item! This is really poor design and now I have all this food I don‚Äôt want just trashed.

title: Bad upgrade
review: It's very bad to upgrade this app, ....during the whole pandemic I order and picked up without problems in the old app, and for 2 weeks now that I only have problems ordering and collecting my orders as before, not only now it is very slow to load the information but it is very difficult to sort and find the items that I'm going to order and not Please return to the last version and leave it as it wa

title: Simple, user friendly and convenient
review: I love the simplicity of this app, I just have an issue with not being able to order cookies. At least from the location I use frequently, or the update of those which are not available generally at the other location I‚Äôll use

title: Worst app I‚Äôve used
review: This app is poorly optimized and anti-user friendly. At the end during check out it tries to up-sell you on every sandwich you buy. No if I wanted to add some more or make it to a combo I would have done it myself I don‚Äôt need you to do it. There is no way to edit or cancel an order after it‚Äôs been placed the money is instantly taken out your credit card. Then they use the excuse of needing 3-4 days to refund it. This app really shows how little they care, and are solely motivated by money. I won‚Äôt be using this app or patronizing subway anytime soon.

title: First time user
review: Of course there‚Äôs a learning curve, but this app was easier than most I‚Äôve tried. Only problem I had was not knowing what to do after I selected the credit card I wanted to use; no real instruction to press ‚ÄúUse Passcode.‚Äù I didn‚Äôt know what passcode it was referring, but given no other choice I did click it and it became obvious what passcode was required. No problem then.

title: Worst app for ordering
review:
Compared to other chain restaurants such as Chipotle, Rubio, Dominos, this is by far the worst app.  

Convoluted, constant pop up ads, make it hard to find and use coupons or rewards. Crashing.  Payment not going through or looking like not going through (and end up charging multiple times), food not being ready by time (or even 10 minutes after the time which is 30 minutes after the order). Between crappy app and crappy franchise, it makes it very difficult for me to keep ordering from this app.

title: Clunky UI
review:
This app is definitely needed but the programming and UI is pretty bad. This app has been out for how long now and I‚Äôm still running into basic bugs?  I tried to order a personal pizza and was hit with a ‚ÄúTopping group ID min:1max:1‚Äù message and could not order it.  

I should be able be able to open the app and fully placed a customized order in 30s.  I often spend closer to 5 minutes trying to work through all the menus. Also, does every new screen need to have a loading symbol?

title: Worthless
review: Worthless app doesn‚Äôt remember my payment methods. I‚Äôve tried three times in the store wasting 20 minutes when I could‚Äôve just paid full price. Stupid deal is useless. I entered payment methods three times I tap ‚Äúagree and pay‚Äù  and I entered all my information but it takes me to a screen that says no payment method found with a stupid looking frowning wallet. What a hunk of trash. Laughable they wasted all that money on ads for something that doesn‚Äôt even work. I was in the store so long I still got that crappy smell on my clothes that won‚Äôt go away and I remember why I stopped eating there a decade ago

title: Faster way to order üòÉüòÉ
review: I really love the app because with mobile ordering...you can schedule your pick up time and it‚Äôs ready for you when you walk in so you can skip the line. Also...if you have a rewards card...you can load that onto your account...put some money on it and your food is already paid for so all you have to do is go pick it up üòÉüòÉüòÉüòÉ

title: APP CLAIMS ARE FALSE
review: I was happy to see the most recent updates.  Entered an order on my IPad and went to check out ... NO, Apple Pay does not work.  After messing with that for awhile with no success I tried to place an order that I would pay for in store ... can‚Äôt do that.  There seems to be such an option but when you click on that and go back to place your order that is not a listed payment option.  Also even though the release notes brag that you can get curbside delivery, the app then says the store you are using doesn‚Äôt do curbside delivery.  So bottom line is I gave up, you lost business.

title: Subway gets app food ordering right
review: They have made designing, ordering paying and the next time retrieving for reorder my family‚Äôs favorite sandwiches a breeze. Totally contactless if you store your credit card on file, and save & label your family members sandwiches. Spend the time once to get it tuned in exactly how you want the next time you‚Äôll have a complex order in and paid for in seconds.

title: It hasn‚Äôt worked for over a month
review: The app won‚Äôt even let me sign in to my account. After I put my email and password, it crashes. I‚Äôm always forced to use the website on my phone which is a pain. I‚Äôve tried uninstalling and redownloading and nothing. It‚Äôs a shame, I enjoyed using it while it worked, I wish they‚Äôd fix this app and make it more reliable.
developerResponse: {'id': 1597924, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we will definitely look into this issue. Feel free out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2017-10-26T20:30:30Z'}

title: Please fix!
review: It does not send a notification to the store after I place an order.  Multiple times I have had to wait for the employees to prepare my order when I arrive to pick it up because they aren't being notified that an order has been placed.  It is also not user friendly.  Very difficult and sometimes impossible to add or remove items.  Please fix or go back to the older version.  It would also be a good idea for Subway to test the app before it is released to the public. Seriously, it is faster and less of a hassle to just place your order at the restaurant instead.
developerResponse: {'id': 1597783, 'body': 'We are sorry this happened - please share more details with us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2017-10-26T19:57:00Z'}

title: Quick and Fast Service!!
review: This subway app does an amazing job by creating an easy to use virtual menu which allow the user to craft their own personal sandwich. The stores I have used always have my meal ready before the pick up time, and lines are never long. This is by far my favorite food ordering app!

title: 20 minutes late
review: The app it's self isn't that bad. It's a little difficult to use just having a "next sandwich" button would make it better but what bothered me was that I order 2 sandwiches, and set my pick up time 20 minutes from the time of the order and I still waited in the store 20 minutes past my pick up time. 5 new customers walked in around my pick up time and all got served before me. I guess sub way thinks "Oh he paid already if he leaves here angry without his food because he's late for something it's no skin off our nose."
developerResponse: {'id': 1144233, 'body': 'Hi there- We are definitely not happy to hear that your experience was anything less than perfect! Can you share some more details (your order number, the restaurant location and your username) with us at appfeedback@subway.com so that we can make this right? Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-08-30T19:25:52Z'}

title: Show no store location I guess to help individual stores rip me off
review: Subway app is showing no store locations on my iPhone SE second generation and I‚Äôm guessing because the app helps me make my food cheap as I can get it and if I go into the store they will ring me up for their own price, maybe just a couple dollars more but for a peon like me a dollar is more than just chump change and anytime I used to use the app when it did work and I would select double protein the store location would not double the proteins and then they would call it double protein

title: Need to locate prior to ordering
review: Every other food app I use will confirm location. This app just defaults to the last location. So it will let you order from a store 100 miles away without hesitation. Then you can‚Äôt cancel even if you notice immediately. So then you have to call the store. Then it‚Äôs 3-5 days. All nonsense by modern standards. Simply confirm the location like many others particularly if it‚Äôs many miles away!!   All other apps already do that and I am not using this one again until it does, and I am walking distance from a subway at my work.
developerResponse: {'id': 4198034, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2022-03-16T18:43:46Z'}

title: Hit or miss here
review: I used the app a few times and thought it was great.  Then it updated.  First all my order history was gone ( ok I can start fresh). Now the menu doesn‚Äôt work.  So I can order the one thing I managed to get added as a favorite but since none of my order history is there I can even add a previous order.  So for now, I can order the same sandwich or nothing.  Great!  Maybe the next update will include a menu again.

title: App broken
review: The app no longer works. Can‚Äôt place an online order at all. Can‚Äôt take advantage of the online promotions because the store will not honor the promos. Tried to call corporate several times and there‚Äôs no live person to talk to to get the problem fixed. My wife app on her phone is doing the same. Every location shows that pickup is not available. I‚Äôve used the app for a few years, but some update must have messed up the program. If not fixed soon, I‚Äôll be deleting the program and stop going to subway and go to Publix.

title: Can‚Äôt submit orders
review:
I hate to leave such a low review, but being unable to order on this app is a pretty critical flaw. 
Whenever I try to submit my order, I get a message that reads ‚ÄúUh-Oh! cannot read property ‚Äòupdate‚Äô of undefined‚Äô.
I‚Äôll happily change the rating once I‚Äôm able to place orders again, otherwise this app is very well made!

title: Time is my biggest complaint
review: The app works pretty well. It has crashed a few times but not much. I like the points system. The ordering and customizing works pretty well, except if you have to go back and edit it‚Äôs a little clunky. I‚Äôd give it four or five stars but every time I use it they give me an estimated time. I show up at that time and they are just starting my order. I might as well come in and order bc it take them longer to put together the sandwich with written orders than verbal

title: MISSING FROM THE MENU
review: Two of our favorite subs cannot be ordered on the app so I have trouble every time I try to order them. Our family love the Black forest egg ham and cheese and I personally love the salami sub. For some reason neither of these can be found on the app so I always have to add things in the notes. I would love for them to update it with these added to the menu. Then I would give it a five star! üòä

title: Love app, needs fixes
review: Love using the app. There‚Äôs needs to be a way to change locations without having to redo EVERYTHING!!! There also needs to be a way to edit your sandwich without it adding as an EXTRA SANDWICH!!! Very frustrating. Also when in your cart... having the option to add drinks and chips is great BUT!!!! It‚Äôs hard to see what‚Äôs in your cart with those options jumbled in there also. Move all that to the side or make it a pop up window. Otherwise... love the app and the deals!

title: Great Job! This app is a success.
review:
To users: 
The app works great, simple to understand. Ordering though the app will save you money and time. 

To the dev team and the business ops team who clearly worked TOGETHER to make this whole thing work. 
In my personal experience your app is flawless. A wonderful design makes the app easy and honestly, fun to use. The subway app is a case study for masterful use of design in creating a user experience in technology. 
With that said, the success of the subway app is truly seen at the restaurant. Walking into the restaurant to pick up an order is so easy and effective. The coordination between restaurant workers and the app system is inspiring. 5 stars for those workers too!

title: It‚Äôs inconvenient
review: I have been using this app, and on the surface it works.  The only major issue is that you can change everything but the meat.  I prefer hard salami subs, but I cannot get within the app.  I‚Äôm then penalized by not getting my buy one get one free.  I continually have to go inside and I would really like for it to be fixed.

title: Minor adjustments
review: Cheese should be a must almost forgot to add Because the option is on the bottom. Also I get the subway deals sent to my phone I would like an option to add the deal I get thru text in the mobile app. That would get me to buy more often because who doesn‚Äôt like to save money. That would be a huge deal for me and I‚Äôm sure many others.

title: Needs updating
review: First of all - I do like the Subway app. We use it frequently. That‚Äôs why I am continually frustrated by not being able to transfer the same order from one location to another. It‚Äôs not possible. If all Subways had the same bread it wouldn‚Äôt be an issue. But they don‚Äôt. My 2nd issue- I get great coupon offers via texts several times a week. They are ONLY available to use INSIDE the shop for 5 min. when you pay there. So- why use the app?  Time to update the app!

title: Surprisingly good, but still has a couple bugs
review: My only real complaint is that this lacks Apple Pay, requiring us to go through what now feels like an archaic process of adding a card‚Äôs number manually. Besides this I had a bug where it wouldn‚Äôt take my card‚Äôs number, which I resolved by restarting the app. I‚Äôll consider this a 5-Star and nearly perfect app once it has Apple Pay; it‚Äôs incredibly easy to get orders in with.

title: Great app
review: I like the convenience of being able to order subway on my phone and then simply go pick it up once it‚Äôs ready. It‚Äôs always been ready on time for me and everything is still fresh. I also like how my rewards account is linked on the app as well so when I order, I get rewards. The app is very user friendly and easy to navigate. I recommend!

title: Seamless order experience and huge time saver!
review: The Subway app is great!  It was fun to be able to build my own sandwich and select the ingredients. Since I like my sandwiches custom, it is a great time saver to be able to save a favorite also. The whole order experience was playful and easy to use. Will definitely be using this often and would recommend it to others!
developerResponse: {'id': 997503, 'body': 'Hi - thank you for sharing the positive feedback- we are thrilled that you are enjoying our new mobile app, and thank you for choosing SUBWAY¬Æ Restaurants!', 'modified': '2018-02-08T19:08:12Z'}

title: Points Tracking
review: I would really love if one of these updates would bring back a method to view your current points within the app. That was a feature that I really miss. Also, a way to order with those points. I do order remotely and would love to be able to use my points without having to go inside the store and wait in line.
developerResponse: {'id': 2164209, 'body': 'This feature is definitely on our radar. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience but for now, you can  track your balance and reload your card at mysubwaycard.com. If you have any more questions, feel free to call us at 1-800-888-4848 or send an email to appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-12-29T16:04:45Z'}

title: Great food and staff!
review: I ordered curbside today on Foxon Road Shoprite Plaza East Haven because I walk with a cane and curbside is so much easier for me! The staff here is always friendly, courteous and professional! They care about their customers! The food is always fresh and delicious; handled with care in mind!  When the weather is warmer I like to sit inside and people watch!  It‚Äôs a great Subway!

title: never delivered food, no way to contact
review:
TLDR: don‚Äôt use this app, order directly through doordash 

waited an hour for my food, it was marked as delivered but the driver never came. i tried to call the store i ordered from twice but they wouldn‚Äôt pick up. i had no way to directly contact the driver. i had to call door dash customer service, who also could not get ahold of the driver. 

they also told me since i put the order in through the subway app and not directly through doordash, i have to get my refund through subway. door dash could not get directly in contact with subway customer service so they had to send an email request to them for my refund. so now i‚Äôm not even entirely sure that i will get my money back.

im left with no food, no refund (hopefully only for now), and over two hours of my time wasted.

definitely will not be using this app again.

title: Not as great restaurant apps
review:
I love subway but the app loads slowly, you can‚Äôt customize your sub anymore and no deals work even when I get a notification for it. Going to chop that up to the subway near me but participating anything.

 Also can you please make two options for the chicken bacon. (rotisserie chicken or white chicken strips) always have to ask them to change it in special instructions which is a 50/50 chance they read it

title: Everything you could want from a quick serve restaurant app
review: I really like the pictures they make it easy to visualize your order, the deals section was sparse but I imagine that is because I haven‚Äôt built up my rewards points. I plan on using this app for all my subway needs. It is on par with the Taco Bell and McDonald‚Äôs app in quality.

title: problems
review: I have had several problems with the app‚Ä¶ today was the most inconvenient one‚Ä¶ I could not pay on the app. it kept telling me default again and again. I have money on it. It wouldn‚Äôt accept it. I have had other problems in store before too. It‚Äôs frustrating. So frustrating i went somewhere else. I only have so much time on my break as a school staff so when I want to go out to eat it‚Äôs a treat and a bit of a plan. I normally do not leave reviews but today I had enough of this app having problems.

title: Poorly designed app
review: The app is horribly designed. When you mean you want all the toppings, it makes you do choices that mean ‚Äúno toppings‚Äù. The people at the restaurant are more than happy to see the order with no toppings because it is less work for and say nothing to save themselves work. I don‚Äôt blame the teens. Go back and redesign this! BTW, when you switch out of the app and switch back (after googling for example) it loses everything you have painstakingly added. Deserves negative stars for the anguish, frustration and extra work it imposes on you.

title: Great except‚Ä¶..
review:
I love the app except for a few things. When you make it a meal you can‚Äôt get a larger size drink. And I had an order with a subway on highland rd a couple weeks back after a hurricane so it was hard enough with traffic lights out. Only to arrive doors locked and woman working had a ‚Äúfamily emergency ‚Äú so I looked everywhere for a way to be reimbursed. I couldn‚Äôt wait for her to get back and fulfill my order because my children were needing to be picked up. 

I asked her about a refund but of course she said the site would need to refund me and I still hadn‚Äôt found a way. Hoping this will be read and I can get refunded 

It was order # ODD3DD8A2C

Other than those things I‚Äôm very pleased.

title: Pretty much useless
review:
This app is very pretty and clean-looking, but other than that it is pretty much useless for fast ordering on the go.

Not only are there multiple issues with logging into their rewards program‚Äîit becomes hard to bypass it if you just want to order and move on.

Secondly, it routinely (as does the website ordering system) tries to send me to a location other than the one I‚Äôve selected; for various reasons. 

Thirdly, the pay system on the app on iPhone makes you use iwallet which is another obstacle if you don‚Äôt already have that set up. And when you do, it still doesn‚Äôt guarantee it will work‚Äîand further, by this time the user is frustrated and it has taken so long you decide to give up and choose something else-a different meal-that you don‚Äôt have to fight with.

title: Everything is not on the App
review: I found several items that I normally get from Subway is not listed on the app. It doesn't list all the types of bread, drinks or chips. It also does not give you the option of the cookies. I am not sure if it is just the location I chose or if they are all like that. The app is great but could be better if all choices are listed.

title: Love convenience!
review:
Love the app! Love being able to buy breakfast from my office and any one of us can go pick it up without keeping track of everyone‚Äôs preferences. It‚Äôs a big time saver! 

Hate that I have to drive past 3 Subway‚Äôs that don‚Äôt participate in using the app before 11 am! The closest one did and then stopped. Not sure the issue, but I know they lose $42 a week from our office for breakfast.

title: LOVING the Subway App!!!
review: I have to drive a lot during the work day and I love Subway but wouldn‚Äôt stop there because it took too much time. With the app, I order for when I‚Äôll be at a specific location and I pay when I order. I‚Äôm in and out with my custom made food in under a minute! It‚Äôs faster than any drive through and much better tasting! I‚Äôm telling everyone!

title: Lies
review:
I downloaded the app because there was a promotion running buy 2 get one free.
I got 3 of them and it charged me for all 3 it never gave me a chance to apply the discount. Only showed me a little tab saying to check before I buy. 
CHECK WHERE? why can‚Äôt you just tell me if I can or cannot use it. Please make stuff clearer I don‚Äôt wanna have to go and hunt stuff down. When I click a link saying imma get something free I expect to get something for free. I made an account and everything just to gain this promotion. I‚Äôm using this app and not eating with subway again I‚Äôm salty as heck

title: Cheese options don‚Äôt exist
review:
This app seems mostly great, the only issue I ever seem to have is it doesn‚Äôt allow me to add cheddar cheese to a spicy Italian sandwich. There are very specific types of cheese it allows with that type of sandwich apparently. Coming from a place that is supposed to be all about choosing what you want, you think the app would be the same. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
In order to get the correct order I have to add a note for the restaurant to add cheddar cheese. üôÑ

title: Easy to use overall
review:
Very simple. Overall great; and the deals for o line order keep us coming back! 
Only problem is limited chip selection on the app, they don‚Äôt have all the fridgerated drinks as options and the sandwiches have the preselected toppings which are easy to remove if not wanted but I cannot figure out how to add toppings so I‚Äôm just stuck with limited topping options. It‚Äôs probably there, just not as easy to find

title: Incompetent Designers/Developers
review:
It looks like they used some nasty turnkey middleware to build this steaming pile, because it‚Äôs just a bad website wrapper.  The registration process, ordering process, basic navigation and integration with iOS is all a joke. Slow even on fantastic connections, buggy and annoying.

Just go to the store or call ahead if you have a big order because this is a headache.  Grab a physical reward card at the register if you‚Äôre a frequent customer.

Every time I‚Äôve tried to use this it‚Äôs cost them my business for that day.

title: Do not recommend
review: I would not recommend using this. Every time I have used it they have not made my sandwich correctly. The most recent time I got extra lettuce because before when I just got the normal amount there was hardly any. There was not any at all this time. It was also missing other stuff that I had said I wanted on my sandwich. It‚Äôs just easier to go inside and make sure you get the correct sandwich. It‚Äôs a shame because I liked the layout of customizing your sub on the app and thought I was a helpful way to do it.

title: Good app but could...
review: None you might Nice but lack of customization of making your ‚Äúown‚Äù sandwich. It would be nice feature to build your sub from the ground. Basically what you would do in the store. Pick your bread, cheese, meat, and what ever else specifically. Like building a sliced turkey sandwich. You can‚Äôt do it on the app without selecting a signature sub that‚Äôs similar then customizing it from there. Not the end of the of the world but would make the app better.

title: Subway Subway Subway!
review: I quite like the app, it‚Äôs visually appealing, it‚Äôs functional. The ability to get rewards and order at the same time is awesome. A++ to the UI Engineers! My only, not even a complaint, suggestion is that when you‚Äôre done ordering a sandwich, it doesn‚Äôt bring you back to the ability of adding another sandwich, you have to tap home again. But, awesome app!

title: Easiest way to get Subway
review: I love this app, and I order my food from it almost every day! It streamlines the ordering process, so I do not have to stand in line and awkwardly tell the sandwich artist what I want. The app is super easy to use, and as a bonus, you get a discount after you order food a few times. Couldn‚Äôt be happier! Download this app to have your own personal portal to Subway deliciousness!!!

title: Gear app!
review:
This app works great and really comes in handy when I only get a few minutes for lunch. I can create an order and pay all right here. Luckily Subway is in the same plaza I work in so it‚Äôs not a long travel time to get. 
I have it 4 stars because I do have a hard time redeeming some of the rewards. I try to add it to my order but it tells me the order doesn‚Äôt qualify. But other than that it‚Äôs easy to use and convenient.

title: Only good for one thing...
review:
This app is only good for one thing, and that‚Äôs to see how many points you have.
I was told (and surprised) that points expire after a period of time, so I thought I‚Äôd download the app to figure out when my points expire and how often I should visit a shop. Nope. A pretty useless app overall. (And you would think they would show you what you could get with the rewards too!)

Subway uses a point/reward system but doesn‚Äôt promote it. A lot of companies will entice you points/rewards to make a sale. This app is such a potential loss.

Will keep the app just so I know how much points I have (to see if/when I can redeem them), but that‚Äôs about it.
If I need to make room on my phone in the future, this app will be one of the first to go.

Don‚Äôt bother using/downloading unless you just want to check on your points (but you can easily do that at the shop or just go online for that).

Disappointment.

title: No ‚ÄúBuild your own‚Äù option
review: I don‚Äôt like how rigid the app is with customization where it locks main ingredients, but doesn‚Äôt offer any DIY or build your own way to make things like if you were in the store. Needs to be added if you want customers to order ahead via the app. Also, why can‚Äôt you have different amounts of meat on one sub? (Example: On the club sandwich you can‚Äôt select extra bacon without it making ALL of the meats the extra as well.). It‚Äôs an okay start, but needs these basic updates for my rating to change!
developerResponse: {'id': 9270449, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-06-20T14:58:31Z'}

title: Pretty okay. Does the job, not necessarily well
review: The cashiers usually don‚Äôt know how to use multiple cards when you scan at the store. The app works pretty well but sometimes it orders if you had a full cart but exited out of the app. They‚Äôve always made my sandwich early so even if I come before it says it‚Äôs ready it‚Äôs already made. One time i came an hour late and they didn‚Äôt throw away my sandwich, but it was also one of those times when it ordered because I closed out of the app.
developerResponse: {'id': 8173933, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-04-11T14:40:55Z'}

title: completely satisfied
review: The order was done exactly how I placed it and filled faster than expected. The sandwiches were not skimpy or over done with any ingredients. Just perfect not too much or too little. The young lady that attended my father spoke Spanish which was a plus. I found my favorite subway. I‚Äôm ordering from here always. Great job Subway!

title: Lousy App
review:
This is my update on subways newest version of their app. Have used it only once. It‚Äôs better than the previous version which I got rid of. I‚Äôll update my comments as I get more experience with their newest version. Given their history and poor performance, I‚Äôm not expecting much.

Subway made a big mistake developing this to the newest version of their online ordering app.

The prior version was far more functional. The new app is a downgrade. Ordering is a mess. Finding a new store almost impossible. If you are fortunate enough to be able to find a store and put in an order, the app will create the wrong date for pick up. 

Pretty pictures and cute cartoon images are the new additions. They do little to enhance the usability. Worthless app.
developerResponse: {'id': 990235, 'body': 'Hello. We are sincerely sorry to hear that you are not thoroughly satisfied with the new App experience. We highly value your feedback and are taking each point into consideration for a possible future enhancement.', 'modified': '2018-02-25T20:38:31Z'}

title: Charged twice
review: Tried making an order for 2 sandwiches on the app but when after putting in my payment information and submitting the order I kept getting an error. After a few more attempts and getting the same error I gave up and walked in and ordered normally. A few days later after checking my bank account on my phone I realized I had been charged twice. For the amount they charged me I could‚Äôve gotten way better quality sandwiches at Jersey Mike‚Äôs. Never stepping foot in another subway after this.

title: Hate this app
review: First thing I see when I open app is spam. 15% off coupon. I try to order while driving but every click takes 20 second to load next screen. When I finally get to checkout after an entire minute. The annoying coupon that was shoved in my face doesn‚Äôt even work. At this point I‚Äôve stopped the car and giving feedback. Make option for no ads and 1 click checkout please I order the same thing every time and always pay the same way just take my money already!

title: Buyer beware!
review: Watch out on this app! If you order and they can not make your sub, no bread in my case, they still take your money and there is no way to cancel the transaction. It took me two trips to the store and 10 days to get my money back. I even contacted the corporate offices and never heard back. I am shocked at the lack of understanding on how an app should run and at the very, very, very, poor customer service and experience. I hope none of you have to go through this. Stick with other fast food apps. All the others work great for me.

title: Amazing app
review: I love subway and the subway app. Everything works great on it besides being able to pick the location of the store(I have multiple around me) and it always takes 40-50 minutes to get here even though subway is about 4 minutes away from me but besides that it‚Äôs amazing!

title: Awesome App!!!
review: The app is SUPER easy to use.  You‚Äôre able to add/remove and change the amount if you want more or less AND you can type a message for special instructions!!  Payment is just a click!!  If any issues, they‚Äôll call!!!  The added bonus is that when you buy 2 foot longs..they‚Äôre $5 each!!!

title: Works well enough
review: The ordering page is a little odd at first. If you didn‚Äôt think to try and scroll down then you wouldn‚Äôt know all the options are there. As soon as you click on an item you just have an add to cart button at the bottom and no real obvious sign that you should scroll down to see all the options. Once you figure that out and everything works pretty smoothly.

title: Default: Please try again
review:
First thing I'm greeted with: "we messed some stuff up and don't know how to migrate authentication tokens, so here's a big button that forces you to log out". Tapped it, was logged out. Now log in again. Thankfully I have it saved (every site has a random password I'd have to hunt down).

Next thing I'm greeted with: a dialogue titled "Default" that just says "please try again". Ordering works and all, but any time I go to the Home tab, it gives this Default message again.

After ordering, I didn't get tracking or a summary, so I had no idea if the store got it... The app shows the order in history but acts like I'm trying to make a new order. So I just went to the store and waited for it.

Fairly bumpy experience. Would be a bit better if not for the obscure, featureless dialog titled "Default".

title: Works good, but could be better
review:
It works as it intended and provides option to use Apple Pay etc. It‚Äôs still easy to navigate through the order.

However, it seems hard to find the menu before actually getting into the order.

It would be good that it confirms the pickup date and let user select a time for pickup.

title: Hatred
review:
Oh how I hate this app, let me count the ways. 
Everytime I go to download it and use it- I run into problem after problem until I give up. This time GR says all my subway locations near me are closed on Sunday. I check their google hours and they are not. I call to confirm and they are in fact open but the app won‚Äôt let me order because they are ‚Äòclosed‚Äô. 
Hate this app. Have yet to actually order because I always hit so many hurdles that I cannot actually order through it.

title: Charges occur but orders are not put through
review:
By now I have a success rate of 40%. What‚Äôs annoying is that the app charges me (repeatedly) via Apple Pay, yet does not place an order at the store. Staff then doesn‚Äôt know about it, do not reimburse and made me pay for a sandwich that I then ordered. I had to dispute the transactions with my credit card company. 
Once, the app said ‚ÄúFraud Alert‚Äù when I ordered, did not place an order, yet the payment went through. With a success rate of less than 50% I am not impressed and may have to give up on Subway. Zero stars.

title: No Cancel Order Feature?
review:
After realizing I had made a mistake on my order, I immediately tried cancelling (and this was within 5min of submitting order on the app). There was no option or button to cancel the order, only a phone number provided for the store. So, I tried calling the Subway store 7 times with no answer. Reached out to customer service for help with the situation and received no actual remediation. 
Very appalled to see an app for a service industry business this size fail at user experience 101. Even more so, disappointed with the poor response from customer service.

title: Bad interface
review: Spend 20 mins making an order to find out that the location I selected did not honor the buy 2 get on free deal (which you cannot find out until you add them all in the cart). I tried to switch locations but then it HAD to clear my order before it switched. Stared the new order. 15 min in adding the last sub which was a Pizza sub and it seems that location ‚Äúdoes not have them‚Äù or at least not on the app. So over 30 mins later I guess we are just driving to it and order there... and no coupon since it was an online only deal.

title: Changed my life
review: This app was the start of a newer, better me. Everything was going wrong in my life, but Subway definitely turned that around! I used to stay at home and play video games and didn‚Äôt really have much luck with girls, but now I have 3 separate girls who all want to go on Subway dates to get two $5 footlongs. And now I am thinner, happier, and more charming than ever before!

title: Missing Product Information
review:
This app needs a lot of work. Easier to walk to a local store, wait in line, step a person through your order and pay.

First, even if you do use this app, you can expect to wait for a cashier to hand you your order from behind the counter. At chipotle, electronic orders are on a shelf and you can walk up and pick up your order right away.

Second, the app doesn‚Äôt tell you what time to pick up. You can only see that in the email you get after ordering. 

Third, the app breaks when you try to reorder, (at least it did for me), with a ‚Äúmissing product information‚Äù error message. I closed app, restarted, and even tried to renter a new order. Somehow the app got itself into a state where it couldn‚Äôt process a new order. Had to delete and reinstall.

I‚Äôm a developer, and this app was made by people who don‚Äôt really care about the end user experience. Terrible.

title: Enjoy using the App
review: I live 11 miles away from Subway that‚Äôs the closest to me.  I like being able to order from home & can send my husband to pick up.  Simple for him & he can do a errand instead of sitting at home under my feet.  Plus easy for me to pick up when in a hurry. I‚Äôm glad I learned how to use your app. Thank you ! Jean Miller

title: Feature for participating subways
review: Recently subway has made a 2 foot long for 5 dollars each deal, however there is no way of knowing which locations are participating beyond checking each store individually. It would be great if I didn‚Äôt have to make a cart each and every time to find out which locations do offer this deal. After checking 12 nearby subways (4 mile radius) none of them are offering the deal, which makes me feel like I completely wasted my time, don‚Äôt understand why I would get advertisement for a deal that is not being offered at a location near me.

title: App Useless
review: I really enjoy the food and service at my local Subway but the app never paid the restaurant so they wouldnt make my sandwich until I showed them my credit card had been charged. It was supposed to be ready at 11:05 according to the app confirmation but until I showed them my credit card transactions they wouldn‚Äôt make my sandwich. They said the owner told them not to make sandwiches based on the confirmation in the app. I‚Äôd still be waiting if I couldn‚Äôt show my card had been charged because there is now way to cancel an order or ask for a refund. Good food, terrible app.

title: Easy to use
review: I like this app - especially the way it recommends what to get on the sandwich. My husband is always overwhelmed by the choices and likes to have guidance. Lol. I don‚Äôt like that the seasonal things aren‚Äôt available. For example, I wanted the caramel apple cookies and they weren‚Äôt an option. Neither are the chip flavor selections at my subway. Other than those two minor inconveniences, this app is awesome.

title: Suggestion.
review:
I‚Äôd give a five star BUT. When using the APP you‚Äôve ordered and paid for your food. Then once you get there you‚Äôve got to wait in line in drive thru to get your food. I ordered the other day for lunch and waited in line for 30 minutes. 
Since APP users have ordered and paid, you need a couple of parking spots and make them priority since it‚Äôs simply a take food out, sign and go. 
You‚Äôd get a lot more customers and APP users!!!!!

title: I‚Äôm suppose to eat when Subway wants me to
review: So first time ordering ahead for lunch I work a regular 9-5 job and about 30 min befor my lunch break I order my sandwich there was no option for what time I should pick it up or anything so I clicked place order thinking it would give me that option next but no I wasn‚Äôt it was just ok your sandwich will be ready 2 and 1/2 hrs later terrible app terrible design on orders only app I‚Äôve seen that didn‚Äôt have a option for what time you would like to pick up your sandwich would never refer this app way it is now

title: Stunning terrible
review: The app fails to load the first time you launch every time I start an order. I hate that it loads up your sandwich with virtually everything and you have to remove all the extras. Editing a favorite should be much easier that it is which also bugs me. The today I wanted to order one sandwich when the order bugged out I started over and it failed a second time only I happened to see an email come saying my order completed. Go to the store and yep two sandwiches were waiting for me. So yes stunningly terrible.
