title: Subway app review
review:
This is honestly probably the best fast food ordering app avaliable right now. Super intuitive user interface and logical ordering mechanics.

A few things that could be improved:
1) remove ads asking me for extra products I don't want (though this can be disabled though)
2) the app did not correctly display all avaliable flavors of chips at my location

title: First time
review:
First time using this app and it didn‚Äôt work.  I was able to create my order, add a payment method, but when I hit order I received an error stating the bag wasn‚Äôt available.  I tried the option of clearing the bag, so I did and deselected everything. I again received the bag is unavailable error.  I had to go to the storefront to place my order.  While there I tried scanning my rewards card created when I created my account for the app.  The card wouldn‚Äôt scan.  

As a side note I tried using the subway website to place an order, but it couldn‚Äôt find any stores near me or anywhere.
developerResponse: {'id': 5525340, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-10-16T14:25:59Z'}

title: Latest review
review:
I use this app every weekday because I don‚Äôt like standing in line. Self employed and I want a short easy lunch. I have thrown this app away 3 times but I have to say they have improved it finally. Since the last update I have had no problems. Today I received a call to let me know they ran out of the bread I ordered and they canceled the order for me, customer service. Now the long line looks at me and you can see in their eyes what the?

Go for it.

Earlier review 

I have had problems with ordering enough times that I am dumping this app. I just tried canceling an order and the phone number they gave me was a fax line. I hate this app for wasting my time. How do I give   Zero stars
developerResponse: {'id': 990101, 'body': 'Hi there- We are definitely not happy to hear that your experience was anything less than perfect! Can you share some more details (your order number and username) with us at appfeedback@subway.com so that we can make this right? Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-12-09T04:05:05Z'}

title: Convenient and easy to use
review: First time using this App and haven‚Äôt picked up order yet. It was easy to use and make changes to a point. As a Club member we get special offers each week but couldn‚Äôt figure out on use them. Put it in notes. Also couldn‚Äôt figure out how to order multiple sandwiches on same order. I am 71 so I don‚Äôt count those as App problems unless u are like me. I will have to get my grandkids to train me.

title: Love my subway app!
review: It‚Äôs so easy to edit the sandwich and all the choices you make along the way. I love the more and less options for veggies, sauces, and everything else. Any deals that are out there are listed and super easy to apply. Plus I earn rewards and the app reminds me to use them! Great app for ordering and saving money!

title: Completely Non-functional
review: This app is completely useless. I can't even get signed in because it comes up with the captcha. It's an app for crying out loud! Why do we need a stupid captcha for an app?! And teh captcha is on the LOGIN screen.  I'd be fine with it if it actually worked. But the captcha is mostly off-screen so I can't get past it at all. AT ALL. Can't rotate the phone because that does nothing. The app is portrait only. And forget trying to get app support the answer is "Find the help and support in the app" - well, you CAN'T if you can't sign in. You need another venue to report issues if your users CAN'T EVEN SIGN IN!
developerResponse: {'id': 1109936, 'body': 'Hi- we are sorry to hear that your experience has been less than excellent. Have you attempted to log out and back in? Are you operating the most recent update for our mobile app? If so, and the problem continues, would you mind reaching out to us at appfeedback@subway.com so we can take a closer look at this for you? Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-08-26T19:40:38Z'}

title: Needs work
review:
Crashes and freezes up a lot. Empties my cart but then after starting over, the missing items suddenly appear. Many sandwiches just won‚Äôt load half the time. 
To add to all this, it gives an estimated time to pick up but that matters none when the store does not pull the ticket. Had to wait 30 min for my order last time. Would have left but I had already laid via the app.

title: Works great unless you buy gluten free bread
review: The app works MOST of the time but it limits those that need gluten free bread. We are told we have to choose regular bread as our option then write we need gluten free in the comments then come in the store to pick it up where you do a second transaction to pay for the additional money for it being gluten free. I love subway but being gluten free sometimes feels like you punish us. Why not just give us the option to choose gluten free bread based on location?

title: Frustrating
review: The app is completely counterintuitive. Also, just had a situation where I was able to order, but the subway was closed. To cancel the order (after the app says it's ready for pickup) I apparently have to call the restaurant... Which is closed... So no way to cancel the order, no way to get my money back. I get that it's Easter, but the app can already keep track of my restaurant's hours, so why can't it keep track of my restaurant's holiday hours? Whatever, guess I just paid a stupid tax for trusting an app that was alreay throwing red flags left and right.

title: Not convenient. Misleading.
review: A huge promotion online and in stores is that you can buy one/get one footlong using the app to order. However, apparently most locations don‚Äôt participate, and the only way to find out if they participate is to put your order in first.  I spent 10 minutes setting up my order at various locations (it erases your cart when choosing a new location) trying to find a local store that participated.  Now, I‚Äôm about to walk into Panera to pick up my lunch order.

title: Rarely works
review:
‚ÄúInput error‚Äù time and time again at checkout. I have been triple charged from making multiple attempts to place orders unsuccessfully. The duplicate charges are refunded a few days later but it‚Äôs absurd that it happens. 
‚ÄúBuy one get one free footlong‚Äù is advertised on the app but I don‚Äôt get the discount and I pay full price (yes this is even at a participating location).
I can click ‚Äòadd favorite to cart‚Äô and it says ‚Äúcart is empty‚Äù, because it won‚Äôt put it in the cart. Over and over again. 
I have wasted so much time I will never get back on this app.
Same problems nearly daily on the app.

title: App is annoying
review: It‚Äôs easy to order but every time I add or remove something from the cart, it reloads the whole cart and this is such a crappy experience when the internet is a little slower!! And additionally, why is there no Apple Pay support? I have to save my credit card info just to make orders!

title: App users beware!
review: Placed an online order through the app this morning. After order was placed, got a message saying it couldn‚Äôt be accepted, however they had no problem accepting my money! Per app FAQs, visited my local subway to get issues resolved and was told there was nothing they could do. Didn‚Äôt even offer to try to make it right. This app needs to be fixed so if an order can‚Äôt be accepted, it will not still charge you for your order! Currently disputing charges with my bank. Will not use app again and even visiting subway in the future is unlikely! Very disappointed!!

title: ‚ÄúEven‚Äù Discount errors with odd number of items
review:
Just downloaded the app. They were running a special on foot longs if you buy two, you get them for five dollars each. However, if you order three sandwiches it errors out because the amount is wrong.  (iOS amount mismatch error using Apple Pay)

The app apparently cannot figure out how to do two sandwiches at a discount and one not at a discount. 

I was able to get past the amount mismatch error by removing one item from my cart to have an even number of items

title: Hard to find participating locations
review: The app works great and I was impressed with how easy it was to use. However, there needs to be a way to know if the restaurant you select is participating before you spend time building your sandwich. I tried two different stores and neither were participating in a recent promotion. I had to call the stores which defeats the purpose of the app altogether. I don‚Äôt eat subway much so it‚Äôs not a big loss, and will probably delete the app because it‚Äôs pointless If my local stores don‚Äôt participate in any promos.

title: Consistent Issues
review: Every. Single. Time. I have an issue with the checkout process. The first time I ordered was flawless, but ever since then I ALWAYS have an error message and I‚Äôll use multiple cards knowing there‚Äôs funds available. And I can‚Äôt blame it on needing the app update because it‚Äôs up-to-date already. So when I ordered to get the 2 for $5 each deal the other day, I had to actually go to the website to place my order. Ridiculous. Im starting to think the deals/coupons aren‚Äôt worth it anymore, I rather spend a few extra dollars somewhere else and save myself the headache.

title: App broken
review:
Hey the app is giving me grief because I can‚Äôt order anymore.  It keeps giving me ‚ÄúUh Oh‚Äù. ‚ÄúThere was an issue with your payment method. Please select a different type of payment method and try again.

Another problem is I can‚Äôt delete my MasterCard off the payment method and say invite parameter so it seem i can‚Äôt remove it for some reason

So please fix this problem

title: Really convenient
review: This is a really convenient way to preorder your subway as to not have to wait in line or if your having someone pick it up for you, would be nice to just have to option to just take a picture of the payment method but hey ü§∑üèø‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è would be nice to have some app only coupons or offers like most other companies do. This is the only reason I probably won‚Äôt get 5 stars from me but unless there is a problem with my order you‚Äôll get 4

You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-06T22:31:23Z'}

title: Reward?
review: Every time I get a reward and use it, it gets stuck. So I will try to order something later and it will try to use my reward that I have already used. No idea how to get it fixed. I managed to figure out how to remove the reward once before but the answer is not obvious and I don‚Äôt think I should have to figure it out anyway. It has to be a bug. Hardly seems like it‚Äôs worth having, if it ceases to even go through the whole check out process because of an expired reward that I can‚Äôt figure out how to remove.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-05-31T14:57:18Z'}

title: Great app! Just slow
review: Maybe it‚Äôs because of my location, but the app is often really slow to respond or make any changes. I‚Äôd also like to see the ability to get a senior discount, perhaps verified when the order is picked up. It would even be good to add a tip. The ability to select the exact sandwiches is great. We live Subway, especially the restaurant on Tucker Road in Tehachapi. The app itself, though, could use some tweaks.

title: Glitchy at best
review: Tried to redeem the $1 off a sub purchase and the register was unable to scan or accept it. I tried to start an order on my mobile at first but after a couple taps, the app brought me to a screen where I had a "scanning" option for the coupon or "start order option." So I just walked inside subway since I was already there. Fine print does not mention anything about using mobile to order now was that made clear causing and awkward confusion between me and the guy at the register. I ended up paying full price. Deal expired end of day. Not happy at all.
developerResponse: {'id': 8557405, 'body': "Hi there, please contact our support team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-05-07T14:40:29Z'}

title: Great app - easy to use
review: I don‚Äôt do a whole lot of app ordering but I do like Subway‚Äôs app. It‚Äôs easy and quick to use. The only setback is the difference between ordering a breakfast sandwich and a regular sandwich. The breakfast sandwiches are built to order whereas the regular sandwiches you have to remove items you don‚Äôt want. This difference is not clear and i messed up a couple orders for my family. But it‚Äôs not that big of a deal. Now I know.

title: Won‚Äôt accept payment
review:
Got my sandwich ready, added payment and went to check out. ‚ÄúPayment already requested‚Äù and I couldn‚Äôt check out. Try a different card. Same result. Force kill app. Same error. Wait 10 minutes. Same error. Log out and back in...same. 

Want to love it because the UI is great, but inability to actually order ruined it for me.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-09-25T16:45:05Z'}

title: App is ok, As long as they don‚Äôt get busy
review: It‚Äôs great to order from the Subway app unless they get busy. If they get busy not only is your order NOT ready, you go to the end of the line. Trying to cancel is a hassle, as the employees don‚Äôt seem to know how o do a return credit, nor do they want to take the time to make your order, so you are pretty much screwed. So much for a ‚Äúpickup‚Äùtime

title: Just want to log in
review:
App is on a continuous loop to reset password. After resetting multiple times, closing app completely, restarting phone, etc and looking in using existing account it kicks me to ‚Äúreset password‚Äù screen. Just want to be able to log in and get points for my subs

<update>

Loop is corrected and able to make my pre-orders for my tokens again. Thanks!

title: I like the pictorial view of ingredients.
review: The pictorial representation of the sandwich ingredients works very well even on the small screen of an out of date smart phone. Review and place order actually allows an item to be reviewed and return to order without an extra item being added to the order. This problem has occurred on other smartphone apps.

title: Paid twice for meal
review: I ordered ahead and paid with the app but the Subway location didn‚Äôt get my order and couldn‚Äôt fill it without paying again.  Called Subway and was told extra charge would be removed but no such luck.  Too much trouble to resolve over $9.44. Needless to say I won‚Äôt continue using the app until they get the bugs fixed.
developerResponse: {'id': 2576166, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-02-13T20:59:06Z'}

title: Easy to order!
review: We used this app to order ahead. I liked the ordering system and entering payment info was easy. It ended with an estimated completion time. I wish there was a place to add promo codes (like from text coupons or printed coupons). I‚Äôm happy to see there is a rewards system but wish it was better than $2 for 200 points. I would also have liked to have an ‚Äúon half‚Äù option.

title: Never works.  They never get my order!!!!
review: A couple weeks ago after ordering online the guy told me I had went to the wrong subway.  Drove down the road only to realize I was right and he was wrong.  After searching on his screen he found my order.  Last week... Girl said it showed up for two seconds on her screen then it disappeared.  Tried a different subway location tonight, they never received my order.  I showed the girl my confirmation email, heck I even showed her my bank account to prove subway had even charged me.  Done with this app, and done with subway. üò°
developerResponse: {'id': 2163519, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2017-12-29T14:46:13Z'}

title: Zimmerman Subway
review: Always says items are out of stock then when I get to the store they have those items available. Very frustrating not being able to get the bread and toppings that you want that are normally available, then I should up little bit early to my pick up my mobile order and they took 4 more people orders who came in behind me. Before even starting my subs. Why is it that they can‚Äôt start my right when I get there like as if I was ordering just like the people who walked in behind me. Dumb company and app

title: Horrible App
review: Would give this zero stars if I could. It takes forever for anything to load, often just spins, and I always get an error when trying to place an order. Only once have I been able to successfully place an order. It‚Äôs such a waste of time - I always end up making it to the store before anything works right and just walk in and order as usual. This app provides absolutely zero benefit to your customer and only leads to frustration and annoyance. Please fix or just get rid of entirely. What a waste.

title: Great app!
review: This app is perfect.  Easy to use, offers all the customizations you need, lets you choose everything just the way you like it.  The more you use it the easier it gets. Also adds your points automatically for the rewards. We use it once or twice a week.  Thanks Subway!

title: Stores
review:
I recently went to a Subway store I my area. First they told me the wheat bread had changed.  Then. The meat was piled high. So I wasn‚Äôt sure how fresh it was. Next the cucumbers were rotten. The were floating in scummy water. I asked the girls if they notice how rotten and nasty they were. They just shrugged their shoulders. I had ordered two sandwiches. I got about quarter of a mile away and my stomach started to turn. I turned around and went back for a refund. I have never been unhappy with that store until that night.  They did take the cucumbers out after I left

Sincerely
Billie Bohn

title: No Functionality
review: It used to work well enough (it was always a bit finicky, but it worked). I uninstalled because after this last update the app is completely non-functional; I can view rewards and deals, but can't place an order, which is the main reason I have the app. It lets me get all the way to the end of customizing a meal/sandwich, only to go to the cart and be told that my cart is empty. I just had a $2 reward expire on me because I couldn't order on the app, and I only ever order delivery, so I can't go in to use it.

title: Sh!ttiest app ever
review: Saying it‚Äôs a joke is kind. Freezes on a blank menu page. Won‚Äôt list sandwiches. And if you try to order a Favorite but an ingredient has changed, all it does is delete the item rather than let you edit Ranch to Peppercorn Ranch (I‚Äôm not even kidding; that‚Äôs the only difference.) Absolutely useless mess that sends you in numbing circles of frustration. Save yourself a headache if you really want Subway‚Ä¶go to a web browser and log into their web page to order. It‚Äôs still slow and weird but at least it sort of works. Good luck!

title: This app is useless
review: Please explain to me why this app cannot locate the Subway that is literally 10 feet in front of me. How am I supposed to place an order if it can‚Äôt find a store? I hoped the update would address this issue but apparently not. It used to allow me to place orders but since you force updates it‚Äôs been several versions ago that actually worked. I guess I will go elsewhere because I have no interest in standing in line to order. I will go somewhere I can order in advance and it be ready when I get there. Bye Subway.

title: Convenient
review: Instead of hemming and hawing in front of the glass case and driving everyone crazy, I can do the same thing in the app and take as much time as I‚Äôd like to place my order. The crew at my local Subway has the food ready extremely quickly, and I just have nothing negative to say about it.

title: Awful and Buggy
review: I got through the ordering process great, but paying was horrendous. I tried three methods of paying, first with the credit card option on the all. Everytime I entered my card information, it would say it was unable to add it as this time. I tried using pay pal, and it would sit on an empty screen before bringing me back to the pay options. Lastly, I tried using apple pay but it wasn‚Äôt accepting that either. I had to give up and just order inside because I literally could not put my order in.

title: First time user
review: This is the first time I‚Äôve used the app. Some things took me a few minutes to find such as the sub size. It felt like it could be more plain. The only other thing was there were some of the seasonings (sub spice) and sauces (sriracha) that I didn‚Äôt see available in the app that I normally add when I ordered in person. But maybe they weren‚Äôt available.

title: Please fix your ordering software
review: It is so inconvenient to order online for pickup for Subway. There are constant error messages and resets. Online ordering is supposed to make things more convenient, not a complete hassle, which it actually is. It seems the issues have been going on for quite some time, and I would have thought they would have been dealt with by now. However, just yesterday, I once again wasted so much time just trying to ‚Äúsave time‚Äù by doing a quick order. It shouldn‚Äôt be so difficult.

title: Love subway, app needs work
review: Good food, decent employees, but the app interface needs a little interface work. It‚Äôs easy to run for me, but I can see how it could be frustrating for less computer / app savvy users. The types of toppings needs to be more consistent across markets also. In the wichita/newton/derby area there is quite a bit of variance which is also frustrating.

title: Much improved app!!
review: This app has traditionally been so unintuitive and buggy. Lately, however, it has been a joy to use and I have noticed far fewer errors. I‚Äôm still not 100% confident that the app is aware of which ingredients certain restaurants carry and which ones certain restaurants do not. Once this has occurred I will give you all 5 stars for sure!

title: Needs a little help
review: My wife wanted a sub that only had one cold cut on it. Since eliminating a meat from any sandwich is not an option, I couldn‚Äôt get her what she wanted. As a result she had to pick off the meat she didn‚Äôt want. Easy enough to do, but it‚Äôs a waste of product that could otherwise be use. Hate to waste food, even if it‚Äôs not costing me any more. Would like to see the option to eliminate meat from a sandwich added. Thank you.

title: Amazing Subway App for Deals but...
review: I always use this app for buy one get one foot long free and for the various other deals this app offers; however, the fact this app doesnt allow me to choose the size of my drink rather it forces me to order a 20oz sized drink makes me not order my sandwich as a meal, if they fixed this error i would give this app a five star rating and order the meal option more often. Please fix this!!!

title: Love, but...
review: I really love being able to submit my order in advance, but I hate that I can submit it an hour or more in advance and still not have cookies available when I get there. I‚Äôd also love to have the option to substitute the kids meal drink and sides for a fountain and chips versus what it comes with. I also think when clicking the fountain drink option we should be able to select our drink choice.

title: Not bad at all; just needs some design and UI tweaking
review:
Sometimes loads slow, and you need to click through a few screens to add additional sandwiches as you go along, but selecting meal options is very good. Somewhat clunky to add a credit card to fund or reload via the App, but I usually use the computer for that.  

I use Dunkin‚Äôs App as the baseline to compare, as that‚Äôs super fast and very user friendly. 

Keep on improving...Thanks!

title: Please add a cancel option!!!
review: I have spent twice the amount of money I needed to on lunch multiple times, not realizing that subway had saved my last order location. So frustrating when it is not possible to go out of my way to pick up an order, it cannot be canceled, and the location won‚Äôt offer it to another customer. Such waste! Even when calling the store they cannot cancel due to how the payment process works on the app. Shame.
developerResponse: {'id': 5460074, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-10-11T13:47:20Z'}

title: Updated review
review: My first review was 1 star because I could not get the app to take my registration info. I called the tech support, not expecting to get through and they answered immediately. It is a known bug and I was given a work-around by registering online. They then followed up with an email to make sure it was working properly. 5 stars for responsiveness of the developer. Overall 4 stars because it is a work in progress.

title: My taxes were easier to fill out
review: This app looks slick, but it is counterintuitive in too many places.  Getting through the security in the beginning was even worse.  Use a blood sample for security:  it would be easier and less painful.  This is the second time that they have done this!  Not only am I deleting the app, I won‚Äôt bother with the restaurant.  In a few years, I might try them again.
developerResponse: {'id': 1351430, 'body': 'We are constantly improving the app experience ‚Äì You can also reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com to provide more details on what needs to be improved.', 'modified': '2017-09-25T13:36:14Z'}

title: Very BUGGY
review:
Every time I use this app. I get an error message telling me to ‚Äúreorder‚Äù.  And a couple of months ago the app. ripped me off... it let me checkout the got the email recipe. That‚Äôs when the error message came up. Went to the store, the manager told me no order came through so he‚Äôd have to charge me again if I reorder even when I showed him the emailed recipe showing I paid.  Please fix for iPhone 8.

UPDATE July 21, 2018
Just a horrible app, error message anytime I try using it. Logged out logged in, checked to see if my phone as well as this app was up to date didn‚Äôt matter... Just a horrible app all around!

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-07-24T20:11:30Z'}

title: Not the full menu
review: There‚Äôs no kids menu on the app (or website) You have to physically type ‚Äúsubway kids menu‚Äù into Google and order it through that link. There‚Äôs also no option to create your own sandwich. You can only choose from the menu list. It says you can customize, but when I pick the sandwich closest to my liking, it doesn‚Äôt let me pick what I want. It gives me only three bread choices for it? Wheat, Italian, and flatbread. I downloaded it bc I thought it‚Äôd be easier to order on the app vs going in store, but no.

title: Convenience!
review: I really enjoy that I can put my order in at the house when the whole family is Around so their is no mistakes on who wants what etc. lol üòÇ But I want to add that the App isn‚Äôt always working so I‚Äôve had to delete it & download it again. It seemed to be ok afterwards! Overall, I‚Äôm very Happy with the App.& The convenience

title: Strange thing going on in subway
review: Don‚Äôt know what was happening in there but one guy in the back and one guy working. The employee working ask my name and check to see there was an online order. The guy in back was asked to fix my order thought he was waking up. There were some shady customers eat / hanging out at the front of the restaurant. Don‚Äôt know what really going on but the customers give bad vibes won‚Äôt be back.

title: Kids Meal
review: I would give this a 5 ‚≠êÔ∏è review, if they had all of the drink options, chip options, and kids meals on the app. Also I would like the option to add different meat. I think Subway is missing out on money not giving these options on here. I don‚Äôt buy meals because I always get sweet tea and that‚Äôs not an option on the app. I don‚Äôt eat here when I need to get food for my kids too because kids meals aren‚Äôt an option.

title: Hire a new developer.
review:
This app is responsible for a clunky, slow, and miserable ordering experience. The user interface leads a lot to be desired, and selecting sandwiches and toppings is far more frustrating than it should be. 

Not to mention that I fatfingered the order button while trying to decide what I wanted for dinner and, because I had a payment method saved, it went through to the nearest store. 

I‚Äôve since deleted my payment methods and am deleting the app. I‚Äôll simply use Uber Eats or something similar to order from Subway in the future.

title: Seems OK so far
review: I‚Äôll have to see once I get my food if it‚Äôs really done in less than 15 minutes, in the Claremont location Madison Place shopping center half a block from my house we will see. So far so good. I hope they did the sandwich is just like a inputted data into the app. LOL. Stay safe and sane! By this time next summer everything will be fine-It Has to be

title: Spicy Italian
review: I love the spicy Italian sandwich the best. The service at 182nd couldn‚Äôt be better.  Fast and always polite.  Easy to work with, just a great bunch of young people.  Sometimes I don‚Äôt feel well enough to cook for my 11 year old grandson, so I call in a order, he will walk up to get his food and they take very good care of him and treat him as though he is part of their family.  Thanks!

title: Doesn‚Äôt work! Waste of time! Don‚Äôt bother!
review: This app doesn‚Äôt work. I tried to order with it. After putting in all the sandwiches, I tried to pay and got an error. ‚ÄúUh-oh, cannot read property update of undefined‚Äù. A useless error as it gives no information. I tried to pay a different way and got the same error. I had to go to the store, stand in line, order the food again. So, after wasting all the time trying to use this app, I had a houseful of very hungry people when we finally had food an hour later. Next time someone suggests Subway, I‚Äôll make sandwiches myself. 0/5 stars

title: Don‚Äôt order ahead
review: I ordered from a subway that promptly called me to let me know they were out of lettuce and other ingredients I had ordered on my sandwich so they cancelled my order. I proceeded to order from a different subway that had a 20 minute wait time. I got there at 6:30 pm (when my order was supposed to be ready) and she didn‚Äôt even start making my order until 7:00 pm, thirty minutes after my order should have been ready. I had to just wait in the store for 30 minutes waiting until she could even help me. I will not be ordering from the app again.

title: Cannot fully customize sub
review: I am an avid order ahead person. I am all about saving as much time as I can. That being said  when subways bogo in app or online only came up I was like ok cool. Here‚Äôs the parts that‚Äôs annoying, you can‚Äôt add meats or cheeses in the app or online. For example, my husband wanted to add salami and provolone to his sub and you can‚Äôt. I should be able to fully customize my sub like in store, I have no idea why that wouldn‚Äôt be available. But any who, that‚Äôs my two cents.

title: You must pay close attention to everything on the app
review: You have to watch everything that you put on the sandwich. Also very difficult to change locations. If you accidentally do the wrong location you are screwed there is no way to change it except to physically call and beg them to cancel it.

title: Not totally custom sandwiches
review:
Although this app is easy to use and you can order semi custom sandwiches most of the time... the sandwiches are NOT any way you want them.  They need to add a ‚Äúcustom‚Äù sandwich or make other sandwiches completely custom.  Example - I don‚Äôt like genoa salami.  But I can not remove it from any of the sandwiches it is currently listed on because it is a ‚Äúlocked‚Äù ingredient.  
Also, not making all ingredients available to all sandwiches means they are also NOT any way you want them.

You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-10-30T16:57:04Z'}

title: Nor as user friendly as I hoped
review: This app has so much going on, I‚Äôm not sure what button to push to order anything. Once you finally find the build your sandwich screen, that part of the interface is cool.  Don‚Äôt want tomatoes?  Click them and hit remove. Then add to your bag.  It‚Äôs adding another sandwich that you have to find the button for. The app is just nit easy to navigate and frustrating
developerResponse: {'id': 9550024, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-07-08T13:36:04Z'}

title: Messy app
review:
This app is so busy it is hard to see what you need to click. I use apps to order food to make sure my order is accurate and ready when I arrive because I am a caregiver for a disabled wife and son. Time is important. Because the app is so unintuitive and takes too much time to use, I usually choose to pay more at Jimmy Johns because the app is easy. 

Fun swipe left and right to add or remove is great for a video game or social net apps but I want fast and this app is just messy. It‚Äôs too bad because I like Subway better. So does my family. I just don‚Äôt have time to screw around with with the app.

Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-05-20T15:43:56Z'}

title: Best ever
review: I have so much going on with my life but it‚Äôs nice to have an app like SUBWAY is out where I can just make my order going pick it up and leave and not have to wait in line its very nice thank you so much for everything you do the customer service is wonderful the people are wonderful the location is wonderful I couldn‚Äôt be happier thank you so much subway

title: App used to work now does not
review: Are used to love this app has it made it extremely efficient for me to re-order the same sandwiches over and over again. However, the app no longer works and constantly throws errors. There is no easy way to reach someone to help with the app. So instead I‚Äôm posting this Review here. Hopefully people at Subway will see that the app is not working for some people and fix it.  Or at least see that they need to make it easier for people to communicate with them about problems with the app. If they fix these problems I will amend my review.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-07-05T13:26:14Z'}

title: My favorite sandwich shop
review: I love Subway because you get sandwiches exactly how you want them! You can be right there to watch them being made, you can order online & go into the store to pickup, or order online & pickup curbside. Subway offers deals and specials - what more could you ask for?

title: App is Great but store implementation is Awful
review: The app itself is easy to use and the pictures and options make it very user friendly. But there is not connectivity to the store you place the order with! If you add sliced avocado or Bella Mozzarella cheese or order specific cookies the app charges you for it but when the store doesn‚Äôt have said item in stock they just omit the item. They do not try to substitute another ingredient or product and the REFUSE to refund the customer for the overcharge!

title: Fix the curbside.
review: It‚Äôs ridiculous that if I do curbside that I can‚Äôt select ‚ÄúI‚Äôm here‚Äù until a certain time. I get here when I get here and should be able to check in when that happens. If the team need more time that‚Äôs fine but they should be able to bring the food if they finish early and I‚Äôm already here. I‚Äôve never been to a single Subway that needed 15-20 minutes to complete an order. Y‚Äôall can calm it down because these stores do not get that busy.

title: Apple pay/coupons
review: If I could leave zero stars I would. I love subway and wanted to get some rewards/coupons as its expensive. So all the coupons on the app are online order only, I‚Äôm yet to see a coupon I can use in store. And you can only pay online using apple pay or a gift card. I don‚Äôt have apple pay and I don‚Äôt want to buy a gift card so I can order online just for the possibility of my sandwich being wrong or made poorly. As almost every time me or my friends have pre ordered a sandwich its made horribly.

title: Bug and feature request
review: A recent update seems to have caused the first attempt to display recent orders to always fail. The second attempt usually succeeds. I use the app every day, and that always happens. A feature request is to be able to save favorite locations, making them easier to select again.

title: Mom of four, super busy
review: I love the subway app!!! Allows me to order a ‚Äúhealthier‚Äù option on the go without stepping foot in the store. Always a crowd pleaser! Also I love how you can serve it right away or put them in the cooler and enjoy later. Thanks subway for making an easy to use app that is straight forward, fast, and efficient!

title: PBF
review: With more people looking for healthy options, it makes sense that Subway leads the way, with PBF options. Statistics suggest that when people are given more PBF options they feel better. I hope that Subway would consider adding Plant Based meats, like Gardein‚Äôs new Chicken tenders or their meatballs. I hope Subway is considering this. Personally, I think it can bring more customers looking for PBF.  Thanks

title: Great sandwich!
review:
This app lets me customize my sandwich just the way I like it.  It‚Äôs a little confusing at first, but I usually select may sandwich and size, the clear all the normal toppings, then add the ones I want by scrolling down through the menu.  One you realize you can scroll down, you will see your favorites listed and can select the toppings you want!

Enjoy!!!

title: Great Service!!!!!
review:
‚ÄúValerie‚Äù was very patient as I tried to figure out what my daughter wanted to eat. And I am
On Weight Watchers so I had lots of questions. I appreciate that she never once let me feel that I was taking too much time. She is a great employee and knows the menu well! I appreciate the time that she took to help me with my app! Thank you!

title: So easy!
review: I love being able to order on line. You can choose exactly what you want like in the restaurant. I just wish that honey mustard sauce is an option. Otherwise this is great. Always ready when I go to pick it up and the employees are always right on top of things. In and out in seconds! Great for the current situation we all find ourselves in.

title: Forced signup and notification nuisance
review:
When app is downloaded, and guest option is selected, the menu loads. But when you choose ‚Äòstart order‚Äô a screen appears forcing you either to log in or sign up. This can‚Äôt be bypassed or diminished, therefore there is no actual ‚Äòcontinue as guest‚Äô option.
When I try to sign up, the app informs me that I‚Äôm in an area that Subway ‚Äòdoes not service,‚Äô although the Subway is less than a mile from my house ... and a friend used her older version of the app to buy us both lunch only yesterday.

title: This app is terrible
review: This app is so unbelievably bad. They have deals exclusive to the app but it can‚Äôt even get your order correct. It stops you halfway through or even when you finish to tell you there‚Äôs been an error and you have to start over. I have to tell it which store I am ordering from before I even begin the order but then when I start the order, it tells me the location couldn‚Äôt be found?? This app is awful and has never worked for me and the rewards program is a joke.

title: Best App! Some glitches!
review: This App is pretty good! Tokens, rewards, and payment methods all in one secure location! The app has a tendency to freeze up with collecting points! There have been several times when i have scanned for my points and then they don‚Äôt apply due to the app freezing. Other than the small issues, it‚Äôs 100 in my book!

title: Easy Peasy
review:
Anything that makes my life easier is my friend.
And it‚Äôs not only easier, it lets me make up my mind of options in the comfort of my home.
The Chesapeake Grassfield location is  also a cut above with their friendly service. If you eat here and don‚Äôt have the App then please get it because you will also save money on the special offers.

title: Favorites
review: This app has improved. It now tracks my favorites so I can easily order next time. I never go to subway without using the app. We have a big family so the time it takes to order gets crazy. This way I can put the order in beforehand and pick it up at the counter when we arrive. Plus the rewards are great!

title: 1st time User
review: My wife  has been using the app to place orders when getting out of Church on Sundays for about a year now . It always seemed like it worked well for her so I thought I would give it a shot since I have a Subway close to my work now . The app works flawless and I actually prefer it better than telling the associate in store what I want on my sub.

title: It‚Äôs finally awesome!!‚Äô I can use my old little amount subway card I had for over a year
review:
Geez you lose all of my info and. Ow have to sign in as a new user? My local
Subway even blames the app, come on this is subway should be better than this, can‚Äôt even sign in even just cycles so can‚Äôt even order, sorry but please fix it we use it all of the time

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-11-07T21:28:25Z'}

title: Getting better
review: So I love the fact that after my last review you guys have added the option of making a wrap. But is gives you the option for habanero wrap when in fact the Subways in my are ( San Diego) don't have them. Probably should remove the option based on are that it's being ordered from. But loving the new update

title: Does the trick
review: Only reason I‚Äôm giving this app 4 stars is because it annoys me that they don‚Äôt let you personalize your sandwich! Like why?! The set items you can order are okay but it annoys me that I can‚Äôt make/build my own sandwich with the bread I like, all those things like other sandwich chains! I can only choose one or maybe a wheat bread option when I like the Italian best!

title: I hate the app
review:
I have never even taken the time to write an app review until today.  I only use this app because I am trying to be frugal and healthy.   The app is the only way to gain loyalist points.  Good luck redeeming them, changing stores or the subway staff helping you.  My most hated feature is the re order my last order - which seems great but usually ends up making me want to throw my phone across the road.  It rarely works and u can‚Äôt change stores.  
At this point it‚Äôs a horrible marriage and I can‚Äôt afford a divorce.  Do better subway - perhaps pay for a better app developer.
developerResponse: {'id': 6643440, 'body': 'Thank you so much for your feedback and we‚Äôre terribly sorry about your experience. We‚Äôd like to speak with you more to understand exactly how we can improve. Please contact me at walker_c@subway.com, and we‚Äôll put a representative from our corporate office in touch with you. - Chris', 'modified': '2019-01-02T16:44:32Z'}

title: Specials not offered via app
review: As far as using the app to build a sandwich, that works great. My complaint is the specials offered through Subway were not available through the app. I recently purchased 2 subs for approximately $19. Before making the purchase I looked for the 3 footlongs tor $18 that I thought I had heard about. Nothing showed up on the app. I made my purchase, and when I went to Subway to pick up my sandwiches, there was a big sign on the front of the store. I was in a rush (that‚Äôs why I used the app), and didn‚Äôt bring it up at the store. This really makes me not want to use this app.
developerResponse: {'id': 5831196, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-11-06T16:51:12Z'}

title: Useful but very buggy on weekends
review: I don‚Äôt fully understand why but whenever I make a purchase on Sundays for less than 10 dollars the order says payment fails but my card still gets charged. It‚Äôs usually corrected by Monday but it‚Äôs still frustrating that I can‚Äôt order ahead on weekends to order my food. Also if you want a Dr Pepper fountain drink you have to select Coca-Cola and put Dr Pepper in the notes‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs the small things that makes the system so frustrating

title: Gift card balance
review: One major flaw in this app is the inability to be able to use your gift card plus a credit card for whatever remaining balance. I get subway gift cards all the time and unless I want to go into the store to use the remaining balance I must ‚Äúadd funds‚Äù to the current card. Super annoying. You should be able to pay remaining balance with a credit card.

title: M Bent
review: App was fraudulently used. Was offered a partial payment back and have been awaiting a response from the ‚Äúinternal team‚Äù if that even exists via social media that I‚Äôve been promised I‚Äôd be contacted back by. I‚Äôve followed up weekly for the last two months just to hear they are very backed up but will get back to me. I‚Äôve made contact with phone operators who state that they‚Äôve never heard of being given part of the payment that was hacked and fraudulently used buy that it‚Äôs a different department and they couldn‚Äôt assist unfortunately.

title: Automatically Cancels orders
review: I have had this problem in the past and thought it was just a glitch so I decided to re-download this app and try it again and turns out it was a good reason I deleted it in the first place I place an order it says it‚Äôs received I get the email that confirms my order and then five minutes later I get an email that says order canceled. I have done this twice and I‚Äôm out $100 until it hits my acct and I‚Äôm hungry and I‚Äôm too ******* mad to even bother ordering anything else. Anyways use DoorDash much better.

title: Lunch ordering made easy
review: Love the Subway app! Makes getting lunch so much quicker especially when we‚Äôre farming and in the field. Use the app to order lunch for the crew and with the estimated pick up time we know when to send a guy in to pick it up and everyone gets the what they want. Great job with app Subway!

title: Great!
review: I use the app all the time to order ahead for me and my husband so that on his way home he can just pick it up. The only complaint is that the app doesn‚Äôt deduct first and then allow you to pay the balance with a different payment. You either pay with all gc or a card.

title: Terrible
review: When I first downloaded this app and used it, it worked great. For the past month I‚Äôve been trying to order for delivery and it wouldn‚Äôt place my order. It would glitch every time and and a pop up would come on saying that my cart was missing items. I‚Äôve tried adding and subtracting items from my cart and the pop up would continue to pop back up. The app doesn‚Äôt even allow me to choose a store to order from. As much as I love Subway, ordering from the app is not worth it.

title: Horrible app
review: This app is ridiculous, for starters you can‚Äôt even make a sandwich from scratch you have to choice one of subways sandwiches and modify it. But the worst part about the whole experience was going to pick up my sandwich and finding a closed store!!!!! So now I took a lunch break payed for my food and then never got it! To top it all off I had to spend 10 mins looking for a number to call to get my money back because the only number in the app was the number to the closed subway that obviously wasn‚Äôt going to help me!

title: The user interface...
review: The user interface is pretty garbage, day for example that you wanna look at a sub since you dont eat subway much, you can‚Äôt just press back to go back to the menu, you have to either close out the app and start from square one or add it to your cart and remove it. Sides & Sides and drinks, sides have 2 tab and neither of them work ive been trying to order a cookie for 5 minutes now it should not be this hard for 1 item in my opinion

title: Recent update does not work
review: I have an iPhone 10 that I have been using to order Subways from for about a year.  Your recent update does not work.  We could not place an order through the app.  After many reloads and attempts to order, it finally let us place a sandwich in the cart, but then proceeded to tell us the store we picked up cannot take orders.  We called the store and they said they are taking orders but have been slow... I wonder why... fix your app and you may get business.  We decided to eat at Jimmy Johns.

title: No Customer Service
review:
The app charged me $10 more than it was supposed to and when I went to get help from customer service it said that to ‚Äúbetter serve our customers we moved to an entirely digital customer service system.‚Äù

It will not pull up the store and the receipt that the app gives won‚Äôt let you submit any feedback.

Subways is normally a gamble anyway. Some stores have great food while other stores are disguising. This app only and their new customer service model makes this a one star app and one star restaurant.

title: Much Improved
review:
I downloaded the Subway for the second time, and this time it was much easier to navigate. I deleted it before because it was more difficult to use then it needed to be.
This time I was able to order much easier.
The app doesn‚Äôt seem to give all the options for the type of bread and chips.

title: I was planning to use my Subway app to get points & rewards
review:
I am so disappointed today I cannot open my app for my free birthday cookie as I got an error message when I try to sign in unable to open my app. I love my Subway app. Please fix and resolved the issues or problems with my
Subway app please and thank you.

title: Subway bogo
review: I thought I did it right and I even put bogo in special orders .  Turn out I only got 1 sandwich instead of 2 as advertise.  Girl at counter said I don‚Äôt know how that works either you only get one.  Order another if you‚Äôd like ..  I will not take advantage of this again .  There are pizza spot within my area .  Thank you

title: Great when it works
review:
I love the convenience of being able to order sandwiches for my family without having to juggle individual orders in store in line.  BUT on more than one occasion, I put a sandwich in the cart and go to add another, only to discover the cart is empty when I get back to it.  Twice, it has processed the order for the sandwiches unbeknownst to me and without me having verified payment.  

Would also love to be able to order more than two $5 footlongs at a time on that promo when it is available.

title: Unable to use app
review: Hi have used the SUBWAY¬Æ app for over a year on a regular basis. For the past month, I have a been unable to place an order, to access my account, or to do anything with the SUBWAY¬Æ app. I have tried to access it from home with my Internet, in the subway store with their Wi-Fi, and anywhere else that I would like to order a Subway sandwich. I am thoroughly discouraged with the app. I don‚Äôt know what to do. I can‚Äôt access it from my computer with SUBWAY¬Æ.com but that doesn‚Äôt help me to resolve this issue. I have also tried to reload the app on my phone. Nothing helps. Thank you

title: Recent orders quit working
review:
I use recent order so I do not have to ask my granddaughters what they want on their sandwich Now that feature has quit working 
Reinstalled the app still same problem seems they should have fixed it by now
Guess I‚Äôll have start going to the Taco Bell
Their app seems to work and I appreciate the convenience
developerResponse: {'id': 10265677, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we wanted you to know that this issue should now be resolved. If you have further difficulty, please reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback. \r\n", 'modified': '2019-08-20T20:43:12Z'}

title: GPS system broken
review: First things first the GPS system is broken. It said that the nearest subway was a subway that‚Äôs 4 miles away versus the one that‚Äôs literally 0.59 miles away. Second I think it‚Äôs stupid it doesn‚Äôt give you an option to create your own sandwich. You have to choose a pre-made sandwich. There should be a create your own sandwich option. Another thing is if there‚Äôs a deal going on and it‚Äôs added I don‚Äôt see why it doesn‚Äôt stay in the cart. Fix this app. It‚Äôs broken. Even the dominoes app is better.

title: Waste of time and money
review: I downloaded the stupid subway app and used it for the first time. Some how it ended up duplicating one of my sandwiches and I paid for an extra sandwich when I was supposed to be getting a BOGO deal, so it basically wasted my deal. The app says call the store to cancel order so I called immediately after it got placed but nobody knows crap and they said they can‚Äôt help me. This app made me waste my money. Will not ever use it again and will stay away from subway for a while. This is ridiculous. I will not make this mistake again.

title: Needs improvement on adding coupons and changing deal on checkout
review: Very confusing checkout screen it is jumbled together. Payment is not easy at all and. Adding deals is limited, also my biggest complaint is that the order location can not be modified when an order in progress is being created so you HAVE TO BACK OUT of all your customizations to redo from scratch!

title: Not bad. Not great.
review: I think it is medium satisfaction. I know my subway offers salt and vinegar chips but that option is not available when ordering. I would like to see all options that are really available. There are also times that the order I made on the app saves me no time at all because the employees did not make the order and I have had to wait. I use the app expecting things to be better. At times they are, at times they are not.
developerResponse: {'id': 10379865, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us by tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com- so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-08-27T15:00:03Z'}

title: Glitchy as anything
review: Anytime I try to order it results in an error. Even when I do order, the order always has a problem (like flatbread not going through correctly). Lastly after logging out and trying to reset my password, the app keeps on restarting. I‚Äôm beyond frustrated although I love subway, this app is a very dark mark.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-02-13T20:49:51Z'}

title: Features Beyond What Employees Know
review:
I like this app a lot. The problem I run into is that some Subway employees don‚Äôt know how it works. In particular, scanning for points/rewards AND applying gift cards. Apparently, the employees have to hunt for the gift card on their screen. 

Another issue I run into occasionally is that opening that app while connected to my car radio by Bluetooth disconnects the phone from the car radio.
developerResponse: {'id': 8173833, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-04-11T14:34:30Z'}

title: Disappointed
review: I planned to use this app mainly after loading a gift card given to me. Unfortunately I‚Äôve only been able to use it once. The last time I tried to open the app, it just wouldn‚Äôt open. I was unfortunately already in line and couldn‚Äôt use the money I had available on my app and ended up paying out of pocket. I sincerely hope you all fix whatever bugs that exist sooner than later because I‚Äôd really like to use the money I have on my app. Customers should be able to utilize the app whenever they like without fear of it not working properly.
developerResponse: {'id': 3164049, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-04-17T18:52:13Z'}

title: Time saving
review: All special deals are conveniently placed on the home page so your able to select the one you want, and after saving your favorites, you send that to your bag, checkout and your done!! Not to mention you earn points for money on the next purchase!!

title: We have Stopped Buying Subway
review:
Online ordering via an app should be pretty painless in 2018. As in actually being able to order a sandwich. And it should not require a call to Subway App Customer Support, as that would defeat the purpose and be more time consuming than driving down to your local Subway, or even sending them a Fax.

There are so many other mediocre apps like Chipotle, McDonalds, Jersey Mike‚Äôs, etc, that make this look like the first software project from a 4th grader. Sounds harsh, but it is really that bad.

As a result, we simply don‚Äôt buy Subway any more. We‚Äôll check back in a year.
developerResponse: {'id': 2576217, 'body': 'We need a bit more information in order to provide a solution for you. Any chance you could give us a call at (833)-778-2929 or send an email to appfeedback@subway.com? We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-02-13T21:08:27Z'}

title: Doesn't show promos, menu inaccurate
review:
There is a promotion going on where several different footlongs are 4.99 each. There is no place in the app that shows current promotions.  The price is correct when I select the sub, but, to find them, I need to go into the page for each sub to look at the price.
Also, I placed an order, which included a Corned Beef Reuben.  The store called to say that they stopped carrying it weeks ago.  They didn't have my next choice either, even though the app shows that they have it.
developerResponse: {'id': 2513631, 'body': "We apologize that you couldn't get your order exactly how you wanted it. We'd like to talk with you more so please contact us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com. Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us.", 'modified': '2018-02-06T15:53:06Z'}

title: Idk what‚Äôs up with the bad reviews.
review:
1.5* average rating is ridiculous. Yes the process for ordering is non-intuitive but IT WORKS. I managed to order a decently customized sandwich with no real issues. When I order again it will be simple and fast now that I know the tricks. 

This app allows me to skip the lines, pay, get double veggies, choose my bread, etc very easily. You other reviewers are fickle and are complaining about nothing.

title: Buggy
review: I was excited to see in the app that delivery was a option, as I am having vehicle issues right now. Tried ordering, but whenever I tried going to my bag, it wouldn‚Äôt load it. Also both my husband and I could not sign up, said that there was a user with our email addresses already, even tho neither of us had made an account. When tried to change password, just in case we had made an account and not remembered, it said there was no account with the emails. Fix this please!!

title: Love the app WHEN it works
review: I live in a busy tourist town so ordering ahead makes life way easier in almost every case. I really struggle with the (non)reliability of your app, though. It often just doesn‚Äôt work (throws error codes). Today in a fun turn of events I didn‚Äôt realize that it had thrown an error and my order hadn‚Äôt been processed‚Ä¶I discovered that when I walked into the store to pick up the order that never transmitted. It‚Äôs just too glitchy, y‚Äôall. Please fix it.

title: Works sometimes
review:
Only works sometimes, I often get a ‚Äúcart expired‚Äù message that won‚Äôt let me add anything to my cart. Yes, I have closed out the app and deleted it and redownloaded. 

I also can‚Äôt order kids sandwiches which is frustrating. I don‚Äôt know about anyone else, but it is much easier to be able to order ahead and pick up with kids and I can‚Äôt do that using the app I always have to go in person if getting food for my younger children.

title: Fix your app
review: It keeps saying the card issues has detected a fraud! I called my bank and they said there is no fraud on my card and it is fully open to any transaction. So I told them to hold on the phone and I made the transaction and ask the lady on the phone to check again and they said there is nothing in their end and there is no issue with my card. Fix your app. It also keeps saying choose another payment method. I tried all the payment methods PayPal and other cards but it did not work! FIX YOUR APP SUBWAY

title: Better than expected
review: I don‚Äôt like going in to order all the time so ordering on the app was super easy and convenient. I like how you can see the deals they have and how conveniently places everywhere was. Checkout was also a breeze. This has changed the game for ordering at subway!! I love it!

title: Terrible
review: Placed an order to be picked up at a location I typically don‚Äôt use because my normal location started closing earlier than normal. I place the order, pay for it which clears my account. Get to said location, which clearly states they were open, and it‚Äôs closed. Couldn‚Äôt go to the other location because it was already closed. There‚Äôs no clear indication on the app to get my money back or rectify the situation. Now I have no way of knowing what store is open, or what their hours are. Clearly this app needs work.

title: Worse fast food app
review:
App is trash, glitch‚Äôs all over. Everytime I attempt to use it, I get errors and when you try to contact some one you can‚Äôt. Last time I tried I did a pick up order which didn‚Äôt work first time so I did it again on the app still didn‚Äôt work.
When I got to the store they had no idea what I was talking about. The subway app debited my account twice for 20 bucks so total 40 bucks which I hAd to wait for 6 days to get back. And there‚Äôs no one to call at subway. **** this app don‚Äôt waste your time.

title: During this Covid season
review: It is great to be able to order from the app and just pick it up in the store. One thing that I would like to see different is when you areOrdering sides that you don‚Äôt have to go all the way back out to order more. For example if I  order cookies then I have to go back out to snacks for each cookie that I order.

title: Easy app
review: The Subway app is easy to use and place you order.  It shows you everything that comes on your item and gives you the opportunity to customize your item if you chose to. You can also save your favorites for super quick ordering.

title: Online ordering made easy
review: I absolutely love the online ordering option. I recently found that you can add a gift card and a second method of payment to place an order. This is so convenient, I wish more restaurants had this capability. Food is always made correctly as well.

title: Pretty good
review: Just downloaded the app and ordered.  Don‚Äôt like how it defaults to footlong.  Didn‚Äôt notice till I was ordering the third sub and it wouldn‚Äôt let me look at a cart to edit them.  So I deleted them and reordered then noticed at the very very end you can edit.  Really need to allow customer to look at cart and edit before final stage.  Everything else was easy.  I also really like the Apple Pay feature.

title: Impossible
review: Worst app ever for ordering food.   Ads for daily specials but no way to use them.  Orders are placed before I am ready.  Needs to have a large "order now" button and a way to go back if a change needs to be made.  In the past I have placed two identical orders without knowing.  I never could figure out how to use the 50% off on the second footlong.  Fortunately the staff at the store was understanding and told me they have problems everyday with customers trying to order and can't get it right.  Needs a total rewrite.

title: Worked once
review: When I downloaded this app and got it to work the first time, it was great. After that I have not been able to get it to show me which stores except orders through the app or now, I can‚Äôt even get in the app it just says sign up, with nowhere to login. I went to the website today and placed an order and when I arrived at the store they did not have the items. I am a busy person and don‚Äôt have time to fool with things that don‚Äôt work.

title: Recent problem with payment method
review:
I‚Äôve recently experienced issues with my payment method (American Express) that is stored in the app. Never had a problem before this.  Message says ‚Äústore does not accept that card please select a different method. ‚Äù or something like that. I entered my Visa number, same message. 
Told store owner that I see every time I order.
She said that the store still accepts American Express and that another customer was having trouble using Visa.
I tried deleting and reinstalling app, same issue.  Please help !

title: Charged my card but no order
review: I ordered two sandwiches to be ready when I came by on my way to work. The app charged my card. I get phone alerts from my bank and saw it go through. I get to the store and no order. The one girl working said an order had not come through and had no idea of who I could call for a refund. She offered to make my order, but that would have made me late for work. Now I have to take the time to call the manager. The app needs to be fixed, but at the very least, the employees need to be educated on what to do if there‚Äôs a problem.

title: No deal then voided automatically
review: I haven‚Äôt eaten at subway in  a long time. Since they were having a good deal. Decided to give them a Shot. Downloaded the app. It gave me a ‚Äúparticipating‚Äù location. Ordered 2  footlongs.  Went to check out. Didn‚Äôt apply discount. After 20 mins I decided to order anyway. Once I get to the subway. They didn‚Äôt have my order and never received it. Not mad at the location for not receiving my order. First order in a long time and the app failed me. Now in sure I‚Äôll have to make a call to get my money back from the original order. Not fun

title: Eat Fresh!
review: Honestly I love Subway the customization options are truly incredible. I try sandwiches and go out of my comfort zone with what I order just because I know it‚Äôs quality ingredients for a cheap price. And the way you can customize on the app without being in the store is great because it makes for fast pick up and sub to mouth action!

title: Bug problems, slow, but still great
review: I‚Äôve been using the app for about a year and it has been great. It‚Äôs kind of slow at first but when you figure out how to navigate it it becomes very easy. I live how the app shows the calorie count for the order. It needs a better way to save favorites. I still like the app over all.

title: Horrible
review: Placed an order and order was confirmed. Upon arrival was told my order was not received and that the app sometimes voids orders. Looked at my order to find out it was voided.  Was not notified it was voided even though it had previously confirmed my order. Tried 3 more times to place an order, even using a different credit card to pay. All 3 times confirmed my order then voided it. It gives no reason or notification on why orders were voided. The only way to check is to go in and check status of order. Deleted my account and will never use again!

title: Fabulous!
review: I came into the Main St, Lancaster, Ohio, Subway looking for help to place multiple orders for hungry baseball team members. She did a fabulous job walking me through how to use the app, place orders and use rewards. I am so appreciative!! Service and kindness like this is not always apparent! I will be back, hoping to box meals next. Thank you so much!

title: Improved since last year
review: This app has improved since last year. Before you couldn‚Äôt get it to log you in worth a darn. Now, I enjoyed the app while placing a pick up order. The app was more user friendly, it even warned me I would delete my order when I fat-fingered the ‚Äú-‚Äú sign next to order for a sandwich with all optioned selected to it. Save me some heart ache there. Thanks Subway for improving your app, as always Store i visit is very high quality too.

title: Won‚Äôt use my new card
userName: just a guy who wants to learn.
review: My old card has expired and it keeps yelling at me that my card is expired so what do I do? Try putting in my new one but alas it‚Äôs already in my apple wallet and therefore cannot be used in the subway app apparently? So what am I to do but erase my card from my wallet and try again only to be rejected once again for some other excuse for who knows what reason. All I know is I am hungry and just wanted a quick meal with my 2 dollars off reward. Hopefully the app will accept my card before I change my mind on what to eat. I‚Äôll get back to you when my card is accepted.
