Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-02-14T16:24:12Z'}

title: Convenient when it works
review:
I find the app very pleasant to use, very visual and easy to understand. However, about 30% of the times I attempt an order, I‚Äôm unable to complete the transaction. I‚Äôm not sure if this is the app, it‚Äôs request to my specific Subway location, or the system as a whole, but I‚Äôve found this reliability problem to be a bit of a downer over the last year.

I hope the app and support for online orders improves in the future!
developerResponse: {'id': 5228562, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-09-25T16:47:35Z'}

title: Good not great
review: The app could be more user friendly. I can always find my way around, but it‚Äôs cumbersome at times. For example, when I go to my prior orders to ‚Äòre-order‚Äô one of my prior orders, when I press the ‚Äòbag‚Äô icon the app often expands to show the details of my prior order rather than putting my order in the bag. I usually have to collapse the order and press the bag icon 3-4 times before the app gets it right.

title: Crashing
review: I love this app. It's convenient to place my order ahead of time and pick it up and it's all ready for me. However. For some reason every time I have attempted to place my order recently the app would crash. I have tried deleting the app and redone loading. I have tried resetting my phone. I checked for any updates and nothing. Still crashes I really hope this can get fixed so I can place my order again and enjoy it again.
developerResponse: {'id': 1858320, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (800)-888-4848, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-11-27T14:41:43Z'}

title: I normally don't write reviews but...
review:
This app is so bad whichever department let this go out to the public needs to get canned. Its literally unusable. The update brings a bunch of graphical "improvements" but it's slow, clunky, and functionally useless. I keep having to dump my bag because of "bad requests". Bugs keep me from ordering from the app and is costing the local restaurant my business. How is a company as large as Subway letting an app like this go out the door?

Edit: it‚Äôs been a month since I left my one star review. Still one star. Still having random errors when going thru check out.
developerResponse: {'id': 1351469, 'body': 'So sorry for your experience! Could you provide more information please, so that we can look at the issue? You can reach us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-09-25T13:38:26Z'}

title: Lousy app!  Can't even place a mobile order without errors
review: Not intuitive at all.  After customizing a sandwich, you have to keep pressing add to bag, and if you're lucky, the item will be added.   The Honey Oat bread is not an option.  If you make an item a meal, there's no way to undo that action.  You have to remove the item and start over.  When I tried to finalize my order and pay, I received and unknown error.  A real piece of crap!!!   Don't you folks believe in testing and beta testing before going live???  Looks like kids developed this app.  Highly disappointed!!
developerResponse: {'id': 1246315, 'body': 'Could you provide more information please, so that we can look at the issue? You can reach us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-09-12T20:00:30Z'}

title: Except for no toasting of flatbread, 5 stars
review: Love the ease of use. Love the rewards points & discounts. Love the pick up option to grab & go at the store. Only thing missing for me is the toast option on flatbread, which completely changes the texture of the sandwich. Smthg special about the in-store toaster, because it doesn‚Äôt toast the same in a toaster oven at work after the sandwich is made.

title: Online orders are not priority
review: You can place and order with the app and they have a tool that tracks the orders progress but when the order shows ready it‚Äôs not ready. Fact my order was an additional 45 minutes after it showed ready. I understand staffing issues but I don‚Äôt understand communication issues and probably will not be using the app again. I watched customer after customer receive their order when placing it at the restaurant. While I waited and waited and waited

title: Trash app for deliveries
review:
It works ok when the phone scanner is actually working in the store

I placed an order for delivery, but they didn‚Äôt make it. The app marked me as delivered even though no sandwiches were received (Subway at 4227 N Fairfax Dr, Arlington VA) - I was still charged even though they didn‚Äôt get a sandwich to me. I called the store & they told me to call DoorDash, even though I didn‚Äôt order via the DoorDash app, I ordered directly from the Subway app.

Why build in a delivery functionality when the customer interface/help functions are garbage?

title: Easy except I‚Äôd prefer to pay cash
review:
Should not have to pay in advance with a card. Would prefer paying with cash. 
If necessary hold card # and take my cash when I get there. 
I order very rarely because of that. 
I order more from pizza shop in same plaza because of it.

title: Great when it works
review: Subway app makes life so much easier when it is working, which is most of the time. There have been some technical issues lately that make ordering frustrating, if not impossible.  Hope they get it fixed and it can go back to being a consistently great ordering experience!

title: Extremely Poor Functionality
review:
It‚Äôs great when it works correctly but that‚Äôs not often. 
Constantly have to re-sign in and the login screen doesn‚Äôt work with the iOS password feature for some reason. The favorites feature is unreliable due to ‚Äúingredients unavailable‚Äù but then they are available. The app just operates poorly overall and it‚Äôs slow. It needs a refresh. ‚Ä¶ I just reduced another star because it is SO SLOW and then crashes and then doesn‚Äôt work at all. Pretty terrible

title: App sometimes doesn‚Äôt work
review: I really enjoy using the app but sometimes (not often) it won‚Äôt show any locations. Even when o zoom in on the exact location of a store, we end up going through the drive thru, but it‚Äôs frustrating sometimes

title: A little difficult but still good.
review: Going through an order is sometimes a lengthy process but once you get it down, you‚Äôre golden. One suggestion is to save a sandwich to favorites and it‚Äôs a much easier order the second time. They also don‚Äôt have diet drinks listed so make sure you put that in the special instructions slot.

title: Disappointed in the Subway App Update
review: I spend $200+ a month at Subway, in the 12 monthly visits I make. I always get the same thing on two subs per visit. Now Subway has updated its app and it wont allow me to add Avocado‚Äôs to my subs. In fact, Avocado‚Äôs is no longer an option on the mobile app so if I want Avocado‚Äôs on my subs, I have to go inside a Subway restaurant and order which is an inconvenience for me because I like to order on the app and pick up to avoid the lines. I will spend my money else where before I wait in line again.

title: I just wanna know why a foot long is $4.72 cheaper on the app.
review: Why are you charging us more to go in and order them the way we always have and we get to watch them make our sandwiches too. Which I think should be standard nationwide by the way, so kudos for that. Giving the app a 5/5 for making it that much cheaper. Love your Chicken Bacon Ranch w/ all the hot fixins.

title: Notes section not apparent enough and not looked at by store
review: I ordered online at 10:00am and put a note in the notes section that I would pick up at 12:30.  I got a call at 11:00 am saying that my sandwiches have been ready for almost an hour.  I then pointed out that there was a note on the order and then they confirmed now seeing the note.  Even when placing the order,  the notes or special instructions field is not very visible.

title: App needs a cancel order feature man
review: Title says it all. I make mistakes in my orders sometimes, need to correct it, but the app won‚Äôt even give me a heads up on the actual order confirmation. Developers please add a big notif/confirmation when you place an order...I don‚Äôt like being charged twice when I didn‚Äôt even click confirm order the first time, should‚Äôve been left in the cart.

title: Philly CheeseSteak missing on your app & online menu
review:
Hello, I downloaded your app and tried to order the Philly CheeseSteak sub and it‚Äôs not on the app menu. We both love that sub and also order the BMT from time to time. The new add on tv said that if you use your app you can get any 2 foot long sub‚Äôs for 5 dollars a each but the online menu or the app menu doesn‚Äôt have the Philly CheeseSteak on your menu. So we went to another restaurant to eat. 

Can you please tell me why you can only order the Philly Cheese Steak sub from the store menu after your Commercial on TV has the Philly cheesesteak on the picture you used but you can‚Äôt order it online or your app. 

I wonder how many others have wanted this and tried to get it from the app and to find that it‚Äôs not available.

Very disappointed with that, will I get a answer or will it be looked at and forgotten?

Look forward for your reply

title: Good app
review: Good app. Gives you ability to customize your order. Works well. Never had any problems in 3 years of using it. Four stars because it isn‚Äôt perfect and could be a bit more intuitive (once or twice I had to fish around for a feature, even just to add another sandwich). But I overall really like the app.

title: Some improvements needed
review:
I like the app. I mostly use it for rewards. 

My issue with the app is that I can‚Äôt reload my card within the app using PayPal or Apple Pay. It takes me to a separate web page that doesn‚Äôt always work. This is the biggest issue for me ordering online. This prevents me from being able to order ahead.

Also the menu options to order online doesn‚Äôt list all the condiments. Sriracha and giardinair are examples.

title: App keeps crashing
review: This app is great and I use it frequently but recently whenever I try to open the app, the screen goes black like it‚Äôs loading then it crashes. I‚Äôve turned off my phone and tried to open it again, it still crashes. It‚Äôs happening to other people too so I know it‚Äôs not just my phone.

title: Terrible. Would not recommend.
review: Mobile ordered a sandwich and a bottled drink. Sandwich was wrong, and I was we greeted with ‚Äúwe don‚Äôt have bottled drinks‚Äù upon arriving. I was given no option of refund nor option to fix the issue through the app. Used the ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù button and was prompted with one automated phone number to call where I made one selection, was put on hold for 10 minutes, then hung up on with no explanation. This exact thing happened three times in a row, which made me too frustrated to keep trying for the sake of my ten dollars and lunch break. Thanks, Subway.
developerResponse: {'id': 6502223, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-12-21T14:57:40Z'}

title: Makes ordering ahead super easy
review: Really like this app. Haven‚Äôt had any issues with the stores getting the orders and they are always ready when I arrive. I only wish changing locations didn‚Äôt clear your cart if you were mid-order, all the locations have the same thing so I don‚Äôt understand why it matters enough for them to erase an order and make you start from scratch.

title: Great but why not incremental payments?
review: I love the app- very simple and clean. Easy to use. However, I have gift cards that have a few dollars on them and I can‚Äôt use them because ‚Äúthere are insufficient funds.‚Äù It‚Äôd be nice if I could choose multiple payment options instead of having those gift cards sit in my payment methods and I‚Äôm not able to use them to pay even part of the bill.

title: Quick Easy but no Coupons
review:
Live ease of reordering favorites. Especially good at my location since pay line separate from order line and part of busy convenience store. Online order pre-pays so go to head of line and walk out. 
Wish they‚Äôd add ability to get discount via coupons though. I‚Äôd use more often if affordable! üòã

title: Easy and Time Saving
review: App is so useful, it gives us all the option available in store and makes us to select our favorites‚Ä¶ also it has the deals section which will get you discounts‚Ä¶ also app order saves our time, no need to wait‚Ä¶

title: Transaction can‚Äôt ever be completed
review:
Used this app a few times successfully, and it was great being able to just walk in and get my food immediately. However, the past few times I‚Äôve tried to place orders have failed due to the error message ‚Äútransaction can‚Äôt be completed at this time.‚Äù

Tried logging out/in again, changing restaurants and payment methods, and even different menu items but nothing works.

I just end up eating somewhere else, since waiting in line at the restaurants always takes at least 10-15 minutes.

title: Consistently inconsistent
review: As a dev I find it amazing how your team continues to push updates that are clearly unstable. Every time the app is updated I cringe. UI/UX has gotten a lot better - but that‚Äôs if the app even runs at all. Numerous times I have gone to put an order in and things break and error out. It‚Äôs also amazing that a brand as massive as subway has such a shoddy product. I hope you can sort this out and simply make the app usable. So far I‚Äôve probably aborted placing about 10 orders and have decided to go somewhere else. That only probably amounts to 100 bucks but still..

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-01-19T17:22:14Z'}

title: Expensive
review: Personally, I don‚Äôt understand why prices on the app is higher than the prices in actual stores. I thought that the point of the app is that you can just order it online and get rewards for that, and after you can use that rewards. But here‚Äôs the fact: I went to Subway store and payed for 6 inch sandwich $5.99, plus Florida Texas, equal $6.41. But the same time I went to the actual subway app and did the same order and it were $8.89, so that means that it‚Äôs almost $1.50 more than the actual price.

title: Inconvenient and no rewards
review:
Often split footlongs and app has no way to divide ingredients. I love black olives and when I split a foot long, I can‚Äôt add that to just one side via the app. 

Also, rewards and promotions done by subway cannot be redeemed. Meaning, I get a message after each attempt saying that the promotion is no longer offered despite the advertisement saying it‚Äôs still going on. So, why advertise the sale or promotion if it can‚Äôt be used?  

In the end, better off just ordering in store and save yourself the headache that is this app.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: We have been driving across the country for the past 3 years and stop at Subway a lot, so I downloaded the app to take advantage of some of the promotions. It‚Äôs never works, it either won‚Äôt let me log in or it tells me 1/2 thru and order that there is an error or it won‚Äôt accept my credit card. Then when we get into a store they are not participating with the promotion unless you use the app. It‚Äôs very frustrating. My other fast food apps work just fine. I have deleted this app .

title: Can‚Äôt submit orders
review:
It looks like the update kicked out the ability to order through the app. I keep clicking on deals and was trying to do the delivery but it looks like everytime I try to submit and go pay for the order I get this error message that nothing is in my cart.

Even cooler is that I just bought a $20 gift card that now I have to leave my home to go use. Kinda in a situation that delivery would have been ideal. 

Also..it looks like people want giardiniera added to the list. I am also one of those people that wants giardiniera as an option. 

From what it looks like reading reviews from the past couple months on this most recent update...nothing has improved. Is there a way this feedback can get implemented? Doesn‚Äôt seem like a great thing if loyal customers can‚Äôt order from the app.

title: Inconvenience application to use
review: This application does have deals and rewards like the rest of the fast-food chain. However, it's very inconvenient to use; I use the value that they have on the app, but whenever I check out, it keeps popping up a message Default -sorry, try again over and over and would not let me check out. I would have to pay a regular price and wait in line, so what's the purpose of having this application.

title: Love it
review: I love the app and delivery discount perks it gives you ! I use it as an alternative to delivery apps because they provide better customization. The only thing I would critique is having all the menu items available to add. For example, I was able to add extra protein for my BLT but the only option was bacon and no other meat proteins for some reason.

title: Love the update
review: The old version was fun, but it took forever to make an order. The updated version is quick, it lets us save favorites and quickly edit them if necessary, too. The pictures are great for the younger and older members of my family, too. I‚Äôm very pleased with this app.

title: Convenient
review: The app is very convenient but missing a few options. You are not able to choose if you want your sandwich toasted. Hopefully when I go to pick it up my sandwiches are. You‚Äôre also not able to ask for sauce on the side. And only has 4 cheese options. Again, it‚Äôs convenient just not fully there yet

title: ALWAYS Check YOUR Orders Before Leaving the Store or Letting Delivery Person Leave!
review:
Made my first On-Line Order. Now that they‚Äôve Updated the program to Allow place of additional items to the Subway Sub. 
To make the Special order simple, which was ‚ÄúBuy 2 Subs get the 3rd Free.‚Äù
So I ordered 3 Meatball Subs with Onions on the Bread under the meatballs. The tomato sauce and sweet onion sauce. Followed by ‚ÄúSWISS CHEESE‚Äù but upon getting home and eating these 3 subway subs‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ where was your swiss cheese? Any cheese?
There Was No Cheese!
So check your orders before leaving‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..

title: Worthless app
review: Only giving 5 stars so my review is seen. This app allows you to pick ‚Äúcontinue as guest‚Äù but won‚Äôt allow you to check out or purchase anything without creating an account. Such a waste of time to even have that option in the first place.

title: Can‚Äôt order pizza online since your update
review: Whatever y‚Äôall did to the app to fix the bugs made it impossible for me to order pizza online. It says violation of customization rule . What the heck is that?? That‚Äôs pretty much all I order and I‚Äôve sent messages through Twitter with NO RESPONSE. Fix this please

title: App No longer works on iPhone 6
review: I have been using the Subway app for the past 3 years and it has worked fantastic on my iPhone 6.  I loved the coupons and rewards that I would get through it.  However, the latest update doesn‚Äôt work.  When opening the app, it goes to a black screen and then my iPhone 6 force exits the app back to the home menu.  I was looking forward to going to Subway today, but I can no longer place my order, as the app no longer loads up.  Please fix this.  Thanks.

title: Convenient, Easy to use
review: We are on the go a lot with all of our kids activities. It‚Äôs always convenient to be able to order ahead and just pick up when ready. However, I wish they would add an option where you can put certain toppings on 1/2 of a footlong and other toppings on the other 1/2.

title: Intuitive
review: Customizing the sandwich is very straightforward. The pictures of each item added to the sandwich is also a nice touch. Perhaps it would be beneficial to include the amount you selected for each item. For instance if I went light on the black pepper seasoning, the picture of black pepper should have the words light next to it in the review of the sandwich

title: Problematic App
review: This is the most troublesome app on my phone.  It is constantly locking-up, asking for a log-in, or upgrading right when I am trying to use it at the SubWay register - and therefore I am unable to register my purchase.  I don‚Äôt understand why this thing has to be so complicated to use.  I never have these troubles with my other rewards apps - such as El Pollo Loco which is much more convenient for me.  It just never seems to be ready when I need to use it.

title: Very reliable!
review: I‚Äôm a big subway sandwich fan!  We order from the Subway on Eldorado Pkwy about 3-4 times each week.  So, it‚Äôs nice to know that when I do the order will be exactly what I want.  This Subway location is always on point.  The bread is fresh, the service is quick, and the sandwich makers are clean and friendly.  Five stars for great service EVERY SINGLE TIME! üòä

title: So useful and easy!
review: I absolutely love this app! Perfect during COVID for contactless takeout. There are coupons and deals all on display which I really appreciate. And customizing the sandwiches is so easy with all the specific options made available through the ordering process. I even got to pay through the app. Completely worth 5 stars!

title: Can‚Äôt create account. Scam? You be the judge.
review: Haven‚Äôt been able to create an account for months. I even created a new email just in case it was an email thing.  I‚Äôm guessing they prefer you order through 3rd party apps like uber eats so they can charge $12 for a sandwich vs the good deals through their app. And I‚Äôm not going to call to set up an account, subway should fix their obviously broken system.  Don‚Äôt be fooled subway shady af, and Don‚Äôt order through 3rd party app cause YOU ARE OVER PAYING BY DOUBLE. Or order in person if you are in good health and don‚Äôt care if you catch that covid.

title: Glitches take your money
review: I‚Äôve tried calling and sent in feedback emails but I haven‚Äôt gotten any response. The app‚Äôs glitches charged  me twice but never sent my orders to the store. This has happened twice; I‚Äôve lost $15 dollars and missed out on two sandwiches. I like Subway, but I need my refunds. The app shows my last order was on September 23rd but I‚Äôve ordered twice since then and the statements are on my account. Every time the payment processes, an error message pops up. I‚Äôve tried reinstalling the app and now my order history is cleared!! This is ridiculous.

title: Works great, but a bit slow when modifying an order
review: Whenever an update is made to an order, even a tiny update, you have to wait 2 seconds or more for each change to take effect. Which can really add up. Also still haven't found a way to reorder an entire previous order, still have to pick one sandwich at a time from favorites.

title: Great app, annoying login
review: It‚Äôs a great app. However, every time I tap on it, I have to log in every single time and I have to change my password every single time. It‚Äôs weird. I use it somewhat frequently that it should remember me but it always kicks me out and forces me to log in. And I don‚Äôt like the log in process for it. It‚Äôs more time consuming to have to go to a separate page to log in.

title: Nightmare app!
review: I Spent 40 minutes trying to order two sandwiches using the app. Normally I would just go to a subway and pay using the app, which is rather clumsy and difficult in and of itself. But I wanted to take advantage of the two foot-long sandwiches for five dollars special. Unfortunately, every time I tryed to order I kept getting an error and I had to restart. I tried to use a different store, different payment method - nothing worked. The app is clumsy and poorly designed and doesn't function properly. A big waste of time. Please Subway, fix your app!

title: Order doesn‚Äôt get sent to store correctly
review: I placed an order on the mobile app so that I could walk in and pick up my order very quickly. But when you order a meal or sides on the app it doesn‚Äôt tell the store which ones you picked. For example I ordered cookies, the app gave me the option to pick chocolate chip. But when I got to the store she said I can‚Äôt see what kind of cookies you picked. Same was true for chips and drink. So I had to wait while she bagged up all the cookies. Kind of defeats the purpose of ordering ahead.

title: Pointless...DOES NOT WORK
review:
I used the app to place my order, then went to the store to discover they did not have it. The sole employee on staff didn‚Äôt know what to do, said I must have chosen the wrong store. I read the address from the app and she actually had to look at the door to see if I was right. Then, I had to show her my order and explain that I had already paid at least a half a dozen times before she would even try to find it. Once she found it, I still had to correct her in making it. 

Ordering in store would have been far more efficient.

title: Ugh
review: So it was 8 at night and I am hungry so I go on the subway app to order a sandwich and I I thought it was delivery so I don‚Äôt have to walk down there but it‚Äôs not and I found that out after I ordered my sandwich and my cookie. I order it at 8 and it says it will be ready at 8:45 (which is a long time) so I get there at 8:45 and the employees don‚Äôt even have my sandwich made plus they didn‚Äôt give me a cookie cause they said they were all out but they weren‚Äôt and later that night at 10 I found out instead of charging me $10 for a regular sandwich they charged me $30 do I am made

title: Placed order store didn‚Äôt revive it until after sandwich was supposed to be ready
review: I‚Äôm done. Done with this app and done with Subway. Places an order with the app, which also means I paid for it. App shows sandwich in progress and available for pick up at 7:25. Get to store. They do not have the order. At 7:20 they do not have the order. Called owner and left message asking for a refund. At 7:25 I leave. Manager reaches out at 7:51 and tells me sandwich is ready and won‚Äôt be issuing a refund. So app doesn‚Äôt provide accurate info to either of us and I still get charged. NEVER EVER AGAIN.

title: Easy
review: Just got this, and just tried it. Pretty nice to have something like this that actually WORKS (since most chain restaurants here in my small town with apps, can‚Äôt actually use them because they don‚Äôt ever work). I‚Äôll keep using it, & update if there are any problems. But so far, this was SO much faster & easier. Thank you Subway.

title: Great app - easy to customize order!
review: This is a great little app. It picks up your location and shows you the nearest store. Ordered are extremely easy to customize. Once you have your CC in as form of payment you can place an order in about 1 minute or less just the way you like it. Best of all with this app you earn the rewards! Awesome !!

title: Changes to the App Makes Ordering Fun!
review: I really like how the new app is laid out!  Given a choice between the old app and drive through, I chose the drive through every time.  The new app is much more intuitive and easy to use, also less glitches!  Well done and thank you!

title: It doesn‚Äôt work
review:
I downloaded this app about 2 weeks ago and I haven‚Äôt once made it past the log in screen. Neither have I been able to log in via the website. I‚Äôve sent multiple emails to the support team and yet the issue still remains. I visit subway on a pretty regular basis and by not being able to use or even earn points it‚Äôs like wasting money. 

Until you guys can get it together and get things fixed I believe I won‚Äôt be getting subway anymore and I‚Äôm grateful that at least your stores don‚Äôt run like your app or website. It‚Äôs disgraceful.
developerResponse: {'id': 3054961, 'body': "We are sorry to hear that you're having difficulties. Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-04-06T20:19:52Z'}

title: Too many bugs. Not enough options.
review:
The subs are prebuilt and you can't customize them the way you want them. What wrong with having a list and just checking off what you want on the sub? 
 You can‚Äôt use coupons or other deals with it. 
 The app crashes often, it‚Äôs more work to use the app than it is to just go in the store and order you sub in person. You may wait in line, but at least you‚Äôll get it the way you like it, not how app thinks you should have it. 
If I were Subway, I would fire whoever made this terrible app and hire a professional.
developerResponse: {'id': 1714556, 'body': 'Hi there- thanks for reaching out. We are working on ways to improve the app experience - we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com', 'modified': '2017-11-09T20:59:05Z'}

title: Piece of crap fecal matter
review:
If I could give it less than zero I would,
I doesn‚Äôt work guys, app freezes and locks up. Can‚Äôt place an order, I have reset the phone and still have the same out come. Ridiculous!
Then if you can get in and past the first layer of encryption you have another layer to go through before you can even think about ordering!!! Really! Come on let me place my order and be done with it! 
Save Tim and get on their email list and click the link and Order from there it does the same thing easier and quicker and much less headaches
developerResponse: {'id': 1605078, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we will definitely look into this issue. Feel free out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2017-10-27T13:36:51Z'}

title: Store option
review: There are 2 Subways in my area, I would like to be able to choose which store I would like the order to go to.  Also with certain extras like bacon, Zi would like the option of being about to double the amount and ask to make it crispy

title: Fix the Barcode Brightness
review: Overall the app is great, the only thing is that when you tap on the barcode to scan for your points the screen stays bright and does not auto set back to the previous brightness. Please fix the brightness for the barcode scanning

title: I like it but it needs a few tweaks
review: The concept and efficiency of the app is great but it sometimes gets stuck and I can‚Äôt tell the order went through. Also some of the items available here do not match in store. There‚Äôs no way to upgrade the meal combo to a medium drink or change the chip selection to what‚Äôs actually in the store

title: Major Problem
review: While I think the app is pretty streamlined and looks good; the biggest problem is not being able to just make a sandwich from scratch; you have to choose from a preselected list of sandwiches and ingredients and can‚Äôt remove everything you need/want to get the desired sandwich. The whole motto is ‚ÄúHave it your way‚Äù, but it‚Äôs kinda hard when you restrict people on how much they can customize. Please fix this ASAP; it‚Äôs ridiculous how you still haven‚Äôt included this feature.

title: Worst app!
review: I have not been able to use any deals! The app either glitches out, or just doesn‚Äôt work. I have tried to change accounts,use on different devices, and the results are the same! The store will not honor any deals because it was not completed on the app! Add to the fact that customer service is terrible at the stores‚Ä¶ Is it really worth going to Subway anymore with their prices being about the same as their (used to be more expensive) competitors?!?! I don‚Äôt think so.

title: okay
review: decent but glaring errors. throws a decent amount of offers at you... but not every store is participating and it doesnt tell you till after you put in an order (which if you were customizing is a tremendous waste of time). since prices vary by store, would help once you select a location to see each price on the menu. instead you have to select each item one by one (instead of an overview) which i frequently do since certain things are cheaper in certain stores. since they fluctuate i would like to view prices after hours if im thinking about it for the next day- except the app itself is essentially locked out if the location youre ordering at is closed.

title: Poor user experience
review: This app is moderately easy to navigateHowever I am a power user and very intuitive with technology. This would be disastrous for an older user such as my parents. The app has selected the wrong location a couple times and lax hey screen to allow you to double check your order before submitting. I can think on two occasions where I chose a different vendor to place an order versus subway. Please rework your app or I‚Äôll continue placing orders elsewhere.

title: All digital contact support?!
review: I‚Äôve had a problem with the app ever since a bunch of new employees ruined my app by constantly charging and removing my order as I was using the app. Now it says my account has an error and to ‚Äúcontact us‚Äù, but all they have is useless FAQs and an all digital phone service that does NOTHING for my problems. This is only a two star review for now, but if these app owners don‚Äôt make some drastic changes soon, it‚Äôs dropping to a flat one...I mean, cmon guys...

title: Convenient but the app needs to fix these things
review:
-- I can't delete things from my favorites 
-- I can't edit items in my favorites without adding them to a bag 
-- I can't add an item to a bag without first picking a store 
-- in some instances there is a bottom menu that pops up in favorites that blocks access to the info button for the bottom item.
-- There's no vinaigrette listed in the ingredients at all

title: Trash
review: This app is trash I just deleted it from my phone. My favorite sandwich is a turkey & salami w/mayo and mustard. Their app doesn‚Äôt allow you to add-on salami...it will let you add pepperoni. It also won‚Äôt give you the option to add mustard to a turkey sandwich. Since I can‚Äôt order what I want I just don‚Äôt eat there so I don‚Äôt need the app. Unfortunately they have the same set up on apps like postmates and Uber so I just don‚Äôt bother to go there. The whole thing about subway is building a sandwich how YOU want it but then they say nope...you can‚Äôt put mustard on that.

title: Having problems
review: When I get to the end to pay it don‚Äôt give the option to pay when I get there it always wants a card before you can place your order and that is not right some people only use cash and do t trust banks

title: No Customer support.
review: CAN NOT get customer support. If there is a problem at the store you ordered at and they do not answer the phone ( and you were passing through Heavener Oklahoma but live in Texas ) then you get no help. The only option is to drive to the store you ordered from and hope a manager is there. Why can‚Äôt they just answer the phone ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: ... but
review: I love the convenience of ordering through the app especially since our local subway often has problems with the credit card reader in the store. However I can‚Äôt order specialty sandwiches like the current bbq rib sandwich from the app, I still have to go into the store and hope the credit card reader works as I have to drive halfway across town for an ATM that works. If this could be fixed this app would be perfect.

title: No toast option
review: I used the app and didn‚Äôt realize there wasn‚Äôt a toast option until I picked it up and asked. She said it wasn‚Äôt toasted, you have to put it under special instructions. Granted if I was in store, this would not even be an issue. If you‚Äôre trying to create an efficient app I would add that. Not everyone will remember or think to put ‚Äútoasted‚Äù. It should be an option just like all the toppings because that‚Äôs what would happen in store. Disappointed in a cold spicy Italian sandwich. Gross. Probably won‚Äôt order again and will just go elsewhere for a hot sandwich.

title: Thank you developers for fixing the location error!
review: I love using this app but prior to this last update had an issue ordering because the app crashed whenever I had to pick the location for the order. I downloaded the update and the issue has been fixed. Thank you developers!

title: Just Lacking One Thing
review: There is no option to heat a sandwich. You can only toast or leave cold. Why have the note section if the employees don‚Äôt read it?! I ALWAYS ask them to heat my sandwiches and EVERY time, my food is cold and I have to take it right back inside. Please add the option for heat, toast or none. Other than that, love the promos and rewards and simplicity of the app.

title: Feedback
review:
Subway is my favorite tester aunt, so imagine how sad it is for me when the app is so hard to use. 

THE UI
The main issue I have is the UI. Your UI is so cluttered and hard to understand. There are so many random buttons and pieces of text all over the place making the app super difficult to use. You should also make it easier to favorite sandwiches and meals. I will say that I really like the UI when customizing a sandwich. Do more things like this.

DELIVERY
On your website, it says you deliver, but there is no delivery option. I am assuming  that you only deliver with door dash and Uber, but you need to be a lot more specific. It is very confusing.

GIFT CARDS
You need an option to scan gift cards instead of having to type all of the codes and pins in.

title: Terrible
review: This app will not let you customize from the start to make your own sandwich. It makes you pick from the list THEY have, not what you may want. Overall it is better to go into the store because you can see what they put on it and HOW you want it.

title: Easy on the run
review:
It is hard to eat right when on the go. I find myself in the drivethru eating junk because it is fast and easy. With the SubWay app I was able to pre order a custom sub to a store near my current location, pay for it and all I had to do was run in and out. Done!

Fast and easy no lines no waiting

title: Forced to update
review: Some apps you can still use without updating, not this one. More than once I have been in line about to pay for my sandwich when I open the app so I can scan my rewards and it says it needs to be updated. The last thing people want to do while waiting in a long lunch line is wait for an app to update! Make it so that you can be reminded to update later and let us still access our reward card!
developerResponse: {'id': 13084688, 'body': "We appreciate you sharing your feedback, and are always looking for ways to enhance the mobile app experience for our guests. You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-23T16:32:24Z'}

title: Going from love to hate.
review: I use to love the app but every time I try to use it something goes wrong and I get error messages. It‚Äôs especially frustrating when I get all the way through my order only to have it freeze or error or crash on check out. Sometimes, I think it‚Äôs faster to drive to my local shop and order in person. Please do an update to the app soon to correct all the error messages and freeze times.
developerResponse: {'id': 10265679, 'body': "Hi there, please contact our support team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!\r\n", 'modified': '2019-08-20T20:43:25Z'}

title: Great app
review: Love this app. Easy to use. Rewards savings are awesome. I‚Äôve received over $10 in rewards to few months I‚Äôve had the app!! Sometimes I only pay $2 and change for my lunch sandwich! And mobile orders make it easy during the long lunch lines most subways have! Definitely recommend that you download this app! Great job developers!

title: Order does not alert store employees to make it!
review: Easy enough to use, but have placed two orders that were received by store but were not ready when I arrived.  Just today when I arrived at the store they had only one customer and all employees were standing at the register chatting.  They were able to find my order on the system but said there is no alert to let them know the order came through, so they did not know to prepare my order.  Seems like the infrastructure needs work.
developerResponse: {'id': 5405391, 'body': 'We are sorry this happened - please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-10-08T13:30:26Z'}

title: Convenient, but too many updates
review: I love this app but it needs to be updated EVERY TIME I use it.  I enjoy being able to order just the way everyone likes their sandwiches, it‚Äôs much easier than the chaos of ordering in-store (with multiple children) It‚Äôs super convenient that it saves my past orders so I can reorder the same thing. I just wish it didn‚Äôt need to be updated all the time!

title: Decently working app
review: App works well if your on decent WiFi only complaint is it‚Äôs hard to know which restaurants are honoring discounts or doing promotions   when ordering on the app. It tells you only after trying to apply at the end. This would be more helpful if the app had deal categories based on restaurants‚Äôparticipation.

title: Horrible!!
review:
Whoever deaigned this app shoupd be fired. I used the old app and worked great. This is clunky, will not connect to server. The old app you had a list of favorites and one click to reorder. Not now.  This app seemed intent on showing us what the sandwich ane green peppers etc looked like. This app needs put to death.  I have reduced ny at least 50% my Subway purchases. Just not worth the hassle. The staff at Subway say jave had many complaints. But the Comapny does not seem to care. 

Major POS!!

Your generic response is not an excuse for a dysfunctional app. I have stopped eatind at all subway restaurants. Fire the developer.
developerResponse: {'id': 990161, 'body': 'Hello. We are sincerely sorry to hear that you are not thoroughly satisfied with the new App experience. We highly value your feedback and are taking each point into consideration for a possible future enhancement.', 'modified': '2017-08-25T00:30:22Z'}

title: Lacking Multiple payments/gift cards on order
review: If you have multiple gift cards and the default one is not enough to cover you get an error not enough.   But yet you have another gift card with 4.00 on it from the last time this happened. No way to have it also use the next gift card or even Apple Pay or credit card

title: The SW company writing this app should be fired
review:
- Apple should pull this app until it works
- Absolutely the worst food ordering app I have ever used.
- App is designed for a phone and will not go full screen on my iPad giving me a small iPhone window to work in. As an older guy going blind and deaf this is not the way to influence customers.
- No one at Subway up the street can help with the app. They just shrug and say sorry that‚Äôs the way it is.
- Nice play Subway, can‚Äôt use the app, can‚Äôt use most of the coupons. That just got you an extra $10 today from me.
- Told the wife, no more Subway for me, if she wants a Subway sandwich she can order and pay. I will go an pick it up but if the app doesn‚Äôt work I will come home empty handed.
- Would not take Apple Pay today. Why, who knows? And of course the store workers were of no help.

title: Missing food
review: I have ordered 3x in last 2 weeks. 1st order for curbside pickup was a wrap.. perfect. 2nd was a no bread bowl. I waited 40 minutes to get my order, but food was as great! Today I ordered  a foot long, a rotisserie chicken no bread bowl with dressing on the side, and cookies for store pickup. Foot long was good but no bread bowl had no cheese or chicken and dressing was way too much.  All veggies were like they would go on a sandwich where the last one, veggies were cut up. Very disappointed.. won‚Äôt order again

title: Use DoorDash instead, not worth the trouble
review: Both times I used this app, I did not receive at least one of the items I ordered. I know that‚Äôs not the fault of the app, but the problem is that there is no way to communicate with the customer service and get a refund if something is messed up on your order like you can with DoorDash. Only redeeming factor is that you can use their pop up deals in this app, but it‚Äôs not worth it if they don‚Äôt have any way to contact a customer help line.

title: I got Scammed
review: I ordered ahead on the app at 11:40 and asked for it to be done by 12:05. I get there at 12:10 and my app said it was ready for pickup. I went in the store and they hadn‚Äôt even received the order. Once i got in the store, my app started to malfunction. It kept showing different locations, one on the order completion page and one on the order history. It had already charged my account. And i had to buy more food! So they double charged me and I can‚Äôt even get on the app to get a refund!!!! Don‚Äôt use the app!!

title: App is easy to use
review: The app is so much better than the last time I used it! More intuitive and easy to use. Yay! Thank you! Only issue is I like to order egg white sandwiches for lunch and I cannot find a way to do this‚Ä¶falls under breakfast and I get the message the location isn‚Äôt accepting breakfast orders. So, having that option would be great!

title: What Happened.
review:
It worked just fine for a year or two, then they tried to update the app to make it ‚Äúeasier‚Äù and there are now constant errors.  Also, menu items keep changing so the ‚Äòfavorites‚Äô
feature is useless. Also, some items the store told me they have are unavailable on the app. Today, my saved payment method disappeared and when I went to check out the app crashed. This is not unusual anymore.

title: If I would change one thing
review: The app is not accurate when ordering sometimes. Like for example I want to order something that has guacamole on it. The app will allow me to put guacamole on it and a store that I go to has not had guacamole since last year. But other than that; the app is pretty handy thank you

title: Just what I needed!
review: The Subways in my area can be pretty busy, so being able to put in a remote order is perfect!  I love skipping the line.  The visual interactivity of the app is easy to use and cuts out any user error that I may have incurred.  Couldn‚Äôt be easier, they always get my order right!

title: Too many glitches and huge time waster
review: There are details they don‚Äôt tell you up front. There is a limit to the amount of items, so if you have a large family, you would have to place multiple orders. Errors on most pages and you can‚Äôt go backwards. Pay function defaults to Apple Pay, but you have to call a number to verify and that number leads you to a voicemail. There is no ‚ÄúI‚Äôm Here‚Äù button when you arrive.

title: No customer service
review: Twice now I have placed an order and went to the store(2 separate stores) and have been told they don‚Äôt accept mobile orders after a certain time and that they can‚Äôt give me a refund. I was told I would need to go to the website to resolve any issues. The website has 0 ways to contact subway to get any issues fixed. I have messaged subway on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and I have had 0 responses. Messages Didn‚Äôt even get read. So can‚Äôt email, can‚Äôt call, can‚Äôt message. NO SERVICE!!!!!!!

title: Worst app ever
review: I‚Äôve tried to use this app 3 times , while in route to a subway location . Works fine until I get near the location and then when I want to open the app to use a coupon or deal, it doesn‚Äôt work. 2 regular subs shouldn‚Äôt cost $21 to boot. Complete bullsh** and this new ‚Äútoken‚Äù system is awful . Should of kept it the old way it was. Every visit to subway become more and more further in between because of its change in business model and food quality gets worst and worst . Thanks #rantover

title: Easy to navigate
review: The app is easy to navigate around. Only problem is there is no way to enter the newspaper coupons that came. The ad clearly says to order online for contactless or no lines yet no way to enter the codes so no deal. Oh well this time dinners ordered but next time I‚Äôll have to go in person if this issue still exists.

title: Account was hacked
review: My Subway account was hacked. Unsure if it was via the app or their web, but someone ordered a pickup in Kentucky, I‚Äôm in Michigan. Learned there‚Äôs no longer a phone number for Subway customer service. Only option is to send an email through their webpage. Did that the day the hack happened, haven‚Äôt heard a peep from them. Obviously I changed my own and removed my cc immediately. Until I hear from them I have no trust in their digital experience.

title: Correct orders!
review: Love being able to save my favorites! Makes getting a sub super fast. And now I usually get my order correct. Which was a huge issue with call in orders. There was even the salad that came with no lettuce screw up. Contacted headquarters and no response. The app is great and even the 2 buck rewards is cool! Now you oughta work I‚Äôm responding to your customers

title: Footlong is default setting
review: Fairly easy to use, but beware every sandwich defaults to footlong unless you specify otherwise. If you make a mistake in customizing ingredients it‚Äôs easy to go back and change it, but if you forget to pick 6 inch, you can‚Äôt change it from footlong without wiping out the whole set of specs for the sandwich and starting over. I suspect this setup was intentional. I don‚Äôt know who eats a sandwich that large unless it‚Äôs a catering situation. Just trying a sneaky upsell.

title: Well made but...
review: Well made but  4/5 because the interface was a little confusing at places. The design and animations used when actually creating the sandwich were impressive and satisfying making the sandwich crafting process more desirable. Even with the confusing interface the subway app is an impressive feat for fast food apps that I would highly recommend!

title: Decent
review: It‚Äôs handy. I wish I didn‚Äôt have to remove items from a sandwich just to create my order but the ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù button helps for my go to sandwiches that I typically get. I noticed at some locations the staff was having issues with making sure the app recorded the points so I wonder if there are somethings on their end that could be changed so it‚Äôs easier for them.

title: Frustrated.
review:
They move all the deals to online orders though the app.
The app itself is slow and clunky to use / load.
You only have select items you can add.
And limited additions to them.
I like subway because of the choice you can get there.
The app completely takes that choice away.
You can only buy one of the selections you can‚Äôt add the meat extra meats to any of the orders.
You don‚Äôt have a note box for additional instructions or requests for customers to write in.
It does not need to be a huge one but something would be nice.
If your trying to complete with old school take out and don‚Äôt have the same options as a regular take out place would why bother.
Add a price counter on the app.
Subway is already known to have jacked up there prices admitting it now won‚Äôt hurt you.
Simply disappointed at how little options and how slow the app is.

title: Good app, but could use improvements
review: Recently used the app for a footlong deal. I saw that you could favorite a particular sandwich so I placed one I usually get into my cart with a different one. It only lets you favorite the entire order, not a particular sandwich. It would be better to have the favorites section where you can design the sandwich and favorite without putting it in the cart.

title: It works well
review: The app is very good. Saved me a lot of time to just pick up my sandwich. It also works well for having someone pick up my food for me so I don‚Äôt have to text them exactly what I want. I know it will be right. The only issue I have is there is not an option to pay at the store with cash. You can only pay when you order and it has to be with card.

title: No Option for NO BREAD!!
review: Are you kidding me?  My kids and I have Gluten allergies, and I‚Äôm not able to change my order of marinara meatballs in a bowl by eliminating the bread on the app.  In fact, I am able to remove Parmesan cheese selection.  It‚Äôs really ridiculous!  I‚Äôve never had a problem telling the workers my request.  I was hoping that the app would save me the hassle of handling high-energy son while placing my order in advance due to being single mom most of the day.

You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-31T00:58:28Z'}

title: Amazing!
review: Our subway is slow.. like ridiculously, unreasonably slow. This app saved me so much time getting our dinner tonight! Now I can order and continue what I need to do at home before picking it up. I know I can order over the phone but they still usually mess it up so now i can see exactly how I want it on the screen! I love it!

title: Why
review: This app does one of the thing I hate the most with updates and that is it signs you out completely. My problem is you have no idea this happens so if you go to order food and surprise. It‚Äôs a problem for me cause I have my passwords at home not with me and subway please don‚Äôt email me that I can redeem my points after the fact with my receipts cause when I was setting up the app I tried that and everyone gave me some form of error. Don‚Äôt know why this happens and it shouldn‚Äôt be a thing with all the other apps I use and have that don‚Äôt ever do this.
developerResponse: {'id': 10420801, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to our team by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-08-29T16:56:14Z'}

title: Missing a few things but generally really good
review: The interface is smooth, simple, and intuitive, making this app really convenient if you‚Äôre in a hurry. There are a few minor details missing, like being able to add more than a single type of cheese or ability to replace meat on a sandwich, but if these were implemented in the future this app would be perfect.

title: Very Handy but could use refinement
review:
Love the app and generally the customer service at participating Subways. 
Reordering is a bit hard to do.  I need to go to multiple locations and the app will not work correctly for at least one location (Mill Plain, Garrison Square).  Impossible to order a 12‚Äù there for some reason (I have attempted several times).
In general, the app just needs some usability refinement.
developerResponse: {'id': 7298385, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-02-14T14:22:13Z'}

title: No Custom Ordering
review:
So, it‚Äôs fine if you want to order from their menu and somewhat customize a sandwich (can‚Äôt remove main protein, can‚Äôt add bacon), but there is zero capability to build a sandwich from scratch. I assume there is some kind of pricing issue here, but it isn‚Äôt insurmountable. For $X price, let me pick a bread, protein (or not), and toppings, and charge me $Y extra for each extra protein or whatever.

Without actually being able to specify a sandwich I want (my kid wanted a BLT, which is impossible to order via the app), this is useless.
developerResponse: {'id': 6903717, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-01-18T13:51:44Z'}

title: Worst app EVER!!!!!!!!!
review: My family and I love Subway but EVERY time I use this app I get genuinely angry. There‚Äôs always a problem. Today I‚Äôve spent 20 minutes trying to log in without success. I even made a new account because it kept sending me to the forgot your password screen (didn‚Äôt forget the password). Even in the newly created account (and this is at least 5 times) it keeps going to the same thing. Guess I‚Äôm ordering Jimmy Johns. Their app works seamlessly!!!!! Shame on you Subway. I worked a Subway for 5 years in HS and college. It‚Äôs too bad I have to get my family (of 6) Jimmy Johns.
developerResponse: {'id': 3640762, 'body': 'We appreciate your patience while we investigated the concerns you shared with us. We identified the concerns that you brought to our attention, and our support team has indicated that the concern you identified should be resolved. Please uninstall and reinstall the Subway¬Æ App from your device, and the concern that you mentioned should be corrected. If you could follow up to let us know that this has been resolved, we would truly appreciate it. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-05-29T15:15:23Z'}

title: Easy & Convenient
review: It's just too easy to order & pay online and just pick it up when I pick kids up at school or even going out for the afternoon. I live in a very rural area so I order as I leave home and it's always ready by the the time I get into town.

title: Consistently takes your money and doesn‚Äôt place the order.
review: This has happened on multiple occasions now to not only myself but everybody else I know that has used the app. I place an order, it tells me ‚ÄúThere has been an error‚Äù takes my money, closes the app then doesn‚Äôt place the order. The first time I eventually got the money returned but the last two times it‚Äôs happened I did not. My friends have all had similar experiences with the exact same results as well. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK!

title: EDIT favorite missing..
review:
Apparently, I didn‚Äôt select toasted, no idea where that was, but I created a favorite, wanted to edit it to add toasting‚Ä¶ nope.

Had to delete it and re-add it..
Oh, have you order it again..

I wanted to do the monthly 50% off on foot longs‚Ä¶ can‚Äôt add that to cart without ordering something else‚Ä¶

So, have to wait for next order, but this location doesn‚Äôt do ANY coupons, so will this work there?   Who knows‚Ä¶

Not a complete disaster, but really make thing better than just ‚Äúmore info‚Äù, I can‚Äôt get more info, and can‚Äôt seem to edit stuff I need to‚Ä¶

  Didn‚Äôt save me any time, I ordered 20 minutes before I got there and they hadn‚Äôt started on my order by the time I got there, and had I just walked in, it would have started at the same time‚Ä¶

title: Gets the job done
review: The app is fine, but there are areas for improvement. When ordering a meal, the app only lets you choose from a small subset of the chips and drinks that are actually available at a particular location. They should update the selection or allow one to make a generic choice on the app and allow them to choose during pickup.

title: Way better than one the app first came out.
review: I downloaded it like a year ago and it wasn‚Äôt that great would not let you pick your drink or chips and if it did you only had three options of chips. I really enjoy this update! You guys are doing amazing job

title: Do not order from app
review: Do not order from app‚Ä¶..especially if you are disabled unable to walk. Ordered this while I was recovering from surgery. Asked then to put the order in front of the door and never received. The app goes through DoorDash. So DoorDash and subway has been giving me the run around, blaming each other because I never received my order. Literally have not had subway since. Just order directly from door dash. Still have not gotten my refund and it‚Äôs been almost a month.

title: App doesn‚Äôt work
review: For the past few months the app has not allowed me to place mobile orders. Now the app won‚Äôt even let me sign in. I‚Äôve submitted numerous tickets to have this fixed with subway and have never heard back from anyone at subway. I recently called their corporate office (had to google the number as it‚Äôs no where to be found on their website) and was told the tickets I was submitting were incorrect, even though this is where I was directed to submit the ticket through the app.

title: Completely unusable now
review: I‚Äôve been using the subway app for about a year, since 3 months ago or so, it‚Äôs been unusable. It glitches, closes itself, won‚Äôt load anything. I‚Äôve tried deleting it and re-downloading a couple times to no avail. It‚Äôs unfortunate because i love subway and order from there often, but since I can‚Äôt use my coupons or promo codes anymore I probably won‚Äôt be going there again until it‚Äôs fixed. It‚Äôs not worth $10 a sub or to deal with the lines etc.

title: Rewards!
review: I use the offers and rewards I receive with the app, and now I eat at Subway 3 times as much as I used too. They are probably making good money off me, but I‚Äôm paying less per visit at costs much less than other quick dining options.

title: Makes it easy to eat subway
review: We had to stop going to Subway since we have a family of five. Now I can order with my phone why they continue to try and kill each other in the background. Plus 10 minutes of peace and quiet while I pick up the order from the store!

title: Tons of Issues
review:
You can‚Äôt build your own sub. So even when I want to make a non buffalo sub and I request to have buffalo sauce taken off for example. It still labels it as a buffalo sub and it‚Äôs put on their anyway.

You click to use the bogo deal where it says use deal right under it or something along those lines but then still have to apply the coupon at checkout and if you don‚Äôt, you get charged the full amount?

Takes way too long to load the pages, isn‚Äôt efficient at all.

title: Could be so much better
review:
1: No options to say whether or not a sandwich should be toasted.
2: Can‚Äôt order more than 6 sandwiches at a time which forces employees to instead take walk-ins with massive sandwich lists for their families. They also mention this nowhere so I waisted about 20 minutes figuring out what everyone wanted only to be told I‚Äôd have to go into the store anyways to overwhelm them with my order. 
3: Most offerings simply weren‚Äôt listed. Missing several toppings that every subway store has access to, like oregano.

title: Ability to earn rewards, via receipt..
review: Overall the app is basic.   which is fine, but it would be nice if the Deals offered the same coupons they send me in the mail every week... Also would be nice if we could enter the receipt info to earn rewards, instead of having to scan at the register (which i always forget to do..)

title: Can‚Äôt even make an account
review:
What‚Äôs the point of an app that requires an account when the system won‚Äôt even let me make an account and just send me a message with an error? Cmon, get it together developers...

UPDATE: I literally come back a year later and figured the problem was fixed but it STILL isn‚Äôt after all this time. You devs that work on this app are absolutely USELESS and are should go kick rocks for a living, can‚Äôt even do something as simple as program a basic log-in. Absolutely pathetic.

title: A so-so experience
review: While the general functionality is fine, the ability to customize orders needs help. Specifically, not being able to customize meat selections. Those options are locked and cannot be changed. Say I want to add turkey to a BMT? It doesn‚Äôt allow for that addition. If they just had a ‚Äúcreate your own sub/wrap‚Äù option that had all ingredients listed to choose from, that would solve a lot of issues.

title: Doesn‚Äôt show all locations
review: We have two Subway locations in our town, but both the app and the Subway website only show one... and it‚Äôs the one in the opposite side of town. We are unable to order online to the nearest Subway location at all, and phoning it in only creates the opportunity for botched orders. The app is basically useless to us.

title: Great flexibility with a few quirks
review: I love the flexibility that the Subway app offers in selection of ingredients and the amounts  thereof just as if I was in the store ordering.  The app did seem to hang on the add-one screen such that I had to tap the button to make it go away and proceed several times (in one instance about 12 times).  When it finally did, I was able to proceed with ordering easily.

title: Layout great, functionality needs work
review: I think the customization and ordering work great, but whenever I try coming back to a saved order it glitches out and some of the buttons just repeatedly give me the loading symbol and go nowhere. Other times I just have to cancel it altogether and start over and even sometimes that doesn't work.

title: Hasn‚Äôt worked for days now
review: Something funky going on since your last update. Tried creating online order a few days ago. It Only let me create one sandwich out of three. After several attempts and much wasted time I Gave up and ordered in store which I‚Äôd rather not do because I do not get my points. Now, it‚Äôs saying ‚Äúuh oh‚Äù by my rewards tokens. Kinda like there‚Äôs some technical issues on your end. It also won‚Äôt let me access my acct info. Nothing happens when I tap on it. Can‚Äôt access this info on your online website either. What the heck?

title: Cannot build a sandwich
review: I find it frustrating that you cannot build your own sandwich. For example, you have to select from the sandwiches on the menu. You cannot just pick the bread, meat, and sides that you want. Also, you cannot add bacon to the kids meal sandwiches on here. And, there are sandwiches that you can ask for in person at Subway that is not on the menu, and therefore not on the apps menu to order. Maybe this app works for most families. That‚Äôs great. But my family likes to ‚Äúbuild‚Äù a sandwich for each persons taste buds. So, this app is really disappointing.

title: Easy and convenient
review: I love subway, and being able to order ahead of time makes it so much easier.  No more waiting in lines for people to get a little bit over everything on their sub.  Just order it online and pick it up at the counter when you walk in.  Done!

title: A great time saver!
review:
This app saves me time on my lunch break.
I order when I‚Äôm at work and then schedule for my food to be ready as soon as I get to the store. It works well for me üòäü•ó
I get to cut the line and pick up my meal instead of waiting. Whenever they didn‚Äôt have something in stock that I ordered, they called me right away to let me know. üëç

title: Love this app
review: Super convenient to order and just walk in and pick up without having to wait in line .. I was really disappointed when the app stopped working and kept giving me an error message when I tried ordering but after simply uninstalling and reinstalling the app, it‚Äôs working perfectly :)

title: Good app, when it works
review:
Half the time when I try to use it, it just repeatedly tells me ‚Äúan error occurred‚Äù. Also says it can‚Äôt show me my tokens. 

But in addition I hate how I can‚Äôt pick from more chips or drinks. I don‚Äôt get soda when I go there. But I‚Äôm not given the options for much else. Not cool for a place that is supposed to be known for healthy options. 

Would also love the option to pay at pickup - that would solve the problem of chip and drink choices too because I could decide that at pickup.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-07-20T17:03:08Z'}

title: Way better than before!
review: The app has significantly improved over the past year or so. Before I couldn‚Äôt even place orders because it was so bugged. Now it actually lets me sign-in, reorder recent orders, and even gives me points for ordering online. Use it multiple times a weeks for lunch! Thank you for fixing it!

title: The best of all the restaurant apps
review: I‚Äôve used multitudes of fast food restaurant apps, and the Subway app is easily the best. All of the others have some sort of issue, from UX to the actual process of getting your order (looking at you, McDonald‚Äôs). The subway app, however, does not suffer from any of these issues. It‚Äôs designed almost perfectly.

title: Can‚Äôt use my gift card towards payments
review: So I have $6.48 left on my gift card and my credit card is listed on my account. They won‚Äôt let me apply my 6.48 to my 6.89 total and require me to pay fully on my credit card. I‚Äôd gladly pay he .41 with my card. Everytime I try and pay it says insufficient funds on the gift card. Instead of letting that be taken off and the remaining paid on the credit card. Normally not a bit deal at all. But when I have to go in and wait in line during my lunch hour that time adds up. Pretty poor design if you ask me.
