Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-04-20T16:26:07Z'}

title: A+++
review: I just downloaded this app 45 minutes ago, got a look at how it works (super easy)ordered subs, and picked them up 10 minutes later. It was the most seamless, pleasant online ordering experience I have ever had! They got it RIGHT first try. Not to mention I love that location (Main Street Blackstone, MA) and the guys who work there! Great job, Subway app creators! üëçüèªüëçüèª

title: Fix the App
review:
Seems like when you want to order and put stuff in your cart and want to check out, all your items are removed from the cart. Then it‚Äôs smart enough to say ‚ÄúPssss your cart it empty‚Äù 
OH REALLY. Because I recall adding sandwiches to my cart and was planing on checking out.

title: Please fix one small error!!
review: I already sent the suggestion to the company, but negative reviews tend to get more attention. It really is an issue that there is no option to select ‚ÄúToasted‚Äù when choosing the flatbread. The workers don‚Äôt pay attention to the ‚ÄúAdditional Comments‚Äù section until it‚Äôs too late. Each time I go in to pick up my online order, I have to catch them before they finish otherwise it gets toasted with the vegetables already on it and hot tomato, spinach and pickles is pretty gross.

title: Can‚Äôt make orders anymore
review: The app was fine until recently. It gives a pop up notification saying ‚ÄúDefault - Sorry, Please try again‚Äù each time I try to order. I looked it up and apparently this is an issue that hasn‚Äôt been fixed for 6 months. It‚Äôs not possible to place orders anymore, so there‚Äôs no point in using the app now. Please address this Subway!

title: What‚Äôs out of stock?
review: This app has been really helpful to pick up a meal on our way from the kids‚Äô sports and everything, but there are some instances when the Subway I‚Äôm ordering from doesn‚Äôt have everything our subs need. There should be a way on this app to see what is out of stock at the Subway of your choice!

title: App is better than quality
review: I love subway and the app is convenient. Sadly the only way to have a sub made my way is to know the people making it or I have to be there in person. Tired of using app asking for toasted sub and leaving special instructions to toast sub op y to be cold when ordering from a different location.

title: The app does NOT WORK in Zanesville, OH
review: I‚Äôm really glad for the people who are having great success with this app but in Zanesville, OH, on the west side, unfortunately it doesn‚Äôt work. The app lets you get excited about making your order but then does not accept your promo codes out payment info, not does it calculate your discount - even if you are standing right in the store! The employees have no control over the app and they try really hard to help but they actually dislike the app as much as I do! Just disappointing‚Ä¶

title: App not work
review: I can‚Äôt older any thing form the menu list it keep not work for me it has not been up date seen at 2015  Ples work on it see it get up date to the right year no more issues on it keep up the  up date to Ples so it can be at 100 % work range

title: Missing Items
review: This app is great. I‚Äôve been going to subway for a long time and love their sandwiches, only complaint I have is how in person there are more options than on he app. I always get Mixed Peppers in my sandwich but the app doesn‚Äôt have that option, which is alright.

title: Making of sandwich
review: I am in need of a kidney and liver transplant. I‚Äôm on dialysis also. I eat Subway every single day. For lunch and dinner! I can only eat this because this is all that my body can handle! I enjoy the way my sandwich is made. They know how to make it perfectly and too a T! I really am enjoying SubwayüôèüèΩ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Love it.
review: We order using the app at least twice a month. Our boys love Subway. We definitely have our favorites and it‚Äôs ready for pick up in 20 minutes or less. They‚Äôve never messed up our order in Flora. We‚Äôve ordered 25 times or more using the app.

title: Love this Subway location!
review:
This is the best Subway I‚Äôve ever ordered from or eaten at. The food always fresh and employees always very friendly. The food prep area is clean and the employees always wearing & changing gloves. I will pass by other locations to eat at this Buffalo WV Subway location. 
Thanks for awesome food and outstanding employees!

title: Easier than in person
review: I love the ability to place my order easily. I love the favorites for my family! It‚Äôs way easier to place the online order than to walk into the store- plus my location has a drive up window!

title: Great App!!
review: The Subway app is very user friendly and allows you all the same variations for your sandwiches just like you were ordering in the restaurant!!  It keeps track of bonus points, your favorite sandwiches and/or meals, as well as the favorite locations!  I really like this app ~ Well Done Subway!!!

title: Convenient & Easy
review: I use this app almost every time I eat subway . I would give 5 stars however, some menu items aren‚Äôt available on the app. Before the last update, there was not an option to put mustard on your sandwich. Also, I just ordered a sandwich today and there is no way for me to order cookies.

title: This app is terrible
review: This app would be useful if it didn‚Äôt have consistent communication issues that persist until it‚Äôs past the time to submit a mobile order. I don‚Äôt know what the point of an app to submit a mobile order is if it is incapable of doing so.

title: HATE this app!
review: I only give it one star because I can‚Äôt give it ZERO! I tried to place my order in the app only to find out that the ONLY things I can get on the pizza are cheese, pepperoni or bacon! When I go into the store, I can add extra cheese, this is NOT an option in the app! I don‚Äôt care if I have to pay more for it, but to not even give me the option is bogus at best! Until I can completely ‚Äúcustomize‚Äù my order, I guess I will just be forced to order when I get to the store! As far as I‚Äôm concerned, the app is useless!

title: Why not just list bread and water as only choices available?
review:
Started my online order, for pickup, and decided to get chips and drinks in the shopping bag before moving on to sandwiches.  Menu picture for drinks shows photo of Coca Cola but selection list doesn‚Äôt.  I know my store carries Miss Vicky‚Äôs Salt and Vinegar chips but the selection list only shows Jalape√±o chips, plain Lays chips and Doritos.  

I‚Äôm not wasting time with this app if I have to go into the store to get it corrected anyway.

title: The app doesn‚Äôt work
review: I selected my location and got all the way through the order (after numerous ‚Äúerror -try again‚Äù messages) and then it proceeded to process said order for a good three minutes, after which it had charged me $31 plus for two 6‚Äù and two 12‚Äù sandwiches and gave me a message that the order wouldn‚Äôt be completed because the selected location was not taking orders. Oh, and there is no one to talk to in customer service. There is no customer service whatsoever.

title: Open stores displayed as closed.
review: The store in my hometown is open till 8, it even tells me this on my app but for some reason it says this store is always closed. I even called my local subway just to make sure they were open and behold they are! please fix this app.

title: Good app...poor payment function
review: The app itself is convenient for ordering, even saving favorite sandwiches customized with toppings.  But the payment function to load money onto your subway card is quite awful. Why can‚Äôt they figure out how to integrate Apple Pay or similar functions rather than directing to an outside site where I have to put in credit card info every single time?  Talk to the Starbucks people please...

title: Good for what it does.
review: The app overall is very good. It gives you the information that you need and for the most part is simple and not cluttered. The only not so good part is right before you press order. It can get very confusing with all of the mess and stuff there. But once your used to it it‚Äôs fine. Because of this, that‚Äôs why it‚Äôs a four and not a five star rating.

title: Nothing but Headaches
review:
Downloaded the app to try and take advantage of special deals. Unfortunately since this piece of junk app wouldn‚Äôt actually process the order it did me zero good and wasted a bunch of time.

Also, there is seriously no way to edit or update existing payment information?
And if you‚Äôre in an order and want to update the size of the sandwich you have to start that part over! Also an issue with updating items in the cart that ended up adding the item over again - the pencil should be only for editing, NOT adding additional sandwiches.

And the interface is not intuitive. Why pre populate with toppings I don‚Äôt want? Add to that the fact you cannot customize the veggies on each half of a foot long and you end up with a pretty poor excuse for an app for a sandwich chain based on the idea of customizing it to your liking.

title: Misleading, coupons not available
review: I have push alerts enabled and allow text alerts, unfortunately, coupons are only available once every 3 weeks. I receive it in a text alert and unless I use It the same day in person, the person at the counter won‚Äôt accept it. I have also tried using the app to order food but have also been unsuccessful using any type of discount. Paying $10 for a sub and a drink these days is expensive when you can go anywhere else and get a full meal with a drink for $5.

title: Subway makes it easy to eat good!
review: It is so easy to just place my order and have s fresh easy meal prepared for me. Their salads are amazing too. Also the people working their are so friendly. No down side. Thank you Heavenly; yes the girl that works there‚Äôs name is Heavenly Summer:). So now I have to go pick up my lunch:). Hope others Enjoy Subway as much as I do:)

title: Easy to use
review: So far probably the easiest self restaurant online ordering app I‚Äôve used! Thanks for not making it hard to choose food from a place and be able to order it easily instead of fighting with the system or platform and just choosing a different restaurant out of frustration.

title: Very unhappy with the subway app
review:
I am sooooooo unhappy with the app.
Placed an order on the app and it indicated to be ready at 6:50p today. When I arrived gentleman said he didn‚Äôt receive the order and couldn‚Äôt tell me why. I have also heard this same issue with other friends. He didn‚Äôt have a Corp number for me to call either.
There is no info to speak with a person at main office. This is vey bad customer service and I will probably find a Blimpie to give my money to. Very unhappy customer 
So crazy to request a nickname that is forever to accept. This is terrible .

title: DORIE
review: Wonderful people working in this shop! We are in the middle of this Covid19 scare, so there were NO customers. But the workers here are friendly and helpful. Please help keep this place in business by ordering sandwiches to go. In fact, let‚Äôs try to keep all the restaurants in business. Everyone is scared, but we should help each other.

title: The app feels super rushed...
review:
Three Key Areas of Improvement Needed:

1. Apple Pay is needed so I do not have to rely on Subway to protect my financial data.

2. The store inside Walmart #2233 during this outbreak was disgusting inside And way too much sauce on my food...  :(

Mainly though, I ordered a bottled soda and paid the extra surcharge and it seems they are out of bottled soda! You need to implement store-level inventory so the customer has an accurate representation of what is being ordered/received! 

Also I do not think I was refunded the surcharge... and the staff did not speak good enough written English to understand me (I am deaf after all)...

3. A review function of that location and its staff to be offered after pickup would be a great addition too. Use your customer base to actively rate the store locations and keep franchisees in the loop!

title: Very convenient and it always works great
review: The SUBWAY¬Æ app has lots of great features, your favorite sandwich‚Äôs, it remembers your orders, remembers the store use last and and allows you to easily duplicate a sandwich you‚Äôve already configured. Really great tool for getting food out the door ASAP. I use it exclusively when I go to Subway to speed things up

title: Stop with the gift card loading
review: We are in the brave new world of Apple Pay. The two largest hamburger fast food restaurants use it and it‚Äôs very convenient. Having to spend more money than I intend to spend in order to use your app is very frustrating. What if I have no intentions of spending the remainder? You would have me go through a painful process to get that money back. What if I only had just enough to pay for what I need to order? It‚Äôs very frustrating. The drive up and park establishment does the same thing so we don‚Äôt use their app either.

title: What a total way to lose money
review: Used the app to buy some food. Should up 35 minutes late and ask the cashier if my order was ready. She tells me their was not order showed her the online receipt and order number. End up losing 22 dollars and getting angry. Never have I been so upset in my life never going to subway ever again. I even called the restaurant and they said never received the order. What the absolute heck. I got ripped off. Would not recommend any using the app it is a waste of time and more importantly a waste of your hard earned money.

title: DON‚ÄôT COUNT ON IT TO WORK
review:
I have sent emails with form responses and also called. The person on the phone could care less. This app is horrible. It lets you go through the enter process of ordering and then it tell you ‚ÄúBAD REQUEST‚Äù. So, you do it over and over again and you end up just going in and ordering it yourself. If you love spending hours trying to order a quick meal, then this is the app for you. Don‚Äôt count on getting the meal ordered however. JUNK JUNK JUNK

The worst thing is, you tell the counter employees about the problem and it‚Äôs, ‚Äúyep yep a lot of people say that‚Äù.

DUMB DUMB DUMB

title: When it works, it‚Äôs great!
review: Would be five stars except that I have had serious consistency issues with using it. I work right next to a Subway. Get 30 minutes for lunch. This app is awesome when it is working‚Äîintuitive to use, and the location I frequent is great about getting orders right and timely. Saves so much time!

title: Won‚Äôt accept credit card
review: I have used the same card countless times, even updated the expiration date. Used it several times since. But today it would not let me use it. So I entered my other one. That would was not accepted either. But I was able to use the one to reload my gift card just fine and pay that way. But what a pain. Plus I ended up putting a few more dollars on the card than needed.

title: This app does not have the subway spirit.
review: Subway is supposed to be where we can have it our way right? Not with this app. Most stores carry pepper jack chess which on the first sub I tried to order was not the case. When I tried to build a sub from scratch by what was wanted was not an option from the sub menu I tried to select a random sub remove all the topping and start from scratch but that wasn‚Äôt an option either. Through the phone across the room and picked up a regular phone and ordered the meal. Will not be using this app again.

title: App crashes cannot open
review:
RE:Tried to open app on my iPhone. It crashed. 

I thought maybe should delete the app that kept on crashing so I did and re-installed it and now it works!
 Sorry for the bother. My computer instinct kicked in and worked it. Thanks to the Subway company and its Tech team for reaching out! Much appreciated.

title: Serves its purpose
review: Easy to get around and use. Just went to the store, said my name, and pick up was easy. I got there at the scheduled time it would be ready. When I got home, many of my orders were wrong; missing condiments and items, and cold (for being toasted that is). It was 5 sandwiches so I get it being a large order. It took the pain out of waiting in line doing one at a tile. But maybe I should have done that to get what I actually wanted

title: Failed to login
review: After this update it made me logout. Then when I tried to login it wouldn‚Äôt let me back in. I had to try to login and to quit the app a few times and now I‚Äôm back in. Some users may not have the patience to do this multiple times. Also, please make this compatible with iPhone X already.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-02-28T20:56:20Z'}

title: Fast and easy... maybe too easy
review: It is very easy to see all of the options for your sandwich, salad, and flat pizza! Even options you may forget about in the store. Customizing your order is super easy too. Changing your order, not so much. I have also accidentally paid for my order before I was finished once... fun and easy app! Just watch what you click on, carefully.

title: Getting better
review: Good changes, in the right direction. Would like to select my favorite store as a default. Need to allow coupons sent from Subway on an order and multiple payment methods on the same order. Sometimes my Subway card doesn‚Äôt have enough funds to cover the full meal and it‚Äôs money will be lost, if I don‚Äôt fill the card back up.

title: Easy Peasy
review: Makes the whole process clear and easy to understand from making orders to finding good deals and coupons. The only sad thing that‚Äôs common in other food company apps is not including their entire drink selection, but I can deal.

title: Stopped working?
review: Used to be a great app, I use to order with it a couple times a week. For the last few months though I can‚Äôt even use it. I get prompted to select my restaurant, which I do, then I select ‚ÄúStart Order‚Äù. At this point, it goes on to a loading screen. After a few moments of waiting for it to load, it comes back with an error. It‚Äôs done this for a few months now. I‚Äôve tried with WiFi enabled, I‚Äôve tried without, same result. Tried calling the restaurant a couple times with my order, but my ticket gets lost or forgotten.
developerResponse: {'id': 2523343, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (800)-888-4848, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-02-07T14:02:37Z'}

title: Much Improved
review: This app has come along way. At first roll out it was an unmitigated disaster. But stability improvements and ordering has become much better. The design and interface is mostly user-friendly. There are still a few quirks which I don‚Äôt quite understand.  Perhaps I just need to spend more time learning some f the functionality.  Why does every sandwich default to cucumbers, tomatoes, lettuce, and green pepper?  Green pepper and cucumber never belong on a sandwich IMHO.
developerResponse: {'id': 587214, 'body': 'Hi- we are sorry to hear that your experience has been less than excellent. Would you mind reaching out to us at appfeedback@subway.com so we can take a closer look at this for you? Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-02-01T16:13:45Z'}

title: Keeping my personal info private
review: I have been a fan of Subway for many years. I travel quite a bit for work and I would use the app a couple of times per week to find out where the closest store was located and what the hours are in whatever city I happened to be in. The new 'upgraded' app won't let you do anything without registering an account and signing in. I have no desire to give out my email, phone number or any other personal information just to find out if there is a Subway nearby that's open. App deleted.
developerResponse: {'id': 1097525, 'body': 'Hi there. We are really sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our new App experience. The mobile app is designed primarily for ordering and in-restaurant pay functionality, which does require an account. To locate a nearby restaurant, we would suggest a quick search for Subway in your mobile web browser to display the closest location and operating hours. We highly value your feedback and would be interested in some more details regarding your experience. Our team would love to hear from you at appfeedback@subway.com. We are always looking for ways to improve the experience possible future enhancements.', 'modified': '2017-08-24T18:16:02Z'}

title: The update is nice but
review:
You can‚Äôt combine a gift card balance and add money so if your order isn‚Äôt the exact amount left on the card you can‚Äôt use the balance. And if you try to reload money, that doesn‚Äôt work either. The website just sits there no matter how many times you click ‚Äúreload‚Äù
I reached out to tech support and they of course told me I was doing it wrong. Which I‚Äôm not and i have video recording to show it..

title: Yet another update; and they STILL!! have not fixed the log in issue
review: I wish I could use the App. It used to work, but then somehow I got logged out and now, through several updates, I still cannot get access. PLEASE fix this problem!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 24030346, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you have encountered this issue, and we would like to investigate further. We encourage you to visit https://www.subway.com/en-US/ContactUs/GuestCare to provide additional details about your experience.', 'modified': '2021-08-13T05:08:03Z'}

title: Good
review: It‚Äôs a great app but sometimes mine tells me the ingredients are out of stock like ranch etc and when I pick up my order and ask, it doesn‚Äôt pertain to my store.  Wish that ingredient problem applied to the store.  If I start a new sub and not take it from ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù, it does not say the ingredient is not available today.  Oh well, learning.

title: Okay, pls add order status and confirmation
review: It worked okay, but most apps let you get notifications or at least send an email confirming the restaurant received your order. After awhile, you start wondering if it worked. I used it for delivery to my house. The driver just called my cell when he was at my house to confirm with me. I appreciate the driver but he shouldn‚Äôt have to do that.

title: Nice try, no sandwich ;)
review: When I saw the latest update and new look, I was optimistic. That was premature. Still getting random errors after filling up my cart and trying to complete an order. I‚Äôm giving three stars because this app has gotten the job done in the past, but since trying the new updated app I have not been able to complete a single order.

title: I have been charged but order did not go through
review: I have ordered two footlongs through the mobile app, the order went through and I have been charged for it from Apple Pay, but when I go to store the order wasn‚Äôt ready and they didn‚Äôt even received the order, order details are not available in my history, but I have charged. I had order and to pay in store again. I don‚Äôt see any refund issued.

title: Makes me want to go to another store
review: The app is OK, but it is basically useless when you try and use a coupon that they‚Äôre offering on the app and then by the time you get to the end of the process of making 4 subs, which takes 15 minutes it says ‚Äúthis store does not participate in this offer‚Äù. I also find it pretty sad that you cannot add sweet peppers or oregano anywhere in this app or the online experience. With foot-long BMT subs nearing $10 each, I think I‚Äôm going to start looking to gas station subs like Wawa.

title: Confusing and Glitchy
review: We found the subway website to be very convenient and useful so that we didn‚Äôt have to order inside the store. I finally decided to get the app so it would save the orders for the next time. The app is extremely glitchy and messes up the orders. Not only but it doesn‚Äôt allow certain amounts of orders where as other times it does. It becomes frustrating so where it‚Äôs just easier to put in all the orders from scratch on the website.

title: Great App with one nitpick
review:
It does what it says on the tin. It allows one to create their Subway masterpiece easily and quickly. Then you can pay for it via the app.

If I had one nit to pick, it‚Äôs that the only flavor of Coca Cola it allows you to pick is regular Coke. I never drink regular Coke as it has too much diabeetus for me. I prefer Diet Coke.

title: Room for improvement
review: The app is convenient but still has some places to make it more seamless. For example, when you click the icon to add an item to the cart it leaves you on the same page. Then, only after you click the icon again will it move you forward to your cart. Not a huge issue but could be more seamless.

title: Easy and good food
review: Subway is a well known restaurant for great subs, healthy options etc. I love the app since it remembers my favorite sandwiches, you can customize your selection, and payment is so easy. I simply order soon enough to allow me to pick up my order on the way. Love it!!

title: Map doesn‚Äôt work
review: I am on the most updated version. I have full service, and maps works for other things. But I search for stuff and nothing happens even just for searching near me. This is absolutely awful I‚Äôm never going to subway again because I want to take advantage of the online coupons, but I can‚Äôt even place an order without choosing a location WHICH THE APP DOESNT LET ME DO. Y‚Äôall seriously ruined my entire day. Something simple as this doesn‚Äôt work, I can‚Äôt deal with this garbage.

title: Easy to use and calculate calories/price!
review: Super easy to customize your sandwich and calculate calories as well as anticipate and control final price. Definitely had all the functions I wanted from it. Finally, a food chain with a half decent app! Most fast food chains have garbage apps but whoever designed this did a great job so huge props to them

title: Bad sandwich
review: I was so disappointed yesterday when I went to Subway I wanted my usual chicken teriyaki sandwich it look like the chicken they put on the sandwich was about half the amount that they usually do and when I asked for the vegetables it was just a little bit here and a little bit there it wasn‚Äôt a real nice for a sandwich like I usually get I was so disappointed when I started to eat it it was why did I waste my $8.49 prices are going up but the amount of sandwich you get is going down never again

title: Horrible app!
review: Everytime I try to place an order through the app there is nothing but problems. I wanted to use the buy 2 get 1 but of course it‚Äôs only on the app and the franchise owner won‚Äôt honor it claiming it‚Äôs not his fault. Well now your just losing money all together. I‚Äôll get Dangelos instead. At least when I order from there it‚Äôs straight forward and their owners appreciate the customers and work with them to make sure they are satisfied. If I could I‚Äôd rate this app and the subway franchise ZERO STARS

title: Not good
review: So me an my family love subway but when I tried the app is was a disappointment because my daughter only like a few things on her sandwich an it would let me take off all the veggies but not any of the meat an there is no way to make a sandwich just with what you want of meat I guess we can‚Äôt have what we want on the app so we need to go in but if not for this the app would be really good

title: Constant Bugs
review: Almost every other time I order there is an issue. Consistently deletes my ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù. I order the same 3-4 sandwiches consistently and if the favorite feature doesn‚Äôt work that completely takes away the convenience factor. It also deletes my order history randomly despite the claim that it remembers 3 months worth of orders. It‚Äôs also very cumbersome. When I open up the app I go to start an order and a big screen pops up with a promotion or picture of something and I have to swipe it away. Be more like chipotle‚Äôs app.

title: Excellent customer service
review: I‚Äôm at the one in Daytona Beach Florida the manager was helping to do orders because she was understaffed. She greeted everybody in the store well and was making sure the line was running smoothly and nobody was out of place in line. I don‚Äôt normally come to subway but this store did a great job during COVID-19. Thanks people helping people is powerful stuff...

title: Terrible app
review: Most of the time, the app doesn‚Äôt work at all. Fill up the cart and then go to pay and get an error message. Pretty crap when it tells you that you have to order on the app to take part in the deal. Buy a 12 in, get a 12 in free. So we had to walk there, place our order in person and not get the deal. One time it gave me an error message, charged me twice and subway told me to contact my bank to fix the issue. So then I had to call my bank to have them investigate and remove the double charge. Complete crap!

title: Easy app
review: Such an easy app to use. By the time I‚Äôm done with this review my sandwich will be ready! Only issue was while adding in cc information I had to hit the back out button to be able to see the add card. Which might be hard for somebody else to find. Other then that it was easy!

title: Robots for 5 star, Realy?
review:
App does not work, and if you see the people that are writing five star reviews are fake and robots, the ‚ÄúSubway‚Äù app just does not work and is trash just the like website but both are equally and greater than TRASH.

I‚Äôm trying to order online because apparently they have a ‚ÄúBOGO‚Äù buy 1 get one free, it‚Äôs tough trying to get a free sub when nothing works, it must be nice 4.8 star review and all of them are fake, this is probably the easiest .5 a star review since it‚Äôs false advertising of ratings, I mean I guess what F me for trying to order the cheapest thing in downtown.

title: Great review!
review: Idk if it‚Äôs because I‚Äôm high or what, but it was a little confusing to add the chips and soda. Maybe make it a little bigger or something. Everything else was dope! I love the way you can customize your sandwich, it really breaks everything down. Always been a huge fan of SUBWAY and this app is just a blessing! Thank you for your time.

title: Info
review: This app. want to much information to use a debit card or a credit card. Billing address is not their problem if the card is issued by a bank, it‚Äôs not like they are sending you a bill from their credit company. And I should not have to pick out 15 different names to get my comments to post.

title: Helpful During Business Hours
review: As a planner this app is of little help. I order platters for pickup for parties, or a sandwich to go on my lunch break and I can‚Äôt do that while getting ready in the morning. I can‚Äôt even do that and save it as a favorite to my profile. The store has to be open...unfortunately store hours are my working hours. Frustrating but not enough to give the app a 0/5. Just wish this app made my life easier.

title: Good App, but
review: The app works well and you can easily choose what you want to add or remove from your order. The only issue I have is there is no comment area that would allow specific requests. Example I prefer firm tomato on my salad or sandwich but when I order I‚Äôm stuck with what ever they give me. A comment area would rate a 5.

title: Easy to make your sandwich, impossible to order
review: This app WOULD be nice if it were less buggy. It‚Äôs nice that you can save your typical sandwich but whenever I try to add something to the cart I get an error regarding my payment method. I‚Äôve tried different cards, removing and re-adding, but still get the error which prevents me from adding anything to my cart. I‚Äôve only been able to use the app succesfully once, all other times I had to wait to order until I was able to physically go onto store, OR I became frustrated and went somewhere else.

title: It‚Äôs improving
review: The app has improved greatly! It used to be that hardly any of the toppings in store were on the app and now it‚Äôs pretty much the same. I do wish that the different locations (like the one in Charlotte nc Harris Houston rd) would make sure that they have side items like chips listed in the app. It‚Äôs kind of a pain to have to separately buy them in store-that‚Äôs why I took away a star.

title: Wish I could confirm order before submitting
review: My only suggestions to improve the app would be to make it clearer what to tap to add more items to your order, and add a step to review/confirm your order before submitting it. I accidentally submitted an order before I was ready because I tapped "Place Order" by accident, meaning to tap an option to add more items to my order.

title: Love Love Love
review: I actually just got on my browser to look up your menu and the app pulled up! Was pleasantly surprised. Forgot I had downloaded it before and registered even, just hadn‚Äôt used it yet. I logged in and ordered my family‚Äôs dinners with ease. Sending my husband to pick it up. The next text will be reviewing the finished product:-)

title: Buggy, complicated and the worst mobile food app I can think of
review: I don‚Äôt write many reviews, but Subway mgmt and devs need to know your app is the worst. Slow, clunky to navigate, buggy and generally a poor user experience pretty much sums it up. The time it takes me to put my order in on the phone for 3 custom sandwiches is nearly what it takes to wait in line. I guarantee, on average, this app brings down your Net Promoter Score with many people. If my kids didn‚Äôt love your beige sandwiches I would probably never go there again after the app experience.

title: Save time at lunch
review:
I us this app every other day to order my lunch. My meal is made and waiting for me to arrive for pick up. The easiest app I‚Äôve used to order food and drinks. And you get bonus points some days to make getting dollars off your next order even faster. Thanks Subway keep up the good work.
Subway fan Larry

title: Meh
review: It‚Äôs not very user friendly when it comes to customizing your sandwich, in my opinion. My daughter has this intense hatred of meat, except for bacon, and there‚Äôs absolutely no way for me to build her sandwich on the app. There‚Äôs not even a blt option! I don‚Äôt understand why the meats are ‚Äúlocked‚Äù on the meals and I can‚Äôt just remove the meat I don‚Äôt want, while keeping the ones that I do. Also not a fan of the fact m that I can‚Äôt select the sides/drinks in the kids meals. Needs just a few tweaks and it would be perfect!

title: Wish it worked consistently
review: I love the concept of using the app, but last 3 times I‚Äôve used it something has not worked right. The middle issue told me my credit card was not compatible despite it working on transaction one and three. This last time it wouldn‚Äôt let me add meal deal. I could see the image but not add it. I went to add chips separately and despite chips being in image, it only gave me option for apples or cookies???

title: Buying reviews?
review:
That‚Äôs the only explanation I can come up with as to how such a worthless application has such high reviews. Forget about placing an order or even paying for one...I can‚Äôt even create an account. I indicate I‚Äôm a new user. I‚Äôm led through one page asking basics before I‚Äôm asked for email/password. I‚Äôm promptly confronted with a never ending error message telling me ‚ÄúOops, something is not right. Please try again with the correct account information.‚Äù So, you‚Äôre saying my chosen email address is not ‚Äúcorrect information‚Äù?

Worthless. Prompted deleted.

title: Update not so great
review: I‚Äôve used this app in the past and been very satisfied with it. Unfortunately it‚Äôs now been updated and, at least for me, it has become harder to use. I‚Äôm not a tech wizard, but I‚Äôm no idiot either, and overall I found myself frustrated last night when trying to place my order. Other sandwich places have simpler apps than this new Subway app, and I‚Äôll be far more inclined to order through them in the future rather than trudging my way through this app.

title: Receipt?
review: Why can‚Äôt this be like other apps such as Noodles Company where you can scan your receipt to earn points? Some people leave their phones at home or their crappy iPhone 6 will run out of battery. Add Apple Wallet function to your rewards card. Come on, shouldn‚Äôt take that hard to figure this out Subway.

title: Good except
review: The app is good and easy to order through. However some sandwiches I have ordered for years are not on the app but are on the board at my local subway. One is turkey breast & ham. The app also does not let you choose what bread type you want the sandwich on. Theses two issues aside it is a good way to save time standing in line at Subway.

title: Rewards system
review: If cell phone coverage in the area is not good I couldn‚Äôt use my rewards card at the register. My app said sorry  please try again. They didn‚Äôt take it off my bill but I have less rewards points now. Today when I tried to order my app kept saying ERROR because of the rewards screw up. I hard to start my order all over again. I had a hard time getting it clear to start a new order.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-07-11T18:46:17Z'}

title: Subway App does not work
review:
I have received emails for offers of free 6 inch sandwiches.  If you select, Order On The App, the price of the free sandwich will not come off the total.
If you select, Order On Line, the price of the free sandwich is taken off, but‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶the app will not place the order‚Ä¶

Very frustrating.

title: Convenient but editing could be more obvious!
review: I love the convenience of this app. With everything I have going on in my day, this takes a load off of my schedule. However, the editing options are not obvious and a little difficult to migrate through. Some pages, you can‚Äôt even tell how to edit. I keep pushing buttons until I find what I‚Äôm looking for.

title: Updated experience
review: This app used to be a pain but I did it for the tokens (I eat subway for lunch nearly every day for work) and now the app makes it easy to order pay and pick up. And it looks much better too after the update.

title: Horrible system
review: This app does not have a way of reporting incorrect orders or items the doordash drover gave me tuna sandwhiches‚Ä¶ im vegeterian‚Ä¶. No way to contact anyone store doesnt answer this is why i dont use this app in the first place my local store messes up too much i dont really eat at subway anyways because its not organic its not worth the overpriced monsanto food horrible corporation with no ethics and no care for their customers health do no eat here no organic good food full of pesticides the average human has no idea how evil the corporations and food system is sad

title: Useless App
review: When I try to order the app doesn‚Äôt get the right tax amount. The app said my total was $6.52, but when I ordered in store my total was $6.40. I only ordered in store because it gave me an error message each time I tried to process the order with a gift card with the exact amount on it. I assumed since I noticed the price difference, that this was why I was getting the error message. This app needs to get that fixed. This is scamming people out of money if it goes through.

title: Could be better.
review: When I go into Subway I‚Äôm allowed to create the sub that I want‚Ä¶ with the app I‚Äôm finding it harder. My son would like a pepperoni sub with veggies but any of the options to pick from have the meat locked in so I can‚Äôt change it‚Ä¶ there is no option to make a sub from scratch‚Ä¶. 1 button would make this app more useful for my family‚Ä¶ ‚ÄúBuild your own sub‚Äù

title: App Support
review:
Someone obtained my subway log in and are ordering subway for delivery in a different state. When I tried to log into the app it won‚Äôt allow me to delete my payment methods. I have 3 cards and Apple Pay there. I would prefer this login be deleted. There is no phone number for assistance. Only refers me to FAQ which of course doesn‚Äôt apply to me. Now the only solution is to cancel all 3 of my stored cards there and not use Apple Pay anymore since I have to delete all my
Cards from there too!?

title: Buggy & no rewards
review:
Convenient in theory but it‚Äôs very buggy and slow no matter if I use wifi, data, etc. Also I have used the app for various locations and the employees NEVER put on the seasonings. Not sure if it‚Äôs just hard for them to notice or what. 

I also have Subway 1x a week and have never gotten a reward‚Ä¶compared to other reward systems for food places, that is just horrible & makes me want to eat other places.

title: Took our money! Not once but twice at different locations
review: Googles subways to see when they‚Äôre closed. Found one that closes at 11pm. And they‚Äôre not even open until 11pm, made an order on the app and arrived there to it being closed and it was only 8:45. Walmart worker told me it closes at 9.... very upset because this happened twice not same location either and the app charged us too... and I‚Äôve tried calling the location 11am, 12pm, 2pm and 5pm. No one picked up... freaking took our money.

title: Awful
review: The app doubled my order, I was unable to cancel as my order did not show up in the app but I got a ‚Äúconfirmation email‚Äù.  Tried to call the store and they tried to do what they could but ultimately the app caused a headache for all of us. Another time I accidentally hit the order button and my order immediately went through and again I could not cancel the order through the app. Both times I attempted to cancel IMMEDIATELY. Lost money both times. Terrible. Will not use again.

title: Easy peasy
review: I order from work and it takes me 5 minutes to drive there, pick it up and come back. Very convenient. I can write notes if I need anything out of ordinary and they always call if they have a question or if one of the items isn‚Äôt available. I skip the line and get a free cookie!

title: To whom it may concern
review: I like this app a lot I use it quite frequently but I find a lot of subways in my area I did not honor the coupons like buy one get one free or 599 it‚Äôs really discouraging and it has stopped me from going to your SUBWAY¬Æ is because I feel that every subway should honor the coupons that are given in my local paper

title: BEWARE! App charges you before your order is confirmed!!
review: I ordered 3 footlong subs on Friday & my app didn't give me the coupon (for the buy 2 get one free deal) so I assumed my store wasn't participating & I tried to place the order anyway. After submitting the order, a message popped up on the app saying that my store couldn't take my order at this time. I closed the app and went to go get sandwiches elsewhere. Later, I found out they charged me $30 for subs I never got! I spent 30 min on the phone with my bank yesterday to dispute the charge. DON'T download this app! It's garbage!

title: Accidental Orders Abound
review: It is too easy to accidentally submit an order with this app. This is because the order confirmation page doesn't give you a clear enough indication that your order is going to be sent. There should be an additional confirmation to ensure accidental Orders don't occur. I've accidentally placed two orders and there's no time to cancel the order - you have to call for that to happen which relies on the store to answer their phone which doesn't always happen.

title: Confusing
review: It‚Äôs sometimes hard to navigate. Like when you want to add more food instead of scrolling back up to find where to add more just give the option next to submit order? Or when you want to change something just add ‚Äúsave changes‚Äù instead of it looks like you‚Äôre adding another different item.

title: Decent
review: Wish I could build a sandwich from scratch instead of being forced to pick an existing and then edit it. Also wish there was a way to ‚Äúadd‚Äù pepperoni instead ‚Äúand pepperoni‚Äù. There is a difference in how much they put on it and the cost as well. Otherwise, app is fairly simple and easy to use. Definitely like that I can order ahead of time and just pick it up so that I don‚Äôt have to wait so long inside.

title: User experience needs work
review:
It‚Äôs a convenient app but the user experience is kind of sucky. Like they spent more time on locating the adds than the ordering food section. Also the store location has changed on me unexpectedly sending me to a location out of the way to get my order.... 

Make it easier to order.

Make it remember my typical or favorite locations.

title: Good app BUT
review: at times it tells me cannot accept card on file and other times yes. Also it tells me a certain time frame then get there and it hasn‚Äôt been started and have to wait. If that was the case then I could‚Äôve just avoided the app and wait in line like everyone else. Should be a live version to get a more accurate time frame versus the basic 20 min.

review: Hi Subway Executives!  Please add a catering option to your app. I‚Äôm in Marketing/Sales and placing an online order is time consuming with your competitors. I LOVE SUBWAY!!!  You have an opportunity to make things easier for those that work in Marketing/Sales.  I don‚Äôt mind paying whatever it takes to make my life easier (this means $10,000/yr or more).

title: Please don‚Äôt download the app
review: I have made three separate orders.  All three times the orders were sent to a different restaurant in a different state.  I have never place an app order to this restaurant, ever.  I called and was hung up on every single time when I attempted to contact the store.  I even tried calling the catering number.  I called the gas station next door to ask an employee to walk over and cancel the order.  Subway Facebook page says I have to go into the store to discuss with them.  I am deleting the app.  Done.  Chick fil a it is. You can keep my $6.

title: Super easy!
review: I forgot my credit card and cash. Again. Where can I go to eat? Subway, of course! I paid with my paypal account with my phone. I‚Äôm not going hungry for the day!!! Yay!!! Thank you, Subway!!! Also, it was *really* easy to put my sammich together. Toasted? No. That kind of bread? Change it. Sooooo easy! My fellow employees thank you, too. Having a crabby hangry co-worker is not fun.

title: Paper Coupons Useless
review: I wish there was a way I could scan (and void so I can‚Äôt use it again) my coupons I receive in the mail to use on my orders in app. I guess waiting in line to order so you can get the discounted price is ‚Äúworth it‚Äù but for people who care about their time more a little more... it would be nice to be able to still use them in app....

title: Use the app all the time now
review: Very cool. I order and my wife picks it up on way home when we‚Äôre busy. My history doesn‚Äôt work but I assume that is an easy fix.  This app has made huge difference in saving time and the stores are everywhere and some open 24h.  Not all stores have the full menu on the app so that would help improve selection.  Smart move subway!

title: App is broken
review:
Past 2 out of 3 times trying to use this app it would not work. 

First time said there was an error placing the order.  I contacted support they told me to delete and reinstall the app.  I did that and it worked.

Then today I tried to place an order and it keeps pop up a strange error message saying payment is already being processed.  I tried deleting & reinstalling the app again and it still gives me the same message and then all of a sudden it says app is not working because of maintenance.

Very inconvenient when we are pressed for time.  Wish it would work properly.

title: Order every Wednesday
review: I love this app I use it every Wednesday. I have one problem and that is when they update the app is never works until I send an email and they update something on my end. Somebody needs to be more efficient but I love being able to use the app mobile. When do we get drive-through‚Äòs LOL

title: Great Manager at Lake Blvd, Redding CA
review:
Today was the fist time we used our Subway App to order lunch

We had never done this before so we were getting confused about what to do ‚Ä¶. we were just about ready to give up‚Ä¶‚Ä¶. But, Daniel Smith the manager at the Lake Blvd location saw this and came over to help.  

It ended up being much easier than we thought and we plan on using the app again real soon.  

Daniel goes out of his way to get to know his customers and greets everyone as they walk through the doors.  
Who knew that he also helps them learn to use their computersüëçüèªüòÄ

title: Updated:  Can now login. Came back...asked to log out
review:
Edit: now I could log in so that‚Äôs is way better. But, next time I went to quickly order a sub I‚Äôm asked to log out and back in to accept terms of service. Please do this in a way where you sit. Have to log out. No one wants to have to figure out their login when they just want to order a sub. 

Old: Can‚Äôt get worse Than this...useless because I cannot login.

title: Works well but local store sabotaged the program
review: This app worked well first time I used it: ordered what I wanted and paid online. Unfortunately when I went to pick up my order, the Subway employee said, ‚ÄúWe haven‚Äôt gotten to your order yet...‚Äù So I ended up giving them my order verbally and waiting for it anyway. Guess no one explained the program to them. Ding one star.

Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2017-12-29T15:39:16Z'}

title: App is wrong!
review: The app said Herb and Cheese bread was out of stock- and then said my order was ready.  I arrived at store and they said they didn‚Äôt have artisan bread(white).  They did have the Herb and Cheese so they made my order when I arrived which defeated the purpose of using the app.  Maybe the app should have an option for next available bread if yours choice is out of stock.  The staff was friendly and nice though.

title: Great app but does not accept deals
review: I‚Äôve tried entering two different deals at two different locations, and received a message ‚Äúthis location is not participating in this deal‚Äù - how frustrating when you get an email with a deal and says you have to order online or use the app!

title: Friendly Service/ Clean Restaurant
review: I haven‚Äôt been to many subways around here but this one appeared to be very clean , and Sunny who was behind the counter making our sandwiches was nice , professional, and helpful . I would recommend to go to this subway if you‚Äôre in the area.

title: Awsome app
review: I love how they‚Äôre creating apps for some of my favorite food places I don‚Äôt get much time to get something to eat but it‚Äôs super easy just to add to my cart what I want pay for it online and then just go inside where they‚Äôll have it waiting on the table so easy!

title: Subway app changed my life
review: I have Ptsd and going in stores waiting in line can often trigger anxiety. I set up my subway app for curbside or walk in and grab and go! These two options plus how FAST & EASY the app is to use.... Rockstar level of service!!! Been enjoying Subway since 1988!!

title: Careful how you order.
review: When ordering a sandwich, make sure you include sauces, seasonings, cheezers, and all the vegetables that you want. If you do, your sandwich will be exactly as you wanted it. If you don‚Äôt, it will again come and you ordered it.  So, application is perfect as long as you use it right.

title: uncooperative app
review: i parked outside the Subway location at 3:00pm and decided to order while waiting in my vehicle.  however the app was totally uncooperative despite me having 5G and full bars on my phone.  so i got out of the app and tried again.  again no success.  tried again.  all the app could do was tumble all over itself like a drunk gymnast.  i then went inside the store to order but there were four people ahead of me.  realizing i was wasting my time with Subway, i decided to go elsewhere.

title: Meh
review: App is clunky compared to other fast food apps, deals aren‚Äôt as good. On top of that it won‚Äôt let you use it unless you update it unlike other apps, when I‚Äôm hungry I‚Äôm not going to wait 3 minutes for your app to update most of the time, instead I‚Äôm going to write an upset review like this bc I‚Äôm hungry and can‚Äôt get food without waiting for your update, let us update when we want a better app like everyone else, don‚Äôt force it on people when they‚Äôre hungry or this is what will happen ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

title: Annoying waste of time
review: Thought I‚Äôd take a chance, but it‚Äôs more trouble than it‚Äôs worth. The sandwich ingredients were never visible on the screen. I‚Äôd tap randomly on the empty screen and they‚Äôd magically pop up. After a tedious while of random tapping and guessing, I had a reasonable order together but when I submitted it, I got a message telling me the store wasn‚Äôt accepting breakfast orders at this hour. That couldn‚Äôt have been conveyed to me when I selected the store and then chose from the breakfast menu? Deleted.

title: I‚Äôd rather have Covid than deal with this app
review: Honestly a group on 5yr olds could design a better functioning app. Constantly freezing and getting error messages and having to restart the app just to complete an order. Just tried updating my method of payment and the app won‚Äôt allow me to save the new info. PLUS getting double billed because the app ‚Äúfails‚Äù to send the order, forced to reorder and get billed for each. For real a monkey F‚Äôing a football could accomplish more than anyone trying to use this app.

title: Limited menu on the app.
review: The menu on the app is limited. For example, there are only 3 cookie styles available on the app. There are 2 more cookie style available on the menu when I walk in the restaurant. Also, there is no deal for 3 cookies on the app. I got discounts the 3 cookies when I ordered in the restaurant. However, I am using the app during COVID-19 situation.

title: Subway location
review: Good app once you learn how to use it. Should put some type of double action needed to set location for sub pickup. I constantly order and when I go to pick up sub they don‚Äôt have it because I forgot to change location.

title: What‚Äôs the point
review: I stopped any use of this app quite a while ago, and I don‚Äôt even eat here anymore. Today I was feeling sick and not up to cooking, so I thought i would just try again hoping they had improved. The map had a totally different location than what is actually closest to me, which was annoying. Then my order was not only wrong, but so sloppy. Why have customize options if they are not used in store? It just solidified my no longer eating with them. At the end of the day it‚Äôs fast food and the app is a mess.

title: Subway app saves you time !
review: I like that I can build a sub & customize it exactly the way I like it ...& then save it as a favorite ! Next time I go to order I can just choose the sub from my favorites & place my order. All the work is already done. Then I stop by my Subway & just pick up my order & I am on my way !

title: App works well but has some major flaws
review: Overall the app looks nice but, I have one huge issue with it. I cannot cancel an order from the app. Every time I need to cancel, I have to call the store where the employee has no idea how to cancel it or if it even has showed up in their system. It‚Äôs always messy and would be a lot easier if I could cancel the order from the app. For this reason I often find myself avoiding this app, just because of this inconvenience.

title: Sandwiches missing from menu
review: I don‚Äôt like that a pizza sub is missing and a subway melt is missing. Also the sandwich makers tend to not follow special instructions or you get home without Extras you asked for such as extra lettuce or extra meat you paid for and you don‚Äôt feel like going back to get it corrected. Makers need to pay more attention and slow down.

title: Rarely works
review: It‚Äôs not very user friendly, kind of clunky, feels like you have to go through a lot of clicks to make your selection . My main problem is that 90% of the time that I try to use it, I go through the entire selection process, put in my payment info and then get a dumb error message that it can‚Äôt process it. I try multiple times with different payment methods but eventually give up and have to order from the website. Will be deleting the app as it has been useless for me, just wastes time.

title: A little trigger happy
review: I love the ease of using this app. It‚Äôs intuitive, you can customize your order, you can save your favorites, etc. The only negative is that it‚Äôs a little trigger happy. I was ordering and accidentally bumped my phone and the next thing I knew, the order was paid for and placed. I had to call the store to cancel and they were not easy to get a hold of.

title: Convenient
review: App is convenient and very helpful to order ahead especially during lunch rush. However some what confusing at first to figure out how to add items out of the norm, as well as fighting back and forth adding extras. You have to select an item like guacamole then add it which takes you back to your sandwich page and the go back for sauces drinks etc.

title: Had Express, Still Had to Wait in Line
review: I ordered with the app to get the two for one deal. It gave an estimated time of 20 min. We got there ten minutes early. We didn‚Äôt wait in line because we had Express. Once it was time, the sandwiches weren‚Äôt done. There was one girl working and five people in line. She said she couldn‚Äôt start our sandwiches with people in line. So we got in line to get our sandwiches made. It was a little disappointing, though the line did go by after 5 minutes.

title: No pepperoni sandwich, really?
review: Any Subway capable of making a spicy Italian can make a pepperoni. However, there is no pepperoni on your  online menu and no way to take off the salami from a spicy Italian. Needless to say a pepperoni sandwich is my favorite and this issue has resulted in myself and my family not using this stupid app to order a meal in advance on several occasions. I have found absolutely no other place but this review to voice my complaint as there is no subway contact to fix this simple oversight on the app.

title: Great ordering ahead of time, app a little clunky
review: I love Subway but don‚Äôt always love waiting in line or waiting for my sandwiches to be made. The app eliminates the waiting problem, but it‚Äôs still a little clunky. The screens are too sensitive, so it‚Äôs easy to accidentally tap & have the screen you‚Äôre on disappear. Has a lot of potential, though, so I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll use it often.

title: App is clear to use but does not show coupon when check out. It does take coupon
review: I wish the app would show total amount then coupon then final amount after coupon. The app only show total without the coupon but does take coupon though.

title: Worthless
review: So right now they have BOGO on foot longs. Go on line and order 2 different price ones and pay the price of the higher one like normal. Give them the time I‚Äôll be there to pick them and when I get there they say they are out of ingredients (steak) for one and that they don‚Äôt participate in the BOGO. This should sure be listed when ordering as it rang up and totaled it like it was going to be BOGO. As it turned out, it was a rip off and I had to order another footling that I didn‚Äôt like as much and then pay for both.

title: Way easier
review: There have been countless orders in the past where I just delete it because it was too complicated to place an order through the app. This makes it almost too easy! I think my kids could do it! Well done subway, you saw the need and made a change!

title: Annoying
review: I got all the way through the ordering process, even created an account and then went to add a payment method... I tried adding two different debit cards, both of which the app said could not be added and to try a different payment method. Also, when my billing address was entered the wrong city was filled in and there was no way to fix it. I deleted the app and would rather sit in the drive thru or go in than try to deal with ordering on the app again.

Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-07-08T13:40:44Z'}

title: Great app, but could be improved
review: I love the ease of ordering individual items, but I do have a couple suggestions for improvement. I don‚Äôt see a way to customize kids‚Äô meal sides or beverage. Also, many of the chip and soda options don‚Äôt seem to be available on the app, even though they are available in store.

title: Great ordering app...but missing a few things.
review: The app doesn‚Äôt show the deals! I couldn‚Äôt find where the meal of the day was, so I had to google it. Also, when you customize a sandwich, it doesn‚Äôt show onions as an option. But when you order a sandwich ‚Äúas made‚Äù it shows onions. Other than that, great app! Way to keep up with all the unhealthy fast food restaurants!

title: Nice app but missing customization options
review: It‚Äôs a nice, clean app and I appreciate the iPhone X optimization. Very easy to use. The only downside seems to be that you can‚Äôt really customize sandwiches very much. For example, you can‚Äôt add two different kinds of cheese, only 2x on one cheese type. Would be nice if there was just a ‚Äúcustom sandwich‚Äù option. Due to the lack of this, we usually just need to order in a store so they can make it how we want.

title: Love this App.
review: I never liked having to go stand in line and tell them my 20 different choices. Now I can save my order and just click it again and again. They make it perfect every time!! When I walk in it‚Äôs paid and ready to go. It‚Äôs great for those like me that have a short lunch break at work.

title: It won‚Äôt accept my credit card after multiple attempts
review:
I added my order and when it asked for my payment method I added my credit card number and the name on card.  The add button was not working and I was not presented with any error.  Almost was going to give up, but I got it working through my paypal account.     I was about to cancel the entire thing and order a pizza.  

Please look at this ASAP!

title: Why is there no way to upgrade drinks!!!
review: I order subway all the time but it aggravated me I can only get a regular size drink I‚Äôm willing to pay for a bigger drink there‚Äôs just no option for it so I just order a drink and cookies separately but seriously it‚Äôs annoying. Other then that app is amazing easy to use and to navigate very clear definitely will use a lot and recommend.

title: Few problems...
review:
I wish I could have more options when ordering drinks, specifically the sizes.  I have to leave in the comment section what size I want, and that seldom ever gets read.   Also, the chips I like aren‚Äôt available on the app, so I have to leave that in the comments section and it usually doesn‚Äôt get read as well.  
Other than that, I LOVE the app!

title: Horrible App
review:
Spent 30 mins attempting to sign up for rewards card. The website kept timing out over and over. I was never able to set up my account or rewards card.  Not worth signing up for and easier to pick somewhere else to eat. I am voting with my wallet .... avoid Subway as they are getting a bit pricey as well.

Still don‚Äôt work nor does your website when you attempt to register the rewards card. In the trash it went after trying 6 times

title: Annoying
review: I tried to download the app so I can start getting rewards. First it doesn‚Äôt even come up in the App Store when you search subway my way. You have to search subway sandwich and t will come up. Then I tried to register and I got as far as typing my info in and it wouldn‚Äôt do anything. It kept redirecting me to the forgot my password link. I clearly did not forget my password as I had just created it. I even redownloaded the app and still the same thing. The last time I just deleted the entire app and won‚Äôt re install.

title: Subway app
review:
I love the app from subway much better than calling in an order.  The staff need to really read the order on more than one occasion they only gave me 2 cookies and I always order 3.  They are always apologetic tho and are happy to fill the order.  Love the fresh bread and cookies they are the best in service and quality!!!
5 stars. JohnT

title: Simple fast easy!
review: I‚Äôve been hesitant to place online or orders by app but this is so simple and it was ready before the estimated time. No waits no worries walk in pick up walk out. Great sandwiches!  I forgot how superior they are to other quick food chains and so much more healthy!! Yummy too.

title: Quick and easy
review: I order from subway pretty much every day at work. The app makes it easy to order right before my lunch and it allows me to just run and pick it up instead of waiting in line. I love this app. It‚Äôs the best thing since sliced bread.

title: Updating item in your cart is awful
review: I use the app all the time to place orders and pick up in the store. However I recently got burned by the app I had a foot-long in my cart and I changed it to 6 inches. I did not notice by doing that it changed all of the toppings so when I picked up my order and took it home it was wrong.  I thought I had done something to my order but I put same foot-long in cart and changed to six inches and all toppings changed to not what I had picked.  Wasted my money‚Ä¶

title: Disappointed
review: Little upsetting we tried to use a coupon that you should be able to use from the app(downloaded the app for the coupon ) and was hot able to use it because of store location! Tried five different locations and it didn‚Äôt work so what‚Äôs the point of the app or ordering online if your picking up your order! Wack

title: Horrible app
review:
Can‚Äôt go into store to order, took at least 10 minutes to download the app.  After building our sandwich, went to check out only to find out there was no time available to pick up.  Knocked on the door only to be told she couldn't do anything about the app.  I asked if they were that busy?  All she could tell me was she couldn't do anything about the app.  

I know that times have changed, but really!!  We just wanted a simple sandwich.  How hard can it be?

title: Never opens
review: This app is just as bad as my Urban Outfitters app, it never opens. I always log in and continue to get the ‚Äúcontact support‚Äù message. I‚Äôve reported it before and nothings been done. I tell the subway workers and they even say it‚Äôs a terrible app and they know it doesn‚Äôt work for half the people. I was a loyal, few times a week, Subway gal but now I rarely go because I can never get the app to work. Please fix this issue. If your workers are spewing off how terrible it is then there is a clear issue.

title: Awful
review: I don‚Äôt know if it was just the app but I couldn‚Äôt order at all today and finally when I did , it charged me twice and the stores didn‚Äôt and couldn‚Äôt give me my order. Would love if someone can contact me and I want my money back

title: Easy to use difficult to go back
review: App is easy to use, but when selecting a specific sub, there was no option to go back. Also, if you decides to change which store you want to order from, it deletes everything in your cart and you have to start your over.

title: Eat Fresh!
review: The Subway App is pretty easy to use. From finding options to customizing ingredients, all it takes is a few fingers and your appetite. Different payment options are allowed, and you can even save Favorite sandwich creations for future reference

title: App doesn‚Äôt send the order to the store but yet it charges you
review: I placed an order using the app, it gave me a time that my order would be ready. Once the time came around it said my order was ready. Got there to the store and they said that they didn‚Äôt have my order, even though on the app it said it was ready and my card had already been charged. DO NOT USE THE APP, THEY JUST TAKE YOUR MONEY AND DONT EVEN SEND YOUR ORDER TO THE STORE. I will not be using this app ever again. Subway you need to do better, stop taking peoples money!

title: The app is great but does not line up with the store
review: I have used the app a handful of times and have found it useful and easy to use. I was excited to see it had a tracker but have learned this is not accurate. Standing in my local Subway still waiting 25 mins after the time the app told me my order was ready. So the app just goes by the estimated time that the order should be ready. What‚Äôs the point of it‚Äôs not accurate?!?!

title: Subway app
review: Pretty good app. When you give special instructions it does not save to particular favorite sandwich instead it makes it your default choice for everything. Good thing it keeps track of your points and special deals

title: Make sure you pick correct pick-up time
review: I started to put an order one evening, but decided to wait until the following day. When I completed the order, I went to the restaurant to pick it up but they never received the order. I double checked the order and the pick-up was set up to the evening, the same time of day I started filling the order.

title: APP
review: This app is no good whenever u try to order doesn't accept c/c. One time I try to 4 different c/c it always says we don't take this credit card. Even tried PayPal & it still said we can't take this card bc it's in grey. Because of that u can't use promotion they have & it's waste of time.

title: Easy to use app
review: I just signed up so I haven‚Äôt been able to take advantage of the special offers, however I‚Äôve heard about. I heard that as you are on the app it will start giving discounts and free chips and things like that so I‚Äôm looking forward to it!!!This app is extremely easy to use

title: Subway review
review: I love the app but it‚Äôs hard for the scanner to scan the barcode when I‚Äôm paying for it on my phone or to use my reward points. Also there‚Äôs no option for ‚Äúheated‚Äù on the app it‚Äôs only toasted and i be leaving a note in the special note section but it seems they never see it.

title: ‚ÄúDeals‚Äù
review: I downloaded the app expressly to take advantage of the 2/$5 deal available only through a mobile order.  Of course, the deal is only for ‚Äúparticipating locations.‚Äù  The app tells you to check first.  How would one do that?  There is nothing in the app to indicate, so I decided to call.  Except the only subway in town has no phone number listed, so I had to go the the browser to find the number.  I did that and learned that they were not participating.  So the app benefitted me none.  That‚Äôs the Subway I have learned to expect.

title: Good service
review: I order here often as I work in the area. Always excellent service and my order is always correct. The young man that works there is super sweet. I couldn't get my app to work and he rang up my order the way I wanted it and gave my the buy one get one. Will definitely order here in the future

title: Horrible
review: Even though there is money in my wallet in the app half the time when I go to pay the store says I have inadequate funds or it won‚Äôt go through.  I have 40 dollars it won‚Äôt let me use.  Now it is saying unexpected error every time I open it.

title: Customizations
review: As a person that likes a lot of custom things on my sandwich, the app is great. No longer do I have to feel embarrassed about ordering 15 kinds of toppings on my sub. The subway workers are always kind and get everything right. And coupons are definitely a plus too. Easy, convenient app.

title: Great app - like a game!
review: We love the visual interface of this app which shows the layers of the sandwich.  You can modify the layers by clicking on them.  The only problem I have is that you can only select one type of cheese and we often order multiple types of cheese.

title: Almost good, far from perfect like dominos...
review:
It‚Äôs a good app, but is missing stuff.
It never shows the ‚Äúsub of the day‚Äù, it doesn‚Äôt let you change the size of the drink when making it a meal. If these options are available, they are very hidden then.

title: Horrible app and Communication
review: Wish I could give this zero stars. For starters chose my pick up time on app and when I got there hadn‚Äôt even started or looked at my mobile order. Employees madre me wait behind the normal line as if I didn‚Äôt order online anyways. App wise it submitted incorrect order info. Ordered with a BOGO promo for two subs and employee said his end only showed I ordered one so I paid full price despite the promo. Order did not have correct bread or choices for online choice either. Subway doesn‚Äôt respond to online contact.

title: PLEASE ADJUST THIS!!!!
review:
The app is great. Gets me my food without waiting in line. I even save up my points to get FREE food! Love it!!!
Although... I order a CHOPPED salad 9/10 of the time. 9.5/10 of the time, my salad is NOT chopped. You‚Äôd think this is because of the restaurant I go to.. NOPE! I went to one 30 minutes from my usually, same problem.

My point is, can there PLEASE be a ‚Äúchopped‚Äù button. Where you either click ‚Äúyes I want my salad chopped‚Äù OR ‚Äúno I would not like it chopped.‚Äù

I‚Äôve even tried using the ‚Äúinstructions‚Äù or ‚Äúspecial request tab.‚Äù Doesn‚Äôt work! Just very frustrating that the salad is specifically called a ‚Äúchopped salad‚Äù with no other option, and I barely ever receive it chopped.

title: Buy 2 get 1 free
review: I bought 2 sandwiches and expected 1 for free but I didn‚Äôt get one for free they said i had to wait till for and it was like 11:00 am. I was just like why send me a deal with no info telling me to use it at 4:00 which is so stupid. To be honest I‚Äôm only keeping the app for points and I‚Äôm really upset about this matter.

title: Makes my life much easier
review: This app makes it easy to order, fly in and go with exactly the food I need. It‚Äôs been a bit of a learning curve for me to specialize my order and request a certain time for pick up but it‚Äôs been worth it. I‚Äôm always grateful that the servers at my local shop are always ready with my order just the way I requested it! Great time saver!

title: Was a five before newest update...
review:
With new update, Adding Payment Information no longer works, which means the app is worthless in its current state. Allowing Apple Pay would make this much less of an issue...

Will put back to 5 Stars after it‚Äôs fixed, as it worked great beforehand.

title: Coupon suggestion
review: I do love this app! It is very useful when ordering instead of standing in line. I just thought it would be nice to have a coupon scanner or number to put in on this app to when you order so you can go ahead and pay. I am a coupon user so it would be nice to have.

title: Subway Russellville Alabama
review:
I ordered on the app and had a pickup time of 12:30 but they didn‚Äôt have my order ready so I had to wait in line like everyone else and wait for them to prepare it for me! 
The app works well except for the things that you can add and take away from the sandwiches also the app doesn‚Äôt have all the drink or chip selections so you have to just tell the workers what you want when you arrive!

title: Frustrating ZERO STARS!!!
review: Can‚Äôt even log in anymore, after I put in my info...it takes me to a screen that wants me to ‚Äúagree‚Äù to terms....THEN when I hit continue...it takes me to a screen that wants me to change my password!!! How does an app go from being useful to straight crap...shouldn‚Äôt they get better?
