title: Won‚Äôt load
review: Loved using the app, but since the last update nothing will load. Hit start and order, and it states, sorry this is not properly working try again later.  It‚Äôs been over a week.  I like using the app in the morning, so when I‚Äôm getting my household ready to go, we don‚Äôt have wait.  We live in a rural area so it‚Äôs slim pickings for breakfast and lunch.

title: Great app for ordering online
review: These folks constantly improve their online ordering. It is such a pleasure to fill in every item for my sandwich that I would order if I was in person. Order filled perfectly, brought out to my car.  I love it!

title: App suggestion
review: I‚Äôd like for developers to add a store rating ability after each visit. Some stores do a much better job than others. Over all app works great, just think we need some way to share our thoughts of each store.

title: There‚Äôs no way this app has 5 stars
review: It hardly ever processes your order to the end, even when updated. We ordered a sandwich & it said error processing. So we tried again & it said it again! So we gave up & drove to the store but our sandwich which is now two sandwiches was already made at the store, so we just took it and left. We only wanted one sandwich, & this isn‚Äôt the first time the app hasn‚Äôt worked. it‚Äôs definitely hit or miss if it will let you finish your order.

title: Subway covers themselves
review: Smart on subways part not to put a function in the app where you can dispute an order that was wrong. This is the third time in the last 3 orders from the app that the restaurant messed ip the order completely. I had to go through the subway website and after submitting my claim, all you get is an apology email from the store. Chipotle would‚Äôve given me a refund for not getting what I paid for. Subway is for the birds and their company deserves to be held hostage by ransomware.

title: Quit with all the annoying pop ups!!
review: So I‚Äôm in line or pay at your store, and because of a stupid app update, I have to log in again from scratch. Then I‚Äôm presented with two or three annoying pop up ads! I‚Äôm trying to use your app to pay in the store which used to be quick and easy, and now you‚Äôve made me dread the experience! Your marketing people need to get with your operations people‚Äîdo you really want to be holding up the line in your own stupid stores?!

title: Easier to Place Orders
review: It takes longer for me as an elderly person to order something. Being able to fill it out on the mobile app is nicer so I don‚Äôt feel rushed. Then I can just go in and out fast to pick up my order

title: Don‚Äôt Use!!!
review: Subway doesn‚Äôt not protect their customers card information. My boyfriend account was hacked and they ordered a couple hundred dollars worth of food before we realized what happened. We talking to the credit card company but they said subway told them they were approved purchases. Trying to get ahold of someone to talk at subway corporate is impossible and they don‚Äôt have a call center. Then to top it off their Instagram just deletes my comments and won‚Äôt respond to the issue.

title: Locations not popping up when trying to apply a deal
review: Trying to order breakfast for the past hour trying to get the stores to pop up on my Maps so I can choose the store closest to me. Whenever I type in my address to see stores closest to me it just says there are 0 stores try another search. It just keeps saying that over and over. I googled the subway next to me and it‚Äôs currently open but the app just simply isn‚Äôt working! Horrible experience

title: App is Buggy
review: The Subway app used to work great for me. Unfortunately it‚Äôs been a big waste of time lately. Half the time it says they can‚Äôt deliver to my address even though my address never changes. I‚Äôll restart the app a few times and suddenly they deliver to my area. Things disappear from my cart as I‚Äôm about to check out and I can‚Äôt place an order

title: No support for when your order inevitably gets messed up
review: If you‚Äôre picking up your order from the store, sure this app works great. The delivery option is absolute garbage. My sandwich was completely wrong and they forgot my drink and side. This would be forgivable if there was an option to request a refund/ submit a complaint (like on DoorDash) but there‚Äôs nothing. For a major food chain app I can‚Äôt believe how poorly it‚Äôs designed.

title: Take care of app customers
review: The app works great. my only complaint is that I don‚Äôt get coupons in the mail and I watch people come every day and save money in ways that myself ordering here three or four times a week miss out on.  and I‚Äôm paying $20 more than I should be if I had coupons.

title: Get it together Subway
review: It is so frustrating when the app crashes which is most of the time. You can uninstall and reinstall but it does not help. What is the point of such a buggy app. Hire a better tech team. When the app works it is very good.

title: do not use
review: I ordered delivery for the first time on the official subway app (I normally order through doordash, or go order it in person), and 2 parts of my sandwich were incorrect. I tried to call the place I ordered from, and they automatically hung up right after picking the phone up. I was trying to report a simple problem with the sandwich, but apparently it‚Äôs not needed there. I was hoping to get a refund, but apparently they don‚Äôt do refunds. If you are buying through the app, don‚Äôt.

title: Ugh!!
review: I really enjoy this app when it works!! The last few times I have reinstalled it it hasn‚Äôt worked when I arrived at the restaurant! I couldn‚Äôt even get my points! The employees of course always inform me they know nothing about the app so they cannot be of any help!! I have reward points I can‚Äôt cash in and I can not use the deals only available online so frustrating!! Thinking of finding a new go to sub place!

title: Can‚Äôt order ahead
review: We were going through town and would be there shortly after the store opened. However we couldn‚Äôt place our order until the store was open. How stupid is that? You could still set pick up times to give the employees plenty of time to make the sandwiches. I should be able to place an order at 7:30 am for pickup after the store opens at 8. But no, not in Torrington!

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: I can‚Äôt do anything. It freezes every time I try to start an order or even apply a deal. Would be nice to be able to order something. I can‚Äôt even look at the sandwiches without it freezing.

title: Never worked
review: Would be no stars if plausible. I have tried the app multiple times on different days, downloaded, re-downloaded, I never can finish putting a meal together without some error popping up. I once made it all the way through to pay and it gave another pop up error, never have been able to complete an order using this app. deleted app, useless. While trying to use I noticed it also never allowed upgrades on beverages ei: large, x-large

title: So easy to order for my teenage son
review:
With students learning virtually, it's easy for me to place my order online, leave work, pick up my order and drop it off to my son within my lunch hour.

Thanks Subway for making it easy for us working moms!!

title: Easy, Fast, Convenient
review: The app makes it easy to build your order the way you want and have the order ready for you to pick up without having to wait in the store. No more standing around then coming home smelling like you‚Äôve worked at subway all day. :)

title: App broken
review: The last 3 times I tried to order through the app it showed my store as having a bunch of missing ingredients and wouldn‚Äôt let me make my sandwich the way I like. I asked the employees at the store if they were missing stuff and they said no. I don‚Äôt know how the app is supposedly keeping track of individual stores inventory but it‚Äôs absolutely broken and I‚Äôm tired of having to write out my whole order in the added notes section just to get the sandwich I want.

title: Not enough.
review:
2nd time using this app. I like it, but you don‚Äôt have all your condiments in your choices for a sandwich. I get a oven baked chicken, I like shredded mozzarella, and mustard and I also want it HEATED, not toasted. You have none of those options in the sandwiches line up. Also on add a drink to make it a meal,  I was unable to change my size. And also the variety of chips are not all on the app. 
The app I feel is okay, I have had no big issues. It just needs more added to its options.

title: Terrible
review: The people who develop this app should be left out of the industry. I say that because it‚Äôs true. The app never works correctly. Frequently, you can‚Äôt even login. This is somehow tied to the web backend, because you can‚Äôt login on the website either and it has similar problems. This is amateur crap and does not belong in the App Store. If you wanna sandwich from Subway, you best get off your couch and go there and order it or else you‚Äôll just be frustrated. This app is disgraceful. If I could give it zero stars, I would.

title: Constantly orders from the wrong stores
review: This app is driving my crazy! I specifically pick the store I want and then place my order and when I get to the store they don‚Äôt have my order because it ordered at some random store I have never been too! Then I have to call the store to have them cancel my order and it is frustrating! Especially when that store won‚Äôt answer the phone!

title: SERVICE was BAD
review: The app is awesome but the younger teenage boys that work in the Corfu subway are really bad at their jobs. Not only did they mess up my subs last order but they also were argumentative. They also told me that they didn‚Äôt know how to make certain subways and continue to argue with me when I explained how to make them. Especially a subway melt. They gave me egg and cheese on flat bread for the sunrise subway melt

title: Subway App Review
review: It is great for the most part, except you can‚Äôt add other meats like you could when you go into the store and if you do the meal, it doesn‚Äôt have all the drinks they have there. However, when clicking on the drink button separately, without adding it to the meal, it has the other drink options there. So I think those two problems should be fixed and it would be better.

title: Good IF the app decides to work
review: When Subway first developed this app, it was superb. I‚Äôd order from them almost daily because of the convenience and overall satisfaction. Now, the app works some days, and some days it doesn‚Äôt. Like today, I customized 5 sandwiches and got to the end just to be told that there was an error and I had to abort my cart. Also, load times are slow. This app has gone from innovative and convenient to outdated and a MAJOR headache. I‚Äôm very disappointed in Subway.

title: Payment methods/options
review:
Loved the app except at the end where it asks you to sign up for Apple Pay then doesn‚Äôt give you the option to use itü§î!

Next when you pick debit or credit it doesn‚Äôt just run it like a card it asks for your billing address along with just the normal card info. 

And finally asks to save the info!

title: Very simple
review:
Easy to make sandwiches. Price well shown and calories. Lots of rewards.
 (But on the store side, I don‚Äôt think they pay enough attention to put everything you wanted... the amount you wanted). I have not used this app enough yet. This could be because of the worker or the store I go to only....

title: Needs a MAJOR overhaul!!!
review: The lag time is terrible, you can‚Äôt swipe up to see your order, there are no options to add more items ( it goes straight to pay) or no options for what sauce/dressing you want on your sandwich. After multiple times trying to manage through this not user friendly site, my order was finally set, and I hit the pay button- only to get a message that it will not accept the mobile order because it is one hour before they close. All I wanted was to get the free footlong promo.  So done

title: Pointless
review: I just had a terrible experience with the app. We tried to take advantage of a free footling coupon offer that was only for use in the app or the website. I had to rebuild sandwiches several times because of app errors, then finally finished, and the app wouldn‚Äôt process my Paypal or my credit card. Couldn‚Äôt do anything to place the order. Just would spin and eventually say oops there was a problem. Meanwhile my wife sat in the parking lot waiting to pick up the order. Eventually we gave up and didn‚Äôt eat Subway.

title: Did subway just delete my account?
review: So I have been using the app for a while and today when I try to log in. It said no ‚Äúrecord‚Äù of my account. So I basically lost all of my reward and have to sign up again with the same email and phone number. Oh and the one thing I don‚Äôt like is that when you order a meal. You can only get bottle drink. What if I want a fountain drink? There‚Äôs only 3 options for the bottle drink. It‚Äôs either water, coke or vitamin water. Which I don‚Äôt drink any of those. I don‚Äôt like Dasani. I usually get lemonade that are ‚Äúmade‚Äù there

title: Love Subway. Hate the app!
review:
I have been double charged on more than one occasion. One employee insisted on charging, even though I paid with PayPal. Sides like chips, cookies, etc. we‚Äôre not bagged with the order - one employee simply didn‚Äôt fill the order because he claimed that he didn‚Äôt know how to make the sandwich! 
Ideally this works well when the system is working like it should and employees are trained properly. I will discontinue this for now, as I am losing too much money and time with this method.

review: When I try to use the app to place an order, it allows me to get all the way to the end, then a pop-up says, ‚ÄúAn error has occurred, please try again.‚Äù I have never been able to order through the app. It has been years. title: Half right
review:
The sandwich selection process seems to work okay, but the payment aspect is junk.   It doesn‚Äôt report errors in any usable fashion.

I was even going to try to buy a gift card at the store and see if it worked, but there was an entire landscape company in line and only one employee.  I decided I had tried hard enough to give Subway money today and uninstalled the app.  See you guys, lunch happened somewhere else.

Tip: go see how the Starbucks app works and work on emulating that.  You might have better success.

title: Good except 2 things
review:
Today I click on deals and a turkey sandwich badge/icon appears and it leads or lands on a blank non functioning page with the heading Fresh Pick or something, so I ordered my sandwich through the ‚Äòprimary‚Äô funnel as opposed through the ‚Äòdeal‚Äô funnel.

Also, today‚Äôs sandwich of the day is a turkey sub and I can‚Äôt tell if I am receiving the discounted price in the app. Perhaps I am but I‚Äôd prefer if it was pretty obvious with usual pricing and today‚Äôs pricing.

Easy and precise customization, clear calorie information.

title: So easy!
review: This app is fast, easy, and convenient. It saves my past orders so I can reorder at the touch of a button without rebuilding my sandwich (I always get the same thing), and I LOVE the convenience of ordering when I get in my car and having it ready when I arrive! Skipping the line is awesome, especially at prime lunch time!

title: Fast easy to use
review: I love the ease of use on this app, but what I love more is the fast service. I learned that online orders get priority at subway. It always ready when I arrive. The thing that I think could improve is more customization freedom. On some menu items the option to remove Certain things is not given other than that it‚Äôs a great thing.

title: Good overall
review: The app is wonderful because I can place my order for pickup. The only thing I don‚Äôt like is that it doesn‚Äôt let you submit a receipt from an order. I‚Äôve had times where the scanner doesn‚Äôt work so I‚Äôm not able to get points for my purchase. If there was a feature where we would be able to submit a previous order from in store purchase it would be great.

title: Easy to use  ‚Äì a few suggestions
review: Just loaded the app and ordered a breakfast sandwich. I found the interface to be very user-friendly and intuitive. I have a few suggestions. Please allow substitutions of white egg versus yellow egg on the breakfast sandwiches as well as the choice of cheese for sandwiches. Also, allow users to create favorites from their order history.

title: üëéüèª
review: I don‚Äôt know why you guys keep taking away the features where I can go in a reload my subway card right from my app. I complaint about it when the app had a whole new refresh to it, you guys took it off and then put it back on. Now you guys recently updated it again and when I try to add money to my subway card it take me out of the app to the subway site and I have to sign in and go through a whole process. This become very inconvenient!! No bueno!!!

title: Love the food hate the app
review: The app is never correct on what toppings bread or meat the store that you were trying to place an order on really has.  The app won‚Äôt let you pay with your credit card if they do not have something that you‚Äôre asking for. why doesn‚Äôt Subway just let you know that they don‚Äôt have it. The app never even runs correctly, when using the website there is no where to see the full menu with prices only catering.  I am very disappointed in Subway especially since I love The food  üòî

title: Wish it was better
review: I was looking forward to using this app but it just didn‚Äôt work the way I was hoping. There were not as many bread options and the taping to change the toppings wasn‚Äôt efficient. They also don‚Äôt have a menu on the app unless you are ordering, but it does not let you look at that menu if the store is closed for the day. I just wanted to look at the menu to prepare orders for work for the next day. Hope this app gets improved.

title: Convenient
review: I love using the app. It makes it super easy to order, especially for a larger family. And if gives the employees a chance to breathe because I can set my pickup time, which I always try to set it a half hour or so later.

title: Overly complex
review:
New: This app has not worked at all for the past two weeks. Have you all just given up on it. I try to place an order and just get "Error: An error has occurred, please try again." Have you all just given up on it?

Previous and still holds: Cumbersome and almost unusable. The design is better but the interface is so much work. Consider making it less complicated. There shouldn't be 10 different pages for one sandwich. Also, automatic toppings are annoying. I will never want cucumbers on my sandwich.

title: Wish I could give 5 stars
review: Deducted 2 stars (being generous) for never being able to take advantage of deals listed on App.  None of the franchises around here will honor them because Subway will not reimburse the owners. (I was informed of this directly by an owner after inquiring why promotions where never granted in our area).  Can‚Äôt fault the owners for trying to stay in the black.

title: Low Rewards and High Prices
review: With foot long sandwiches at $15 now which is way too much as it is, the occasional $2 reward users get which use this App is way, way too low.  There are too many other lunch options where average prices are lower and more balanced rewards are given which actually mean something (like free food items). No real benefits here with the App  and with the restaurant food offerings in general. The business model needs to change here to be more competitive and worth while.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2022-08-06T16:52:30Z'}

title: Lack of options
review: Unable to put sauce on the side so that the sub doesn‚Äôt get soggy if I don‚Äôt eat right away. Unable to add an additional meat or hold a meat. For example, if I wanted a ham and turkey sub, I can‚Äôt order the American club and hold the roast beef AND I can‚Äôt add a second meat to a turkey sub. It is definitely doable because the Panera app allows all kids of customizations and I am always able to get my sandwich in person. The app definitely isn‚Äôt ‚Äúmade to order.‚Äù

title: Delivery issues
review: I‚Äôve always been satisfied with the app until recently. Anytime I try to order delivery everything goes fine until I click checkout/ place order. At that point it tells me there was an error and my order cannot be placed. This has happened numerous times over the past couple months.

title: Subway app missing just a few things.
review: App works good just need to add the different drink sizes to the app it only offers a small or bottle drink. Also a pay at pickup option would be awesome you can still require a CC for backup payment but being able to pay cash on pick up would be awesome.

title: Love the app
review:
I can order. Husband can pick up. He doesn‚Äôt have to remember what I want or even pay. 
I did have a little bit of problem the first time. But I get frustrated easy. But it was worth it. Now I just go to favorites then check out.

title: Store Locator Failure
review: The only thing I can use the app for is the menu. I can‚Äôt order anything because the store locator does not do it‚Äôs job. If I want to order, I either have to use an internet browser, or go straight to the store. When trying to use the app, I can zoom in on the map to my location but that‚Äôs all it does. I cannot select a location to order from. Right now, the app just tracks my points.

title: Kudos to Nappanee Subway
review: I am so impressed with this Subway!! From the moment I step inside I‚Äôm greeted with smiles and it‚Äôs always clean inside. I‚Äôm trying to make healthier food choices and they have such a great variety to choose from. The staff and management go above and beyond for their customers!!

title: Convenience is nice but reliability is poor
review:
5 star idea but not 5 star execution. The app closes out on me when I try to hit the phone number to call the store, it has charged my card and I haven‚Äôt received a confirmation and then I can‚Äôt even go to recent orders to verify it went through. Recent orders don‚Äôt update reliability.

I do not have any issues with similar apps for Starbucks or Chick-fil-A to name a few.

Very frustrating app to use.

title: How is this rated so high??
review: Im fairly sure this rating was paid for. The app is absolutely terrible. It crashes and lags. It‚Äôs so inconvenient. The worse part is they have cut off the customer service. By that I mean if you just want to go into a store and speak to a person, you can get the deals on the app. So because your app is crap.... I have ave to pay more money??? I‚Äôm sorry but your subs are below average and expensive for what you get. It‚Äôs no wonder your pushing people to your competition in droves.

title: Need much improvement
review: The app made me sign out to update, then didn‚Äôt auto remember my user name or password. Order is a pain (enough with the pop ups to add items). For those of us who want to build our own sandwiches there‚Äôs no option, only subways prebuilt sandwiches. There is no favorite location ability (for those of us who go to the same locations regularly). In short, the user is forced to use way too many clicks thereby making ordering much more cumbersome.

title: Mobil app flaws
review:
When customizing make sure to uncheck anything you don‚Äôt want. My
Last 6 Mobil
Orders have been completely different than what I ordered. The server put on exactly what the ticket said but the things on the ticket were not what I ordered at all

title: Bit janky and missing things
review: As the title says it is a bit hard to use at times. The first time I tried to order I didn‚Äôt realize you can‚Äôt change the size sub even if you‚Äôve gone through all the customizations. Then, I was looking for the veggie delight sandwich and they do not have that as an option on the menu. Then with the app after completing the order it was having some trouble favoriting the items. Wouldn‚Äôt do anything no matter how I tapped the hearts....

title: Eat for heath and convenience
review: Easy to use, the food options are clearly labeled and the deals are automatically applied to each purchase when you hit the proper threshold. Not to mention they have a built in loyalty plan that gives you points per purchase. This app is an actual life hack.

title: Helps me save money! Please add better rewards!
review: I get subway often at work since it‚Äôs the closest chain to me. The app provides some nice savings here and there. I wish they would be a little more generous with the rewards though! But, regardless I‚Äôm gonna go to subway, so might as well save 2$ or 10% off here and there.

title: Disgusting Subway, ordered online, staff weren‚Äôt wearing masks, refused to issue me a refund
review: Subway is a disgusting company that does not care about COVID. When you order online, you have no idea if staff are wearing masks and following CDC guidelines. I went to pick up my food and all of the staff were massless, talking over my food while they were preparing it at the New Smyrna Beach, Florida location on beachside. They were nasty and refused to issue me a refund because I said I didn‚Äôt want the food knowing none of them wore any masks. They were nasty and I will never go to Subway ever again.

title: Happy Customer
review: First time user. Made usual mistakes, but was able to go back and revise my sandwich. Liked choices for less, regular, more.  Deletions and extras were helpful choices.  Payment options made it easy to choose Subway gift card.  Will definitely use this system again!

title: Pretty good
review: I love using the app. It‚Äôs very convenient! However, I would love to see the option to be able to place your order and then pay in the store. I don‚Äôt understand why that‚Äôs not an option. But other than that, it‚Äôs good! I enjoy using the app!!

title: Redesign checkout page
review:
The checkout screen that shows items in the order is confusing. Recommend putting each order item in its own clearly-defined box. 

Also, I don‚Äôt like the default toppings on sandwiches. I remove the default items, such as tomatoes, and basically just build my sandwich from scratch. 

Overall, good app.

title: Wonderful Food Ordering App!
review: Very complex but well organized & easy to use food ordering food I‚Äôve ever used so far! Sandwiches are easy to customize just by simple touches on your phone screen & all topping options are available as well. Payment method options were very convenient as well. Excellent app!

title: Lost all favorites and recent orders!
review:
It‚Äôs an excellent idea!  Pre-order and pre-pay and just pick up your sandwich!
But went to order today and found my ‚Äòfavorites‚Äô gone, and my ‚Äòrecent orders‚Äô missing.  So when I tried to select a sandwich and re-enter all the ingredients the Subway Club was no where on the menu!
Had to go back to standing in front of the counter and order a sandwich.
App is difficult to use.  If you aren‚Äôt careful in the ordering process the app will double your order.
CHECK THE PRICE, before you submit payment!

title: Terrible Service and Unreliable
review:
This app works when it wants to, anytime I want to order online it constantly gives the message ‚ÄúError, cannot read property ‚Äòupdate‚Äô of undefined‚Äù

This always happens once my order is completed and whenever I checkout when I‚Äôm ready to pay. I have spent so much time trying to order as well as with different cards. Not to mention wether you try to call the store you‚Äôre ordering online from or call corporate customer service. NO ONE HELPS. 

So much for ‚Äúonline order deals only‚Äù

title: Subway Lafayette La on Ambassador Caffery
review:
I love subway and I always have but the reason I go there is because the people are so friendly and kind.  The place is very clean and the tables are always wiped down. You never have to ask for anything because it‚Äôs automatically checked by someone.

I love Subway but these PEOPLE are absolutely awesome!!!!!!    Rosemary Landry

title: Stopped working for over a month
review:
I used the heck out of this app because I can order my food in advance.  

For over a month now I keep getting some constraint variable error and I can‚Äôt add food to my cart to order in advance.  I‚Äôm hellaciously busy at work and my lunch isn‚Äôt long enough to wait while my food is made.  I‚Äôve started going elsewhere because I just don‚Äôt have time to wait.  

A way to send errors right out of the app would be great.  I can‚Äôt attach photos here to show you the error I‚Äôm getting which is a shame.

title: User Friendly
review: I was really afraid I wouldn‚Äôt be able to personalize my sandwiches on the app. However, the app is easy to use and best of all, it has a ‚Äúspecial instructions‚Äù area where I could tell them to put the Mayo ALL OVER the sandwich, not just in the crease! I hate a dry sandwich. üòÇ I will continue to order using the app! Thanx Subway!!

title: No app support
review: This app continues to be one of the worst ive ever used. Today it has decided that when i choose to make it a meal, it automatically adds a 50 cent upcharge for a bottled drink. Also there is no way to go back when putting an order together! The only way to change a restaurant location is to close the app and reload it. Seriously?! When selecting a sandwich and making it a meal, it only changes the price of the sandwich but doesnt indicate in any way that youve made it a meal. Yet it continues to offer the option to make it a meal. Huh?!

title: Worst food ordering app
review: I have my favorites saved. Instead if showing them in a list, I have to scroll through a the images if them. It‚Äôd be much easier to just select the sandwiches I‚Äôm trying to order. Half the time, the favorites wont even load. Secondly, why does the app guess at what we want added to the sandwich. I need to remove a bunch of toppings before adding what I want. Also, some stores do not allow for advanced ordering, AND, I cannot order more than 6 sandwiches. So I have to place 2 orders to feed me family. Nightmare!

title: App needs to be fix
review: The app used to easy. But with the update I‚Äôve had to delete it a couple of times. I says my card is not good. Then when I was in the middle of a order the app crashed and it still sent my order unfinished. When I tried to finish my ordering wouldn‚Äôt work.
developerResponse: {'id': 7299981, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2019-02-14T16:22:59Z'}

title: Complete mess
review: This app is a hot mess! Ordered a sandwich, got a confirmation, and drove to the store for pick-up only to be informed that the order didn‚Äôt go through - even though the app indicated that my order was ready for pick-up! Spent over 30min there as they tried to figure out what went wrong (which they couldn‚Äôt) and ended up leaving without a sandwich. Love subway but I‚Äôll never use this app again or go to that specific store after wasting my time. Plus - the charge for the sandwich is still shown as pending on my card!!
developerResponse: {'id': 7300108, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! title: Excellent when it works
review: I had a hard tome today ‚Äî App kept shutting down. I deleted and downloaded again fro App Store, same thing initially. Tried again 15 min. later and worked great. Would be 5 stars except for this glitch. Very convenient, fast to order, and pickup always efficient. Would be better if I could add tip to electronic charge to my debit card
developerResponse: {'id': 6890601, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we wanted you to know that this issue should now be resolved. If you have further difficulty, please reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2019-01-17T21:34:37Z'}

title: Kind of confusing
review: When ordering more than one sub, there is not a clear button or anything saying how to order another sub.  I had to go to the menu and click on the home button, then it asks if you want to order another sub.  I was trying to order the chicken bacon ranch and it would not let me delete the bacon.  I had to put it in the Special instructions.  Not very user friendly!

title: App is a great app except some kinks need worked out
review: Kinks need worked out of the app like it‚Äôll say ordered ready or building and then ready they have no way from the restaurant to tell you when it is ready so when I got there my food was cold

title: Great for mobile ordering!
review:
Ordering my sandwich ahead of time was super easy! I loved the clean interface with plenty of pictures to show me what is ordering. Checkout was easy too.

The app loaded excessively between stages: not log loads, but lots of them between every screen. The app looks beautiful and finished the task well, but the section in-between remains to be optimized.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work most of the time
review: This app is okay, but for the last 2 weeks I have been unable to use it to order. Every time I open it it tells me there is an error and to try back later. It doesn‚Äôt even give me the option to order it just says do you want to add something else to your cart, but my cart is empty and then tells me there‚Äôs an error. I can‚Äôt figure it out. This isn‚Äôt the first time I‚Äôve experienced this. It really only works less than half the time for me. I plan to delete the app. It‚Äôs pointless.
developerResponse: {'id': 1900575, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (800)-888-4848, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-12-01T19:38:09Z'}

title: Needs to upgrade gift card payment ability
review: I wish it would deduct gift card value and give you an option to pay remaining balance with credit card but if the gift card is less than the total you can‚Äôt use it. Other than that I enjoy the convenience of ordering through the app.

title: Easy to use, can not use gift card for partial payment
review: I like the app for the most part. It‚Äôs easy to customize your sandwich. However you can‚Äôt use a gift card for partial payments. My gift card has $4 and some change and it‚Äôs useless. I can‚Äôt reload it because it says PayPal is no longer supported. Please fix the app to work for this!

title: Latest Update causes constant crashes
review: I was somehow able to login after starting out as a ‚Äúguest‚Äù and added to my cart. Submitted my order and it went through. A few minutes later when I went to check the tracking I was once again told there was an issue with my login and was prompted to either sign out or contact support. None of those options are helpful and simply logging in has become impossible

title: Subway is the best and the app is even better
review:
Between getting the rewards and how easy it is from order to pickup I absolutely love subway. I literally press like three buttons and bam i have a sandwich ready in like 10 minutes to pick up! 

Much love subway<3 

-JAXX‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Deceptive app and promo orders
review: Ordered online using 15% off on footlong deal. 3 subs‚Ä¶ all the way the app says the best deal will be allied at the checkout‚Ä¶ unfortunately the APP forgets the 15% somewhere in the ordering phase . Gave my order 28 cent discount. Called the store and only option is to call customer service. 2nd time it has happened to me and not sure how many other customers this has impacted. Deceptive practice ‚Ä¶ love the sub ‚Ä¶ don‚Äôt like being lied to for cost

title: Good, but beware when using gift cards
review:
I was leery about the app at first because I truly want my sandwich MY way, but they have done a pretty good job so far. 

My beef is with the mobile ordering. If you have 1 penny less than you need for your order on a gift card? Sorry about your luck. You can‚Äôt use 2 payment methods. So I hope that I can still use my gift card from the app in restaurant because otherwise I have $5 sitting there in a gift card that will never be used. üò° 

The rewards program is pretty lacking as well. $2 off after spending $xx? Cheap! And they expire so quickly and you can‚Äôt stack them. Not worth it.

Weigh the risks for yourself.

title: Good overall but could use some improvement
review: Would love to see a ‚Äòbuild your own‚Äô sandwich or salad instead of just being able to change a preset selection. Otherwise, fairly easy to use. Could use some work on speed, it‚Äôs a really slow app.

title: Missing items on website
review: I would give the app 5 stars because it's so easy to use but it never has a list of all the drinks or chips available. So I can't order curbside because I need to go in and get the right chips and such! Regular coke wasn't even an option this time... ugh!

title: Drink Selection and Size issues.
review: You cannot chose specific drinks at a single drink order. For example, make it a meal k can choose Coke Zero. Order a single bottle drink I have to select something different and request the store make the right drink choice (Diet Coke selects, I have to request it be changed to Coke Zero). You cannot select anything but a small fountain drink even if you want a larger size.

title: My Favorites
review: We enjoy using the Subway app, but now have a problem with our favorites and have to build it each time we order.  The message we get for both favorites is that they are not available at our store, which is not true.  How can we fix this?

title: Best app!
review: Mobile orders rule! My sandwich is always there waiting for me with contactless pickup. Some Subways are extremely slow. I save about 1/2 hour with this app. Plus you earn points for 2$ off an mobile order every time you place a order.

title: Workers A+
review: They always have my order correct and ready when I get there, and if they don‚Äôt have something they always call to find out how they can change it to something else. They should get a HUGE RAISE for how good of a job they do here!!! :)

title: Great customer service
review:
I like coming to this location, although it‚Äôs busy during lunch hours, the team here gets it done!!!
Everything is always fresh and delicious,, I like ordering online also, now that it‚Äôs available

title: The worst
review: This is the worst app ever it always crash and especially when you‚Äôre trying to get something to eat and it always ask you are you hungry yes that‚Äôs why I‚Äôm on the app please fix the issues with the app crashes every day

title: I can NOT believe the high rating
review: This app, has to be the worst app of all. The ratings must be fake. Every time I‚Äôve used it for the last year or so, it deletes the order, cancels it after payment, makes you click the same button again and again then reloads. The actual layout of how you go to the next step is illogical. I could go on and on. Signs you out in the middle of an order, etc. Almost matches how bad the service is at every Subway I‚Äôve ever been to.

title: Good but some issues
userName: Just let me use my gift card
review: This app is nice and convenient if you prefer to skip the line and just pick up your food. However, if you are trying to use a gift card it will not let you use it if your order is within a few dollars of your balance. Very annoying when you know there is enough on the gift card.

title: Piece ‚ÄòO Crap!!!
review: In the world of apps galore, Subway‚Äôs mobile app for iPhone stands out as true garbage. I‚Äôve ordered food and had to wait, or they just didn‚Äôt receive my order at all. Then there was the time I checked, and they actually charged me twice for the same order. Dear Subway, for a multinational conglomerate you really should learn about this thing called technology! Or at least outsource to competent contractors. At any rate, based on just your app alone, I am electing to get a Jersey Mike‚Äôs sub instead. Their app is great.

title: Love this app
review: This app makes it so much easier for me to get sandwiches and even has a saved favorites option to make it even easier. I am always on the road and have short break ls for work. This app makes lunches quick and easy.

title: Terrible
review: I cannot for the life of me get this app to work. I desperately want this app to work as I have a tight turn around from class to class and online ordering would work perfectly but it will not work. Every time I try to put something in my cart it‚Äôs error something went wrong try again over and over. I even tried the website and it‚Äôs always something went wrong error. I tried reaching out to support but nothing works. Please fix this app.

title: We enjoy the app
review:
Get to add or subtract and place order, super easy
It does take 5-10 min before restaurant gets it and ours is a little slow at filling the order even when no ones there but doesnt stop us from using the app every time.

title: Very easy to use
review:
The application and the contactless deivery system have been extremely easy to use so far. When I go pick up my subs, it‚Äôs been ZERO wait time! I just walk in the front door, grab my order off the shelf, and GO!!!!
It‚Äôs a fantastic fast system!

title: Awesome
review: I love subway and this makes it easier the store me and my grandson go to remember what we want on our subs even though you have to say he likes lots of olives more than you can select and they remember its truly a good app if you like subway why not try it out!

title: Good app, great design and graphics
review: Sometimes have troubles with choosing a restaurant, or customizing sandwiches particularly choosing ingredients. In my last order couldn‚Äôt chose salt to put on a sandwich which is okay, but would be nice to know why it‚Äôs not available, Store ran out of salt? Or it‚Äôs just technical difficulties. But overall better then was.

title: Good app
review: Use it all the time but a lot of the time when I go to recent orders it errors out (everything else works fine). Usually it ends up working after I click it like 30 times but sometimes I have to make a whole new order because it just won‚Äôt go through which is kind of annoying.

title: Horrible
review:
The first time I tried to place an order - I ordered over 10 times as it would not go through. Went inside to get Subway Deli and they had a massive Grub Hub order that came in the same time. Very inefficient.

Also, when you go into a subway shop, they ask you if you want your meat and cheese toasted with the bread, with this app - you only get to choose the bread to be toasted. Very , very difficult in it‚Äôs efficiency!

When I messaged headquarters about the app being unable to process my order, there was no response .

title: Terrible design, options
review: When ordering, not all of my local Subway‚Äôs options are available to customize my sandwich (can‚Äôt order anything on Honey Oat, for instance). There is no option to create a sandwich from scratch - you have to start with a preset, remove what you don‚Äôt want, then add what you do want. There is no option to navigate around the app while retaining your order - you either order everything at once or delete it all out and start over.  Just really terrible design all the way around.

title: disappointing :(
review: I was hoping I could see the menu and add sandwiches to my favorites without having to buy something right away. I wanted it to be more where I could save a restaurant closest to me and save payment info, see a menu of everything they have, customize sandwiches and put them in a favorites category. Then I wouldn‚Äôt have to remake my sandwich and pick a restaurant every time. And it‚Äôd be fun to see what other items I might not have thought of trying before. But it feels so rushed for you to buy something.

title: I hope they fix their app
review: App is most of the time garbage. Cart does not belong to member - there was an error - favorites sandwich not available - it makes me not want to order from them but still I do only because the physical location is close to me
developerResponse: {'id': 990221, 'body': 'Hi - thank you for sharing the positive feedback- we are thrilled that you are enjoying our new mobile app, and thank you for choosing SUBWAY¬Æ Restaurants!', 'modified': '2020-06-28T18:36:30Z'}

title: Malfunctions
review: I was creating a sandwich, and added it to my cart. When I went to pay, I received a message stating I didn‚Äôt have anything in my cart. I reordered the sandwich again, this time online,  o app! When I went to the location I had TWO sandwiches waiting for me, and when I looked at my back statement I had been charged TWICE. The manager told me that I have to go to the app to get a refund, and just handed me one sandwich. I haven‚Äôt seen anything about getting a refund from the app.

title: One major issue
review: I place my order real quick from favorites it‚Äôs great it‚Äôs quick but when I place the order it randomly says it will be ready at 7pm? I placed it at noon! This has happened 3 times! I click at the bottom to call the store to try to cancel because I‚Äôve already been charged or to cancel and see if they could make it now and they say they haven‚Äôt even received it? I gave up and said keep the money and the sandwich I‚Äôm tired of going through this every time and throwing money away.

title: So easy!
review: I love being able to order my food and have it ready without standing in line especially with the social distancing this app is so easy. I‚Äôve been using it for a few years now and I love getting the tokens plus any deals they have. I never get sick of a good, delicious, and fresh sub!!

title: Ordered twice
review: I love the app. One glitch I have run across was accidentally ordering twice. I called the store but they were not able to do anything about the 2 orders. I was able to only get one order and then they allowed me to come back a different day for the same order.

title: Great community resource
review: Great community resource especially in this trying time. The SubWay app is convenient once you've run through it - very convenient. You're in and out in no time and number people waiting is minimized! Plus the coupons are great savers in these times of a streched budget! Thank you SubWayüëç

title: Not very intuitive
review: Your app is terrible.  Every time I have ordered from it something is not right.  The bread has to be changed to get the bread you want.  The way to have it toasted is terrible.  I ordered a subway melt and apparently ordering a subway ‚Äúmelt‚Äù does not mean it comes toasted.  Ordered 2 sandwiches that both should have been toasted and were not because apparently I missed the option to toast.  Ask in the app the same questions in the store.  What bread do you want?  Do you want it toasted? Redo your app.  Waste of money on ordering my sandwiches.

title: Horrible Glitchy App.
review: This app is garbage. I love that subway has so many good online deals, but 9/10 times the deals malfunction upon checkout and don‚Äôt apply, your cart gets reset, etc. And I know the subway I‚Äôm using takes the coupons and deals. That‚Äôs another thing, it doesn‚Äôt tell you the stores that take deals. If it does, the coupon applies at the end of you creating your order. But then again, the coupons won‚Äôt apply most of the time to stores that DO take them. It‚Äôs just a complete mess to use.

title: Do not use the app!
review: Fun fact. You cannot cancel an order after it had been sent and if you need to make a change afterward you must call the store. I sent  an order before it was complete and tried to cancel it so that I could complete my order.  the app won‚Äôt let you do that. I called the store per the app directions and the store refused to help me. The person pretended not to speak English even though I know they do. Awesome experience. Don‚Äôt use the app. There is no accountability and no assistance when things go wrong.

title: Very Convenient; works as designed!
review: Ordering at Subway has always been a bit of a hassle with everyone trying to navigate all their options. This app makes it effortless and virtually error-proof! I‚Äôll be visiting Subway more often now because of the ease of ordering & paying!

title: But gift card
review: Everything is user-friendly and great on the app except for when you have a order that cost more than your gift card that you have saved costs.  So you have a $10 gift card balance but you can apply it to your $22 order
developerResponse: {'id': 10379046, 'body': 'Hello! If you are looking to split between gift card and another payment method, simply select ‚ÄòApply a Subway Card‚Äô on the ‚ÄúYour Order‚Äù page. If you need to change the other payment you‚Äôd like to use, you can then press ‚ÄòChange‚Äô. For assistance, please reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.\r\n', 'modified': '2019-08-27T14:21:03Z'}

title: App works but service in store...
review: Great app! Works and is user friendly. Seems like store employees don‚Äôt know that I‚Äôm paying just as much money, if not more then the customers that are ordering traditionally... that‚Äôs not the apps fault tho. I fill out the customer surveys to give the store that feed back and it might help.

title: Great app....Subway got it right
review: It is extremely easy to order and modify what you want. The stores generally prepare it quickly and without any issues , and picking up is relatively easy. Similar experience to the StarBucks app, which I think is best in class. My only suggestion is that they add Apple Pay to the app.

title: Good but need a few tweaks
review:
Need more chip flavor options.  You offer chips in the store that are not on the app.

Should have a station in the store for web pickups.  Currently, you go to the store, skip the line and then just hang out by the register.  People think you are cutting in line.  And the cashier is not clear if they should help you or keep ringing up others.

title: Great app.
review: I work at a grocery store with good subs and I may say that subway is one of my other favorites if I don‚Äôt want subs from work. The app itself works nicely and I like that I can mobile order now and of course it‚Äôs super easy like always to customize it.

title: Great way to order lunch at work
review: We send one person out to get lunch at work. Ordering using the app makes it extremely fast and easy. We can order and pay for our own order and all our guy has to do is pick it up. I gave it 4 stars because sometimes we have put our whole order in and it won‚Äôt go through.

title: Auto pay please
review: The app is great with one exception, i link my credit card to the app but why wont your stores systems just auto pay with the linked card. It makes no sense to link my card and then i have to do two steps, scan the barcode to earn tokens and them i still have to dig out my credit card to pay. Make it automatic so your system pays with the card linked on the account.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your time or money.
review:
This app actually makes the simple process of ordering food more complicated and leaves much more room for error compared to simply ordering at a physical location. Also know that if anything gets messed up in the process of ordering, Subway will not refund you, not even with store credit (that‚Äôs what happened to me today anyway). 

This app isn‚Äôt going to save you time, and can very easily lead to losing money rather than saving it. Spare yourself the headache and just order at the store.
developerResponse: {'id': 4078166, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-07-03T17:26:41Z'}

title: An annoying app. Place your order with caution!!!
review: Several times it selects a location that is not the closest location to you when an order is placed, money is the debited, and no way to get your order. There should be a prompt to confirm the location, it‚Äôs proximity and if the store is open before accepting an order. Orders are taken when stores are actually closed. This is a serious flaw that needs to be fixed!!! I still have money outstanding for orders taken that have not been honored as a result of this.
developerResponse: {'id': 2817320, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-03-13T20:14:13Z'}

title: Doesn't work
review: Ever since the app was updated, I haven't been able to actually complete a mobile order without an error occurring and having to clear my entire order. There is literally no point to an app for a fast food place that doesn't let you order anything. I used to go to Subway all the time when this app worked, but now I never go anymore because I don't have time during my lunch break to wait in line. Get it together, Subway. You're too big a business to be have such a problematic app.
developerResponse: {'id': 1246128, 'body': 'Could you provide more information please, so that we can look at the issue? You can reach us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-09-12T19:45:38Z'}

title: One of My Favorite Apps
review: However, I do wish it were more consistent on the use of coupons and deals, otherwise I would‚Äôve given it five out of five stars. This saves me a tremendous amount of time, and it ensures that I have a great attempt at consistency amongst stores across the metropolitan area in which I live.

title: It cannot refund the wrong item
review: Bad experience. The food I got was different from what I ordered. The restaurant where I picked up my food is far from my home, so if I want to change or return it, I have to waste extra time and gas. My state gas is expensive. No one was happy in this experience. I won't use this app. You won't get the wrong food if you go to a restaurant and order face-to-face, but you will if you order by app.

title: Terrible app
review: Just tried to use this app for the first time. Signed up for rewards and everything. There was an offer to get 15% off my first foot long and I tried to order it 4 times and it never would apply the 15%. So I have up and went to the store. Not only was the app not going to give me the 15% off, but IT ALSO WAS FOING TO CHARGE ME $.30 cents EXTRA!!!  Don‚Äôt fall for this app. It does NOT give u the discount and overcharges for tax or whatever that extra .30 was going to be. Just go to the store.

title: One star from perfection
review:
Would like to see the support of Apple Pay. 
Also, the whole app is not native enough. Every page in the app requires loading and waiting, though just jump around different tabs in the app. It will take me longer to finish my order.

title: Almost perfect, but‚Ä¶
review: ‚Ä¶ tonight when I was just using it, I had to switch back-and-forth between my texts and the app to know what to order. The app kept refreshing whenever I would switch for two seconds. It didn‚Äôt used to do that. Other than that, it is perfect.

title: Don‚Äôt use delivery
review: This delivery service is terrible. There is no way for a customer to get in contact with the delivery person if they did not fulfill the delivery. I ordered two subs and it said it delivered but it didn‚Äôt, I called the store like the app says and they said I had to contact the delivery driver. There is no way to contact the delivery driver and now my money has been stolen from me. Also couldn‚Äôt find a way to send an email to corporate so here I am leaving a terrible review on your app.

title: Terrible app.
review: This is hands down the slowest, worst running app on the App Store. Simply trying to place an order. Took 10 minutes to finally finish an order between the longest load times I have ever seen. Added item to cart, go to check out. After what felt like an eternity of waiting it tells me there‚Äôs nothing in my cart. Was feeling like subway, now I‚Äôm just going to drive to Publix because it‚Äôs less of a head ache standing in line then it is ordering online.

title: Great store. YUMMY
review:
I wish it was a little simpler to change the bread and change the sauces etc. I had to just take the sandwiches away they came .Un
able to figure out how to change the items you had on your app. Other than that it‚Äôs great to be able to have somebody come to the house. I

title: Server issues
review: I‚Äôve had issues when I go to put in an order and after everything is customized go to checkout and get sorry there was an error. At the point I don‚Äôt try again due to the time it takes sometimes on other peoples order.

title: Terrible UI Changes
review:
Removal of the sandwich builder?  Not a good move.  That UI looked unique and was easy to use.  This app looks like a web-app; it‚Äôs slow and not nearly as creative or easy to use.  Subway really seems to be slipping in numerous ways.  Doing away with favorite sauces, no more chopped salads, employees are becoming less friendly and seldom greet customers, and now this?  The mobile app looked great, now it looks typical.  Nothing unique and frustrating to use.

You‚Äôre slacking, Subway.  What gives?

title: Personal and awesome!
review: I was having some trouble with the app and the local subway personally reached out and provided a solution within minutes so my son could still get some subway today. Thank you so much for the kindness and professionalism, Maco Store Subway!

title: Update is marginal
review:
I think you created more bugs than you fixed.  It errors out more often than not.  There is no way to go back if you look at the ‚Äúfeatured‚Äù items on the menu, you have to close out of the app.  
I was eventually able to place my order but not without a lot of frustration using the app

title: Convenient but....
review: It is really convenient to have everything done and ready when I arrive somewhere. Although, I would like it if they would have a second option on breads. If they don‚Äôt have a bread they just use any old which bread and sometimes it‚Äôs not what we wanted.

title: It‚Äôs good but needs update
review:
One of my few problems with the subway app include 
1. not all items are available through the app often times items I could buy in person 
3. Not all the toppings are available sauses I directly dislike 
2. You can‚Äôt upgrade drink size 
4. The time straight up lies to you it takes 4-5 orders for mine to surpass the time suggested by the app (well my sandwichis still in perfect condition) I believe that subway should either move up or down the spectrum (see Burger King or dominos for what I believe to be good examples)
Despite my complaints I still regularly order from here and enjoy it I can literally order it and see my ticket

title: Breakfast subs not always available
review: I wish the app told me up front if breakfast subs were available instead of waiting until after I do all my customizing. Then to try a different location, it forgets all the changes I made.

title: Functional but needs some serious UI improvements
review: While the app is functional, numerous issues make it more difficult to use than is necessary.  Make it a meal no longer works correctly.  It repeatedly asks me which store I am placing my order at, and it‚Äôs just not built to be simple and fluid.  I have already saved my favorites, which should mean that order placement should be quick and easy.  But it still requires far too many clicks.

title: Great .... when it works
review:
Lately this app freezes when signing in and just hangs there. I have actually started to order from different restaurants in the area because of the problems with the app.  Because of the extreme heat today we tried to offset sandwiches for the family, but after waiting almost five minutes for the app to load we finally ordered from somewhere else 

Fix this app, you are losing business.

title: Greatest Food of All Time
review: I have literally never eaten something as heavenly as a SubWay Sub. The first time I bit into this perfect food changed my life in more ways than I could‚Äôve imagined, I found love for the first time. Thank you SubWay, for showing me how to love and cherish life, have a good day, and always, always, eat fresh.

title: What‚Äôs the point of having an app?
review: Super disappointed in this app! I thought the purpose of ordering online was to get your food taster? We ordered our food at 1145ish and it was not to be ready until 1:25. Then when I went in early to see if I can get my food then and I could not. I asked to cancel my order and they told me I could not and to try from the app. They staff is not apparently trained to know that calling the business is how you cancel and order. I will not be using the app anymore as it is a waste of time!!

title: Unreliable app
review: Have used this app about four time and two of those times could not get it to work. I have used it during the time they have their deals running and it just won‚Äôt load the favorites of ours with their deals.  I have decided it isn‚Äôt worth the headache anymore and will go back to ordering our subs from a local place instead where we have always gotten great service, fantastic subs, and more convenient location.

title: Sandwiches are the Bomb
review: I have always love Subway and having the online order app and even just the driveway makes it so much faster.  And the staff at the Subway on 23rd and Deer Valley have always been courteous and professional even when they are super busy.  So glad the put this one close to my home.

title: Horrible!
review: I don‚Äôt usually do reviews but I just have to let people know about this incident I had. I was placing a mobile order to a subway (1215 scenic hwy snellville, Ga) and the app said the store was open and let me place an order. Turns out, the store was actually closed and it took my money! I‚Äôve been trying to contact corporate about it but talk about not responsive corporation. It is so hard to reach them and tell them about not just the mistakes on this app but as well as file a complaint on the store itself. Just horrible.

title: Waste of time and money
review: Like previous reviewers have stated this app AWFUL.  Same thing as other people have reported: Placed an order, given a really long amount of time for pick up, called into the store and they have no record of order. Can‚Äôt get a refund through the store and there is ZERO SUPPORT of any kind from a corporate office. I call and I‚Äôm told by automated services to go online. I go online and the feedback form doesn‚Äôt work. So I‚Äôm here without a sandwich and without my money. I regret ever downloading this app. Don‚Äôt do it! Zero stars.

title: Almost perfect
review:
I really enjoy the app. There are two things I experienced that weren‚Äôt working properly
1.) I couldn‚Äôt order a larger drink when I made a sandwich a meal from the ‚Äúmake it a meal‚Äù button in the cart after adding a sandwich. 
2.) the text doesn‚Äôt appearing this text box as I write this review     It‚Äôs weird but that‚Äôs why there may be mistakes in this review.

title: Good except...
review: Sometimes the deals aren‚Äôt applied at checkout even though you click through them to order. Super annoying, other that that it‚Äôs awesome, order when I leave work done by the time I get there less than fifteen minutes away.

title: The best
review: Very easy to use and order is done in less than 15 minutes. Subway was out of something that I ordered, so they called to inform me and asked if I‚Äôd like for them to hold on to the receipt and pick it up tomorrow, or swap it with something else. Love the app, rewards are easy to build up as well!

title: There was a bit of a learning curve for me
review: There are 2 Subways in my neighborhood less than a mile away from each other on the same road. Once I figured out the address of the one I prefer it became a lot easier to order ahead and pick up my order where I expected it to be. Easy to mark a sandwich as a favorite so I can reorder too.

title: Waste of time
review: I was able to use the app successfully one time, after I just downloaded it. Every time I go in and try to use it again the cashier says she can‚Äôt use my promotional offers. Every time I try to make a purchase through the app it won‚Äôt go through. It is still trying to apply the expired deals that I used the first time using the app. There is no way for me to remove them. I have simply quit going to subway because of the inconvenience of this app and the rudeness and uncleanliness of the staff.

title: Ok App, but could be better
review: When at the store and using the app, often times it would not allow use of the coupons. Cashiers never have advice when the app isn‚Äôt working. When the app is first opened for scanning at the store, the UPC (or whatever it is called) should pop up right away for ease of use versus having to fumble to find the correct icon to click on to enlarge it for scanning.
developerResponse: {'id': 12755965, 'body': "We appreciate you sharing your feedback, and are always looking for ways to enhance the mobile app experience for our guests. You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-06T22:31:00Z'}

title: Not customizable
review: While the theory of the app is good, it doesn‚Äôt work in practice. For picky eaters like myself, it would be much easier if there was an option to custom build a sub. I shouldn‚Äôt try to pick one of the pre-made ones and then add or subtract things in the hopes I‚Äôll be able to make what I want. Because, big surprise, I can never make exactly what I want that way. Just let me pick the bread, and add exactly what I want to it. It‚Äôs almost 2020, this shouldn‚Äôt be a problem.

title: Suggestions
review: My son wanted to layer the toppings in a certain order. Maybe sliding the toppings up and down. Also some apps now allow you to scan the card instead of entering the info. Can‚Äôt remember if I saw Apple Pay as a payment option but would‚Äôve chose that if I saw it.

title: Buggy app
review: Having this app is a joy for me. As of late, though, it seems to be a bit buggy and missing a few features that it had before. Lately I‚Äôve tried to access the recent orders part of the app only to be alerted of an error. And y‚Äôall had a feature that u can duplicate a sandwich that was just made. Please fix.

title: Great app!
review: I really like this app because it‚Äôs user-friendly. There are some restaurant apps that are so complicated to use that I just finally give up and call them, but this is great. The only thing I don‚Äôt like about it is the chip selection isn‚Äôt always the same as what‚Äôs in the store, but that‚Äôs minor.

title: Love ordering online
review: Wish I cld place an order when their closed to be ready the next day‚Ä¶ or even in the morning to pick up half hour after they open - otherwise so easy‚Ä¶

title: Warning do not use
review:
Edit : if subway actually cared about their customers , the developer wouldn't copy and paste the same response to every single review pretending to care , experienced user here, please take those shady tactics elsewhere 

This app is terrible and has always been bad , I've ordered several times and had my order messed up, contacted corporate and never gotten the gift cards I was promised , now the app won't even let me login or make a new account , one of the times I was taken to a page that asked for my ssn, beware

title: Mobile ordering woes at Subway
review: I‚Äôve tried mobile ordering twice, and both times my order wasn‚Äôt ready when I showed up!  I even showed up a few minutes after my scheduled time!  In the latest incident, the staff didn‚Äôt make the sub.  they said the printout didn‚Äôt tell them if they should toast or not. I ordered it untoasted!  This app needs some type of notification built in, where the workers at the restaurant ‚Äúpush‚Äù a notification to the customer after they have completed making the sub!

title: Great when it works
review: I‚Äôve used this app twice and was excited because it saved my previous orders and the shop is downstairs from my apartment. Now the app won‚Äôt work, it lets me create an order and then says ‚Äúooops, something went wrong‚Äù every time I press the order button. This has been going on for 5 months. When I ask in the store they say they don‚Äôt like online orders anyway. Soooo, why have an app if it doesn‚Äôt work and the store could care less?

title: WORST STABILITY
review: I never thought I could find a worse app than Snapchat when it came to stability. It says no stores available in the entire US continent every time I try to order. What‚Äôs the point of having an app that makes it ‚Äúeasy and accessible‚Äù to order but I can‚Äôt even order. Obviously this is a glitch bc there‚Äôs subways everywhere but it‚Äôs such a crucial factor. I can‚Äôt even order. There‚Äôs no point in downloading this app. Every time I download I‚Äôm quickly reminded why I delete every time. Hit or miss with this one. Typically miss.

title: Never again
review:
I used this app to place and order, only to get to the restaurant and be told ‚Äúwe do not sell pizzas‚Äù. It has been a battle getting a refund. Everyone is putting that responsibility off on someone else. I‚Äôm now being told someone from the regional office will call me back within 48 hours. Although the payment was taken immediately, I may have to wait five days to get a refund. I will not use this app again. 
Why let me order something if the restaurant I choose doesn‚Äôt sell it?
Deleting my profile.
