title: 4 subs for Dinner
review: Place order on app before running around. Got there early to pick up subs, order was ready, we picked up and went without any problems!! All the subs were made right and delicious!!! Thank you to the 2 girls that were working tonight!! You Rock!!! üëçüòÅüëç

title: Payment Issues
review: I appreciate the app & its convenience, but there are many times when the payment option is rejected no matter which card I use. I run into this issue every time I order from the app, which is maybe twice a month or more. If that issue would be resolved, the app would be very useful.

title: App isn‚Äôt worth the errors
review:
Used the app 2 days in a row at the same store. First day they are all out of cokes which isn‚Äôt indicated on the app and they don‚Äôt read the note about cutting the sandwich in 3 pieces. 
I order the same thing the next day and this time they‚Äôre entirely out of bottle drinks. They again do not read the note about cutting it into 3 pieces and I don‚Äôt get the bacon I ordered on a CHICKEN BACON RANCH. $20 wasted, I‚Äôll go back to McDonald‚Äôs bc at least they won‚Äôt mess up on every single order I place

title: Cannot look at the menu after hours? Hurt my eyes too
review: If I try to look at my Very Favorite sandwiches, this app Cycles me back and forth between the location picker and the scan QR screen which AMBUSHES me with 100% brightness while I‚Äôm in bed, anticipating the morning when I can finally put the Danger-wish in my cart. Now I do have an answer for Russell Wilson‚Äôs question ‚Äúhave you ever done anything dangerous‚Äù; yeah I looked at the Subway app in the dark and now my eyes hurt! I have sub club tickets for Pete‚Äôs sake

title: Hit and miss
review: The app is great when it does what it‚Äôs supposed to do. Recently over the last four months the app crashes a lot, doesn‚Äôt load the rewards page or scan to pay. When I click rewards I get a message on screen that says this restaurant isn‚Äôt able to take mobile orders at the moment. Please select another restaurant. The doesn‚Äôt work more than half the time.

title: Chicken bacon ranch purchase
review: The sandwich was actually really really delicious except for the fact I do not like my bacon flip flimsy, I like a crispy. I did put it in my special request to microwave it crispy first. It was not Crispy at allüò¢ that was my only complaint otherwise it was very good! Next time I will double check before I leave the facility!!

title: Love Subway
review: We love your Subway but a little disappointed about new menu.  My husband has a very strict diet and love the subway vinaigrette.  Which you no longer carry.  The next closest item is very high in calories.   So disappointed.  Hope you don‚Äôt go by the way of other fast foods, and become unhealthy.

title: Convenient but shady
review: This is a great way to get you food ordered although it has been slow at times.  My main issue is that the rewards expire quickly.  Also the app should remind me that I have a reward to use.  Instead, it makes it difficult to even find how to use a reward.  Subway, you can do better.

title: If you change stores you have to start over.
review: Was potting in an order an hour before closing time and it kept booting out the order, when it finically gave me the reason I switched stores only to find my 10 sub order gone.  I then had to start order.  Then when I went to check out, this store didn‚Äôt except the promotion.  So then I had to start all over with a third store. By the end I just gave up and we went somewhere else.

title: Ok app but needs work for issues placing orders twice
review: I downloaded this app for the convenience of ordering and pick up , so on my first app order apparently the app submitted my order twice , thanks to the subway I ordered from called me to verified if not they would‚Äôve charged me for two orders instead of one.

title: App Menu and Store Menu Don‚Äôt Match
review: I ordered off the app. I put my order in at 12pm. By 1230 it‚Äôs not ready for pick up. So I wait in a longggg line just to be told one of the items I ordered is not available anymore and has completely changed. Why did this not come up as an alert when I chose my pick up location on the app?? 45 min of wasted time for me. No lunch and no time left of my lunch hour to get food anywhere else. Went back to work hungry and irritated.

title: Subway dinner
review: This Subway app was very easy to work through. I‚Äôm so glad we don‚Äôt have to go in during these challenging times. I was able to use Apple Pay so we can go and have them bring it out to our car. All done, EASY.

title: It works, but not well enough
review: The one thing the app is missing that really irks me is the option to just build a sandwich. I want to use rotisserie chicken; that I know is available, but because all I can do is edit prebuilts, I cannot order this meat. I feel this would be a simple enough feature to add, and the app doesn‚Äôt do what I need it to without it.

title: Better
review: I‚Äôm changing my review from 1 to 4 stars because with this updated version of the app, they made it much more clear which card is going to be charged and when it‚Äôs going to be charged (for those people who like to edit their orders before checking out).

title: Subway app
review: I love the app; I just wish it had the deals and the regular menu on the same page. That was the only problem that I had. I don‚Äôt order very often, but this had changed since the last time I did. Really looking forward to dinner for tonight and tomorrow.

title: Clunky
review:
This app is very clunky, especially when compared to other food apps that are very smooth, like Starbucks. 

It should be much easier to see what the Deal of the Day is and order that, as well as apply orders from previous stores to new locations. If I ordered a Ham & Cheese in New York City and want to order it again in Newark, it shouldn‚Äôt default me back to NYC. 

Clunky.

title: Nope!
review: You can‚Äôt order food unless you have an account I have an account but it won‚Äôt let me login I put in forgot password and it says bad request. So I try to sign up with a different email than it says oops try again not worth it to frustrating just go through the doorDash app or to the restaurant itself. Also when you call the help number it tells you to go online to the contact us section this app is garbage and I wish I could rate it zero stars.

title: Frustrating
review: Once you have started ordering, you cannot back out to check deals and specials without losing the order(s) you have already added to your cart. Once items are in your cart, you should be able to return to the home screen without losing progress. Very frustrating Subway.

title: Works okay
review: Kind of buggy at times. Sometimes I‚Äôll pay for an order and it‚Äôll not go through the 1st time. I‚Äôll try again and it‚Äôll go through but I‚Äôll get a call from the restaurant I ordered from telling me I ordered the same sandwich twice. Needs work. But it works 90% of the time.

title: Like the app but website is not working to place order today
review: Can Subway please create an option to duplicate order from recent orders by giving date orders were placed. It will help with large orders and save time. Thank you

title: Not updated menu
review: Not able to order other stuff on the menus like soups etc through app the app should be updated to be able to order everything the store offers...

title: Very helpful
review: This was my first time to use the app and the girl was very understanding and patient with me. I had ordered but not actually sent the order in.  Elizabeth was very kind and understanding   This subway is very close to our house and we will order many more times now that I know how to do it.

title: Subway you need to fix your app
review: I saw that 2 years ago you had problems with your app! It‚Äôs now 2020 and it STILL DOESN'T WORK! I have been able to use it all the way thru maybe 3-4 times. But, for the last few weeks or months, can‚Äôt remember it‚Äôs been so long since it has worked. Each time I try to order it says, ‚ÄúOops, I can‚Äôt find your store right now.‚Äù Then I try to logout and log in again it says Access denied.  I deleted the App and started over. Nope!   Subway! Get this app fixed or I‚Äôm going to Jimmie Johns!!!

title: Really subway
review: Trying to order your special but have to build 2 sandwiches to see not available at this location changed location 3 times and you make me build the same sandwiches each time to find it‚Äôs not available. Why do you have the specials and why do I need to reorder my whole thing every time? Deleted due to you‚Äôre making it to hard to give you my money, that‚Äôs all I wanted to do was support your business. Bye Felicia

title: Fun and interactive sub appüëå
review: I was surprised how well put together this app is. Pretty neat pick your sub and go down the line and add whatever toppings and extras you want, just like at the actual subway store! It matches you up to your nearest location or you can pick you own and bam it‚Äôs done ‚úÖ your sub will be ready shortly üòä

title: Favorited Don‚Äôt Work Right
review: When I save a sandwich as a favorite it doesnt save the toppings and customizations.  I learned this the hard way when I went to order and added my favorited to the cart and didn‚Äôt double check everything.  I got sandwiches with meat only.  The favorites really should save all the toppings and customizations otherwise it doesnt save time versus going to the menu and customizing each time.

title: Order wrong every time
review: This is the second time I have ordered from this app and both times my food has been completely wrong! And it is pretty much impossible to get a refund! Never again !

title: Easy way to go
review: The app has everything to make the perfect order. You are able to add and subtract any item and the ability to design your specific sandwiches. Use the app all the time so upon arrival you can just pickup and go.

title: THIEF
review: I was robbed. App constantly crashing while trying to place order & I was charged for multiple subs. As I entered the store the employees were already aware of the clear mistake & I was told to call a number to report what happened.... I was never presented a phone number to call & I still don‚Äôt know who to call. Why don‚Äôt hey have that information in the store? I downloaded the app for convenience & the temporary deal that was going on at the time. If I‚Äôm not there to watch them make it, sandwich is always wrong. Now I‚Äôm being robbed!!

title: Misleading words / icons
review:
Placed an order with multiple sandwiches, several that I would have expected would have come ‚Äútoasted‚Äù or hot by default. When you click to customize and are on the bread selection, there is a small flame icon which has a caption that says ‚Äútoasted‚Äù. If you haven‚Äôt used the app and don‚Äôt touch the flame icon, you would assume that it meant the sandwich was to be toasted. 

You would be wrong. 

The caption stays the same, indicating ‚Äútoasted‚Äù whether the flame is grey (not toasted) or red (toasted). This lesson has to be learned by picking up cold sandwiches for the family. 

Perhaps your programming brain trust could make the words change along with the flame color. 

That would have been easy and smart to do. Why would you need a reviewer to call it out?

title: Glitchy and website is no help
review: App could be great but is very clunky and could use some improvements.  If the price on the app is not the same as in the store you chose, your order just gets cancelled and then they don‚Äôt tell you so your standing in the store with no order.  Also you can‚Äôt add receipt information on the app to add your rewards and when you go to the website it doesn‚Äôt work.  Overall ok app but needs some fine tuning.

title: Visual Sandwich Building!
review: The graphical interface is amazing. It makes it fun to build a sandwich. We use it for our whole team. We pass around the phone and everyone builds their own. No writing down 5 different orders. And the. The sandwiches are numbered and labelled so they‚Äôre easy to distribute. Seamless experience. Way to go Subway!

title: Location changes are annoying
review: I would give it five stars except that if I need to change the location of my order it empties everything out of my shopping bag. It should be easier to change locations for an order if you realize you‚Äôll be closer to a different location.
developerResponse: {'id': 11560154, 'body': "We appreciate you sharing your feedback, and are always looking for ways to enhance the mobile app experience for our guests. You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2019-10-30T16:54:52Z'}

title: No option for coupons!
review: Would be nice if you could use coupons for the app or even get a warning before they deduct the cost from your linked payment method.  Why you automatically deduct the cost of the sub when I scan my card before checking out in store.  I thought I was just scanning to add points,  but turns out I completed the purchase using my default payment method and wasn‚Äôt able to use the coupon I brought.

You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.", 'modified': '2019-10-09T15:11:36Z'}

title: Bad app
review: I just tried to create an account so I could place an order. I had all sorts of problems from creating a password and then problems with the email address saying already in use, which is impossible. Wanted the convenience but this isn‚Äôt at all.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!\r\n", 'modified': '2019-07-31T20:22:08Z'}

title: Great online not so great in the store
review: The app Works very well online slight issue with being able to apply rewards (says it will be added at check out but is not). In store a different story as many times the employees don‚Äôt know how to redeem the amount on a gift card stored on the app
developerResponse: {'id': 7298435, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-02-14T14:25:08Z'}

title: APPLE PAY and  in-app gift card reload..
review: WHERE IS APPLE PAY SUPPORT??! Also, Can you please allow gift card reloading **WITH-IN** the app?! Maybe Apple Pay or PayPal, but please, stop redirecting me to the website and forcing me to sign in again and to input my card info every time I try to reload. It‚Äôs so exhausting, I dread every time I have to do it. Why?? Apple Pay and PayPal are so convenient and it‚Äôs so easy to to use, as opposed to inputting card info every time.
developerResponse: {'id': 9270549, 'body': "We're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. Thank You!", 'modified': '2019-06-21T13:13:12Z'}

title: Simple and gets the job done
review: I am a fan of the points system through the app and can get $2 discounts fairly often which is great. I do wish there was a way to redeem your points if you order in store and forget to scan. Overall I am a fan of the app and it‚Äôs simply and clean and I have had no issues with it.

title: Handy but ultimately useless
review: This app has the worst distance tracking I‚Äôve ever interacted with. It thought that 1.12 miles were closer to 0.8 and there‚Äôs no way to change it after paying. The usage on the iPhone XR is the worst as every button to get out of the current menu hugs the border of the phone, especially when you‚Äôre in maps and it‚Äôs painful to use. Great if you order subway 3 out of the 7 days and are in a rush but painful with infrequent usage
developerResponse: {'id': 8118287, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! title: Upset with the upgrade
review: I use the subway app a lot because as a busy mom to two very active kids that are heavily involved in school activities and soccer and dance I would order Subway on our way way home so we aren‚Äôt going through a drive through and are able to eat a somewhat healthy meal. Since the upgrade they took away kids meals as an option to order. I really don‚Äôt understand this and this will definitely cut back on how much we eat there. Please consider adding the kids meal option back!
developerResponse: {'id': 7679192, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-03-11T21:06:35Z'}

title: Online pick up food was cold
review: So I order my food at 12:10 and pick up was at 12:30 right. So I know that once they get an order make it right away. I asked for my sandwich to be toasted. So when I get there at 12:33 my food is ready, however, it‚Äôs not hot or warm it‚Äôs cold. It‚Äôs like they toasted and it got cold after they toasted it. So when i get home it‚Äôs about 12:40 and I am eating it and it‚Äôs cold, the cheese is melted but it‚Äôs not hot or warm. They did not wrap aluminum foil around it to keep it warm. And on top of that my wrapper was open. So I am eating my sandwich and it‚Äôs cold.

Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-02-14T16:18:34Z'}

title: Great App!
review: I love this application.  I only have two issues.  I wish you could scan receipts after the fact for points and split payments.  Example if you have a gift card but don‚Äôt have enough apply it to the order and take the rest off the card.

title: Love it!
review: This app makes ordering from Subway so convenient. Being able to walk in and pickup my order without having to wait is so refreshing. Plus the rewards system is an added bonus. I highly recommend for anyone who frequently eats at Subway.

title: Frustrating
review:
I‚Äôve had to remove and reinstall this app 4 times now. It keeps getting stuck at checkout. Either with a reward that doesn‚Äôt exist, that cannot be removed, or just coming up with a blank pop up whenever I try to finish checking out.
I look forward to this app not being as buggy as it is on account of being a huge subway fan.

title: It‚Äôs ight
review: This app is cool and all but you should be able to start off with a blank space and customize it any way you want. I have a pretty specific order and i‚Äôm picky so i don‚Äôt want certain things that come on sandwiches that are previously thought up of. So yeah if you could make an option to start off blank that would be cool.

title: The Subway App is awesome!
review: Once you figure out that you can swipe right to take stuff off a sandwich this app does exactly what you'd want it to do.  Order your sandwich in advance and have it ready to go.  I love the guys at Subway.  Now we just say Howdy! without me going through line and waiting to pay. Win, win, win.

title: East to use once you get in
review: The access/password set-up was a pain but otherwise easy to use. I accidentally built a footlong instead of a 6 inch. I didn‚Äôt see a way to change it without going out and back in which meant rebuilding my sandwich. Might be a food idea to add a feature to change the length while in the sandwich building stage.

title: Update the app
review: This app needs to be updated. I can no longer put flat bread on my sandwich because it will not show up on the screen, and the employees don‚Äôt ‚Äúreceive the information on what bread.‚Äù Also, I tried to use the app today and it would not let me order my food. I tried deleting it and redownloading it and it will not make a processed order. Please update this because this is very convenient for me so that I don‚Äôt have to wait in line on my break!
developerResponse: {'id': 2446527, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (800)-888-4848, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-01-30T14:54:23Z'}

title: Gripes and grumbles
review:
Why can‚Äôt I make my sandwich how I want and then save it as a fav? Looks like I have to actually make a purchase before that can happen? 
Why am I getting an up charge for fresh Mozzarella if I custom build a sandwich that it comes on anyway? 
Why can‚Äôt I San my receipt and still get rewards?
Love Subway!! Love the new sandwiches, 3 stars for the app though. Change my mind‚Ä¶

title: Idaho Springs- THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE
review:
I live about an hour away from Idaho Springs and thought while I went to Safeway, I would stop at the nearby Subway.  This will be my first and last time. The rep was rude, snapped my head off when I explained it was my first time using the app and refused to let me see my purchases prior to leaving the shop. 
Got home and my sandwich (sweet onion chicken teriyaki foot long) had 3 small pieces of chicken on it. What a waste of gas and money!! I have pics of the sandwich and plan to send them to corporate.

title: Food not ready
review: I place an order thur the app and arrived in time to see that my order was not right.  There was no other customers in the store.  While the employe was correcting my order. Two more customers came in and left before my order was finish.   This is the reason why I had place my order thru the app with what I wanted on my order.

title: Easy to use
review: I‚Äôve use this app a couple times. It is very easy to use and the bonus is you get to use your coupons also. Many other restaurant apps you‚Äôre not allowed to use your coupon. Good job! Well done!

title: Another waste of time
review:
An app either always works or it doesnt work. it cant be sometimes and it cant be both. it apple needs to smog check PASS or FAIL each application before it becomes available because I am tired of wasting my time with these stupid applications. App has me waste time trying to order than it tells me

 ‚Äúan error has occurred please try again‚Äù 

guess what? you are stuck in an infinite loop when this happens you literally cant do anything but continue attempting to try again endlessly until you die. 

you know what always works? My landline telephone, my sprint phone from 2002 that had no applications and the best reception. I hate technology that is ultimately useless.

title: Buggy app, expensive sandwiches
review: Supposedly there was a ‚Äúrefresh‚Äù of the menu but I can‚Äôt really figure out what has changed other than prices going up astronomically for more or less the same thing. Just go to Jimmy Johns- their app works well and you don‚Äôt get a bunch of restaurant locations that don‚Äôt accept advertised deals. And it is cheaper and tastes better to boot! Subway better get a corporate management makeover before the chain goes the way of Howard Johnson‚Äôs. Unbelievable

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review: This app is completely worthless. It always glitches and almost everything I try to click on just pops up an error screen. Can‚Äôt order from the app. Can‚Äôt look at sandwiches on the app. I have these points I‚Äôll never use or get to accumulate any more because none of it works. The ads for your deals pop up just fine but how exactly would you like me to take advantage of said deals if you stupid app doesn‚Äôt work?

title: Just doesn‚Äôt work right
review: This has to be in my top 3 most buggy iPhone apps ever, constantly having my cart empty itself, not being able to check out, payments not going through, and between all those things, tons of long loading icons, I always expect to use at least 30min- 1hr on this app because it just straight up doesn‚Äôt work. It‚Äôs so frustrating, and hasn‚Äôt gotten any better with the last couple of updates. GET A BETTER APP.

title: Recent online order
review: Placed an order tonight for two subs for my wife and myself and was very disappointed. First when I got to restaurant to pick up order I had to wait because they had not even begun to prepare my order. When I get home my wife‚Äôs sub had been toasted, but was not supposed to be. Mine wasn‚Äôt toasted but should have been. I ordered steak and cheese for her and there was very little steak. Don‚Äôt understand, we usually get great service from this location.

title: Needs Improvement
review: The overall app is great. It does have issues though. The app is extremely slow, regardless of internet connection. The app repeatedly freezes and crashes, slowing it down even further. It can be extremely frustrating ordering multiple sandwiches for a family.

title: Why do you send me deals that the app doesn‚Äôt recognize?
review: Every other day I get these deals in my email and then if I try to order from my app, I get these Default error.  I can‚Äôt even use these marketing deals, why should I bother keep getting the useless marketing campaigns when the promo doesn‚Äôt even linked to the app or the account?  It‚Äôs terrible, that‚Äôs why you‚Äôre losing customers.

title: Convenient when the App works right
review:
I use this app often.  Sometimes it doesn‚Äôt process to checkout. It‚Äôs just easier to continue shopping and go to cart for checkout.  
Very frustrating when all subway restaurants will not use bogo half, Woodbury is the worst for that.

title: Do not download this app it scammed me out of $30
review: Today I ordered two sandwiches from the app with Apple Pay  and the  app said the order failed but then charged my card for amount of the food. Then I called the store to see if my order was received and they said it was not. I asked what to do and they said they did not know. I then emailed customer service and they have not replied. Overall, do not use this app and if you want subway delivered then use a third party app like Uber eats.

title: Frustratingly Terrible
review: Bug ridden and clunky, I literally cannot complete an order. It tells me my cart is empty every time I try to check out. It‚Äôs laughably pathetic that the one thing they should know how to make work would be collecting money from their customers. Tried three different times and it never worked. Deleting the app and going to go eat somewhere else. Subway you guys are really dumb to put an app out like this in this day and age. You should be embarrassed.

title: This app and the glitches!!
review: It should not have taken me an hour just to place this online order. So many glitches! I had to delete the app 2 times and reinstall to get it to finally work!

title: Worst food ordering app
review:
Who please is giving this a 4.8 star review?

The pain starts when selecting a restaurant, instead of showing all in the map, they don‚Äôt pop up until you manually add an address which is a pain.
But also, when you see restaurants on the map (after you typed in your zip) you still can‚Äôt select from the map but have a list. Sorry, I don‚Äôt know all the street names around me, i have to click through this list and hopefully my second third or fourth pick is the restaurant near me.

I have run into troubles where I started an order, wanted to change the restaurant and boom! Gotta start the order all over again.

User experience is extremely bad, I really dislike using the app. Make it as easy as chipotles app please.

title: Subway App
review: All in all the app is really good.  The only thing that I find wrong is it doesn‚Äôt list everything.  For example it doesn‚Äôt list all the sauces that are available.  If there isn‚Äôt room why not put an other button for someone to add the sauce they would like.  I don‚Äôt remember if it listed all the drinks or chips offered either.

title: Awesome but
review: Love everything about this app, it‚Äôs super simple and it‚Äôs a very convenient way to get your food fast and accurate. Only issue I have is you can not order the larger fountain and/or tea options. The drink option is the only reason I gave 4 starts, other than that this is a 5 star app.

title: Misleading
review: ‚ÄúContinue as a guest‚Äù is an option until you actually try to order food and then they try and force you to create an account and give away details to order a sandwich... no thanks

title: App was great until they updated it
review:
Since the app update, it doesn‚Äôt work at all!  After several attempts including uninstalling and reinstalling it, I gave up and went to the website to order (heads up:  the website doesn‚Äôt work half the time either).  

Things were working just fine before the update, so why did Subway go try to fix something that wasn‚Äôt broken and instead make it unusable?!?  Bad idea, Subway, bad idea‚Ä¶

title: Price issue
review: I‚Äôve always ordered Subway when it was convenient for me. The checkout price was always on point. But lately when I try to place an order through the app my total price for everything suddenly jumps to $150 for just 3 items. Fix this!

title: Great when it works but usually does not
review: I have used this app off and on every day now for some time.  However can‚Äôt get it to work for the last week.  Even online does not work in my area because it shows ALL the subways are closed due to a holiday?  Which I assume did not get changed from the 4th.  Guess someone simply is not doing their job.  But when the app is working it is great but most times it is glitchy and simply gives errors.

title: Good luck actually getting your order
review: I‚Äôve used the subway app several times to get pick up and delivery and every time I‚Äôve used it, the restaurant hasn‚Äôt gotten the mobile order. They say they can‚Äôt help me and can‚Äôt make my order. That I have to take it up with the app and deal with it online. However, there is no way to deal with it online. No cancellation button, no help menu, no nothing. So basically my orders have gone no where. DO NOT USE THE APP. ITS ALMOST LIKE THE RESTAURANT AND ONLINE ORDERS DONT WORK TOGETHER

title: Easy grub!!
review: I just used the app for the first time and found extremely easy to make the sammiches the way we wanted them even with a couple deletions and additions to customize! And yes, I know how to spell sandwiches, it‚Äôs just the way my daughter always said it! Lol

title: Doesn‚Äôt work right
review: Placed an order through the mobile app and paid with Apple Pay , said order was placed and to go pick up, when I asked for my order they said they didn‚Äôt receive no orders, I even showed where I was charged and they said to refresh the page and it still didn‚Äôt show my order and said it was the app and they said themselves that it happens often with the app! Never using this app again..so disappointed

title: Great App
review: App can be sluggish at times but for the most part it does great, crew doesn‚Äôt get the order wrong and are quick‚Ä¶ I can‚Äôt seem my review to actually see what I‚Äôm typing but that could be my fault using apple beta software and beta apps

title: App is simple and easy to use
review: I work out in the field, constantly driving and moving around. The Subway app makes it easy to place an order quickly, and makes customizing it easy.

title: Do you test this stuff
review: If you click on you new ballers special you can not see the back arrow because it is black and so is the background. Instead of payment no millions to have them in your commercials bring back 5 dollar Friday and some of you other great deals

title: Repeat customer
review: My husband and I usually go to our subway 3-4 times a week as he doesn‚Äôt have many places he can go. Unfortunately they rarely have coupons that you can use in the store. Seems like they want you to only order by the app. Does not seem fair for regulars to get a deal. I did try using the app once. Very confusing and even the employees said it does not work half the time.

title: Frustrating!
review: I used a deal to buy one footling, get one free with purchase of drink and chips. I bought all those things but it didn‚Äôt give me one free. Even worse, it put chips and drink on both foot longs. When I mentioned it at the counter, all they could do was refund $4 or a $7.19 foot long. So frustrating!! I know that the cashier couldn‚Äôt help it and did all they could. It kind of felt like bait and switch though because I wouldn‚Äôt have ordered two without the deal.

title: Updated app is horrible!
review: It worked fine through the ordering process, but once I got to payment, it wouldn‚Äôt let me apply my gift card.   I kept getting the message that I needed to reload my gift card or pick another payment option even though it was reloaded for more than enough to pay for the order and was linked to the account!  Please work on the payment processing and enough with the work on the flashy ordering.

title: Update?
review: An update (according to the app) was needed to ‚Äúprovide the best experience‚Äù. After a few seconds and no update on the App Store to speak of I tried to order something only to find I‚Äôd been signed out. Trying to continue as a guest brings up an impassable ad for the subway rewards program, which gives a ‚Äúbad request‚Äù error when you try the ‚ÄúForgot password‚Äù link after tapping ‚ÄúSign in‚Äù or ‚ÄúSign up‚Äù. So if I want to continue I‚Äôd have to make a new account.

title: Food pickup
review: I‚Äôm really impressed with the food pickup process.  I‚Äôve used the app twice now.  Both times, the employees seemed to drop everything to get me my food quickly.  It definitely is the way to go.  I will never go to Subway without first ordering on the app.   Well done Subway team!

title: Good concept, bad quality
review:
The concept is nice and a relatively good UI but it just charged me and failed.

The store never got the order.  The app reports an error now when trying to view past orders.  The credit card shows the charge (Apple Card, so easy to see and track)

Plus, the coupon with the QRCode did not work in the app.  Very disappointed and will not use that again.  A web site may be better.  The app is definitely not worth downloading.

title: App account hacked!
review:
Apparently, this is not a safe and secure app. 
I would strongly discourage using this app at this time.  
We live in kentucky and just realized tonight when we went to create an order, that our app and credit card attached to the app was used to make three separate orders in three different New Jersey cities in December. Obviously, I changed my password and removed my credit card info immediately. I hope this issue is fixed before anyone else is hacked.

title: Very convenient
review: I sat out in the parking lot and placed my order. The interface is very user friendly. It has pictures so you know you can‚Äôt go wrong. I‚Äôve used it several times and it hasn‚Äôt let me down yet. The best part is it has all of the discounts built in.

title: Bad software. Charges not authorized
review: Attempted to order but the software indicated there was a problem and to clear the cart and reorder. I did that a couple of times and got the same message. Finally, I gave up and ordered elsewhere. Then I received multiple emails telling me that all the orders were processed. I contacted the store and Subway headquarters. I reported the software error and asked for a refund. The response was simply ‚Äúsorry, no refund‚Äù. I have been loyal to Subway for years and will no longer be a customer due to this situation.

title: Love!!
review: This app is wonderful for the work day. I can place my order and run over and pick it up without waiting in long lines. The only thing I would like to see changed is being able to chose and 20 oz drink or a 30 oz. other than that minor detail this app is amazing!!

title: Good app, easy to navigate but only one adjustment is needed.
review: This is easy and quick to follow with visuals. Only adjustment that should be made is the ability to change store once you have created your sandwich selection. I had to clear it all out and start over once I decided to pick a different store location.

title: Horrible app
review: It took us 35 minutes to order through the app.  We only used this app because you had to use it do receive the footlong sale.  I also could not order from the location nearest to my home because it would not allow me to order a breakfast sandwich from that location which I always do in person even at lunchtime.  Likely next time I‚Äôll eat Penn Station East Coast Subs.  The food there is more expensive but with much less aggravation.

title: Terrible app for using specials
review: I downloaded this app to use for a vacation and it was so hard to find a Subway that accepted the specials. Every time we tried to use the app on our vacation, the location would tell us they weren‚Äôt accepting the specials or they didn‚Äôt accept orders from the app at that time. The app is ease to use but each location needs to be required to accept the deals advertised.

title: Slow To Respond
review: I love the great deals you can get in this app. However many functions are not working well on my iPhone 7 plus.  Have to redo it repeatedly.  Hopefully Subway fixes the errors because it does not make me fond of using the app. Took over 10 minutes to get it to work this time.  Turning on and off my phone.

title: Regular App user
review: The App allows me to jump ahead of the long lunch line.  The order has always been correct. The only difficulty with the App is reordering past orders.  There seems to be an option to do so, but I have not been to reorder using the App.  The directions are unclear or not working.

title: Can‚Äôt find kids menu
review: Can‚Äôt seem to find where the kid menu options are. Maybe with a little more navigation I‚Äôll be able to figure out where it is but my opinion it should be right on the menu with the other options.

title: After a long absence...
review:
...I have returned to Subway Restaurants.  The chain must be experiencing poor profit margins.  The My Rewards program is terrible. Net savings is 2% off $59.  Mot an effective program to create repeat customers.   They should look at the Starbucks app if they really care about providing incentives to returning customers.  I‚Äôll eat at the restaurants occasionally if it is convenient to stop.  Will not go out of my way as I often do for Starbucks.

Bring back the old stamp cards.

And, the app can be annoying.  Crashes often.
developerResponse: {'id': 7679097, 'body': 'That‚Äôs definitely frustrating. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com and we can help. We appreciate you writing in and look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-03-11T20:55:47Z'}

title: Love Subway ‚ù§Ô∏è
review: Love this app! It allows me to order my families meals to go without waiting in a long line or creating a long line with our ridiculous requests. You can customize your subs just the way you like it! And since it‚Äôs already paid for, you just pick it up and walk out!

title: Fantastic AP but..
review:
It has glitches where you have to delete and reinstall - or they make changes and it stops working- too often. 

Fortunately, when you do have to delete and reinstall, it remembers all your data via your subway account.

Fantastic when it does work, which to be fair, is most of the time.

title: Cool interface but a bad flaw
review: Many online ordering apps require layers of screens before you fully confirm and place your order, If you have an account and everything set up the button on the bottom is ‚Äúplace order‚Äù, So for those who are used to having to push a bunch of buttons that could be a mistake

title: Great time saver
review: I walk in and I walk out. No line for me. I hate lines. So this app is great. Just like other kiosk type apps you order and they have a 15 minute time period to make the order. If your the subway next to you hasn‚Äôt done this before may take a time or two but they catch on. Great app.

title: Wasted my time
review: Choosing a subway store in a particular area, not just where you are located, was problematic. Building a sub was relatively easy and well done. However, I received only error messages when trying to actually place the order. 20 minutes. No subs. Fail.
developerResponse: {'id': 1097533, 'body': 'Hi- we are sorry to hear that your experience has been less than excellent. Have you attempted to log out and back in? Are you operating the most recent update for our mobile app? If so, and the problem continues, would you mind reaching out to us at appfeedback@subway.com so we can take a closer look at this for you? Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-08-24T18:16:35Z'}

title: Time Saver
review:
Reordering the same thing you had on a previous order is a huge time saver.  I push the button before I get in the car, drive the 5 minutes to my Subway and it's usually ready when I get there.

I would be nice if I could save a favorite sandwich so I could quickly order it when I visit a new location.

title: What is the point?!?
review: This app only allows you to see store hours and order online.  There is no menu to look at, no nutritional information, no rewards of any kind.  You can literally open it up, choose to order or see store locations. The fact that the app is so bad makes me want to go to Quiznos haha.  Oh also the main screen has like 4 pre ordered meals on it and you can‚Äôt get rid of them either.  You can swipe through them or order them.  What is the point, I love my sandwich but the app is embarrassing
developerResponse: {'id': 1677048, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience - we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-11-06T15:48:27Z'}

title: Only good for minimal items.
review:
A family of 5 can not order 5 sandwiches.  Add on drinks or chips and it is reduced even further.  That isn‚Äôt very helpful.

I have to wait wither way, so what does it matter if I wait and watch while telling them what to do or I wait while they make it following a list?

Keeping track of 5 peoples (3 kids) orders can be challenging.  The app allows me to keep everyone‚Äôs favorite ingredients in order. But it‚Äôs nit very helpful if I can‚Äôt actually place the order. 

Get it together subway.  Get it together.

title: buggy and slow
review:
the app itself is slow no matter my internet connection. it kept telling me there was an issue with my bag and my there was an unexpected problem regarding my cart/bag.
it logged me out so i tried to log back in but it told me it didn‚Äôt recognize my email, so i tried to make a new account with the same email it just told me didn‚Äôt exist, and it told me ‚Äúsorry, an account using this email already exists, please try again‚Äù WHAT

title: Can‚Äôt change drink size.
review: The app is slow but convenient. I‚Äôm very disappointed that you can‚Äôt change the meal deal to a large drink. We paid at the store to make it a large and it cost $6 for two drink!!! Not right when we had already paid for a drink. It shouldn‚Äôt cost that much to upgrade. I wish I could do it in the app!

title: Will not work
review: I can‚Äôt put in an order, because it constantly gives error messages when I tap on any sandwich. So I can‚Äôt use any deals that I have access too, because even when shown the problem within the app, the store can‚Äôt honor any of the deals because ‚Äúthat‚Äôs an app‚Äù issue. This is a frustrating part of things, because it keeps me from ordering from Subway as often as I would like to for my family.

title: Map needs improvement.
review: When searching on the map for a location please add the ability to move and search as I love or at least have a button that says search in this area. I don‚Äôt always know the address or zip of the area I‚Äôm headed to. Also the name and email fields why can‚Äôt they auto added with the info from my phone like pretty much all the other food apps.

title: Annoying
review: App works great until you go to check out. If you have a gift card balance that is lower than the total there isn‚Äôt an option to pay the difference with a debit/credit card. It‚Äôs a bit annoying that I can‚Äôt use a gift card until it is the exact cost or higher.

title: I love this app !!!
review: It easily allows me to order our food using coupons and gift cards my favorite subway is less than three minutes away from my home! I always know when it‚Äôs ready

title: First time using App
review: This app is very useful, I am stuck in the house today and was very excited to see you can get subway delivery through the app. The App is very easy to set up and navigate definitely will be using again.

title: Worst App Ever
review: Do y‚Äôall even want us to order food from this app?  If so, then maybe make is possible to ACTUALLY place an order!  This is ridiculous. So many errors, deleting sandwiches, crashing, ‚Äúempty cart‚Äù when I just took 20 mins to gather and input the 10 sandwich for my whole office‚Ä¶not worth it.  Jersey Mikes is just a bit further away, going to have to get our subs from there I guess, seeing as their app actually allows you to order the food they offer.

title: Do not order delivery!
review: I ordered delivery and door dash never received the info.  The subway restaurant made my food and it just sat there for hours and spoiled.  Door dash had mo record of the order and so no delivery driver was sent.  They told me to call the subway help line but there is no longer any customer service at subway nationally.  There is no one to call if the app has an issue and doesn‚Äôt communicate to the delivery company.  There‚Äôs no way to request a refund if your order never arrives.

title: Literally have never been able to use it when walking in
review: The app is so inconvenient when you are just trying to walk in and order. It always signs me out and never allows me to log in. It also doesn‚Äôt help that it is so slow! I‚Äôve had to pay full price when I could‚Äôve used my coupons and it‚Äôs just so irritating because it happens way too often where I‚Äôm also just trying to accumulate points. So unfortunate

title: Easy! I love the new updates app.
review: Super easy to find menu items and customize each sandwiches. I love the favorites option. Each one of my family members can have their favorites saved. Makes ordering so easy!

title: Can‚Äôt save user info
review: The name change requires a phone number on the account and the phone number change requires a name on the account. My account got set up with neither, so I can‚Äôt edit them at all. They‚Äôre on separate pages so, why are they not separate form validations/submissions? Also, there needs to be a way that a store can mark items that are unavailable in the app so you don‚Äôt end up prepaying for something that is not available.

title: FIX YOUR APP SUBWAY!!!
review:
I updated my app a few weeks ago and since then it has not worked properly. I go through & make my selection of ingredients that I want added, get all the way to the end to make my purchase & I receive an error message‚Ä¶.

I have painstakingly tried several days & several attempts each time & nothing. It‚Äôs way easier I feel to preorder, so please correct this error. Deleting app‚Ä¶hopefully the problem will be corrected soon.
developerResponse: {'id': 24218944, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you have encountered these issues, and we would like to investigate further. We encourage you to visit https://www.subway.com/en-US/ContactUs/GuestCare to provide additional details about your experience.', 'modified': '2021-07-30T12:25:53Z'}

title: Easy and accurate
review: This App makes ordering simple.  It is very easy to pick and choose toppings, what type of bread and even if you want the bread toasted.  Using this app seems to ensure that my order is filled to my liking.  Way to go subway!!!!

title: Recent changes to app blow.
review: Try and make yourself a turkey, ham, & bacon sandwich with pepper jack cheese on the app. Can anyone do it? My favorite saved sandwiches are ‚Äúnot available‚Äù anymore and they cannot be recreated in the app. Fix it ASAP! You already made the meat smaller and smaller and given customers way less for 20+ years. Probably has more fillers than meat now too. I should file a lawsuit like the no tuna - tuna lawsuit. I‚Äôll have to check out other sub shops who aren‚Äôt getting greedier and greedier. ü§¨

title: Chips
review: You need to have all your chips options because we decided not to get a meal from y‚Äôall because you didn‚Äôt have all your chips so we are buying them from a gas station! And drinks!

title: Very convenient,but...
review: I like the Subway app, I just wish that all of the sandwiches and daily specials were available in the app. My local subway has several sandwiches available that I can‚Äôt choose from in the app, and also daily meal specials that are not listed in the app. The app does make it very convenient since I only get a 30 minute lunch break.

title: Predictable
review: I say predictable with a lot of praise. I come here a lot because I know I‚Äôll get exactly what I ordered and with a smile ... they also humor my 12- year old and his funny requests to chop the onion a little bit more and add JUST the right amount of sauce -and even that is with a smile

title: Not an Option
review: Not all options that are offered in the store are present on the app. Salt and oregano are the two I noticed, but there may be others. I needed a special instruction to add this two ingredients. Other than that, the app works great and allows for quick and easy-to-use ordering.

title: Frustrating. Needs lots of work!
review: It‚Äôs easy to find a store on here but that‚Äôs the only positive thing about this app. You can‚Äôt customize sandwiches. It will let you choose a meat for a sandwich but it won‚Äôt let you add other vegetables/toppings unless it‚Äôs on their picture. You can remove any that you don‚Äôt want, but you can‚Äôt add. Same with sauces. So basically I can order a steak and cheese sandwich but I can‚Äôt choose what cheese, veggies, or sauce I want. Not user friendly and a frustrating.

title: Easy Quick
review: If only employees where as good as the app I‚Äôd give 5 . Also because they don‚Äôt have all options as store or updated availability on items on store . I don‚Äôt want to order something not available .

title: Might as well wait in line.
review: You can wait at least an hour for your sub, regardless of when you order...they don‚Äôt even begin the sub until there‚Äôs no line in the shop.   So NO ADVANTAGE to the app...I had given it a 5* but not now....can‚Äôt even get a refund for an excessive wait...

title: Surprisingly Awesome
review: This app is relatively dummy proof and incredibly user friendly. I don‚Äôt often order with online apps, and many restaurant apps are serviceable but not great when trying to accomplish tasks such as looking at a menu. All your app requires is swipes and clicks. Whoever is responsible for it, did a very nice job on the design.

title: The location in Beaty is terrible
review:
They don‚Äôt have all the meats or Veggies The 2 guys in there are very rude You tell them what you want they put as much or as little as they wants You ask them to cut the sandwich in 3 as we were driving and wanted a little at a time our sandwiches were cut in 2!And why are they 3.00 more than in Vegas I now take the time go to Denny‚Äôs across the lot and get a full meal for less and I don‚Äôt have to feel like I bothered someone 
I love Subways but we will never go to Subway in Beaty
Save yourself Do Not go there

title: Great when it works
review: Great when it works!  Went for about a month where it wouldn‚Äôt let me order.  Looks like a solution was found.  Thanks for that!  Would enjoy a little more variety as some extras are limited.  Otherwise,  appreciate the ability to order online and limit time standing in line.

title: customer service
review: I stopped in the other evening. The lady behind the counter was so helpful. She told me the differences in the wraps vs flatbread and calorie content. I tried the spinach wrap and now its my favorite. I am sorry I didn‚Äôt get her name , but, my husband has stopped in this location everyday this week. Thank You!

title: COVID 19 Issue
review: This app is fine when you are familiar with the area but twice now it has sent me inside TWO hospitals! During this time it should make it very clear that the pickup location is at a hospital so we can avoid putting ourselves in danger!!!!

title: Location issues
review: Please update the location issue. The app used to work great now it refuses to locate any subways stores. How am I supposed to order ahead if no stores exist through the app. Used to get subway everyday, very disappointed.

title: No Salads?
review: I went to the app to order for my family only to discover that you have eliminated salads from the menu in the app. They are still on the website. Please put the salad options that are available back into the app as my dietary restrictions require me to eat them when I dine at Subway.

title: Confusing
review: Quite possibly one of the most confusing apps for quick service food and beverage I have ever used. When ordering for 1 person it is fine, but add an entire family and it is extremely difficult to review the order, you can‚Äôt tell who has what, or why the charges have gone up. I would have been better off just walking in to the store than spending forever trying to add things to an online order. Will not use again. Not user friendly.

title: **Updated & Fixed** (Can‚Äôt Log In)
review:
Developers responded and fixed it. Great job!

‚ÄúDownloaded and setup user/pw. However it is just stuck trying to sign in or load. I have verified that I can log in on desktop PC. I have deleted and reinstalled several times to no avail. Please fix developers!‚Äù
developerResponse: {'id': 8764234, 'body': 'Thanks for reaching out to us, and for your patience while we corrected this issue. We heard your feedback loud and clear, and now have a fix for the pesky issue you described (which will not require you to have location services enabled to login). \n \nPlease update to the latest version of the Subway¬Æ App, and please feel free to call us at (833)-778-2929 if you are still experiencing any issues.', 'modified': '2019-05-21T06:49:08Z'}

title: Touch area is too touchy.
review: We struggle with where to touch the phone screen. Finally found that just to the right if the words works best. Also wish we could apply the coupons we get in the mail and paper via the app. We would eat at Subway more often if we could use the coupons.

title: I‚Äôve been patient! Addendum 2
review:
1) can‚Äôt add pizzas to cart. Get errors with or without toppings. 

2) can‚Äôt add toppings to items that you can in person. I‚Äôm looking at you sausage, salami, and extra shredded mozzarella on a pizza. 

3) picking locations is a pain sometimes. 

4) app is too busy. Just let me order food. Look at other food apps and takes some pointers. 

5) get rid of the myway and points gimmicks. Just let me order food. That doesn‚Äôt make me come to subway. Worry about the app/web working instead. 

6) can‚Äôt reorder past order and change store. It empties cart. Jesus Christ. 

7) Gave up on app and went to web, pfff same problems. Same topping errors. 
 
8) don‚Äôt respond with your cookie cutter bull. Just fix it. Have the developers ride near a subway and place an order. Then fix what makes them say curse words.

title: Love anything that saves time!!!!
review: Enjoy the app, and love walking in and just picking up my sandwich when there‚Äôs a giant line! However I would love to be able to choose items on only 1/2 of the sandwich when ordering to split one instead of having to order them separately, but over all, apps convenient and user friendly!

title: Disappointed
review: I am very disappointed that there isn‚Äôt an option to pay in cash when you pick it up. Other than that I was impressed. It was easy to make the order but didn‚Äôt complete it as we were planning to pay in cash when we picked it up. Called in the order instead.

title: Fun to swipe, wish I could put ingredients on half
review: This app was easy enough to use. Love the swipe feature to remove ingredients. Wish I could add ingredients the same way. Instead of ‚Äúadding to cart‚Äù after editing a sub, the button should change to ‚Äúsave changes‚Äù.

title: Great app ordering and rewards
review: I bought this app 2 years ago. And I also bought a subway gift card, and I used It and It worked and I ordered a meatball sub for pick up and the app covered my order on time and I totally appreciated the employees at many Subway restaurants. And couple weeks ago I started use the rewards and It totally worked!

title: Good app
review: I like how easy it is to navigate through the options and personalize your sandwich. It‚Äôs almost like taking to the sandwich artist him/herself. The only thing I would do different would be to add the pizza/marinara sauce to the sauces category because requesting it in the special instructions field could easily be overlooked.

title: No default to store pay options
review: Would have given it a 5 but it automatically defaults to PayPal or your debit card for payment. I pay with cash in store but if I forget to change this every time I use the app it defaults back to PayPal and when I scan my card it pays through PayPal. Need the pay in store default option.

title: One suggestion
review: This is my first time using this app and it seems to work great. It's the first time me using master pass also I have one suggestion for them. I only entered my new password once. Usually they ask you to confirm it to make sure you typed it in right the first time. That's all

title: UPDATE:  Changing password forever
review:
Poor app- created a new account and all it did was ask me for a new password. I couldn‚Äôt do anything else.  
UPDATE:  Thanks for the response and the fix, I was able to login successfully. My login and password was already in the system. Looking forward to placing an order!  I‚Äôll let you know how it goes.

title: Better now
review:
Update: Developer contacted me about the problem, and asked me to respelled the app, which I did before with no avail. I logged back in as usual and it worked. Much better. Thanks. 

Always a glitch. It keeps saying ‚ÄúForgot password, we‚Äôll send you a new password‚Äù I didn‚Äôt. Even if I reset it, it takes me back to same reset screen.

title: Short review
review:
The subway app seems pretty well designed. It‚Äôs easy to figure out and put together an order. Much better than many other similar apps I use.
Thanks to the programmers who did the work, and and managed to keep it from being annoying!

title: Easy to use - add a tip option!
review: This app is great and my orders are always accurate and ready a few minutes before the estimated time. I love my local subway workers, but don‚Äôt always have cash so please make a tip option on the app :). Thanks!‚Äù

title: Absolutely, 100% truly terrible.
review: Downloaded the app, went to make a sandwich, there was absolutely NO WAY to make it a 6 inch. I tried swiping up, down, pinching, swiped left, right, horizontal, diagonal, and any which way you can imagine. I pressed every possible corner on the screen, to the point it is now impossible to see anything past my fingerprints. There is absolutely no way to add soup, there's no option for it. Also, 20 minutes for it to be ready? Little excessive no? Please fix this, it's as broken as this economy.
developerResponse: {'id': 1473746, 'body': 'Hey there- after tapping "Start Order" and one of the subsequent options- ("All Sandwiches", "Subway Fresh Fit" etc.) you can select any of the available sandwiches. On the first page for the sandwich is a choice (on a white background) to select "6-Inch" or "Footlong". Soups are currently unavailable for mobile ordering to provide a consistent guest experience while we simultaneously work to implement an easier way to specify soup flavor availability in the app and online. If you have any additional questions or concerns, don\'t hesitate to contact us at appfeedback@subway.com or by calling (800)-888-4848. Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-10-11T14:57:47Z'}

title: I hate the updated app.
review: I give the new app 1star because 0 star was not available.  I ordered from the old app. 2-3 times a week.  It was very easy and user friendly.  Now I never order because it is very difficult to navigate and always gives me an error at the end of some kind which makes me start all over.  I have had to delete the app several times and reinstall and put all my information on again to see if it would work better.  Now I just don't go to subway anymore.
developerResponse: {'id': 1222653, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience -we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-09-09T20:32:44Z'}

title: Ok overall
review: Crashes a lot. Says items are out that are not but asp let‚Äôs you choose items that are not available. No way to reload your gift card, you end up in a loop that goes no where. So I‚Äôm stuck with $3.50 I can‚Äôt use because it won‚Äôt combine payment with credit card but also wont let me reload.

title: Have to re-launch app for ready to order
review: I love the Subway app (for iPhone) and use it daily.  I‚Äôd really appreciate fewer clicks and less scrolling to accomplish a reorder.  I keep my phone operating system and the apps updated yet need to launch this app numerous times in a row so it‚Äôs ready to take my order.  A 20-second task consumes 2-3 minutes at 4G/5G LTE cellular data speed.

title: I can't figure out how to add something to favorites
review: There is no button to add certain items to your favorites unlike other food apps. I really wanted to use the feature so I could find things I want without having to look through the whole menu. PLEASE FIX IT!!!!

title: No way to complete order
review: When I tried to place my order, I got the message that my card had expired. I used the ‚Äúadd payment method‚Äù link to update my debit card and clicked on ‚Äúsave.‚Äù I did that at least ten times, but every time I got the message that the card had expired. Then I tried with a different card with the same result. After 45 minutes of trying, I was never able to place my order. Then I ordered from another company.

title: Lonnie is the absolute best!
review: Lonnie is a very quiet person I have noticed. I read his name tag one day to say thank you for making my lunch and since then he treats me very special every visit! Very professional and takes great pride in making everyone‚Äôs sandwich! He deserves a raise!!

title: Do not use this app for delivery
review: They make it very difficult to get in touch with anyone about your order and won‚Äôt give you any updates on what going on. The app said my food would be here in 20-25 minutes when it really took an hour. They partner with doordash so that‚Äôs enough said already. Besides the delivery issues and lack of access to any timely help or customer service the app is ok.

title: Poor App
review: Pick up times aren‚Äôt met.  I show up on time and waited for 10 minutes before I ask the worker about my order. She didn‚Äôt even know about the order until she looked it up.  While waiting for my order another customer shows up and asks about her order.  They find out she ordered it for tomorrow, but she said the pick up date wasn‚Äôt an option. This app needs work I wish I had 3 hands so I can give this app 3 thumbs down. üëéüëé

title: Easy to use but slight bugs need to be fixed
review: Sometimes when applying coupons or reward bucks the app bugs out. I have to close the app and open it back up. Luckily it does a good job of saving my cart.

title: Won‚Äôt let me add card
review: I don‚Äôt have access to my old card and I was trying to add a new one, but it kept giving me an error. I tried the website and the app. Waste of time. Spent 30 minutes trying to figure it out. The app is also slow and buggy.

title: Don‚Äôt waste your time
review:
Don‚Äôt waste your time installing this app. Worst app I‚Äôve installed. Installed it, says I can order as guest ie no logon needed. Go though the process of ordering 6 subs. Add to cart. Go to checked and forced to create an account. 
So, for 2 days been trying to create an account and all I get is ( oops there seems to be an error. Please call 833xxxxx
You can and it tell you to go to website. 
So never mind. Will just order my subs from a regular restaurant.  
So long subway app.

title: Subway Review
review: I really enjoy the Subway app. I work super close to my Subway. The app lets me place an order, gives me a reasonable pick-up time, and my sandwich is always ready...fresh and hot. I would definitely recommend this app for anyone who loves Subway like I do ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: So easy and so convenient
review: Love this app use it a lot to help keep my two boys fed! Save your favorites makes life even easier. Like the fact you get to see the rewards and reminds you when you can use them. All round great app.

title: App failure
review: Tapped my app and was advised I needed to update my app.  With much apprehension from previous experience with Subway update failures I tapped ‚Äúupdate ‚Äú.  My apprehension was justified as now when I tap my Subway app my screen goes black and then I‚Äôm returned to my app page.  I finally gave up and went to Burger King.  Why the never ending updates?  They rarely work properly.  Does Subway bother to field test their updates to see if their customers can actually make them work?

title: Needs a new update or something.
review: The app use to work decent but now in the past few months it hasn‚Äôt allowed me to add the location of any subways. I can‚Äôt order through the app anymore not allowing me to gain points. I‚Äôve tried deleting and reinstalling the app but still won‚Äôt work. When I even type in the address of the store location it doesn‚Äôt pull up any subways near by. Just decided I won‚Äôt shop here until this is resolved.

title: Let us use coupons or delete the app
review: There is currently no point in using the app as you can‚Äôt use any coupon or deal. You have to redeem it in store making the whole app pointless.

title: It Works!
review:
Fairly intuitive. Pretty easy to navigate. Placing an order was simple and found the closest location no problem.

Does what the app should do, easily allows you to order food. No complaints

title: Easy and Fast
review: This app is very easy to use. Very helpful to have picture graphics to help avoid making an error when ordering. One of the best food apps I‚Äôve tried; and I tried many during this pandemic!

title: Subway is my way...
review: I order from subway at least once a week. The app makes it easy to order and pay. Plus they remember my favorites.  I also like earning reward points and the online coupons. Can‚Äôt go wrong with subway and this easy app.

title: Great for preordering just before soccer practice ends!!
review: Works very well, however I do wish that previous orders could be ordered from any store and not just the store where originally placed.  If there are discrepancies with ingredients between stores then just highlight them if that is a concern.  Otherwise for the app is very easy to use and works well

title: A pain
review: I hate this app. Mostly because when it‚Äôs time to check out, it doesn‚Äôt ask you which payments you‚Äôd prefer. It just automatically takes it out of the card you used last. Every other food app I have gives you the option at check out. Half the time my order isn‚Äôt even complete but if my finger just so happens to slide by that order button, it sends in my order. At least add a feature at the end that says are you sure or something.

title: App has improved
review: The app has improved and is easy to use; the payment portion is not.  If there are two gift cards it won‚Äôt let you use both, and if the amount on either is less than total, it won‚Äôt apply and give option to pay balance another way

title: Good Menu Options But Ordering Process a Bit Arduous
review: The categories in which to create a sandwich are available but it doesn‚Äôt flow the way it should. Perhaps someone in IT can interview some customers to see what improvements can be made in order to make the ordering process online easier instead of cumbersome

title: Great App
review: Even before our COV-19 devastation I have used the subway app because of efficiency. I appreciate what they have done to constantly improve their quality and to make ordering as user friendly as possible. It will be Apps and Chains like Subway to help us through this challenging time.

title: Enjoy using the app
review: I frequently go to subway and being able to use the app makes choosing easier for me, I don‚Äôt have to look up at the menu. I also enjoy the deals they offer. Would definitely recommend using it.

title: Very helpful app!
review: It‚Äôs super cool how easy you have made it to customize my food to get exactly what I want. It‚Äôs also an app that‚Äôs very attractive, visually. My only complaint is that I can‚Äôt order two kinds of cheeses when I order double cheese. I‚Äôve been really impressed otherwise. Thank you.

title: This App Is Amazing üò≠
review: It makes it easier to order any sandwich you want. Even if you‚Äôre on your way or heading out you can pick and choose which location you want and when. It also gives you rewards for using the app. Strongly recommend

title: Internet connection
review: Love the app - makes ordering at work on the go great when u r so busy ... plus easy pay with PayPal! ... only problem is if the internet service is down or not working properly at the store - I think your order is waiting on you & they never got it.

title: Feature Request for Subway app
review:
Can there be an option to use a coupon that we get sometimes in the mail in the app. I think it would be a great feature to add. Also would like it if we could be able to use the promo codes in the app when it is offered for completing a survey!

Thanks

title: Never works
review: I loved ordering off the app and just going to pick it up. All of a sudden it stopped working. I can‚Äôt order anything. I wait for an update but it doesn‚Äôt help anything. Please fix this because I would like to be able to use the app again.
developerResponse: {'id': 4636023, 'body': "We are sorry to hear that you're having difficulties. Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. title: Could be friendlier for vegetarians
review: I wanted to replace the meat protein with eggs and it will not allow swaps for eggs. The breakfast sandwiches are not able to remove the meat either so I could not find a way to order a foot long with eggs, cheese and veggies unfortunately. Also- no option for choosing between egg whites and eggs with the yolk. Everything else was great though and easy to navigate.

title: Issue with order
review: I have my order set on favorites has worked for a while. Now it stopped working all of a sudden with no reason, just says there was a problem with your order. The purpose of this app is to save time, get your deal together.
developerResponse: {'id': 1676883, 'body': "We're working every day to improve the app experience and we will definitely look into this issue. Feel free out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com. We appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2017-11-06T15:36:16Z'}

title: Won‚Äôt take payment methods
review: For an app that is supposed to facilitate ordering it won‚Äôt take the cc information on either my wife nor my phone, with no explanation as to why. It wouldn‚Äôt even go ‚Äònext‚Äô on my wife‚Äôs, and errored out on mine with a perfunctory ‚Äòoops‚Äô.  If it‚Äôs a franchise issue, figure that earlier and let the user know. If it‚Äôs something else, give a better error message. The UI is great, and the app is easy to use, but pointless if you won‚Äôt allow me to order and pay at the restaurant or figure out how to TAKE MY MONEY.

title: Lack of toppings!
review:
Whenever I use a Phone coupon or one that‚Äôs mailed to me I get less toppings on my Bread. Last week when I went in I did not tell them ahead of time that I had a coupon and got more ingredients on my bread. And of course I was somewhat chewed out by the cashier that I should have shown gal who took my that I had a coupon. So if you use a coupon from your phone or what you received in the mail be assured that you will not get the whole sandwich. 
 Of three stores near me they all have gone downhill ‚òπÔ∏è

title: App doesn‚Äôt work
review: This app no longer works. It won‚Äôt take me to any order screen. It just says reorder and then when I push that it says error has occurred. This is a really awesome service for those of us that have kids and don‚Äôt want to wait in a line to order. I have used this so much and it was convenient. Please get this fixed. I haven‚Äôt been to subway since the app has stopped working because standing in a long line with 2 toddlers just doesn‚Äôt work and is a huge inconvenience. Please fix!

title: This app a orked so bad I went to jimmy johns.
review: I literally went to jimmy johns after trying to order in this app. I‚Äôd like it to work, but since it doesn‚Äôt anymore I could care less. Subway isn‚Äôt even the same anymore.

title: App never works anymore
review: I‚Äôm done with this awful app!  It used to be great, and now it works about 10% of the time.  Most of the time, it gives an error message when placing order.  Subway, you are losing business from your customers who need to place an order on the go and don‚Äôt have time to wait in line.
