title: Unhappy
review: Ordered three menu items The first one was supposed to have extra lettuce it did not and it came with no dressing they offered sandwich dressing as salad dressing and only gave a small cup- the second was supposed to have no onion and was supposed to be toasted it had onion and was not toasted and the third was suppose  to have black olives and smashed avocado which I paid $1.99 extra and it had neither one of those things

title: Isn‚Äôt working for some reason
review: Maybe there‚Äôs a bug but whenever i try to order it says ‚ÄúDefault please try again‚Äù and whatever i just put in my cart disappears. I‚Äôve refreshed the app several times and it continues to do it. The only reason this isn‚Äôt one star is because I love subway and it‚Äôs an easy app to navigate.

title: Gift card glitch
review:
It only allows to add one gift card at a time per order. My company placed us at a hotel 3x a week that offers a $5 subway gift card, I don‚Äôt always use them and when I try to add more than one to an order it sends an error message.
The app also glitches occasionally when submitting an order.
developerResponse: {'id': 24072125, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you have encountered this issue, and we would like to investigate further. We encourage you to visit https://www.subway.com/en-US/ContactUs/GuestCare to provide additional details about your experience.', 'modified': '2021-07-22T12:58:17Z'}

title: Apple affiliate?
review: After trying to buy as a guest which is a option , it does the whole order then you click pay then have to sign up , ok so now I‚Äôm 30 minutes in and guess what will only let you pay through Apple Pay , no others. Then Apple Pay doesn‚Äôt take my debit card. No way I‚Äôm using a cc for a frickin sandwich. You guys are stupid! Got rid of the reward program years ago and said it would come back never did.

title: Rewards points stopped adding to account
review: While I use to enjoy this app, the last 8-9 months I‚Äôve not received any rewards points.  The app sometimes has issues with adding gift cards too. I‚Äôve deleted the app and re installed.  Logged out and logged back in. Tried to call customer service which is nonexistent.  The end result is I barely use the app or go to subway anymore.

title: the app never works & they have no support team
review:
like the title says, the app often has ‚Äúerrors‚Äù (mostly when you‚Äôre using a ‚Äúdeal‚Äù where the app will pretend you haven‚Äôt added the item to the cart until you‚Äôre frustrated enough to remove it, which is probably what they‚Äôre hoping for) and they have switched to ‚Äúfully digital support to better serve you,‚Äù as you‚Äôll be informed when you call their customer support line, followed by the digital system listing 5 different variations of ‚Äúfor help with _____, please visit our website.‚Äù the web support is just as circular, leaving you with no real help and 20 mins wasted. 

overall, this app is hot garbage, and subway‚Äôs just as shady as they were before, don‚Äôt let the rebranding fool you.

title: Crap
review: My idea of ‚Äúlots of lettuce‚Äù or ‚Äúmore pickles‚Äù cannot possibly be the same as an ‚Äúat store‚Äù order. Therefore I have to order in store, which automatically disqualifies me from ANY promotional discounts. This means that one of your long standing customers, that was good for at least 2 visits a week, sometimes 5 times a week, no longer is a customer of Subway. Your corporate office needs to rethink this losing marketing strategy. You are losing out on a bunch of sales to Jimmy‚Äôs.

title: Do better
review: The app is ALWAYS glitching. I had to put in my payment info so many times because it kept saying there was an error when nothing was wrong. When you ask for toasted on the app, it doesn‚Äôt print out on the receipt so I can never get a toasted sub if I order thru the app. It also took my order almost 20 min to come thru to the store. I placed my order and drove to the location (15 min drive) and they hadn‚Äôt even received my order yet.

title: Super helpful!
review: Easy online sandwich builder that allows you to order, and purchase so you can skip the line and hassle in stores; normally available for pickup within 10-20 minutes of ordering.

title: Simple dinner
review: My wife and I figured we would get the kids and I sandwiches for dinner. We saw the $20 for 4 and we were hooked! Kids were excited and have different tastes for their food. Ordering was simple and pick! Contactless pick up for the win!!

title: So/so
review: I tried to use the app to order my lunch. Was able to build the sandwich with no issue. However, it doesn‚Äôt appear the drinks are synced or store specific because my choices were limited and I know my store has more than what was offered. Unfortunately until this is updated, no use in using the app.

title: Doesn‚Äôt include all menu items
review: I have recently downloaded the app, and I am disappointed to see that there is no options for personal pizzas. I‚Äôm a big fan of them, and they aren‚Äôt on there. It is extremely disappointing. This is the reason I am not a member of subway rewards, even though I go there every week.

title: Love it!!
review: Super easy to use! And soo convenient. The only con is it doesn‚Äôt give you all the selections for chips. But you can leave the option in special instructions. I love subway and their app make it so easy for me working where I work.

title: Security or Just a Poor App?
review: I very seldom am able to use this app when I go to Subway, because I don‚Äôt want to enter credit card information and have an account with $$$ with Subway. As a result, I have to try to sign in every time, it seems like. Then I get locked out because I can‚Äôt remember my password. It‚Äôs more trouble to use the app then just pay the full price from my point of view.

title: Make all bread options and drink size options available
review: I love subway and use the app regularly but I have to add special instructions every time because my bread choice is not an option for the store I go to even though they carry it (honey oat). Also sometimes I want more than a 20 oz drink and am not able to order/purchase one because the options just aren‚Äôt available.

title: There is zero confirmation before placing order
review:
Ease of ordering is a double edged sword.

Be aware that there is zero order confirmation between adding items to your basket and payment. You tap once and everything goes through immediately. I've appreciated this quickness in the past, but it caused frantic running around today. I was merely checking what promotions were available and tapped the "place order" button on accident.

There is no way to cancel in the app or through the website. Within a minute, I called the store directly and told them my mistake. They reluctantly cancelled the order on their side (no refund issued yet, but at least they didn't make the sandwiches).

Subway: add a confirmation step to the order process. You'll prevent countless accidental orders from being placed...

title: They need a specific time for pickup
review: I live in a small town, the subway is never too busy. So when I put in an order at 7:30 or something and it says ready at 7:45, they will make the sandwich immediately, and then let it sit there until I come in at 7:45, and by then it‚Äôs cold. I wish the app had the option like other places to update you on when it‚Äôs actually done instead of giving a time frame.

title: Better way to order
review: So much easier and better order off the app than in person. You don‚Äôt have to hurry to pick stuff cuz of a line or the person making the sub not one gets upset or impatient or anything. Just so much better

title: App Meets Functional Needs, but is too cumbersome
review:
Generally the app meets functional needs, but it is cumbersome!  Also the previous order portion is not working.  I have to use my favorites to individual order the family meals.
Get rid of the cumbersome bells and whistle and simplify the app.
I would model after the chipotle app.

title: Buggy
review:
Had issues completing my order previously, as other reviewers have mentioned. Thought I would try again, everything seemed to go well through order submission...but the. Received an error saying the store could not take my order right now. This was right after a received the confirmation from my bank that my card had been charged.

Then the app crashed. Nice. Not going to try a third time.

title: Easy to use
review: The app is very user friendly but not all toppings are available through the app.  I very much enjoy the sweet peppers and every Subway I‚Äôve been to has them but it‚Äôs not an option in the app.  Otherwise very please with the app.

title: This app is so easy!
review: The app is so easy to use. Choosing the toppings and bread is also a little fun-don't want it? Swipe. All gone. The instructions are simple and thorough and all the toppings and options are listed. This beats going into the store and waiting in line to place the order. Well done Subway.

title: Terrible customer service
review: Accidentally sent my order to 705 College Blvd Oceanside CA so I figured like any other person I would cancel it and get it from another closer shop. Tried calling them 4 times and they won‚Äôt pick up and now subways got $8 for free bc some lazy mfs won‚Äôt pick up the phone. And just listening to your call at the end is annoying. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry all our sandwich artists are currently unavailable.‚Äù Wdym artists literally 3/4 visits my sandwiches r all sloppy. Bet u even a dog could make a better looking sandwich

title: Might as well give up
review: The app hardly ever works. You go through the pain of making and customizing your order just to get an error when you try to pay. It‚Äôs only worked about 3 times for me. I literally tried to buy 2 subs, for the last few days only to get an error message when I tried to pay. We ended up going somewhere else because it was so annoying. We even tried changing locations a few different times to no avail. Please fix this app

title: Worst app on my phone
review: It offers to let you save your favorites, but when you go to reorder a favorite it doesn‚Äôt work. It has great graphics while you wait but alas nothing happens. I can usually go and build my sandwiches manually and add them to my cart but it takes forever. I have version 24.0.0 on my iPhone 7 and this app does NOT work well. Maybe a little less work on graphics and a lot MORE work on functionality.

title: Great easy to use
review: Love the app easy to use.... only thing about it is that after you log in the first time you have to close out and go back in before you see the deals.... after that the customization of the sandwiches were easy

title: Double ordered and charged
review: I placed an order #E168F90D-F5. It would not go through. After five minutes it was wiped out. No order there. So we placed another. My son placed it Order #A01E67A0-53. We changed the order up a little and my son put one under my name while the first was under my mother‚Äôs. Both were on the same debit card. When I got to the store, both orders had gone through. This is not right. The store could do nothing to correct it. Has to go through corporate. This needs to be fixed pronto.

title: Great tool if you don‚Äôt want to talk to the local associate
review:
I live in a have a neighborhood with the subway store with the worst customer service.

The the local associate will hate you if you buy anything on sale... 

This is a great tool if you don‚Äôt want engage with the local associates.

title: Excellent customer app
review: I love using the Subway app because of the many choices I have to customized my order. I also enjoy the ability to re-order an item and still be able to modify the ingredients. This is what a restaurant app should be like. Thanks for such a great app!

title: Almost 100%
review: I like the app, except, I would like to be able to add or minus certain ingredients from half of the sub, like if I were going to eat half now and reheat the other half.... kind of like the dominos app where you can get some items on half of the pizza.... same aspect, but I love subway, hope to get this option soon!!

title: Problem
review: I don‚Äôt know why your app is so hard to use. All I want to do is put money in the account for my daughter to use. Each time I have to search and search to how to put money from my credit card into the account. I‚Äôve been able to do it a couple of times but, mostly just go to Dunkin‚Äô Donuts where it is easy. With Dunkin‚Äô Donuts, I just put in my CCV number and I‚Äôm ready to go. Why isn‚Äôt there a way to add money on the first page?

title: Useless
review: Tried to set up an account and when you get to the terms and conditions page it sends you back to the original sign up page.  Tried several times.  Apparently they‚Äôre more concerned with binding arbitration than selling sandwiches.

title: Love the app but have one request...
review: I love the ease of using the app.  Especially having the ability to order favorites quickly! The one thing I wish I could do is use the coupons I get in the mail/newspaper. I haven‚Äôt figured out a way to apply coupons and the sub experts at the store don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a possibility. Why?

title: No Favorites
review: I like the convenience of the app. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôve continued to use it. I don‚Äôt like that I can‚Äôt save a a sandwich as a favoriteAFTER  I‚Äôve made it; I can‚Äôt save a sandwich as a favorite WHEN I make it; I can‚Äôt save a sandwich as a favorite BEFORE I make it; I CAN‚ÄôT SAVE A SANDWICH AS A FAVORITE. So I use the ‚Äúreorder a recent sandwich‚Äù feature. The only problem with that is, I CAN‚ÄôT USEMY  REWARDS AT CHECKOUT. If you fix those flaws, this app would earn more than three stars from me.

title: Use to work
review: App was great until they started trying to do all these updates. Now the app will not work at all. Every time I go to try and place an order it gives an error. Will not pull my rewards in or anything. Checked to see if I was logged on and it shows my login but when I click on it it does nothing! Need to higher new IT developers or something and only push out app updates once they are working.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-07-26T15:39:37Z'}

title: Worst rewards program I‚Äôve seen
review: Wow. I spend $50 to get $2 off. No real incentive to use this program or eat here more often. That being said, as a person who orders pickup thru many other apps, there is no real incentive to do it thru this one so I probably will be deleting this. No offers under my offers, no coupons, and no excitement at receiving $2 off after I spend $50. Nice try Subway, may want to take a look at the reward programs of some of your competitors for some ideas on how to improve.

title: Great App-Stores Not So Great
review: The app is great!  I only wish the stores would step up their game.  Every time I select ‚ÄúMore‚Äù on the vegetables and dressings, I get regular at best.  Either employees don‚Äôt know how to read or are poorly trained.  What‚Äôs the point of going there with subpar execution?

title: Annoying
review: The idea is a good one, but it‚Äôs flawed in the sence that can‚Äôt put my own password, being forced to used symbols on what is suppose to be my very own private password is just stupid. Wanting to sign up and unable to because every password I‚Äôve input needs 2-3symbols from your list and capitol letters etc. for that reason I don‚Äôt sign up and believe me a lot of other customers feel the same way...ones password is their own it‚Äôs not for you to tell us what should or shouldn‚Äôt be there.
developerResponse: {'id': 3128408, 'body': 'Hi! Passwords must be 8-16 characters, containing three out of four of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \\ : ‚Äò , ? / ` ~ ‚Äú ( ) ;. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-04-13T20:21:06Z'}

title: Could be better
review:
Went to order my first meal using the app. A couple of things:

1.) After setting the pickup time, it defaults back to the original time, more than once, prompting me to call the store after the order has been placed and let them know the changes. In doing so, the location still got my order time wrong and my sandwich was soggy and cold when I picked it up.

2.) I don‚Äôt like having to prepay and store my CC info in the app. Other fast food chains allow you to pay when you pickup, which I would prefer.

3.) Why can‚Äôt I add a meal to my favorites before I order it? Even after I ordered it, I could not find just exactly HOW to add it to my favorites. 

4.) Too many menus makes this app more confusing than other competitor apps to navigate and easily find what you are looking for.
developerResponse: {'id': 3005847, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2018-04-02T18:15:36Z'}

title: Oops
review: I‚Äôm actually a fan of this app and has been using it several days a week, but when I got my new iPhone X I discovered that the Login button for existing users was no longer functional which has prevented me from using it at all for the last several weeks. Figured it would be fixed by now, but maybe you don‚Äôt know about it, so figured I‚Äôd say something... :-(

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-02-28T20:31:54Z'}

title: Not many ingredients to choose from
review: I downloaded the app because the website doesn‚Äôt have all the ingredients to choose from like the store. But it‚Äôs the SAME problem on the app. Not all the subs of the day are there. Just Monday, Tuesday, and Sunday..where did the other days go? When you click on all the subs tab, it will not show you all the sandwiches. The one star is for that and the second star is for aesthetics. But really only deserves the one star lol.
developerResponse: {'id': 2163417, 'body': "We apologize that you couldn't get your order exactly how you wanted it. We'd like to talk with you more so please contact us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com. Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us.", 'modified': '2017-12-29T14:25:24Z'}

title: Your app is too slow!!!
review:
I like the concept of quickly submitting my orders to Subway - especially since my kids love their subs; however, this app needs improvement! 

Every change reloads the whole app page which takes several seconds to do. There are lots of errors when trying to apply subway dollars you earned and the payment submission  process is terribly slow. 

I have 3 saved subs to my profile and made a few changes and it took me 15 minutes to submit my order. It should literally take me maybe 2 minutes if I'm not starting from scratch.

 I hope subway improves this app because right now it's extremely frustrating to use!

title: Stopped working
review: After someone hacked my account and I removed my card i haven't been able to order again. When I try to add a payment method an error message pops up. Weirdly though, I tried ordering from 2 other family members account and the same thing happened. I think overall theres an issue with their app. Ive tried contacting customer service multiple times but the issue is never resolved.

title: Poorly designed and implemented
review: This app is really abysmal. I use several food ordering apps, this is the only one that forces me to update, forgets my login repeatedly and locks me out when I get my password wrong, and rarely, if ever works as intended. I‚Äôll just use the app to order from the Starbucks next door and get a sandwich from there, that one works consistently and has better features in every aspect. Look forward to this one improving (I hope).

title: Saves Times
review: The subway app is wonderful when doing multiple orders at the office and 1 person is picking up. Everyone can customize their order and pay ‚Ä¶no stress for the pick up person.

title: Refund
review: I order three sandwiches online on the mobile app. On Google it said that the store was open till 11 but it was actually at 10 but I made my order somewhere around 9:45. So when I got to the store they say that they were closing and that they didn‚Äôt get the order but online on the app said my order went through and it took my money. This happened on the 14th. And I can‚Äôt get through to customer service.

title: Piece of crap
review: This is putting in nicely- 50% of the time the orders don‚Äôt go through. Plus, the promos that are through the app never work in our area, so stop sending them! Also,  the year is 2022. If my giftcard has a remaining balance of 5.78 and my order is $10, let me pay the remainder with another credit card. Every other company in America has figured this out, so there should be lots of people that can help you get out of the Flintstone era.

title: Hey, Subway, military people eat subs too!
review:
So I downloaded this app thinking that with our tight time schedules where I work, this might help me have time to get my food and eat it too. But I cannot select the Subways on my installation. Not any of them. It‚Äôs all greyed out and doesn‚Äôt give me the option to prove I can get on the installation. But hey, I guess you really don‚Äôt want to sell to service members. 

If this doesn‚Äôt change soon, I‚Äôll just delete the app. 

Poor, just poor.

title: Christmas Eve
review: They were so polite to let us know they were out of some of the items to complete our order. They called us and we very sweet. Thanks for making our sandwiches with care on Christmas Eve right before closing.

title: Great changes to the app!
review: I avoided using the app to order because it was so complicated, pleasantly surprised the new app changes are very easy! If I can do it I‚Äôm sure everyone else can. First transaction went very smooth. Thank you SubWay!

title: Very user friendly
review: I‚Äôve never had a problem with this app. My order is always waiting for me when I get there. I like that my reward points show up immediately on my account

title: Hard at first, but I like it now!
review: It was hard to navigate at first and I had to call the store. Once you figure out you have to scroll down for options, it was much easier.

title: Lack of drink and chip choices
review: 3/5 stars for the fact the ability to choose tea or bbq baked lays when online ordering. If I want a drink, the app forces me to choose between Coke Zero, Diet Coke, Hubert‚Äôs lemonade, etc. Even if I write special instructions that I will fix my own drink, most of the subway workers go ahead and prepare the drink I was forced to choose. And then I have to accept that or pour it out.

title: No Swiss in APP
review: So the only thing I have a complaint for is that the Swiss cheese is not in the App so when one of my sandwiches consist of that cheese I have to go inside. Also, the Caesar dressing is no longer available for them to order more and I love making my own Caesar wrap but you guys really need to bring one in. Thanks!

title: Upgrade please
review: Would be helpful for the deals/offers to specify location when you choose one rather than finding out at checkout that it doesn‚Äôt work. Also when switching locations you have to empty the cart which is frustrating. Other than that very easy app to use!

title: Coupon deals
review: I love subway and I love the bold look of this app. I do wish when you clicked on a deal, it would take you through the steps of using that coupon. I did the free sub with purchase of a drink and I was confused why the discount wasn‚Äôt applied when I turned it into a meal.

title: Deals won‚Äôt show up
review: Lately I‚Äôve been getting notifications from the app saying this deal is available and that deal is available. So one day, I decided to click one of the notifications. When I got on the app, I didn‚Äôt see any deals or offers that my notifications said were available to me. I know the deal/offer wasn‚Äôt expired bc I clicked the notification banner as soon as I got it. Anyways, it was just a waste of time.

title: Always fail
review: I order in the same store though the app and always the message say ‚Äúsomething wrong‚Äù I have to show my bank account so they can see the debit. Only because the person is so nice and she knows now that my daughter with special needs is fan of subway she proceeds with the order almost every day.

title: Buyer Beware ‚Äúlost orders‚Äù
review: I used the app place my order. App said order was ready went to the store. They said we don‚Äôt have your order maybe you chose a different store. I showed them the confirmation number showing it was their store. ‚ÄúSorry we don‚Äôt have it‚Ä¶maybe the computers are down.‚Äù  No attempt made to fill the order, they just acted like they were busy‚Ä¶no one else in the store. Tried to contact Subway for a refund no answer. Buyer Beware

title: From home
review: When my husband is out it is so awesome to give him a call to just stop by and pick up a meal without having to go over what I want in excruciating detail and still have it come home wrong. Yea for app ordering.

I ordered a deal based on the app, the deal didn‚Äôt go through after the transaction was completed-30 oz w/free 6‚Äù sub, didn‚Äôt receive sub.

It became a conflict because I filled the drink, and put in a straw, but didn‚Äôt drink it and had my mask on the entire time, in full view of the employees.

I was unable to find to customer care number on the app, as there should be one readily available for a situation exactly as this. So this doubles as my formal complaint as well.

Also, the screen to add toppings is counterintuitive as you can‚Äôt see them until you move the screen.

title: Didn‚Äôt get the food, but paid the bill
review: I ordered my lunch in the app and selected in-store pickup. But the store was closed when I arrived. Both this app and google maps showed that the store should be open. I went to the store two days later. The employee there told me that I could get an automatic refund. After waiting for a month, I haven‚Äôt received the refund yet. Have tried to give email feedbacks, but received no response. Very disappointed‚Ä¶

title: Easy to use app
review: The only complaint I have is when you place your order for the chips and drink you don‚Äôt have a full selection on the app. It is a much reduced selection and what I usually get isn‚Äôt on there, Dr. Pepper and baked sour cream and onion lays.

title: Easy to use
review: The app is easy to use, find all the choices available. I would actually rather use the app than stand at the counter in the store trying to pick options.

title: Cluttered app, adds extra sandwiches when you edit
review:
Confusing to order and highly cluttered. Went to edit a sandwich, ended up adding another one. Didn‚Äôt notice it until I paid because the screen is so cluttered with attempts to sell addons. Want to cancel and reorder? App says call the store - store says no way to cancel.

A $8 gift card to cover this annoying error would be great thank you.

title: Do Not Use.
review: Today I tried ordering a meal & when I went to checkout it said my restaurant couldn‚Äôt fulfill my order. So I waited a while & tried again. Same message, ‚Äúthis store can‚Äôt fulfill this order‚Äù. So I went somewhere else. After I got home I found out they charged me 4 times, about $30. There is no way to fix it with the app. Your can only contact them about certain topics from a prepared list. As a result I can‚Äôt get a refund for any of this.

title: CANT MAKE YOUR OWN
review:
I‚Äôm highly disappointed by this app. I wanted to be COVID safe and order my usual which is NOT a specialty sandwich but rather a BUILD MY OWN type of sandwich and unfortunately it wouldn‚Äôt allow me to build my own... I had to pick from one of the specialty sandwiches and remove almost all the toppings... BUT IT GETS WORSE you can‚Äôt remove any meat that‚Äôs already part of that specialty sandwich nor can you add your own 
For instance I wanted teriyaki and salami 
But only had the choice of teriyaki....

title: Terrible
review: I spent 30 minutes trying to make and order one sandwich. It kept saying error and then would kick me back to the precious screen. I got all the way to payment and it was trying to force me to set up Apple Pay but I just wanted to pay with my card and not set up Apple Pay. Then it said error again and completely deleted my order. So what‚Äôs the point of an app that doesn‚Äôt even work... deleted it off my phone.

title: 1st Time Ordering online
review:
This was my first experience with ordering online with Subway. It was very easy and user friendly. I had a great experience and will continue with online ordering moving forward. 

Thanks Subway.

title: Very satisfied customer
review: As a health care worker with sometimes very short lunch break,  I am grateful that my sandwich/order is almost always ready when I pick it up, never an uncomfortable wait and always fresh and the way I like it! Everyone is also efficient and so nice.

title: Good to the last BYTE!
review: This app is great. I easily found my location with easy to use tools. Adding, and changing ingredients or bread types was a breeze and even fun to see and do.  Frankly, I prefer using the app. My sandwich was even better this last time too. I got the Spicy Italian, because my name ends in an ‚ÄúO‚Äù lol... enjoy

title: App is okay but a little disappointing
review: For the most part I like the app but it is frustrating that I can‚Äôt order a turkey and ham sandwich when they have both meats. Also asked why the cold cut sub was not on the app at the store and they said they had no control over the app. If you could fix this so you could order what is at the store I would give the app all five stars.

title: This app is great
review: It‚Äôs a quick easy way to place an order. Love that our favorite sandwiches can be saved. Just click on them and add them to the cart. Drive to the store, walk in pick them up and walk out, because they are pre-paid. Just wonderful!

title: Works but...
review: Has crashed a few times when submitting order but fortunately I haven‚Äôt lost any orders. It doesn‚Äôt seem to remember payment options I don‚Äôt know if there‚Äôs a setting for that. It gets an error when I click on recent orders and doesn‚Äôt retrieve anything. In general it is slow on selecting items or adjusting quantity. Again the app works but for a major fast food chain it seems to have a lot of issues.

title: Discounts, freebies, and points
review: I really enjoy the discount promos, the freebies, and the point system. The app lets me save my favorites and makes ordering convenient. I would recommend allowing people to pay for the order when they get there as an option.

title: App no longer works.
review: Used the app for awhile and it works.  Tried it a few times over the past 6 months and nothing works.  You can‚Äôt sign in. You can‚Äôt find a restaurant.   An error pops up stating Access denied.

title: It‚Äôs amazing
review: To be honest I was scared to order from here because of all the bad reviews but I still ordered and honestly it was amazing, I don‚Äôt know about the other reviews but for me and my first time ordering from subway app, it was a great experience.

title: Good app; has glitches
review: It does a great job of keeping track of your subway points and allows you to order and customize your sandwiches at any open location. It is fast and easy to use. But every once in a while it deletes your ‚Äúfavorites‚Äù or your ‚Äúrecent order‚Äù data; that‚Äôs annoying.

title: Lacking a lot
review: This app does not have a lot of what they have at the restaurant. Subway is offering certain promotions to try to get people to use this app but half the Condiments, seasonings, and even menu items are not available. Since you know your local Subway has those items. You have to order your sandwich without it and then ask for it when you go to pick it up to apply them yourself. If I want to make my own sub sandwich I could do it at home for a lot less $$.

title: Terrible app - Happily switch to jimmy johns
review: I‚Äôve only been able to place 1 successful order with this app. Prompts for errors and invalid fields plague my order attempts, even when using app correctly. Online ordering on a separate device leads to same issues noted above. Subway should be able to ensure a working app that doesn‚Äôt leave customers hungry. Furthermore, the app and website have a terrible layout that is clunky and unnatural. No longer a subway customer

title: Unhappy App Mobile User
review: I‚Äôve only been able to use the App twice.  It doesn‚Äôt let you change your order.  Every time I get to the store, it‚Äôs from a past order. Grr. Can‚Äôt even do that now.  I have to call in the order.  Can‚Äôt look at the deals...

title: It takes getting used to
review: I love being able to order ahead but there‚Äôs so much options in terms of toppings. I wish they had a section to accept coupons so it could speed up process when I check out

title: Great interface
review:
But I could not cancel or edit an order that was set up for an hour away and when I called the restaurant to try and cancel it they were not aware of how to cancel those orders. 

We were trying to make it easier by using the app but it made it much more confusing because of the second order we were trying to cancel. 

Otherwise I love the how easy it is to customize and build a sandwich.

title: Great app!
review:
The app is super easy to navigate! The only problem I‚Äôve encountered was with the part where I added my payment method and it wouldn‚Äôt let me move on.

P.S. Just hit the back button and it‚Äôll ask if you‚Äôre sure you want to move on because it won‚Äôt save your card information. Select no then save!

title: Do not use!
review: Placed an order and paid in app. Got to store to pick up the order and they said they didn‚Äôt have any order for me. I opened my email to show them my confirmation number and while showing them I got another email saying that my order was cancelled. The store offered no help other than get in line and order and pay again. I called Subway hq and they offered nothing other than to tell me I will get a refund in 7-10 days for the money that they took IMMEDIATELY!
developerResponse: {'id': 12774980, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us by tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com- so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2020-01-07T15:52:58Z'}

title: Love the app!
review: Once I got used to the app very easy to use. Able to save my choices to favorites so my next order goes even faster. Plus I keep earning points and save $$$ on my next order. Then my order is ready for pick up, no waiting on line in store:)

title: Scanning at the register
review: Every time I use this app I change to ‚Äúpay in restaurant‚Äù. Doesn‚Äôt do it. I scan to get the points and it charges the card on file, which is should not be doing because that card is maxed out! Then, every time I try to redeem $2, it never applies to the purchase. Then the restaurant has no clue why or what to do once it‚Äôs paid for. Then you can‚Äôt order the 6-inch sub of the day via the app. There‚Äôs no point in even using this thing so I guess I just shouldn‚Äôt. No one should.
developerResponse: {'id': 11152593, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us by tapping "Contact Us" in the app menu, at (833)-778-2929 or by email at appfeedback@subway.com- so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you. \r\n', 'modified': '2019-10-09T16:19:34Z'}

title: Good app but‚Ä¶
review: For some reason at my home subway I can‚Äôt order a sub with Italian dressing even though they have it when I order in store(5126 Route 30 greensburg pa). I tried to put it in the request section before you complete your order but was told that the store employee couldn‚Äôt even see the request I marked down.
developerResponse: {'id': 8764266, 'body': 'Hey, there! If you could give us a call at (833)-778-2929, or send us a message at appfeedback@subway.com, with the missing items, and restaurant address or store number- we can contact that local restaurant team and make sure they update their menu. Thanks!', 'modified': '2019-05-20T19:46:28Z'}

title: Makes ordering for more then 1 easy
review: I love to use the app to order for my family. Everyone can customize their sandwich and it‚Äôs ready when we get there. Also so helpful for office lunches. Everyone just orders their own and one person makes the sandwich run.

title: App is great
review: Loved the ease of ordering on the app.  Only challenge was entering a payment method.  When I entered my card the app wouldn‚Äôt allow me to click next to finalize.  I ended up having to use PayPal which is fine but frustrating after entering my card a few times.

title: Because i can‚Äôt give  it any less
review: Tried to use the app just to try it. Unfortunately when i got to the store i was told they had not received my order. I showed them my online purchase and was told my payment had not gone through but it showed on my phone it had. They were trying to make me pay twice because of the error in there system. The app is supposedly to save time, but it was worst than just going and ordering there. Never again.. deleted.
developerResponse: {'id': 7300113, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2019-02-14T16:30:23Z'}

title: Subway phone app
review: Picking sandwich and what goes on it was pretty easy. Only caution is that the cheese selection was at the bottom, after the extras; I almost didn‚Äôt realize and the sandwich would have not had any cheese. I don‚Äôt know why cheese is not listed as one of the standard items.

title: Great app
review: This is a great app however it is missing a couple things. 1) when making a combo, the chip and drinks don‚Äôt always what they have in store when I go to pick up so I just leave a little note when placing my order. 2) I would like to be able to pay with ApplePay just like I could if purchasing in store.

title: Take my order please!!
review: I used to be able to put my order in and get my sandwich later.  Now I go through the process and put my sub together and then go to pay.  It just comes back with an ‚Äúok‚Äù and never actually takes my order.
developerResponse: {'id': 5946334, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-11-14T18:21:55Z'}

title: Perfect!
review: My family loves subway! We have a routine each Wednesday after music lessons that we eat at subway. I can order, pay and pickup my food all in ten minutes. The one time they didn‚Äôt have the bread I wanted, they called right away (Vandament in Yukon, OK), and let me choose another bread. Love this app!

title: Efficient but a bit glitchy.
review: I enjoy the app‚Äôs easy access and simple design. Love the surprises, a little sad about the large amount of purchases required for rewards in comparison to other apps but hey free is free. One thing is that this app turns off music that you‚Äôre playing at the time, and constantly shuts down  by itself if you click too fast. If it wasn‚Äôt so finicky I‚Äôd give it a 5/5.
developerResponse: {'id': 5477136, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-10-12T14:27:28Z'}

title: Balance transfer doesn‚Äôt work
review: I used to transfer my old gift card balance to the new one without any problem. But recently the app keep saying the transfer can not be completed. I tried to do it on the website, same thing. I‚Äôve been trying couple days but only feedback from the app or website is ‚Äúplease try again later‚Äù.

title: Love it but glitchy
review: I‚Äôve had to uninstall/reinstall this app several times. Every once in a while it just gives me an error message. Everything else about the app is great. I would really like it if someday you could customize half the sandwich have a foot-long differently then the other half. But that‚Äôs being picky.
developerResponse: {'id': 4692492, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-08-16T18:37:43Z'}

title: Like the app
review:
Do not like how you can‚Äôt add a topping to only half of a 12in sub.  If you add tomatoes or mayo it goes on the whole sub, no making it with half.  I added special instructions to leave half of a 12 in sub plain and it was completely wrong in pickup.  The worker stated they don‚Äôt even get the special instructions....then what‚Äôs the point?
  BTW....the special instructions were on my receipt but apparently not theirs.

title: WRONG FOOD multiple times
review: I just deleted this stupid app - a) if a store is out of stock of an item, you can still order it. Once you arrive, the store basically tells you tough cookies and won't give you a refund and only offer a different item. I ordered a pizza and you try to give me a sandwich to make it better? No. And b) today, the bread type, toasting, and cheese weren't sent, so when I show up they have sandwiches on the wrong bread, no cheese, and not toasted. 3 wrong things, and guess what! THE STORE COPS OUT AND SAYS "NOT OUR FAULT". F Subway altogether.
developerResponse: {'id': 2446739, 'body': 'We are sorry this happened - please share more details with us at 1-800-888-4848 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-01-30T15:18:56Z'}

title: Trash
review: This app is trash. Everytime I use it there is some issue. Most the time it pops up a error tab or just keeps logging me off. I tried to changed my payment info and it won‚Äôt even save.

title: Build Your Own Missing
review: Couldn‚Äôt order like we usually do in store, so we had to go in. We would have liked to be able to use the online deal/discount. To be user friendly for Subway, this app really needs a build your own feature that allows you to add meats you like. We could not add ham and chicken together.

title: Overall it‚Äôs great
review: I love the app overall, I just wish there was a way to use the remaining balance of a gift card and then use a different form of payment at the same time instead of always having to reload the gift card.

title: No cookies
review: My sandwiches where ready when I got there at the appointed time, however, forgot to put sauce on teriyaki sandwich, no oatmeal cookies (they refunded me $4.00 for 6 cookies ordered). I suggest that the app can let the customers know ahead when items are not available or what time they will be ready.

title: Nurse Betty
review: Love the new Subway app! So easy to use and add your menu items. I do have one request. Please add options for toasting and giardiniera peppers.  I added these items in the comment section of the order, but these instructions were not followed. Having a section for this already included could potentially avoid this problem. Thanks!

title: Convenient
review: I've always enjoyed subway sandwiches the app is great because I can place my order show up walk right to the register get my lunch and head back out. Convenient, quick works well.

title: Doesn‚Äôt always work
review: Although it is convienent most of the time, it does fail to work 25% off the time. I‚Äôll have to resubmit the order multiple times before it goes through, sometimes with no luck. Earlier today, I couldn‚Äôt get the Menu to open the first 5 times I tried it. When it works it‚Äôs great!

title: Pssst. We emptied your cart!
review: I tried three different ways to order a sandwich. Each time I got to the bag/cart,  there was a popup that read ‚Äúdefault. Please try again,‚Äù and the cart was empty. Tried it with reorder, then favorites, then going straight to the menu, and each time, the same thing. I tried restarting the app, then signing out and back in. Same thing every time. Frustrations with this app have kept me from ordering at Subway dozens of times.
The app is really easy to use and breaks down all the ingredients in each menu item! If you make a mistake on your item it still allows you to edit during checkout!

title: Special deals
review: It‚Äôs just a shame that you can‚Äôt use the app for more than one sandwich they should really consider in times of pandemic and when we support the business thank you hope everybody listens

title: Pyramidcom
review: App is quick & easy to see. I placed order & specified pickup time. I arrived few minutes early & order was ready & waiting. Next time I will use curbside do I ca wait in car instead of going inside, how easy & convenient.

title: Almost Perfect
review: It‚Äôs a good app. Most people just don‚Äôt have patience with electronics. One little gripe though; there doesn‚Äôt seem to be a lot of support for managing Favorite items. Can‚Äôt delete, can‚Äôt edit, and can only add one after purchase. Could you do something about that?

title: App has a few bugs
review: I‚Äôve been working at subway for awhile now, and I‚Äôve used the app frequently since i started working. However, once the fresh melts order option was implemented, the app stopped working all together. I would open it, and all I would see is a white screen with a green bar on top.

title: Great service and convenient
review: I really appreciate being able to use the app to preorder my meals. Whether at home, work or traveling it is easy to pick the right location and avoid waiting in line!

title: Helpful for this mom
review: This actually very helpful for me. I‚Äôm a mom of 4 young boys and today was not the best start so we are getting fast food. I downloaded the app added Apple Pay and it will be ready in 15 minutes at out closest gas station that is 3 miles down the road.

title: Hello?!?
review: I was trying to put on my new card information since I lost my last one and it would not allow me to put on my new card info. It kept saying that I wasn‚Äôt saving it and that I did not have a new payment method. I have tried five times and it rejected me every time. Is anyone else having this problem?

title: Beware of hackers
review: I‚Äôve used the app once or twice and have PayPal set up as my payment method. Well three days ago someone hacked my subway account and ordered 22$ dollars in food. Not that much damage but I contacted both subway and PayPal and neither one acts responsible for issuing a refund. PayPal said that when I created a Subway account I agreed not to hold them liable for fraudulent orders. Subway gave me an automated response say we are sorry you had a problem with your mobile order. Total Crap.

title: Easy to use
review:
I would like the option of getting different toppings on different halves of a footlong sandwich since my kids prefer different things.... 
 Otherwise though the app is easy to use and saves time when we‚Äôre in a hurry.

title: Thanks for removing a sandwich from my order
review:
Added a sandwich and initially thought ‚Äúsure, I‚Äôll add a chips and drink combo.‚Äù Later decided to remove the chips and drink combo. Well, that removed my sandwich too. Now, everyone in my family has their sandwich and I need to drive back to pick up mine, which I had to resubmit in a new order. 

Thanks a lot.  

On top of this while ordering I constantly had pop-ups for ‚Äúan error occurred‚Äù or ‚Äúlocation does not exist‚Äù. On hitting OK and continuing everything would be fine.

title: Don‚Äôt like the order button
review: The order button makes it easy to order, but it doesn‚Äôt confirm. I accidentally hit it all the time when I‚Äôm. It ready to order. Would be nice if it would ask you to confirm instead of just charging you and going through right away.

title: Subway App
review: I‚Äôm not very good on things like this but I was able to get my order done the way I want it. Saving the items ordered make it VERY EASY to repeat and you can pay online so you walk-in and pickup your order. The 2 for $10 is AWESOME! My Subway really takes GREAT CARE of their customers!!!

title: Some good days some bad.
review: Today the app couldn‚Äôt find any local subway locations (we‚Äôve ordered same location thru the app before so I‚Äôm assuming app was crashed today)no matter what we did and previously the employees told us during pick up that the app doesn‚Äôt give them enough notice for when the order is due. I don‚Äôt want my sandwich thrown together super rushed.

title: Ads for offers you cant have + crappy customer service
review:
Soooo the app knows the location I am ordering from, and that the offer/deal doesn‚Äôt apply, why should it have an Ad for that offer on ever order page AND checkout!

Emailed my suggestion and frustration to fix this, and got a canned reply about franchise‚Äôs explained to 5 year old level...

Regular customer (2+ times a week at work and at least 2x a month at home). Here at home the franchise doesn‚Äôt accept any national offers/deals... I figured that out before I ordered, and ordered 3 other times. 

Like most normal people most complaints just want to feel like they were heard. They totally failed on that one. 

Tease, bait and switch, or just not giving a crap about the customer... at least the last one if confirmed!

title: Horrible Experience
review: The developers seriously need to consider an updated UI design. Way too many steps to modify an order, etc. And, why am I limited to ordering 6 items in a single order?!! We love Subway, but there have been several times when we decided to go elsewhere, because we didn‚Äôt want to take 30 minutes out of our day to place an order for our family. Meanwhile, we can complete a Chick Fil A app order for our family in under 5 minutes.

title: Deals
review: I was unable to place an order using the deals option. Maybe give an error message so the order can be placed before I get to the store and have to place the order.

title: Location change not available at checkout
review: I realized after I had gotten my order ready that the store location was incorrect. Can‚Äôt change it unless you go back and start all over. Would be great to have the option for store selection at check out.

title: Glitchy as hell
review:
This app would be sooooo convenient if it worked. 
I spent 20 minutes trying to order 2 footlongs. It kept quitting right before the end, when I was trying to save as favorites. Finally made it it thru the entire order. Went to pick up... I‚Äôve got 8 sandwiches.  It charged me all 4 attempts, although on my end only one showed that it went thru. The app never saved as favorites and shows nothing as a recent purchase.

title: Never works
review:
I have tried using their app several times and keep getting ‚ÄúUh oh! Order has errored and cannot be continued.‚Äù This error comes up every time we hit submit order. We try rearranging our order thinking it is because something isn‚Äôt offered and nothing gets the order to go through. We have to go to the location and order. So much for using the app for rewards or to make it easier on us.

It‚Äôs up to date with its updates. I give up. It‚Äôs worthless.

title: Pretty easy to use
review: Makes it easy to order food when you have children that can‚Äôt make up their minds.  My only complaint is that there is no option to build a custom Sub from scratch.  But other than that it‚Äôs a great app.

title: One of the best food apps out there!
review: Ordering from this app has been so unbelievably easy and fun! From customizing your order to your specific wants to great app/online deals you can‚Äôt get this level of enjoyment and accuracy anywhere! Definitely recommend!!

title: Horrible
review: This app never works when I need it to updated and all still got an error message and couldn‚Äôt get the buy on get one deal and they wouldn‚Äôt honor it in the store hate this subway app how bout u do deals in the store as wellü§¨ü§¨üò°üò°üò°üò°üò°üò°ü§¨ü§¨

title: Subway Clutchh
review: Living in a college town, this app has become my favorite because I can place Togo orders right after class and pick it up or even during a study break! Easy to use and you get great perks like free 6 inch and cookies!!! Everybody needs this app on their phone. Thank me later alligator

title: One of the worst apps!
review: It never gives you a page to review your complete order. When you click to review your order it automatically places your order. Then it tells you if you want to make changes or cancel it you have to call the store. When you call the store they tell you that you have to call the number the email gives you. I only used the app to get the bogo deal and I ended up paying for 3 of my 4 sandwiches because it only gives you one free.

title: Error Error Error
review: Got a text this morning that said get any footlong free with the purchase of another footlong. I have uninstalled and installed this app three times and I am still getting an error message whenever I try to put an item in my cart. Then it says my cart is full but my cart is empty. I was trying to order my food before my lunch break. No luck with that. And to top it all off, you can only use the offer if you order through the app or online üôÑ Neither one is functional...

title: When it works it is basically competent.
review:
Of course, when it works is half the time.  I‚Äôve been trying to make an order for about half an hour and it just... won‚Äôt.  Won‚Äôt do it.  Won‚Äôt add my sandwiches to the cart, won‚Äôt let me finish customizing said sandwiches, won‚Äôt even let me get THAT far without having to restart the app multiple times to no avail.

No, I‚Äôm not submitting my device information and a detailed report of every problem.  I‚Äôm just ordering from somewhere else.

title: Loving the app
review: I use subway app for my kids lunch. I order at the one near the school & pick up before dropping them off. This also allows me to get breakfast for myself, when I usually don‚Äôt have time. Yay!! They even deliver to my daughters school! So convenient for our family.

title: Best fast food app
review: This app is so convenient. I hate waiting in line at Subway listening to patrons before me order every time like it‚Äôs their first time there. My food is ready when I roll up and my order is always accurate. Plus, there are desks and rewards.

title: Much Improved
review: Thank you. So many of my complaints fix. Mostly can continue to order from same page you end with. Not having to go to a drop down menu. Check out easier with rewards.

title: Convenient and easy to use
review: No more waiting in line with the ordinary people.. order ahead and pay online. Then just walk over to the counter and let them hand you your food and walk out. I love the dirty looks from the people waiting in line! "So long suckers!" lol

title: Great...when it works
review: This is a great app to order sandwiches ahead of time. You can save your favorites for quick and easy ordering.  HOWEVER, it‚Äôs a 50/50 shot if the apps working or not.  Sometimes it sits on the clock and eventually fails or stores are listed as closed at twelve noon and you can‚Äôt order.  Not sure how old this app is, but they should resolve the bugs before releasing for use.

title: Ordering from app
review: I love being able to place my order with the subway app.   I will get her name next time, the subway employee is always super nice and has my order ready every time get there.   Awesome experience every time and my order has never been wrong.

title: Love this app
review: I have to say, I‚Äôm a fan of all these food apps. Especially ones were they make your order custom. It takes just a couple minutes to type in your order, then you walk in the door 10 - 15 minutes later and pick it up. Way better than waiting in line.

title: It is just so easy!
review: I‚Äôm a first time user of this app! I was able to download and get my food order in only a few minutes. I could not be happier with it. Thanks for making it so simple that my 13 year old needed no explanation on how to order her own food.

title: Terrible terrible app
review: I used to order from subway all the time because the app was better than waiting in line. They've lost at least 3 orders from me now because the app is terrible. It never works and it's not intuitive at all and in tech savvy
developerResponse: {'id': 1246204, 'body': 'We are working on ways to improve the app experience -we would love your feedback to understand how to make the process easier for you. Please reach out to us at 1-800-888-4848 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.', 'modified': '2017-09-12T19:53:35Z'}

title: Great Food Great Service
review: We order from various nearby towns. Our experience continually includes tasty subs, great service, and kind, courteous work crews. On a few occasions, the sub was not toasted, but that‚Äôs a rare occurrence. Ordering via the app is easy, and convenient. Subway continues to be a weekly must for the whole family.

title: Disappointed in customization options
review: Honestly, I can‚Äôt review much of the app because past downloading it and signing up, I didn‚Äôt even get to complete an order. There‚Äôs limited options for each sandwich. And it‚Äôs missing an option for ‚Äúbuild your own‚Äù sandwich. The same as the ridiculous drive through menu that is order on your own. So that was a waste of a download, it‚Äôs just getting deleted.

title: Inconvenient
review: I ordered through the subway app. One of our sandwiches was made incorrectly and several items were missing. When I called the store they said there was nothing they could do to correct my order or replace the missing items. The manager was extremely rude and unhelpful. He blamed everything on the app. There are many other and much tastier sub shops. I gave subway another chance but I will never return again.

title: Broken App
review: I used this app a lot and while it had a few glitches was still pretty good and very convenient. However, now the app is completely broken. When you attempt to check out, it gives an error message, charges your account but doesn‚Äôt place the order. Uninstalled and reinstalled hoping it would fix it, but it did not. Don‚Äôt waste your time on this app until they fix it.

title: Great App!
review: The App works great! I haven‚Äôt had any issues.  The only thing I would like the option to do, is to lock my favorite location.  I always have to search for it. Other than this, all is well.

title: Minor Complaint
review: App is great; use it weekly. However; there are times I just want to peruse the menu but am unable to do so because the shops haven‚Äôt opened yet. I would like to see the menu made available separately from the order button.

title: No help whatsoever
review: I am giving it a one star because I can‚Äôt give it zero stars. The app doesn‚Äôt have customer support like UberEats or DoorDash, there‚Äôs no way to report issues like the one I experienced three days ago and your customer service via email says they can‚Äôt refund me over your mistake of not fulfilling my entire order (I am missing two items that I paid for) so I just lost my money and won‚Äôt ever be using your app again.

title: Major updates needed for this app! Always disappointed
review:
This app needs an option to create your own sandwich as one of my kids is very specific. 

The condiments and options available at the locations are never accurate. I typically order the turkey Italiano and Most of the time the app tells me that the item is not available when it actually is.

title: This app is a usability nightmare
review:
Won‚Äôt let you type in a password if you try to create an account during checkout. There‚Äôs no way to update your account settings without creating an order and processing it into the checkout stage. You can‚Äôt do **that** if the stores around you are all closed. Stupid app designed by a team that considered only one use case in a world where nothing **ever** goes wrong.

The subs good, though, only the app is terrible.

title: Psst your cart is empty
review: I have had this message for over two months. I cannot use the app or order anything because the app deletes it every time. I‚Äôve ordered 2-3 sandwiches a week for years and basically stopped going to Subway because of this, and there is no fix. I can order from DoorDash, but then I miss out on the measly Subway points and some items or options aren‚Äôt available there. Just a horrible app experience.

title: Decent app
review: The app works mostly ok. I‚Äôve had problems with a double order and ended up with way too much food. But the part that seems the most inconvenient is that there aren‚Äôt options for all of the chips that are offered in store.

title: Needs more options
review: This may be user error, but while placing a mobile order I couldn‚Äôt figure out how to add certain things to the sandwiches. My daughter likes chicken and salami on hers. Could not find a sandwich that would let me add both. Just one or the other. I didn‚Äôt see an option to build your own sandwich.

title: 1 Star
review: for a restaurant that promotes and revolves around eating subs how you want, and making custom sandwiches on this app you can't do that.. you cannot order food how you want, your choices are so limited compared to ordering in person was going to order some food but got frustrated with this feature and ordered mcdonalds instead.. atleast even for them you can be more creative on what you do and don't want on your food than subway 0 stars

title: Very convenient!
review: I would just like to ask that there be an added option to have your sandwich heated, not just toasted. Also, the drink options on the app are very limited. The app needs to have more options or a way to type in your drink choice.

title: Online ordering
review: Everything is great!  Love the picture so you can see what‚Äôs on your sandwich.  Wish I could make a partial payment with a gift card and then pay the rest with my debit card

title: Read if You Have Kids
review: This app is great unless you have a picky eater that you want to share a sandwich with.  Unlike the pizza apps, there isn‚Äôt an option to put veggies on just half the sandwich or a place to add notes. If this feature was added, ordering would be perfect!

title: Literally doesn‚Äôt work
review: I don‚Äôt know how anybody approves this garbage. I am unable to create an account in either the app or on their website using multiple different emails. It lets me continue as a guest, only to block me from actually ordering behind a pop up that requires me to login or create an account. This problem has existed for literally years and I have yet to see any solution. How they have any new customers baffles me.

title: Easy, fast, efficient
review: Love my subway app!! Super easy, have my few favorites saved for a faster check out. Comes in handy when the line is so long in and out of the store. Why didn‚Äôt I find this app sooner?!

title: Worst experience ever!
review:
I ordered through the app, it‚Äôs stopped and closed all of a sudden and didn‚Äôt even have my order at the location when they charged me for it on my account. Plus I wasted my time traveling for pick up! 
At least have the courtesy to have the decent set up when you offering deals on the app. 
I‚Äôd never ever process online transactions or even buy online for subway when they showing deals. Worst!

title: Dear subway
review: I love you but it can‚Äôt be this hard to make a stable ordering app. I have no idea why you have 4.8stars. I‚Äôm giving the current build 1 star previous versions 3 at most. It‚Äôs always been glitchy but now it can even find a subway near me, I can see the subway on your map, but nothing comes up, and I can‚Äôt search for it. Doesn‚Äôt load my favorites...basically I‚Äôm giving up ordering a sandwich tonight because it wholly unusable. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

title: Simple to use!
review: Love it‚Äôs ease of use adding and subtracting toppings. Only thing that would make it better for me is making the line between each item heavier so they don‚Äôt run into each other but there‚Äôs more delineation between items.

title: How do I contact?
review: There‚Äôs no way to see what money I have in my account, you guys took out money yesterday but did not actually place the order so I had to pay with cash when I got there. Today I thought the money was there in my account I ordered again and you guys took money out again out of my bank account. How do I contact somebody so I can find out how to credit my account. I need to talk to somebody. Your app does not allow me to talk to anybody

title: Awesome
review: This is my second time using the app. I found it very easy to add or delete items. Although the app is great, my 84 year old mother tried to call and order a sandwich. They told her she had to use the app. She can‚Äôt drive and has a basic flip phone. She doesn‚Äôt know what an app is. Very disappointed you can‚Äôt call.

title: World‚Äôs worst app!!!
review:
This app does not work. When you try to customize it doesn‚Äôt let you change anything. When I try to place the order, it accepts my payment and then I get an error message that I can‚Äôt place the order. Tonight it said the store is closed on Sunday when in fact it‚Äôs open until 9 pm. If you want business from an app, you need to be certain that it works appropriately. 
This app doesn‚Äôt deserve any stars unless you rate it on the degree of garbage that it amounts to.

title: Easiest App!
review: Love this app! It is one of the easiest (probably the easiest), ones I‚Äôve used and it is so nice to just walk in and grab our order! Although it would be nice if when they send out coupons, they would be coded so we could use them in the app.

title: Be careful using app. Cannot cancel order once placed. I never got a refund.
review: Be careful using app. I had ordered food then tried to cancel order so I could order from Subway store because they had more selection. I ended up paying for food from app and at the store. Was told you can‚Äôt cancel order that you have to email corporate. I emailed corporate as I was told but never got a refund.

title: Good app
review: I like the subway app, I have been using it for quite some time now (almost since its‚Äô inception I think)...it has been modified several times now and every time it gets better...I think it is at least one of the top 3 food apps that I have used

title: Great when it works!
review:
Not happy that to get a deal you have to use the app and the app even gets it wrong. How frustrating. This is the last time trying. I‚Äôm frustrated that I had to deal with a computer when it totally wasn‚Äôt necessary. The older clientele hate to use your app because it still isn‚Äôt a correct order even when I screenshot to prove it. 
Thanks for shutting out an entire generation of people from your business. You might want to reconsider your deals.
Good luck.

title: Subway App
review: I like tthe idea of the app but the buttons don‚Äôt functionally work well.. I added one sub but it didn‚Äôt automatically addd cheese so I went back in to add cheese. It showed on my ticket before I paid that there was 2 sandwiches and after I paid it showed 3 because one sub was ordered without cheese and one was with cheese. I asked the store for a refund and they couldn‚Äôt give one. It‚Äôs very inconvenient.

title: Do not order online
review: Do not order online or via the app. It is in your best interest to go to the store in person. I accidentally ordered using the wrong credit card (my dads) and the store was unable to refund it. When trying to cancel they ask me to call the store. I tried to multiple times, and when I arrived at the store they said there was nothing they could do. This is not the first time the app has not worked for me and this I do not encourage others to use it!!!

title: Cart Gets Deleted
review: The app is nice; it features good in-app only deals. However, if I place an order, and that time slot is taken, an error message pops up. After this, the entire cart is deleted. It is irritating having to remake the whole order again and hope another time isn't taken.

title: Love This App - #SubwayRocks
review: I really like this app. I always get a lot of items on my sandwiches so being able to easily build it on the app and pickup is great! I can‚Äôt wait for this app to work with Alexa so I can order using my voice! Thanks Subway! You rock! Well done keeping up with technology.

title: Not Fully Customizable!
review: I tried to order from the app but this app is useless to me.  For a person on low carb diets this app is useless.  Even under the customization for the sandwiches there is no way to remove bread.  I don‚Äôt want a chopped salad, I want a breadless sandwich.  To fully customize this I have to go in the location and order, other than that the app is great.  Just wish it were more user friendly as to ordering in person is.

title: Amazing App
review: Love this app! I can manage my subway gift cards to pay and get credit tokens earning money off and seeing daily deals to take advAntage of additional savings!!!!! The best part is walk in and pickup my food no waiting in line so fast and convenient for on the go lunchtimeüòÅ

title: Love it
review: I hate having to give a long list of specs when someone else goes to Subway for me. This app allows me to order and have someone pick it up for me without bothering them. Today I was sick and my hubby was able to walk right in and get my order for me.

title: It works
review: The Subway app has improved greatly. It‚Äôs very easy to create an order for pick-up, customize your meal, and see nutrition information.  My only complaint is that some ordering options do NOT appear in the app (such as all of the different breads and sauces).

title: Awesome.
review: I love this app. Going to Subway and standing in line while trying to order four sandwiches is very difficult. This way, I can order right from my phone, then go and pick it up, and pre-pay for it already. Easy to use and very convenient!

title: Nice app but doesn‚Äôt work.
review: I‚Äôve tried to order numerous times through the app and it‚Äôs only worked once. Not sure what the problem is. The one time it worked was really nice but I can never get it to work anymore. I don‚Äôt know what the problem is.

title: Excellent Convenience
review: I am very pleased with the Subway app.  It is especially convenient when ordering for multiple people as each can select and customize their choices. So far orders have been ready to go when I went to pick up.

title: Better app navigation
review: The app can be difficult to navigate. I have ordered off of it a few times, but never received the tokens that are promised; it still shows 0. The restaurant that I go to is very prompt and makes their food very well, so that‚Äôs the only plus of having the app to order ahead.
developerResponse: {'id': 6643234, 'body': "Your feedback is really important to us and we're always looking for ways to improve your experience! Feel free to reach out to us at (833)-778-2929 or via email at appfeedback@subway.com.", 'modified': '2019-01-02T16:30:28Z'}

title: Didn‚Äôt work for me
review:
I kept being told I can go on line and use my receipt to get the points I didn‚Äôt get when I purchased products. I never could figure out where or how to do it. When I asked an employee they couldn‚Äôt figure it out either.

Update: Months later I got a developers response finally and like all of the rest that were sent out to people with complaints it says contact you? I thought that‚Äôs what my review did. That‚Äôs pretty lame. I‚Äôm just not going to rely on your app.

You will be directed to log in to your account. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-12-11T14:36:03Z'}

title: Payment Option
review:
Can you fix the app so we can use multiple payments? I‚Äôd like to use up my gift cards and apply the difference to my credit card. 
It just says ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt order choose another payment option‚Äù which is LAME.

title: Something goes wrong
review: I used to order through app it‚Äôs more convenient for me but I just bought iPhone XS this week and something goes wrong, I can‚Äôt choose the locations and the app doesn‚Äôt work cause  I can‚Äôt process my order since I can‚Äôt choose the location , hope you can fix this issue
developerResponse: {'id': 5316115, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (833)-778-2929, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-10-01T20:16:26Z'}

title: Doesn‚Äôt work
review:
Couldn‚Äôt even sign-in, after the sign up process I would be redirected to the start up page of the app and then the reset password page.

I tried signing-in with the my email and password only to get kicked into the ‚Äúforgot my password page‚Äù.

Tried signing-in again multiple times to have this happen. I tried to reset my password to see if that would fix it but it didn‚Äôt, just kept sending me to reset my password over and over. 

I‚Äôm assuming the sign-in button doesn‚Äôt work properly so I can‚Äôt actually sign-in, and since the ‚Äúforgot password‚Äù button is right underneath it redirects me there despite delicately trying to press ‚Äúsign-in‚Äù over 10 times.

This app needs a lot of work if right off the bat you‚Äôre unable to get in...

title: Very easy
review: Many fast food restaurants you go to today have apps for easy ordering. Some of them complicated while others are easy. I personally find the SUBWAY¬Æ app very easy to use. I would recommend it for those who like to order via apps.

title: Not there yet...
review:
The app is still glitchy. Like it won‚Äôt let me set my actual birthday. Just keeps rolling back to a default date. 

And it doesn‚Äôt set breakfast sandwiches to the correct toasting setting. If you want your bacon toasted (you do), you have to add that as a customization. 

I think this app needs to learn the menu better. I hope they‚Äôre talking to store employees about the troubles they‚Äôre dealing with. They are the true front lines for this company.

title: New rev app not work:(
review:
I've used this app successfully numerous times in the past. Now, with new rev. It doesn't work. You've waisted my time!!!!!!!!

App is improved (still a few issues now and again) and I love the quick list reorder and go to head of the line at the restaurant. 
All good:)
