title: Paid for food I didn‚Äôt eat!!!!
review: To big problems I had with this app. The first time I used this app. I added a note to grill the vegetables with my sandwich and the employees never got the note. The second time I ordered a salad on the app and the app told me my order failed to go through. I didn‚Äôt have the time to order in the store so I never went. Later I received an email telling me thank you for your order. So my order actually did go through and I paid for a salad I never picked up. Thanks Subway!!!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 2706885, 'body': 'Hi there- so sorry for the inconvenience. Please share more details with us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com- so we can make this right. Please mention or have ready the restaurant location, date/time you placed the order, and your user name when contacting us. Thank You.', 'modified': '2018-02-28T20:38:07Z'}

title: Terrible app
review:
More thought should have been put into this app and more testing should have been done before this app was ever put on the store.

The only way to pay for food in the app is with MasterCard Masterpass, which is not what was advertised on the store.

Really disappointing app.
developerResponse: {'id': 2186080, 'body': 'Hey there- thank you for the feedback. To add a credit, debit or Subway¬Æ card, as well as PayPal- simply access Payment Methods in the Menu. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-01-02T20:30:06Z'}

title: Awesome App.
review: Been using it for a year now and it has not failed me yet. Always prepared on time for pickup. Simple to use and also easy to save your favorites for future order‚Äôs. Definitely recommend this app. Love Subway

title: Looks amazing! Still haven't fixed many bugs.
review: Please please please fix the issue where you cannot get past the "currently selected" store to start your order unless you switch to a different store and back. Most people order from the same store every time, so this is a frustratingly absurd bug to have (especially for this long).
developerResponse: {'id': 1097364, 'body': 'Hi- we are sorry to hear that your experience has been less than excellent. Have you attempted to log out and back in? Are you operating the most recent update for our mobile app? If so, and the problem continues, would you mind reaching out to us at appfeedback@subway.com so we can take a closer look at this for you? Thank You!', 'modified': '2017-08-24T17:50:32Z'}

title: Glitchy mess, charged twice
review: The app is horrible. Ordered, put in my payment, then got a message that the payment didn‚Äôt process. So - I ordered again at a different store location, and it processed. Later - checked my bank account and was charged for the first order the app said it didn‚Äôt process. Corporation said there‚Äôs nothing THEY can do and it‚Äôs up to the individual store. This is strange as the app is owned and operated by the franchised, not the store.

title: The app
review: The app is very simple to use and very convenient as I travel at least 45 minutes to work. Easy enough to jump on and get what I need swing through and head on out. Thank you subway!

title: Thank
review: Easy to go the app. Great food and super people at this location. Special shout-out to kaitlyn and guy helping her but especially kaitlyn. She is very sweet and helpful and patient! We will start coming again on a regular basis. Thank you. Nice not to have to cook on my birthday.

title: Love new app and staff
review: I love the improvements in the app making it easier to customize your order. It‚Äôs also easier to see what you‚Äôre ordering.  Of course the staff at my regular store are always fantastic.

title: Theft. An app written by criminals and hacks.
review:
This app contains no functionality for resolving problems with orders that were delivered. When they fail to deliver items in your order (which happens most of the time), you can‚Äôt get a refund for things you paid for but did not receive. This is theft / fraud. 

The communications are insecure as evidenced by many complaints about stolen credit cards. Avoid this app. It is a terrible customer experience and unsafe to use.

title: Update Broke Favorites
review: Used the favorites function to order a sandwich. The favorite I have saved has regular meat because that‚Äôs my typical order. Apparently with a recent app update if you change to double meat it gets rid of your customizations and adds a default set of garbage that you don‚Äôt want. The app should never override the user‚Äôs set of ingredients when changing attributes. Terrible customer experience resulting in food waste and wasted money.

title: Great service!
review: This is my favorite store. When I come in to order the crew is so fast and efficient, and did mention friendly. When I order online everything is done correctly!

title: Many issues
review:
First the sandwich options (veggie and sauce) reset if you change your sandwich size‚Ä¶ why?

Also the app asked me how I enjoyed using it, it presented a pop up to send an email, which I filled out then sent. Only to get an email back from them saying that the email address is no longer monitored. Then why have me send the email‚Ä¶ update the app. 

I love the sandwiches but the developers of the app need some time to get the basics right.

title: Broken
review: I have the same problem many users have where I add items to the cart and when I try to checkout, the app throws up an error saying my cart is empty. Apparently the app is deleting my cart items when I tap the checkout button. I just tried 5 or 6 times with different combinations of items and the same thing happened every time. Was hoping to use the BOGO50 coupon, but I guess it‚Äôs Jersey Mike‚Äôs for lunch today.

title: Promotion notifications that you can‚Äôt use
review: Frequently I get promotion notification, but when trying to use it, standard message:‚Äùthis location not participating in this promotion ‚Äú . Just waste of time and need to start over. It will be nice, if I can know if a location is participating in a promotion or not without wasting time.

title: Unreliable and Bug-ridden
review: This is the least effective fast-food restaurant app I‚Äôve ever used. The first clue is that it opens with an error state as soon as it‚Äôs launched. Doesn‚Äôt get much better from there. Today‚Äôs problems have included having it change the selected store from Ashburn, VA to one located in Brooklyn, NY.  Once I had the sandwiches loaded into the cart, I was unable to submit the order - it would simply error-out with no explanation. Did this app ever get tested?

title: Glitchy but usible
review: There are many issues with this app, orders are not always registered as fulfilled, it is slow, when ordering from favorites, it asks if I want to add the order to my favorite, and when I select a payment method, I have to scroll away from the order button, which is grayed out, and scroll back to be able to place an order.

title: Horrible app loses orders
review:
Twice in two weeks on two different phones this app charged our credit card but lost the order.  The ‚Äúmanager‚Äù at one location said they have no way to look up the order number shown and give us our food.  Went to another restaurant since they weren‚Äôt willing to do anything.

Only download this app if you hate yourself or you are installing it on the phone of your worst enemy!

title: Love it!
review: I really like the subway app. Very easy to order and pick up. We so far have never had a mistake on our orders. It is nice to pick up quick and go. Also, the special deals in the app make it totally worth it.

title: I app has definitely improved.
review: This app used to be very hard to maneuver. I see where changes were made and it is much easier. Sometimes it is a bit slow so I would write it at 90%. This app has definitely improved.

title: Sandwiches are thin when ordered through the app
review: The app itself is okay. However, every time I order through the app they add ingredients in very few quantities to my sandwich. I thought this was the case for one particular location but everywhere I use the app I end up with a thin sandwich. They take advantage of the fact that you are not there to cut back on ingredients, even the cheap ones like lettuce. But they still charge full price. Rip off.

title: Force closing
review:
App works good until you get to the paying part and it closes the app without letting you know if order processed or not (when using apple pay)
Also would be nice to check in and view mobile order progress in app instead of having to see in email

title: Easy Ordering
review: I love the convenience of ordering through my app and just pulling up to pick up my order and by pass a line! I highly recommend the use of this app especially during lunch time!

title: Makes ordering and receiving fast food a pain in the‚Ä¶
review: App spins and takes forever to load new screens. Tells me that a BMT is not available at the location, which is weird since I see it on the menu and have never been to a subway that didn‚Äôt have it. Sat in my car and tried to order a sandwich and saw 5 people go in store and go out with a sandwich before I decided to delete the app and go to a diff restaurant on my lunch break.

title: Always perfect
review: This particular location is the best in our area! We always get exactly what we order, how we order it. Always fresh and never a wait when we pickup! Always an awesome experience.

title: Needs improvement
review: You can‚Äôt set a pickup time which makes this app useless . You can‚Äôt split a payment between a gift card and credit card. It‚Äôs hard to navigate.

title: App won‚Äôt allow multiple payment methods and store won‚Äôt accept funds from app
review: I ordered a sub and the clerk tells me they don‚Äôt accept funds from the app. So I went to place an order on the app, but it would allow me to use my gift card because it didn‚Äôt have the full amount available. I have other cards in the app, but no way to use multiple payment methods, so I will be stuck with unused funds on all my gift cards!

title: Hopefully, this APP has improved!
review: Look, I LOVE SUBWAY üòòü•∞üòªüôå BUT the app was driving me insane! And it is the only way I wanted to order SW. I wanted to order & go get my deliciousness in the 15 minutes they would have it ready but the app was terrible so I stopped ordering. Now though it seems all is good! Boy, did I miss you SW!ü§§üòò‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Subway App
review: I‚Äôve had several occasions where the app will freeze up and I have to start all over. And the app has also charged me twice because it said the first order didn‚Äôt go through, but it did. So we end up with sandwiches from 2 orders.

title: Never loads locations
review: I have tried so many times to get this app to work. I‚Äôve even deleted and downloaded again more than once. It never finds any stores so I can‚Äôt order. I‚Äôve tried looking for stores in both my city and other cities and I‚Äôve never been able to find a single restaurant. I‚Äôve tried typing in zip codes, zooming to different location on the map, using my exact location. Nothing works.

title: Written options
review: If there is such an option I didn‚Äôt see it. If there is not it would be nice to request something on the sandwich that isn‚Äôt a drop down option. For example I like the meatballs cut in half so when you bite it to the sub it‚Äôs proportional.

title: No way to reconcile store errors from app
review: You need to add a way to request a refund for incorrect orders direct in the app.  Ordering thru the app is easy but the water sack employees can‚Äôt seem to make the sandwich the way it is requested in the app. 2x now back to back.  I should not have to tear into each sandwich in the parking lot to be sure that they are assembled correctly, but I do because the employees can‚Äôt follow the order sheet.

title: Can‚Äôt order
review:
Can‚Äôt order anything because no matter what I click on or type in for it to find a subway near my location it just keeps popping up with the search this location and when I do that it just keeps glitching.
Useless app when you can‚Äôt order anything because it won‚Äôt recognize you hitting buttons to search

title: Bad but useable
review: Add an option that lets you custom make a sub... you‚Äôre called subway and decided to base a restaurant around customizing and creating your own sub just to not be able to do that on the app, weird. The only thing i like about the app is that it is, in fact, usable. if you only like to pick from the same 8 subs, that is.

title: Easy to use but needs some changes
review: I don‚Äôt like that they have pre selected bread and toppings if you‚Äôre not careful you‚Äôll order a sub you don‚Äôt want. I wish I could use 2 different gift card balances to be able to use up the balance of them before using my credit card.

title: Order button
review: On one screen the continue button is in green at the bottom and on the next screen the order button is in green in the same place. I have accidentally ordered one sub before I‚Äôm finished with a four sub order so many times!!!! It is extremely frustrating!

title: Hot Garbage
review: I like subway... it‚Äôs not my favorite, but when I‚Äôm of a mind, I want my sandwich the way I like it, not the way that‚Äôs easiest for some developer. My husband doesn‚Äôt eat veggies so he gets all sauce. The app only allows you to put four. I like my bread NOT toasted, but heated. That‚Äôs not an option. The amount of problems with this app reduce it to a spot on my phone that I never use. You might want to fix this because although I don‚Äôt usually crave subway, my husband would inject it into his veins, if he could.

title: Self Submitting Order
review: I try to place my order, it would leave some sandwiches in the cart, it placed an unwanted sandwich in the cart and when I tried to delete a sandwich and add the right one, it auto submitted. Couldn‚Äôt cancel the order, I was not able to use the deal because I had to separate the order. Called the restaurant to cancel first order, they didn‚Äôt answer. In their defense they were really busy. Anyways, I should be able to immediately cancel my order on the app.

title: App is great!
review: It is very easy to use and convenient during the covid-19 pandemic. The app however is missing some menu items such as meat options and sauce options. For instance one of my favorite sauces is the spicy mustard and it is not an option. Will be using this app frequently! Thanks for the great app!

title: Fast and easy to use although on credit information auto fill would be a nice addition!
review: Fast and easy to use although on credit information auto fill would be a nice addition!

title: SO THANKFUL THIS SUBWAY HAS REOPENED!!
review: I love the owners/crew of this store.  Not only is the food excellent, the store clean, and service friendly, it‚Äôs like a local diner ... you always see someone you know!  Plus, for the ‚Äúfrequent flyers‚Äù, they pretty much know what you‚Äôre ordering before you get inside the door!  It‚Äôs SO nice to have you back!!!

title: No help option when needed
review: Placed order in app, received confirmation email and went to pickup.  Store said they had no record of order.  Manager refused to look at confirmation email and told us to contact subway corporate as it was not their problem.  Subway corporate has no phone number to call and I received a standard email several days after I contacted them.  Never will I use app again as they took my money and I cannot even talk to anyone to fix problem.

title: Order Keeps being Cancelled
review: I recently tried the Subway app for the first time. I placed an order of 5 sandwiches, paid, received a conformation, only to have the order cancelled within 5 minutes of placing it. I tried two more times with the same result. I thought maybe the app was down that day, no big deal. Then today I tried the app again; same thing. This makes no sense, and calling the store didn‚Äôt help because they had no clue what I was talking about. Disappointing...

title: Fantastic
review: I have been coming to this location since we moved here and have been blessed with some of the most wonderful people at this location. I have my mom drive down from 20 miles away just to have a sandwich with us.

title: First time user
review: Shelter in place order has us looking for meal options each day. The app is easy and FUN to use! We love it! We were even able to adjust our pick up time. Thanks, Subway, for making ordering easy in this challenging time!

title: App works great and makes pickup fast & easy
review: The app has been very helpful for quick and easy pickup. I would give it 5 stars if there was an option to add comments for each sandwich or if it included store specific ingredients/menu items. Like my subway has garlic oil, but that menu item is not in the app.

title: Great App!
review: After I figured out the Subway App it was easy-peezy.  On my initial use of the app I made a lot of mistakes - my fault.  Once I ironed out the errors it was easy to place a ‚ÄúPickup‚Äù order, drive there 15 minutes, or so, later, and retrieve the sandwich.  No lines or anything. Quick and easy!

title: Picky kids will be the death of me üòÇ
review: Very easy and simple ordering only things I was highly displeased with was not being able to add an item to only one side of the sub and certain items that are in store aren‚Äôt on the app (such as sauces and chips/drinks, they had about 4 options to choose from and the picture posted didnt even match the options)

title: Very user friendly
review: So easy to place an order and pay. Only thing I wish is that the soups were available on the app to order. We have to order those separately when we go in to pick up online order.

title: Missing rewards
review: I always have issues with my rewards. I got an email that one was about to expire and couldn‚Äôt find the reward anywhere to use that day. I also don‚Äôt get tokens for some of my purchases. I wait the 24 hours and even submit the information from my receipt for a missing tokens report. Never got anything.
developerResponse: {'id': 12755959, 'body': "We appreciate you sharing your feedback, and are always looking for ways to enhance the mobile app experience for our guests. You can always reach out to us by tapping 'Contact Us' in the Menu, or at (833)-778-2929.\r\n", 'modified': '2020-01-06T22:30:30Z'}

title: App issues
review:
The staff is very nice but I ordered cookies and went to pick up my meal and it did not show on their receipt so I had to open my app and show them that I did in fact order the cookies. 

Also you need to update the new items available

title: Love the new options
review: Finally can say extra or less ingredients. Build the sandwich exactly like someone wants to. Great app! When I‚Äôm on the way, I click a couple of buttons now and my meal is waiting for me to pick up when I walk in within minutes.

title: One issue. Don‚Äôt forget to Toast it!!
review:
I always forget to toast it! 
Please place the option to toast it and change the bread some where extremely obvious for people like me me. 

But overall the app is working great! I find it easier to order ahead instead of having to explain it to the Sandwich-ista(Artists) over the counter.

title: Subway messes up
review: Since they updated the app I am unable to get it to load. Also I am a rewards member and anytime I go into Subway they are unable to add my purchases for points. The last time was in December and I sent the info in to get my points added and got a response they received my request to add my points but never received confirmation that my points were added. Not receiving my points so many times has made me considering no longer supporting Subway. Very Disappointed!

title: Much better
review: I had a lot of problems with previous versions of the app but everything has been running smoothly the last couple of months. Use this app all the time now and seems to work great! Thanks!

title: They were on it!
review: Really appreciated the convenience and ease of the service provided. Also learned a new app will be launched to deliver with Uber-eats starting tomorrow. I personally prefer the more personal fave to face approach but I don‚Äôt feel it was lost in this process today. Great service and friendly.

title: App is good but needs more options
review: App is good and practical for when I forget my wallet. :)The only thing is that I sometimes find myself a little stuck when I can‚Äôt find the options I get when I‚Äôm presently at subway. For example, there‚Äôs the choice of flat bread but couldn‚Äôt find the option for wheat.

title: WHAT HAPPENED?!?
review: I gave one star because you have broken way worked. It‚Äôs so much trouble it isn‚Äôt even worth using. This used to be the easiest app to use, was very responsive, save the changes correctly, and was easy to navigate. Now it isn‚Äôt. It won‚Äôt save changes you do to the sandwich, it won‚Äôt allow you to add favorites, it isn‚Äôt allowing you to pick drink sizes. This used to be easier than the Starbucks app. Can you please fix this? All this happened after the last update.

title: Unable to use Subway app
review: I get texts for rewards and have a card that I want to attach. Can‚Äôt get past Email address & Password. Keeps kicking back to Forgot your Password? I even deleted the app and downloaded it again. Very frustrating!

title: App not working
review: Yep not working today. Keep getting error messages. When it has worked in the past, I can‚Äôt figure out how to pay for my order when I‚Äôm in the store, only if I order ahead through my app. And the employees don‚Äôt know how to help me either.

Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-07-05T13:27:05Z'}

title: Pointless
review:
I enjoy going to subway however this rewards app is super inconvenient to be required to scan my phone for points. Theres no phone number associated to connect you to your rewards. There‚Äôs no way to scan for your points AFTER you get your receipt! The one time I did remember to scan my phone beforehand I didn‚Äôt get my points, the cashier finished the transaction and said it‚Äôs too late I can‚Äôt get my points. 
Saving your past orders is helpful but the rest is pointless.
developerResponse: {'id': 4255795, 'body': "Hi there- you can earn tokens on purchases using your phone number (associated with your account), a plastic Subway¬Æ Rewards/Gift card or the mobile app. If you didn't scan before the transaction was complete, you can also request your tokens by logging into your Subway¬Æ MyWay Rewards account on our website and filling out the Missing Tokens Request form. If you have any additional questions, don't hesitate to reach out at (833)-778-2929. Thank You!", 'modified': '2018-07-16T13:53:50Z'}

title: Good app but needs fine tuning
review:
Pros:
I can create my meal and customize my sandwich item by item and pick the location abd time for pickup. I can also reorder from my previous purchases. 

Cons:
I cannot reorder and change the pickup location. I have to start the order from scratch. 
I should be able to reorder a previous item, and just change the location for pickup. 

Also not sure if you can include any promo codes fir coupons texted to me. I haven‚Äôt tried but I don‚Äôt recall seeing a field for this. Would be nice if promos camevto me via the app vs text.

title: Can‚Äôt even order a foot long
review: Tried to order a foot long and the only option they showed on the app was 6 inches. I called customer support and the person tried to have me recite my order to them over the phone instead of telling me a way to order a foot long from the app. She asked if I tried ordering online from a computer which I hadn‚Äôt. So I gave it a shot and the only two options given to me were 6 inches and chopped salad. Why can‚Äôt I order the thing that Subway is best known for?
developerResponse: {'id': 3478230, 'body': 'We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. The location may need to adjust their menu. Please contact us at (833)-778-2929 or appfeedback@subway.com. so that we can make this right! Please mention your concerns, the restaurant location, and your user name while contacting us. We look forward to hearing from you.', 'modified': '2018-05-15T20:37:19Z'}

title: Great App
review: I love having my order delivered.  My sandwich comes quicker than if I had to drive to the store and pick it up and drive back in traffic.  The sandwiches are always made correctly. The app is easy to use.

title: Bad app!
review: When this app worked (which was 50/50) it was nice I could go in and pick up my sandwich really easy. Now my app does not work, and hasn‚Äôt worked for about a month or longer.  Guess how many sandwiches I have purchased from the store during that time‚Ä¶ Zero! I have been trying to close it down and restart it and nothing! What is the point of having this app available to your customers if it doesn‚Äôt work! Do you realize how much business you are losing?
developerResponse: {'id': 2348390, 'body': 'Hi there- we are here to help! Please contact our support team at (800)-888-4848, or by email at appfeedback@subway.com. Have your app version, device type, and the steps to reproduce any errors ready- so we can investigate and address these concerns for you. Thank You!', 'modified': '2018-01-19T17:23:58Z'}

title: I wish it worked consistently
review:
When it works, it works great. 
Unfortunately, every time I go to use it I have to delete it and re-install it. If I don't I get an error that my cart is expired and it won't let me place an order. 
I wish it had a "build your own sandwich" option. I have a child that substitutes one meat for another one and it's not an option on the app. I wind up having to call her order in separately.
developerResponse: {'id': 1144863, 'body': 'Hi there. We are really sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with our new App experience. We highly value your feedback and would be interested in some more details regarding your experience. We would love to hear from you at appfeedback@subway.com. We are always looking for ways to improve the experience with possible future enhancements. We also wanted to make sure that you could see the "Special Instructions" field on the "Your Order" screen- you should be able to note your child\'s substitution in that field without a problem. As always, thank you for choosing Subway¬Æ!', 'modified': '2017-08-30T22:12:12Z'}

title: Can‚Äôt view menu when store is closed
review: I was trying to view the menu and see what we previously ordered, but because the stores were closed, I couldn‚Äôt view the order. Maybe have a notification that says they are closed but an order can be made for a future time, like another restaurant app I have. Would be more stars otherwise, 4 or 5 if it lets you switch stores and keep your cart.

title: Multiple problems
review: It lags often & doesn‚Äôt allow for multiple methods of payment. And you can only use one method of payment per transaction. For example, if you have multiple gift cards, or a combination of gift card(s) and another method of payment, it doesn‚Äôt allow you to combine. They force you to order online for many coupons, but then you can‚Äôt pay the way you want.

title: It says download app and earn rewards but totally lie!
review: There is no rewards and any points when you download it. It is disappointed. It is not worth to download it for get points or deals. There is a special offer and deals on app but it says the point of subway coupons no subway restaurant participate in your areas which I live in downtown Seattle! I tried other locations but didn‚Äôt work. Totally waste your time to get food from here.

title: Could be better
review: Subway should add a category for the available soup(s), the ability to request sauce on the side or vegetables on the side and the ability to chose two different types of cheese. For example i like to get pepper-jack and provolone but on the app i can only select one cheese.

title: Works half the time
review: Thought this would save time but takes longer to add sandwiches and pay compared to just ordering at the store. And there are always errors! Tried and tried to get Apple Pay or credit card to go through and it spins and spins and then gives you error. Then an email arrives AFTER you have gone in, ordered, and paid saying your order is waiting ugh! Paid twice!

title: waste of time
review: Seriously this app is so terrible! It rarely works. The annoying thing is you don‚Äôt know that the app doesn‚Äôt work until you are done with the options and going to pay. I had a long order and was adding things to my cart. When I went to review and pay the stupid cart wouldn‚Äôt load. It kept saying refresh cart or return to menu. I swear this app is junk and a serious waste of time.

title: Glitchiest restaurant app out there
review: I was charged for the second time now through Apple Pay and Subway‚Äôs app crashed. So the charge went through both times and the order didn‚Äôt. The only way to get your money back is to call your bank. What a joke. You‚Äôd think in this day in age they could keep up with the programming necessary for a stable app, but they can‚Äôt.

title: App map too stupid
review: I can scan for location on map but stores are not shown and I can‚Äôt force app yo ‚Äúsearch this area‚Äù. I can‚Äôt order from a store that opens at 8:30 even though it is currently 8:28.  Can‚Äôt filter to only show stores taking online orders!

title: My first online order
review: Order was not completely accurate as I was given Lays Classic chips instead of Baked Lays chips I ordered. Ate them anyway as I am working & did not have time to return to store as I only have half-hour. Arrived very close to 11:45 AM & sandwich was not very hot; still good taste.

title: Horrible
review: I ordered a sub online and the subway said they can‚Äôt make it and I have to cancel it in the app. Problem is you can‚Äôt cancel in the app and the there isn‚Äôt a phone number or anything. I will never order subway on the app ever again and customer service is unreachable I may never eat at subway again since they don‚Äôt care about customer service. Now I have to dispute the charge with my credit card.

title: Please allow multi payment options!
review: Love the app except one thing‚Ä¶ when I have a gift card, it doesn‚Äôt let me use that AND another payment method. So my gift card just sits there if my order is more than the GC balance. And it wouldn‚Äôt let me reload. Combing gift cards would also be a nice option. Thanks!

title: Don‚Äôt use! Won‚Äôt refund for missing food
review: Used this app to order delivery.  Delivery was missing items.  You can‚Äôt request a refund through the app.  Impossible to find where to request refund on website - had to submit form several times, that constantly rejected store number despite following their example receipt on how to find it. Just use the other food delivery apps, the ‚Äúrewards‚Äù isn‚Äôt worth it.
